name: Granny Battery
description: Spurred by the sudden death of their friend, three senior citizens attempt to break out of their nursing home to attend a rock concert.

name: WWE NXT Spring Breakin  2024 - Week 1
description: The 2024 Spring Breakin  is an ongoing professional wrestling television special produced by WWE for its developmental brand NXT. It is the third annual Spring Breakin  for the brand and is airing as a two-part special episode of NXT on the USA Network. The event is taking place on April 23 and April 30, 2024, at the WWE Performance Center in Orlando, Florida.

name: 劇場版 忍たま乱太郎 ドクタケ忍者隊最強の軍師
Baby Assassins Nice Days
description: Teenage hitmen Chisato and Mahiro go on vacation to Miyazaki, Japan, and face their biggest opponent yet.

name: Crossed
description: When a group of mercenary soldiers are hired by a Mexican cartel drug lord to retrieve a package for him and don t deliver, the drug lord suspects he s being double-crossed. He then gives the soldiers one last chance or die.

name: Portal Quest: The Thunder Sword
description: Ermythia, a beautiful world where alien relics hold incredible powers and where legendary heroes once known as the Overseers protected the land from rising dangers alongside the Ender Knights. However, this is a different era, an era where wicked forces have stolen the relics from the tombs of the fallen heroes and are now threatening the remaining peace. Seeing the dangers firsthand, Zac, one of the Overseers  descendants, embarks on an unexpected journey with old friends and new faces to find and defend the remaining relics, if any.

name: THE SCHOOL OF FIGHT
description: A determined schoolgirl challenges the top fighter in her class to avenge her best friend. However, vengeance may not be the only thing on her mind.

name: El Paso, Elsewhere
description: Recovering from a toxic relationship, James Savage confronts both his inner demons and enigmatic ex-girlfriend, Janet, before she executes a world-ending ritual. James navigates her reality-bending universe of ethereal monsters while facing the truth of his own addictions and skewed sense of self-worth. James learns that the only route to love is through healing.

name: King of the Underground
description: Gabe has been kidnapped by the dangerous Monster Magnus, King of the Underground, and it s up to Blake to save Gabe before it s too late.

name: The Political Cartel Godfather s Kille
description: In a landscape where corruption and dark power rule, a skilled, seemingly invulnerable criminal lawyer finds himself trapped in a deadly game. Accustomed to protecting high-caliber figures, his destiny takes a sinister turn when he becomes the target of a meticulously planned revenge. In an unexpected twist of fate, he is forced to confront the godfather of Mexico s political cartel, unleashing a series of events that culminate in a devastating tragedy. Can the lawyer survive in a world where loyalty is as fragile as a piece of paper, or will he succumb to the dark forces that surround him? Immerse yourself in a thriller full of intrigue, betrayal and the fight for survival in "The Godfather Killer of the Mexican Political Cartel."

name: ドラゴンボールZ 危険なふたり!超戦士はねむれない
The Path of the Greys
description: A Grey pupil in the Star Wars universe is subjected to a physical and mental test by his mentor to prove that he is on the right path of the Force: being neither Jedi nor Sith.

name: Ghost Hunter
description: Many years ago, corrupted spirits overtook the Luna forest, causing a war between humans and spirits that took the life of a brave warrior, Akira. Akira’s sons train for the day to vanquish these spirits, but when younger brother Kaya ventures into the forest, older brother Sasha is forced to face the darkness and save his brother before his soul is taken.

name: The Matrix : Suédé
description: A homemade version of the famous bullet time scene from the Matrix

name: Chalk Warfare 4.0
description: 3, 2, 1, CHALK!  Two teams are pitted against one another. Goal? to destroy the other, How? any way they wish. But how are they going to win when their only weapon is chalk?

name: Chalk Warfare
description: 3, 2, 1, CHALK! Two teams are pitted against one another. Goal? to destroy the other, How? any way they wish. But how are they going to win when their only weapon is chalk?

name: Al and the Lost World
description: Mysterious natural forces transport Alistair and David to the Lost World but how they get back home is another question.

name: 突然の来訪者 ―苛まれる青春の呪い―
The Woman in the Red Dress
description: An MMA fighter falls in love with a beautiful woman as an evil man will stop at nothing to end them.

name: Hellbound: Closet-Man 2
description: After the events of the first film, the masked superhero Closet-Man has gained some notoriety and now has new challenges to face: evil robots, arson, and his own enslavement to The Nightmare Room. Will he make it out with his life?

name: Closet-Man: Mindsweeper
description: A talk show host obtains closet-related superpowers and shows evil what s what with the help of his mannequin aid Wendy.

name: Meggy s Destiny: An SMG4 Movie
Blue Jay
description: James Butler decides to adopt  the superhero persona of Blue Jay, the question is; how brave or stupid could this decision be?

name: Keep the Faith
description: An ex-gang leader comes to Christ years after the Rapture and is persecuted in a Christian containment camp by his rival, a former drug dealer.

name: Star Wars - Showdown auf dem Schmugglermond
Rashford Biggins 2: A True Revenge Story
description: 50 years after the conclusion of the previous film, Rashford Biggins awakes from a coma only to learn the world is not the same as when he left.

name: Precious Pearl
description: A village head s son s accidental death in the sea forces the government to ban fishermen from diving in search of pearls. However, the ban obstructs the main occupation of the villagers.

name: They’re Here
description: The playful and inventive They’re Here places the viewer within a community of New Yorkers who have had close encounters with UFOs and reexamined their lifestyles as a result.

name: The Alliance: Chapter One - Operation Metamorphosis
description: In a city plagued by shadows, two unlikely allies, Doga and Dhruv, find themselves drawn together by a mysterious threat to national security. As they navigate the murky underworld, they uncover a sinister plot that blurs the lines between heroism and villainy. With the fate of their city hanging in the balance, Doga and Dhruv must use their unique abilities to confront the looming danger. But as they race against time, the ultimate question looms: will they succeed, or will the forces at play prove too formidable?

name: Krishna Balram: The Warrior Princess
description: A warrior princess from another world is hiding inside a massive lotus flower and accidentally gets exposed by Krishna Balram. Her cover thus destroyed, she is immediately tracked and attacked by her enemies who are on the lookout to eliminate her, as she is the last surviving rightful heir to the throne. Krishna and Balram take on the responsibility of protecting her.

name: Highway
description: Betrayed by her husband, Amanda, a former Army Ranger, drives hours to meet a revenge lover but is followed by a mysterious and menacing truck on lonely desert roads.

name: Return to Paradise
description: The minister of the King of Malaka frames Han, a young sailor who saved him from a pirate, thus becoming personal guard to the King, and he is thrown into the sea.

name: King Roger
description: Based on a folk tale back in the year 1681, the King expands his power over his neighbour state.

name: Devil s Daughter
description: King Daha calls on Master Warrior Baraba, whose son, Bahwula, is due to marry the witch s daughter Ratna, in the hope that they can steal the Book of Lontar and defeat Calon, a black magic witch who creates a severe drought in the Kingdom of Airlangar, in order to take over the throne.

name: No Signal Detected
description: Rhytmical combat of digital and chemical decay. (Brakhage and Sharits meet with Bruce Lee.)

name: Psycho Rabbits
description: An tragic argument between three friends leads to a catastrophic shootout, causing more violence than they ever could have imagined...

name: Bastard s Brood
description: An epic silent film depicting the tumultuous clash between twin brothers Opus Sun and Magnum Crassus.

name: ADAM
description: After The Great Catastrophe; In a world where nature has taken over, a young child tries to survive a hunter who is chasing him.

name: The Bigshot
description: THE BIG SHOT, a stunning new action short film. Made in the 3TC film/theatre class of an “average” high school.

name: Papa Movie Game On
description: Film based on "Papa Pipi" (2019).

name: Tangata Manu: The Legend of the Man-Bird
description: Filimoeika is a great warrior tasked to obtain a sacred egg that will turn him into the ruler of Rapa Nui.

name: Botching.
description: Hacking a Robot for fun, or malicious intent, is dangerous, illegal, and banned globally. It has a name: Botching. This is a story from one such  Botch  job.  In the future Robots will preform many mundane everyday functions from delivering your parcels to security jobs. This concept came to me when I read an article in Wired magazine about the possible outcomes of hacking a robot while its building a car, or cleaning your home or more terrifyingly, in the middle of an operation on a human patient. As of today there is no slang / street word for hacking a Robots Operating System yet the implications are massive when, not if this happens. This let me to develop ‘Botching’ as a concept. A hacker would be hired for a ‘Botch Job…’ The story was simple, if I had a criminal mind and I was a bit lazy what would I do with a team of robots at my command… the outcome is limited only by your imagination.

name: Evening Broadcast
description: As the snow starts falling, and the winter night rapidly approaches. two students going to a party learn about a dark conspiracy through a local radio station. Little do they know, they are already embroiled in an event that will change their lives forever...

name: Gelya
description: A crime action comedy on a Landwagen with a family line.

name: Piper s Sugar & Spice!
description: Piper s baking bombs for her brawl to be!

name: Night of the Living Sausage
description: A family enjoying a memorable holiday outdoors discoverers a videotape that awakens….. the klobasa

name: Loose Ends
description: Things get out of hand when two friends go fishing and end up on the receiving end of a gun.

name: The Third Age
description: The complete stories of the Red Book of Westmarch adapted into the motion picture.

name: The Seltser Seven
description: The Seltser Seven team up in this epic action movie directed by the one and only B. Seltser, other plot details are currently unknown.

name: The Powers Pantheon
description: If You Could Have One Superpower, What Would It Be?  Four friends hangout one day and get into the discussion of super powers. In the discussion, the question of, "What power would you choose?" Comes up. From there on out, the four friends set off to defend their chosen powers. In a showcase of their powers, the question of which superpower is better finally gets answered.

name: Super Like
description: After matching with a beautiful woman on a dating app, a man s evening is interrupted when masked gunmen show up to crash the date.

name: Honeybuns 3: Escape to Birmingham
description: The epic finale to the Honeybuns trilogy. Now on the run from Lucinda and her minions, Edward, Byron, JJ and Alfie must find a way to stay alive while the final battle looms over. Loyalties are tested and relationships change as the final fight begins.

name: Honeybuns 2: Betrayal of Both Sides
description: After defeating his murderous wife, Edward and his son Byron are living peacefully in their safe house. But when evil unexpectedly returns, Edward & Byron must team up with old enemies, lose old friends and prepare for the beginning of the war.

name: Honeybuns
description: When a lawyer gets his client arrested for murder, the client will stop at nothing to get revenge. Alfie Johnson is out of prison and thirsty for revenge on his lawyer. Alfie finds Edward and tries to kill his loved ones and then Edward. Edward must do what he can to protect his family. This edge-of-your-seat thriller sparked the beginning of the Honeybuns Saga.

name: It Aint Pretty
description: A documentary about the challenges and triumphs of female big wave surfers fighting sexism in the water, in competition, in the media and in the surf industry with the support of a closely-knit community of like-minded women. Probing, incendiary and thought-provoking, this film takes you inside a growing movement of women that are shattering the shallow and sexualized images of female surfers in the media. Featuring interviews with top female athletes and awe-inspiring big wave surf footage filmed in the icy waters of Ocean Beach, San Francisco and Mavericks - one of the biggest waves on the planet - this film is meant to empower a new generation of girls to live their dreams and overcome the challenges they face along the way.

name: OICHI
description: An action erotic film in which the blind demon exterminator, Oichi, a female zatami, slays evil spirits of the mountains and rivers. Blind Oichi, who travels around the country doing shiatsu, is a master iai slayer. Wherever she goes, she gets caught up in futile battles with the changing spirits of the spirits.

name: Skirmish Round the Flag
description: A short film depicting a dramatized scene from the Boer War, produced by the Lancashire company Mitchell and Kenyon. The film portrays the rescue of two nurses from impending danger at the hands of Boer soldiers, thanks to the timely arrival of British troops. The filming took place on the outskirts of Blackburn.

name: The Century Saga
description: The entire saga refined to its best form.

name: Thomas & Friends: The Adventure Begins (Fan-Film)

name: Fly to the Moon
description: The classic story of Hou Yi (后羿) and Chang E (嫦娥) from Chinese mythology brought to life for modern audiences with a new cast of supporting characters.

name: Lawyer Vishwanath
description: Lawyer Viswanath is a 1978 Indian Telugu-language action film produced by Y. V. Rao and directed by S. D. Lal. The film stars N. T. Rama Rao and Jayasudha, with music composed by Satyam. It is a remake of the Hindi film Vishwanath (1978).

name: Yugandhar
description: When Yugandhar, a ruthless don, gets killed in a police encounter, Jaganath, the police superintendent, trains his lookalike to pose as the don and help nab his gang. It is remake of Hindi film Don (1978).

name: The Assassin
description: The most dangerous assassin in the world has fled from his own clan "The Order of Assassins". Will the Order be able to eliminate this man known as Death before he wreaks havoc in the real world ?

name: The Flying Painter
description: Lexo and Nodar, two house painters, fall in love with Nina, a resident of the house they are painting. In order to keep Nodar out of his way, Lexo suggests that he learn to become a pilot at flying school, but doesn’t know that Nina works as a flight instructor. Lexo pretends to be an experienced pilot. After rescuing a passenger on a damaged plane, Lexo decides to become a professional pilot.

name: The Doomed

name: Godzilla Against The Space Monsters

Monsters from pollution and invaders from space come down to earth causing havoc, and a new war between man and martians. Will Godzilla be able to bring all monsters together to stop these creatures?!?!

name: Godzilla Vs Gomora - Part 3

description: Eric and Jeff return from the horrors of Jiger and Godzilla s past ruins, mourning the lost of they re best friend facing new problems, two monsters emerge to conquer the world, one being an ally, but others to kill, will Godzilla come back once again?!?!?

name: Godzilla: Attack of Jiger - Part 2
description: A group of excavators go out to find the legend known by villagers in Mt. Fuji known as rodan, a pteranodon, once they get there, inconveniences get in their way when godzilla rises from the depths to wreck havoc again, will godzilla, the army, and our heroes stop this new monster named Jiger????? Godzilla is not an enemy but as the movie flows, everyone is against him instead of our main characters. Will the world forget godzilla saved them and not fight the main villains in this jaw-dropping movie of the summer!?!?!? Watch it and find out!!!

description: A group of excavators go out to find the legend known by villagers in Mt. Fuji known as rodan, a pteranodon, once they get there, inconveniences get in their way when godzilla rises from the depths to wreck havoc again, will godzilla, the army, and our heroes stop this new monster named Jiger????? Godzilla is not an enemy but as the movie flows, everyone is against him instead of our main characters. Will the world forget godzilla saved them and not fight the main villains in this jaw-dropping movie of the summer!?!?!? Watch it and find out!!!

description: After the Rampage of anguirus, Scott and his assistants go after anguirus in a helicopter. While the military try to contain anguirus godzilla rises from the depts to finish the horror.... Who will be the one to win?!?!?!?!??!?

name: Doda
description: The story revolves around a former boxer DODA from a small town. The film goes through the journey of Doda, and how he can survive and overcome his past and make things right once again.

name: Godzilla VS Anguirus - Part 1
description: Meet Scott, a scientist working with his new assistants trying to investigate and study a new monster that has awakened. Watch as this new monster cause chaos on japan, and fight the king of the kaijus. Who will be the New King of the Monsters!!!

name: The Scratch Saga
description: The Scratch Saga, when characters had dawn to Kaj.

name: Boa
description: As a result of a drilling accident, a giant man-eating boa constrictor is released into a maximum security prison in Antarctica.

name: Proteksi Sandiwara
description: The two founders of the club where they can vent at school are called "Proteksi Sandiwara" Galang and Abby. was surprised by the arrival of one of their club members, Audy, who felt that the story of her personal love problems was spreading among the school.  Therefore, Audy took revenge by forcing Galang and Abby to tell Audy about the problem of his play to spread around the school.

name: Roll No 21 - The Quest For Swarnamani
description: Kris, the incarnation of Lord Krishna is an intelligent and naughty orphan with magical powers who wreaks havoc with his friends Pinky and Babloo. To save his friends from evil zombie demons and uses his superpowers to keep everyone safe.

name: Klicky Jones and the curse of the pharaoh
description: Kidnapped by the evil treasure hunter Vanessa Lange, the adventurer Klicky Jones finds himself imprisoned in an ancient pyramid in Egypt, on which a terrible curse weighs. Together with Lily, his intrepid young assistant, Jones must protect the pyramid s treasures before they fall into the hands of his enemy, and above all, get out of it alive! Second short film in the  Klicky Jones  trilogy.

name: 西域古墓之藏宝图
description: This movie is a story centered on the theme of protecting ancient tombs in the Western Regions. The protagonist Li Tianxiang and Dong Ling fight against The Crow, Da Rong, Ma Hong, Lin Lu Tao and others who want to rob the tomb, but in the end, with the unremitting efforts of Li Tianxiang and Dong Ling, the found ancient tombs from the Western Regions were handed over to the archaeological team, so that the national cultural relics were properly protected.

name: Invisible War
description: Hackers cyber attack the Ethiopian power grid and the Information Network Security Administration rushes to stop them.

name: Little Warrior
description: A Bangladeshi movie.

name: Monkeys 2: Fight the Future
description: Hold onto your seats for the action-packed sequel to the 2002 cult classic, "Monkeys"! When Prago becomes enamored with the strangely simian Yoko, John and Mark sense trouble brewing. They soon discover that the monkeys have returned, using time travel to conquer the world in the past! Luckily, the mysterious bum has plans - and a time machine - of his own. It s now up to Prago s friends to fix the damage done to the timestream, and then hopefully find a way back home. So sit back, grab a banana, and prepare to "fight the future"!

name: Dave Macade Jr
description: Dave Macade Jr was once a serial killing, cocaine-addled criminal and the most dangerous man in America. After being recruited by a government agency hoping to utilize his skills, he is assigned to take down a violent drug lord calling himself Doctor Crowe who is known for his affinity for birds. Working alongside his no-nonsense sister, his genius best friend, and his drug-distributer ex-wife, Dave s body, sobriety, and morality are put to the test in a war that will determine if he can truly be redeemed.

name: Antropomorph
description: The Selva del Camp is in danger. Two anthropomorphic animals have appeared in the town, and they are causing disasters without mercy. The town s residents will try to do everything possible to stop them, but will they be able to put an end to the anthropomorphic threat?

name: Girls Behind Bars
description: A youth drama set in the Japanese alps.  Two robbers, chased by the police, escape from the youths of a university mountain club who are trapped in a lodge during a blizzard. This ski action romp has the tempo of a musical, and Okamoto Kihachi s style is on full display. Tsuruta Koji makes a special appearance as a senior member of the mountain club.

name: Barbie 2: Ken s Revenge
description: Tired of being overshadowed by Barbie, Ken and his allies revolt by destroying the Dream House, the symbol of Barbie s dominance.

name: The last horse-drawn fire engines in Copenhagen
No Phones at Jacks
description: What am I supposed to do with this?

name: The Lone Hero
description: A Taiwanese Martial Arts film

name: Bros Before Foes

name: The Great South

description: Takazaki (Riki Takeuchi) was attacked by a mysterious attack. The investigation reveals that the assault is an attempt by the former anti-government organization, the Fujimura group, and that there is a traitor inside. Tachibana (Ozawa Kazuyoshi), who holds prison authority, is restrained even if he tries to fight back. However, Takazaki who is angry madly used Mari (Morishita Morishita) who has a grudge against the Fujimura group, and decided to attack the Fujimura group assault!  (Google Translated)

name: War of Hearts: The Last Summartch
description: Copper age. the Ismirian empire has conquered the Summartch empire, A group of survivors had managed to escape. a captured hero struggles to find his family and in the middle of war for survival searches for love in a world full of hate.

name: Tour de Cinema: The Grunge Era
description: Experience the 1990’s and the end of a millennium in the sixth installment of the “Tour de Cinema” series.

name: I Want To Punch You?

name: Tour de Cinema: The Eighties
description: Dive full-force into the most electric, profound, action-packed, and emotionally resonant decade in the history of filmmaking with the fifth installment of the “Tour de Cinema” series.

name: Grounds for Disaster
description: Asked the impossible task of delivering coffee to his boss by the next morning, an intern will have to endure hardships that no man has before to guarantee the job be finished, and well at that.

name: The Legend of Lost Cabin
description: When their spring break plans are sent into a spiral, three teens are sucked into an outrageous historical adventure through Southern Oregon.

name: Golden Eagle. Special Forces
description: A group of candidates undergoes trials to earn the maroon beret (special forces traditional hat). There are three friends among them who try to stick together - Ruslan, Kaysar, and Aibyn. Ruslan and Kaysar are taking the tough exam for the first time, while for Aibyn, it s his third attempt. Each of them dreams of joining the National Guard special unit, but only one of them is destined to make it to the final.

name: Mighty Raju: The Movie
description: A four-year-old Raju, an intelligent young boy with a strong moral code receives super human strength. He gets this strength when his mother Sandhya accidentally consumes a compound created by his scientist father Swami, when she was pregnant with Raju.

name: JAMES O BARR S THE CROW
description: A film adaptation of James O’Barr’s graphic novel, THE CROW, was created from 1994-1998. A year after his own tragic death, a young man rises from the grave to seek vengeance for the brutal murder of his fiancée. Through painful flashbacks, he relives their deaths and remembers their life together. Donning a sinister mime-like visage, he stalks the murky alleyways and rain-slicked city streets, determined to exact a terrible and bloody revenge upon the gang that killed them.

name: The Motherfucking Wigs
description: Soraya is the proud owner of  "The Motherfucking Wigs", a small business that only sells synthetic wigs to bald people. One day she wages war against the big wig corporations that sell high standart realistic wigs. She trains in sword fighting to defeat the seven wig bosses of Rio de Janeiro.

name: Painted Red
description: A bounty hunter in the old west finds himself pitted against a sadistic assassin.

name: Shoot or Die
description: Kate is a spoiled 14-year-old with a pampered life, but that is all about to change when she is kidnapped and has to fight for her life.

name: Ace Thunder Ace Blisterball
description: Get ready to experience the thrill of ACE THUNDER ACE BLISTERBALL copy 3, the latest addition to your collection. This internet art film is available in DVD format and is a must-have for movie enthusiasts. The storyline is gripping, the cinematography is top-notch, and the performances are outstanding. This DVD is perfect for those who love to watch movies that are out of the box. It s an excellent choice for anyone who wants to add something unique to their collection. So, what are you waiting for? Get your copy of ACE THUNDER ACE BLISTERBALL copy 3 today and experience the magic of this incredible film.

name: Support Droid Yurika
description: A tokusatsu movie about a gynoid superheroine.

name: Ra’ee Al-Ajrab
description: An epic film that shows an important aspect of Imam Turki bin Abdullah s story, who was nicknamed Ra’ee Al-Ajrab. The film depicts the Imam’s extraordinary courage in confronting the enemy, his efforts to regain Riyadh, and his establishment of the second Saudi state.

name: PUPIN AND ME 2: PUPIN POOPS AGAIN
description: As the Galactic war keeps on brewing the enslaved people of Idvor, once a great multiplanetary empire, are slowly losing hope, but the ancient spirit of Pupin comes back to world of the living to lead them to victory.

name: Heartthrob

Seeking revenge, he replaces his own son with the master’s son in the family, planning to strike a blow to his master’s life several years later. Finally, he carries out this plan but is not successful.

name: Andy Crashes Christmas
description: Johnathan s Christmas is turned upside down when an online order delivers a talking puppet instead.

name: Broken Promises - A Vengeance Story

name: Chase Banks: The Return of Chase Banks
description: The featured film of the hit streaming service, Nedfligs

name: Portal Trick Shots
description: After finding out what happens when you combine basketball with a portal gun, two scientists are determined to discover what other possibilities can be done with such a union.

name: Dragon s Revenge
description: Dragon Yuen, a Hong Kong cop, comes to New Jack City to take his revenge from the powerful criminal John Rickman. With the help from his friend inspector John Campbell, he sets out to track down Rickman and put an end to his criminal activities.

name: The Hunter s Exchange
description: A hunter seeking to kill a warrior is revealed to have committed the most taboo of all rituals to claim unspeakable power.

name: Commando Ninja 2: Invasion America
description: 1988, Communists have been planning to invade America for the past 10 years, hiding entire divisions underneath major cities, moving through the sewer network, and infiltrating into the population! Nobody can believe it!  Today is the 4th of July, the day they have chosen to launch their operation.  Hopkins is gonna have to rally the team, John, Kowalsky and Jenny to fight back, and destroy the evil at its source, the house of the rising sun, VIETNAM! When America is under Attack, When Governments can t help, if you find them, maybe you can Hire them

name: "O Jehovah, . . . I Trust in You"
description: See how Hezekiah overcomes pressure from all sides to make decisions based on faith and loyalty, setting an example for his entire nation and all those who serve Jehovah today.

name: Handyman

name: Into The Dottie-Verse
description: Hugo from Disney s The Hunchback Of Notre Dame gets sent into the multiverse by  Dottie The Otter from Pelle Politibil, Hugo  must make new friends to help defeat Dottie.

name: The Pilot
description: The movie is about a man who tries to become a Pilot. This movie might be great to watch depending on if you like the videogame ROBLOX. Since it was filmed in the game roblox. This film is being nominated for four Sweet Chili Awards including Best Picture, Best Actor and Best Soundtrack.

name: Pupin i ja
description: A boy finds Pupin in his house and he gives him life changing advice.

name: American Holocaust 2000
description: The story of a vagrant wandering through the frozen wastelands of the USA in a post-Y2K world where the president is out of power and the people have become savages. One man struggles to survive as he journeys alone through dangerous ganglands with military police in pursuit.

name: Feelings
description: Blind4love employs experimental emotions.

name: Time
description: Blind4love illustrates how time affects everything, depicting the journey from childhood to the present in the short film.

name: Bible Psycho Queen
description: The dominating Mistress Lee extracts total obedience from her willing slaves. Feel the pain ans scorching sexual intensity of these helpless servents. See the piercing cruelty and hot ash torture!

name: The Price of Revenge
description: Miron is a young, promising guy with plans for life. On one of his worst days of life, due to the mistake of a local authoritative bandit, he loses everything - his love, hopes and faith in the future. Myron s loved ones are already planning their vendetta and are trying in every possible way to persuade him not to leave everything as it is. Can Myron overcome grief and forgive the culprit or will he take revenge despite the sad consequences?

name: The Nameless Tritage
description: A tage with FeeDz of all kinds & with all guns. Complemented by Goldds unique editing style, that nobody can really replicate.

name: The Girl Killer
description: Zhou Feilong, chairman of Hong Kong Feilong Group, exposed the smuggling and drug trafficking conspiracy of Nick, the leader of a multinational company, and Nick secretly sent the killer Ah Jiang to kill Zhou, but Ah Jiang had already attracted the attention of the police, and Nick had to change his mind.

name: Whispers Of The Lost
description: In Kochi, Kerala, a Japanese assassin Koji  is on the run after a failed job uncovers secrets from his past. Pursued by local thugs and a hitman from his own organization, Koji  must confront his identity and seek the truth while evading capture in a dangerous game of cat and mouse.

name: Das Todescamp des Ninja
description: Early film by Ingo Trendelbernd

name: Kaprice 2: The Rise of Mike Gee
Molly, Star-Racer
description: Pilot film for Ōban Star-Racers.

name: Searcher - The Greatest Adventure
description: Tunisia 1898: French occupying forces steal two valuable amulets from Kabir Beli and murder him in cold blood. Almost 100 years later, top agent Ingo Lee is tasked with recovering one of the amulets. Using a time machine, the agent is sent 100 years into the future. Together with an associate, he embarks on a dangerous search.

name: Boka Haru: The Chronicles of Social Awareness
description: Two men on a journey to make their next Vulgar Social Awareness Short Movie meets a YouTuber who turns their life upside down.

name: The Bust
description: The Bust is an action-comedy set in a classic warehouse drug deal. Six mafiosos and gangsters face off against each other. But as the characters quickly discover, there s more going on than it first appears.

name: Twelve Days
description: On October 14th, 1941, in the rural West Coast town of Kowhitirangi, Stanley Graham is a financially struggling recluse. He is accused of poisoning his neighbour s cattle and threatening his neighbours with a rifle. Local Police Constable, Edward Best, arrives to resolve the situation. Graham soon threatens to shoot Best and so he retreats for backup. Best returns with three other Police officers from Hokitika to confront Stanley.

name: Vaginator: Dawn of the Bitches
description: The V1 Extermination Unit searches the near future for survivors who have not been eaten or infected by mutant monsters. The planet is nearly empty, and they hope they won t become a snack for the bloodthirsty mouths. One day, however, they hear a radio transmission, and on the other end is a rebel hero - General Testicle! He needs rescuing, he s trapped...and he s carrying cigars! The journey to save humanity can begin...

name: The Mysterious Heroine
description: Fok Tats scheme to raid a convoy of government reserve is intercepted by  Ghost Knight . Chau Ping, an accomplice of a corrupt official, declares wars on Fok whom he believes has ties with the mysterious raider. A meeting was convened by Ghost Knight to settle the dispute. Tat s son Sze-chuen learnt that his maid Ma Yuk-lan is the daughter of a general of the ousted Ming court who has donned the mask of a knight-errant to protect the son of the Ming minister Sze Ho-fat, Sze-chuen himself. Back in Deadly Valley, an impostor of Ghost Knight was caught. Slashing at the father, Sze-chuen is disheartened to learn that the faker, Ma s mother, has been transferred to the enemy camp in a feigned surrender orchestrated by Sze while an uprising is gathering momentum funded with money robbed from the corrupt official. Ma teams up with the father and son to storm the Chau Fortress and rescue Ma s mother. The couple champions the restoration of the old empire with Sze s seal.

name: Der Todespanther von Brooklyn
description: In New York, violence and crime are the norm. Sam Williams works as a getaway driver, but one day a job goes wrong. As punishment, he is executed by the gangsters. Fortunately, he is allowed to leave the realm of the dead and now sets off on the hunt for the murderers.

name: Victor
description: A mob boss worries about his rivals motives and hires a hitman to take him out. The hitman executes his job perfectly and continues to work for the boss until the power reaches his head.

name: Giganotosaurus vs Tyrannosaurus | Jurassic Warpath
description: I know, I know. It s really short. But making fights as long as the Allo vs Rex takes a lot of work.  Jurassic Warpath fights will be quick but awesome like this one...hopefully longer too.

name: Ceratosaurus vs Pachycephalosaurus | Jurassic Warpath
description: Once again, the fight came out short. Sorry guys, I m going to have to take a break from fight videos...It s too draining. I ll see if I can put up more subtle and even comedic videos instead for a while.  Be sure to vote for next time!

name: Monolophosaurus vs Tuojiangosaurus
description: A short vid of a realistic fight between a Monolophosaurus and a Tuojiangosaurus.

name: Sexual Dynamite Heroine Sailor Ninja
description: An entry in the Sailor Ninja tokusatsu series

name: Sailor Ninja Time and Space Battle Record Part 2
description: An entry in the Sailor Ninja tokusatsu series and the second part of the Sailor Ninja Time and Space Battle Record duology

name: Sailor Ninja Time and Space Battle Record Part 1
description: An entry in the Sailor Ninja tokusatsu series and the first part of the Sailor Ninja Time and Space Battle Record duology

name: Sailor Ninja vs Vampire Clan Part 1
description: An entry in the Sailor Ninja tokusatsu series and the first part of the Sailor Ninja vs Vampire Clan duology

name: Sailor Ninja Part 2
description: An entry in the Sailor Ninja tokusatsu series

name: Black and White
description: A teen struggling with addiction encounters the battlefield of her mind - literally. As her garage transforms into her mental struggle, she learns that despite her best efforts, she can t win. But Someone else can.

name: Campaign Day
description: Trouble strikes Nicholls House when favoured candidate Digby Dalitz goes missing. In a race to save him from peril, Alistair Scott leads a brave band of Nicholls House members to locate Digby. But the true danger may have been in front of them the entire time…

name: Dashing Through the Snow
description: Set in a cabin on Christmas Eve, the film will see US Marshall Jo protecting a pregnant fugitive from a bounty hunter and a hitman Santa, accompanied by his henchmen of elves.

name: T. Rex In The Atrium
description: Dinosaurs were once the preserve of Paleontologists picking over dusty bones. However, a Tyrannosaurus Rex rampaging through a state-of-the-art university campus is the latest viral video to take the internet by storm. The video was created by students at the University of Glamorgan as part of their BA Hons degree in Computer Animation.

name: Frenzy
description: This video was originally a test animation using Dragonframe! I completely recommend this software. I will be doing many videos consisting of these "Mini" Dinosaurs. This is the first.

name: Fredz Jurassic Fight Club Claymation Style Part 2
description: Finally, the second half of an epic short revealed! Enjoy... The LOST EPISODE.

name: Fredz Jurassic Fight Club Claymation Style Part 1
description: Shorter & More Violent Versions Instead of the lame clay sculptures previously seen. The animals are not in Vivid color B/C I don t have a large amount  colorful clay. This video Has 4 out of 8 Episodes i ll be doing & soon i ll be making colorful Versions of The Creatures In  Runcycles.

name: Mystic Navy Aquamarine
description: A tokusatsu magical girl film

name: Uncharted: Sic Parvis Magna
description: Before the iconic adventures of Nathan and Sam Drake, the two brothers embarked on an adventure that started a lifelong path of searching for lost goods - making a myriad of enemies along the way.

name: Aftershock
description: Scientists around the world try to find out what is happening, and if or when, the world ends.

name: A Work In Progress
description: An aging detective is forced to partner with a new detective in order to take down a mafia crime family

name: Karate im Wald
description: Karate-Action in the woods!

name: Angkan ng Sietereales
description: THAT HIS KIDS MAY GROW UP FAR FROM THE MADDING EVIL AND CORRUPTION OF CITY LIFE, A FATHER HERDS HIS BROOD TO A DISTANT, SECLUDED ISLAND.

name: Fureytha
description: Fureytha is a 2024 Dhivehi language Maldivian film produced by Dark Rain Entertainment.  Revenge | Thriller | Action  Can you decipher the enigma and unveil the real  Fureytha ? The hunt for justice begins, but the line between revenge & justice blurs. Dare to uncover the darkness within.  Unveil the shows of vengeance in  Fureytha  as one man takes on a relentless journey to bring justice to the darkest corners of crime.

name: Chhota Bheem Shakti Astra Ki Khoj
description: The soldiers of planet Shakti Grah successfully avert the theft of the energy generator, shakti astra by Shrewdus and hide it in Uttarayan Forest till Shrewdus is apprehended; however, a cunning Shrewdus poses as the king of Shakti Grah and approaches Bheem and team seeking their help in locating the shakti astra and retrieving it, but he expresses his inability to accompany them to the forest as the greenery and water both are harmful for the inhabitants of Shakti Grah. Bheem and team agree to help him and retrieve the shakti astra for him after successfully finishing many challenges; however, just before handing it over to Schrewdus, one more challenge stands in front of Bheem as Taurus, the real king of Shakti Grah arrives to claim the shakti astra back. It is now up to Bheem and team to decide who is the real owner of shakti astra and to whom the power source should be handed over as the lives of thousands of inhabitants of Shakti Grah depends on that single decision.

name: The Amazing Carl Weathers: 3 Days Out
description: 3 days before he s taken off the grid and sent to Omaha to become a Cinnabon manager, Carl Weathers is brought out of Kirtland Ranch to save his reverend and lawyer, Jimmy McGill, from Gabe and a sinister assassin known only as "Pop Pop"

name: Bug Fight
description: The Disgusting Insane Story Of All Bugs Kind And The Kings and Peasant Bugs

name: Godzilla vs Rodan | Kaiju Claymation Fight
description: Rodan finally snaps and decides to fight Godzilla.

name: Jurassic Fight Club - Cannibal Dinosaur Claymation
description: A Short claymation version of Jurassic fight club s first episode.

name: Therizinosaurus vs Ankylosaurus
description: I ll have to wait a while for the new votes to fill up before starting the next one.  Will probably put up another drawing timelapse video soon.  No idea why the sound is so iffy...

name: IMMORTAL HEART
description: Smith Hertz, a seemingly ordinary man is hunted down by a group of Mercenaries, and their mysterious leader Thanatos, who may have a connection to his haunted past, and the strange curse that inhabits both of them.

name: Spinosaurus vs T-Rex, Giganotosaurus & Allosaurus
description: Animation test of different theropods fighting each other, copying the style of Jurassic Park: Operation Genesis.  Still seems to be gathering quite a bit of salt lately...

name: Once Upon a Time in DHAKA
description: Film data is unknown at this point

name: Pledging: The Movie
description: Witness the wrath of Master Sargeant Petree as he transforms Siblings into Men worthy of being in Gamma Sigma Phi.

name: Welcome To My World
description: There is a lot going on in Tommy s head, who is fed up with the daily routine and is trying to change his life. However, the attempt at "revolution" does not bring any success, and his business partner Andy plans his own game. Seeing this, Tommy abandons his ambitions and asks new questions. What actually happened and who had control over the situation?

name: Home Alone
description: After being left home alone in a new house, Josian soon realizes that this new home might be more sinister than he thought.

name: The Father
description: Wanting to atone for his past actions, The Father targets his adopted children he trained to be cold-blooded killers. If they want to survive, the children must try to kill their father.

name: Fuzz Kill
description: An assassin is dispatched to terminate a crime boss, but has to fight her way through the army of cute, fuzzy, killers sent to stop her first. A short film featuring action, violence, betrayal, stuffed animals, lemonade, and remote controls.

name: Ninja Gece Savasçisi
description: Action packed Turkish ninja turkey.

name: Joao Gabriel - Saga Peixe Limao A MORTE DE THOMAS EDISON
Joao Gabriel 8 - A Invasao De Jacares Na Floresta Engraçada
Pariah Vol. 2
description: Sequel to the 2024 Indian movie Pariah Vol. 1.

name: The Supercut
description: All 6 episodes of The Bentley Films saga combined into one glorious supercut. From telemarketer to overlord, experience the story of Bentley Wilson, and the story of those who worked for and against him across all of time and space.

name: Bars
description: A short film where two buddies go to a bar when a lion comes near and havoc breaks loose!

name: The Age of the Ruash
description: A feature film created by Piedmont High School students in 2004.  Three hundred years ago, the land of OT was taken over by the dark god, Sirus. However, there was a prophecy that a warrior would be born who would lead the forces of New Hachemeg against the Sirus legion. The five adventurers created to seek out and retrieve this warrior were titled the Ruash Warriors. This is story of their quest.

name: Fighter s Brigade: Faith of Sisyphus
description: FIGHTER s BRIGADE, a masked vigilante collective, tries to seek their breakthrough in the crime-fighting business by attempting to save Sisyphus from his doom

name: Mighty Lady Excelio & Astral 2nd Stage
description: An entry in the Mighty Lady tokusatsu series and the second part of the Mighty Lady Excelio & Astral duology

name: Mighty Lady Excelio & Astral 1st Stage
description: An entry in the Mighty Lady tokusatsu series and the first part of the Mighty Lady Excelio & Astral duology

name: The Awakening
description: A young man decides to pay a visit to his deceased friend at the cemetery when he is caught up in a fight for his life against flesh eating zombies. Little does he realize that the end of the world is taking place right before his very eyes.

name: You re Mine
description: A group of South Asian girl friends are stalked by a sadistic incel, with an ulterior motive, on the night of Valentine s Day.

name: The Liberator
description: After the destruction of his village at the hands of a powerful criminal organisation known as The Embassy who previously controlled the village, John Pope is sent out to The Blossom Forest to train under The Sensei in order to become stronger so he can take down The Embassy once and for all.

name: Kitman
description: Curiosity kills when a world-renowned hitman faces his greatest adversary yet,

name: Vetri 2
description: Vetri s next film after Gunpoint.

name: Incident in Raccoon City
description: Two girls face a horde of zombies in the fictional city of Raccoon City.

name: Synthetic Hope
description: V, a young girl surviving on the streets, has been captured. She, along with a mysterious new form of AI are trapped in a criminal organization s warehouse that deals black market tech. V slated for organ harvest, has no time to spare, as black market operators await a man known only as "The Butcher", she must trust the manipulative AI she has found, to escape the corruption that promises to destroy them both.

name: Average Joe 2: London Calling
description: The adventure starts again with Average Joe 2:London Calling! Join Joe Normal on this thrilling and action packed vengeance story!

name: El Rodeo
description: A couple of hunters have the mission of murdering a horde of zombies in a town in the province of Buenos Aires.

name: Gunpoint
description: Faceoff between Rudhra and Amir. What will happen next?

name: Rampart
description: Story takes place in Los Angeles where an ex-drug dealer/part-time hustler by the name of Dre wants out of the drug Business but some crooked cops have other plans for him.

name: Once Upon a Time in Cuba
description: Rita, a prostitute, works the colorful streets of Havana looking for rich tourists to fund her escape from Cuba. One day she finds much more than that and now its a race against time to safe her life!

name: Red Gloves
description: An amateur boxer discovers the truth about his father moments before a fight.

name: Raja Shivaji
description: The journey of the young Shivaji, who fought against the powers that be and was crowned as Chhatrapati monarch.

name: Mechazoic
description: "Mechazoic" is an emotionally driven story that revolves around self-love and forgiveness, following the journey of a mech pilot, Mia, grappling with losing her girlfriend.

name: Lithiuman
description: Notorious supervillain Lithiuman goes on his miraculous quest to steal all of the Lithium in the world, but an ominous figure stalks him.

name: Me Vs. Me: Revelation — Butterfly Wishes
description: A one-on-one showdown only worsens when property destruction and utterly jarring discoveries come into the picture.

name: Me Vs. Me: Revelation — Angel Ocean
description: A robbery at the Angel Ocean Souvenir Shop blossoms into pure, violent mayhem when the police carelessly choose to get involved with a chain of events not for the faint of heart.

name: The Christmas Curse
description: A year after Santa s death, Luke is ready to take his place, until a new challenger appears to destroy christmas once again...

name: Duplicity
description: A group of academic magicians must confront violence and unimaginable horror when a ritual goes terribly wrong.

name: The Meal
description: An Art House Action movie about a manwho ordered a special meal

name: Time Firm
description: In order to find the true meaning of life, the high-latitude human Autumn Timothy Leaf travelled through a time tunnel to contemporary society. He opened a shop somewhere that specialises in acquiring people s lifespans and memories. For every customer who came to trade, Autumn Timothy Leaf would look deeper into why they came to trade. From there, he found the true meaning of human life among these people who came to sell their lifespan and memories.

name: Me Vs. Me 3
description: The stakes are higher than they ve ever been when the Anti-Adrian Corporation inexplicably runs at large, accomplishing a frightening number of achievements within a short span of time.

name: Me Vs. Me TOO
description: Sickly monster hysteria, a cryptic robot corporation set to put an end to the world population, a task to be accomplished in limited time. The saga of violent shocks continue...!

name: Me Vs. Me
description: Punches, slaps, kicks — not much other than purely vicious disaster in a state-of-the-art fighting feat.

name: The Kazooboy Files
description: Take a deep dive and discover the Kazooboy you thought you knew in this all-new (not murder) documentary, The Kazooboy Files!

name: Adil shehzad
description: DevOps , Cncf Lahore , google cloud lahore

name: NOOB VS BACON
description: After the murdering of bacon s father he confronts his killer, who also happens to be his childhood best friend...

name: Galaxy Special Investigation Elysion Part 2
description: An entry in the Mighty Lady tokusatsu series and the second part of the Galaxy Special Investigation Elysion duology

name: Galaxy Special Investigation Elysion Part 1
description: An entry in the Mighty Lady tokusatsu series and the first part of the Galaxy Special Investigation Elysion duology

name: Shoe shiner 2
description: Mr. Cuchillas is back in the second part of the  Limpiabotas  saga.

name: Abandoned Betrayal
description: An experimental comedy short audio film, where the picture is not seen, but imagined.

name: Vengeance Wears a Tampon
description: Grindhouse parody of low/no budget thriller where woman rampages men with tampons.

name: Boy vs. Battleship
description: A boy on a beach struggles against a massive battleship.

name: Mission Extract
description: An agent is hired for a mission to rescue a Super-Human from the hands of an emerging Cult.

name: Herobrine: The Legend
description: After an incident in a abandoned town, 4 teenagers decide to investigate it and end up getting haunted by an evil entity

name: I Will Challenge
description: Akira, a student who is professionally engaged in boxing, aspires to follow in the footsteps of his late father and become a champion when, during training, he becomes embroiled in a murder case. His school friend is involved in the case, and Akira also becomes the target of villains...

name: The Beast of War
description: Set during WWII and loosely based on real-life events, a warship carries hundreds of Australian soldiers across the Timor Sea to the frontline of WWII. Suddenly, Japanese fighter jets scream out of the sky, and within minutes the ocean becomes a hell of steel, fire, oil and blood. While a handful of soldiers build a makeshift raft from floating debris as they cling to their lives, their biggest battle is yet to come. In the dark below, the ultimate apex predator — a great white shark — hunts in the wreckage and is drawn to the smell of fresh blood in the water.

name: 侠盗至尊 Break a Dead Lock
The Last Masterpiece of Eagle
description: 21-year-old Paul Huber is studying foreign languages ​​and Far Eastern fighting techniques at the University of Hamburg. To prepare for his difficult final exam, he travels to the high master in the Far East to learn the secrets of Kung Fu, but there is a sweaty and bloody road ahead of him to reach his goal...

name: Untitled Alliance Media Film
description: A nobody, gets dragged into a heist amid a gang conflict, where he is forced to come face to face with his problems.

name: Rajavazhcha
description: Govindankutty struggles to make his younger brother Vijayaraghavan an IAS officer. But they have a major fallout because of their rich uncle s wicked tricks.

name: OddNez
description: Nez is an ordinary guy until one day he discovers an ancient artifact with strange and unusual powers.

name: Time of My Life
description: Time of My Life is a movie documentary project born and initiate in spring 2011 in West Switzerland. Ski, skateboard and snowboard movies are usually made to impress and show only one aspect of these sports: impressive tricks and bluebird skies. Skiing and snowboarding are much more than that. With this film project project, we want to explore the back stages of the show and wish to give a more complete and authentic vision of the riders experience. The movie guideline is to catch and film what is behind skiing, snowboard and skating, what is behind these passions.

name: Black Castles
description: Two years ago, Nissa Arnson s infallible interpretation of the future was challenged for the first time, and she spared a man s life. Now she investigates a new adversary with fewer Rooks and far more to lose, while Will Augustine fears for his future and struggles to maintain his integrity as an Alterer. As their paths cross again, long-hidden and terrifying secrets begin to come to light.

name: Brother Blur
description: A young boy mysteriously gains super speed and uses it to get back at his high school bully...

name: Terra: Reckoning
description: The third and final part in the Terra trilogy.

name: Luebat alashrar
description: The writer (Riyad) marries the beautiful (Camelia) despite her previous relationship with (Azmi), his lawyer, at the same time (Azmi) marries (Manar), Riad s secretary. Manar doubts the renewal of the relationship between Azmi, her husband, and Camellia. She manages to record a tape of Camelia urging Azmi to kill Manar and Riad, and plans to trap Camellia and Azmi at her house and summon Riad to expose them.

name: The Long Ride
description: From Muybridge and Porter, passing by John Ford and Howard Hawks, all the way to Sergio Leone, Quentin Tarantino and the Coen brothers, a story of a cowboy trying to escape death cut from over 100 films.

name: Mandya Haida
description: A group fails to create discord in the love between the protagonist s friend and his lover. Will the love story stand true to all tests?

name: The Bell Pepper Bandit
description: A kid staying home alone gets robbed for his most valuable possession.

name: The Hunt
description: A desperate chase unfolds across a city but who or what is being hunted?

name: Antivirus
description: Lethal virus transmitted by SMS predominant  Pathogen  software company workers, specializing in Anti-Virus for humans.

name: Space Adventure
description: Space Adventure is a 1989 sci-fi action brickfilm by Christian Stage. It was filmed in Norway and shot on Super 8 film, with all effects being achieved in-camera. Pre-production took place in 1983, the production occurred from 1984 to 1988, and the post-production was done in 1989. Upon completing the film, Stage created a preliminary soundtrack, and began sending the film to European TV stations and to The LEGO Group, to see if anyone was interested in doing anything with it. LEGO declined, with their stated reason being that it was too violent. The Children s Channel UK took interest, and created a new, more professional soundtrack. They added new voice acting, and allowed Stage to choose the music. The film was aired on The Children s Channel, and later also on SVT in Sweden and NRK in Norway.

name: V.PYRE
description: In a futuristic night city, where human Hunters search for the secret to biological immortality- we follow a Vampiric father as he breaks into the Hunter Corp. He fights to rescue his daughter from being a test subject, no matter the costs.

name: Tournament 11 Sub Zero Night
description: Three gangsters were hired by a businessman. They originally planned to carry out a fake robbery so that the businessman could successfully defraud a huge amount of insurance money. It is a very simple task, but it turned into a death catastrophe that affected the whole world. The gangster boss (played by Sam Gor) is a decisive, ruthless and vengeful man. He leads two subordinates, one is loyal and calm (Abi), and the other is very lustful and neurotic (Apo). It seemed to be a simple fake robbery, but because (Apo) killed the businessman driver by mistake, the whole plan was ruined. The businessman then planned to set up an ambush and arrange for multiple killers to kill the three people, but he was annihilated by the boss instead. Later, The boss planned to settle a score with a businessman, but he found a suspicious doctor outside the office door.

name: Prey
description: A web adventure series host and his cameraman venture into the Black Hills of South Dakota hoping to get some good footage. Things take a deadly turn very quickly and now the duo must find the strength and courage to survive before the become prey.

name: METAL GEAR: SILLY
description: When Liquid Snake steals confidential government documents, Hostile Takeover sends the elusive Silly Snake to track recover the documents and take down Liquid Snake.

name: Shin Spider-Man
description: For 45 years, Takuya Yamashiro has been known as the one true Spider-Man. In this New Theatrical Version, Takuya s life is totally changed when the Iron Cross Army takes the life of his father. Now imbued with the rage and power from Planet Spider, he must rise up and take down the Iron Cross Army s evil leader, Professor Monster as SPIDER-MAN.

name: Maboroshijō kaiketsu-hen kizoji no gaika
description: Tsukinosuke narrowly misses capturing the lord of the phantom castle by a hair s breadth. The mountain map was with Kirisaku at the Ashiwara residence, belonging to the phantom gang. Tsukinosuke heads to the Ashiwara residence to rescue Kirisaku, but in the meantime, the Matsudaira residence is attacked by the phantom gang... (Existing version. Please excuse any deterioration in image quality due to original conditions.)

name: Maboroshijō dainiwa shi no senpū
description: The undercover agent Tsukinosuke Kigurumi successfully escapes with Kirisaku, who possesses the coveted Shinshu Mountain map targeted by the phantom gang, but loses the key to unlocking it. The one who picks up the key is Osumi, a female courier. (Existing version. Please excuse any deterioration in image quality due to original conditions.)

name: Maboroshijō daiichiwa Hida no uzushio
description: Mt. Norikura s natural fortress, the phantom castle. A white-clad iron mask, offering prayers to the eerie triple-faced deity of the Sennjogadake Rocks - the lord of the phantom castle, scheming to overthrow the Tokugawa shogunate that destroyed his lord. Sent by the shogunate to infiltrate Hida, Kigurumi Tsukinosuke s cover is blown... (Existing version. Please excuse any deterioration in image quality due to original conditions.)

name: 天使が俺を追い駈ける
description: A comedy-action film depicting a kind-hearted protagonist who, feeling disillusioned with the world, asks a hitman for assistance with suicide, only to find himself embroiled in a thrilling and hilarious journey involving money and women.

name: Podèt
description: A low-budget, independent tribute to the "poliziottesco" genre of Italian 70s cinema. Wrongly incarcerated for the Piazza Loggia bombing of 1974, a man known as Podèt (which means knife, or blade), is set free after forty years and must now take care of a sick priest.

name: Django Vecchio
description: A low-budget, independent tribute to Italian Spaghetti Westerns and bizzarre sci-fi fantapolitical thrillers.

name: Determined As Fire
description: In a world filled with fear, requires a warrior that can inspire determination to the people and fend off the deadly creatures lurking throughout the ruined city.

name: Messiah: Dawn of time
description: The final entry in the "Messiah -Toki-" series based on En Takadono s  MESSIAH  novel.

name: Agente Segreto 6667 - Più che mai a Brescia
description: A low budget independent tribute to spy movies, action thrillers and italian 70s films.

name: The Mysterious Murder of Ben Balls
description: Ben Balls is murdered by a mysterious shadowy figure. Its up to the genius minds of Tanner and Zachary to figure out who committed the vile act.

name: Twin Blades
description: Hotel cleaner Ye Da Ling accidentally rescued Mi Lan, a world-famous socialite who was kidnapped by criminals, but accidentally discovered a bigger conspiracy behind the incident.

name: Decent Things
description: In 1931, a famous person borrowed an ancient painting to appreciate, but he refused to return it. The owner of the painting was embarrassed to ask for it, so he entrusted an elementary school martial arts teacher to contact the celebrity s bodyguard, Tie Backer, hoping to accommodate him. By means of painting, it shows the sophistication of martial arts practitioners.

name: Sand Sea Gate
description: Adapted from the novel "Sha Hai Wu Men" (沙海无门) by Wu You Yi

name: A Sword and Nine Rings, Part Two
description: Lee Kap-lan, whose parents are slaughtered by the underling of the Qing court, Yan Sheung-kong, is rescued from the carnage by Leopard-faced Magic Nun. Nun imparts martial artistry to Lee, who will kill the old enmity when she grows into womanhood. Yan and his half-brother Luk Sun are assigned to capture the survivor. Fong-ping comes under the attack of an assassin dispatched by Sun when Butterfly comes to his help. Recruited to the Yan den, Ying Tin-lung summons the knights-errant of the martial world to the court. Lee infiltrates the congregation and has her eyes fixed upon Sun and strikes him with the Soul-snatching Tai Chi Dart which has mistakenly wounded Fong-ping. Butterfly puts Lee into a drug-induced coma to obtain the antidote to treat Fong-ping. Ying seizes the chance to capture the women. Fong-ping sustains another injury to rescue the hostages. Nun arrives in time and seizes the Lee family heirloom. Lee avenges her parents  death.

name: A Conceptual View Of A Vampire

name: Waffle F1 - The Movie

name: The Vendetta Project
description: Two federal agents set out on a mission in order to avenge their dead friend by tracking down and stopping the leader of the biggest and most dangerous gang in New Zealand, whilst they face setbacks from malicious mob members.

On the Tokaido Highway of Flowers, a beautiful swordsman is in peril! Tokaido is a journey of women s peril! Pink Kumudo no Kenjidoshu! A swarm of beautiful women chases after him! The forest of white blades that ambushes! Tokaido is in full bloom!

name: The Perfect Warrior
description: On a remote island deep in the Orange Sea, an elite clan of warriors called the Totomé train and fight to keep peace among their lands. Every 100 years the top warriors compete to see who will take over as leader, or Abeoji. Katana and Sai are given this opportunity, but when their forbidden relationship is discovered their final challenge to become the leader is to fight in a Si Dou— a fight to the death.

name: The Ferocious Brothers
description: A man returns to Japan to avenge the death of his father.

name: The Cheetah
description: A cheetah is on the loose!

name: Oversteer
description: Inspired by a true story, ‘Oversteer’ follows the journey of Wind, a young man whose passion for cars leads him to fall out with his family, leading to a world he’s unprepared for. As he navigates financial struggles and personal challenges, Wind finds support from unexpected sources. The film explores themes of perseverance, friendship, and the pursuit of one s dreams, offering a heartfelt and inspiring narrative in a car racing world.

name: Last Call
description: In the city of Dhaka, a pack of goons look to hunt down an unstable alcoholic.

name: Sacrum Vindictae II
description: Picking up after the events of the first film, Nathaniel Nucci is back for another adventure.

name: Sinner
description: After an unfortunate loss on set, a tv crew travel to Grove, Oklahoma to shoot their next episode of their haunted reality show. However when they arrive, they realize that the horror of the tv show may have actually entered their reality.

name: Leadership Violence
description: Leadership Violence

description: Jake Winter goes through any means to go back to a reality that once was...

name: Myth of the Assassins
description: As the Saika family s reputation wanes, the son is tasked with assassinating shogun candidate Yoshimitsu of the Kishu Tokugawa clan.

name: The General and the Tyrant
description: Upon becoming Prince Regent, the bellicose Lord Biu of Wu sends commander-general Si Ching-wan to rage wars between the Zhao and Chen Kingdoms. A small state that is long on literary excellence but short on military might, Chen is defenceless against the invading forces. The compassionate general answers the pleading of the Chen princess, Fung-ming, to sign a treaty of peace. In his speech to the lord, Deputy General Lau Mo-yeung accuses Si of treason so as to lay claim to Chen. The lord dispatches the valiant fighter Lui Chen-sing to Chen on an assassination mission, but the assassin is vanquished. Si prevails on Lui of his patriotism. Lord Biu fights Chen. In a dire attempt to redeem Chen, Si surrenders to the Wu camp. Lui pretends to have blinded Si to extricate him. The duo ally with a band of chivalrous fighters to overturn the corrupt regime. Dispossessed of his throne, Biu commits suicide. Si returns to his land to serve as an aide to the young king and marry Fung-ming.

name: Oil of L.A.
description: Are southern California girls really the most beautiful in the land? You make the determination as you watch these suntanned beauties fight for the light-weight title of the Women s Oil Wrestling Association (W.O.W.A.), Don t miss them grappling in oil, body slamming in the mud, and leg locking in chocolate syrup, as they attempt to tap out their opponent. Forget about G.L.O.W., buy this movie!

name: BLOODY DATE
description: "BLOODY DATE" is a short film that delves into the life of Javier, a blue-collar worker with a secret life. By day, he s a mechanic dealing with the dirty grind of work, but by night, he s entangled in the world of drugs and danger. As financial troubles loom over his best friend, he finds himself owing a lot of money to some very wrong people. With a heart of gold and a tough exterior, Javier navigates a complex web of loyalty and betrayal. This thrilling narrative unfolds as Javier s past collides with his present. The film explores themes of friendship, sacrifice, and the consequences of choices made in the shadows.

name: Fuoshen: The Burning Man
description: The film tells the story of Liu Hengshun, a fire-bending young man who is about to become the best detective in Jiuhe City

description: In need of a legacy in order to remain relevant, the Richmond Vampire forces powers on an unsuspecting college student.

name: Wild Planet (Redux)
description: He s a mild mannered accountant from out of town; She s an extraterrestrial from the planet Ultra Terra; They re three very  evil ,  wicked  and  nasty  characters from out of the past behind the wheel of  59 Chevrolet in hot pursuit... Filmmaker Brendan Young, re-works, remasters and  reduxes  his 1989 short sci-fi comedy chase film  Wild Planet  and propels the eccentric genre-mash up into the 21st century for a whole new lease of life.

name: Wild Planet
description: George Bonicelli, an unassuming, naive accountant, has his routine  9 to 5  existence turned on it s head when he s accidentally run down by Leilah Deluxe - an estranged young girl from another planet - fleeing for her life on a jet propelled motor scooter. George soon becomes entangled in a manic chase throughout the city in one action packed night. In relentless pursuit is the mad and obsessive French biophysicist, Professor Henri Gautier and his two equally deranged henchmen, former Nazi rocket scientist, Doktor Werner Von Toller and a French Moroccan hit man, Fartouk Hahmesh. Armed with a  59 Chevrolet, a homemade radar tracking device and a laser gun, the evil trio hurl themselves at Leilah and George from all sides, carving up the late night city streets like a heat seeking missile.

name: STAY AT HOME
description: It s night time. Jazz music playing, a man enjoys his cigar, a drink and, later on, a midnight snack. Just another peaceful night during the pandemic s lockdown... until...

name: Car Trouble
description: Two skilled hot-headed mechanics engage in a heated battle over a car s engine problem but as their egos clash and sparks fly, they must confront their own immaturity to fix their real issues.

name: The Woman with a Name or Two
description: Earth, year 2202 and 1/2.  It s different.

name: The Open Boat
description: "The Open Boat" is a tale of survival as a group of sailors are thrust into rough waters, where salvation lies on the horizon.

name: Metamorphosis
description: A man gets dealt a hand he wasn t expecting in life s cosmic deck of cards. Come the metamorphosis, only one man will be left standing.

name: Generalprobe 7
description: A mystery that depicts the 13 days from the production announcement press conference by the seven actors taking on a new Shakespeare play to the final rehearsal. The director is Tsutsumi Yukihiko, who has directed many hit works.  TROUPE SEVEN, a seven-member theater troupe that is extremely popular among young people, is about to welcome a new member, Yamai (Miura Kairi), in preparation for the performance of their new play "Shakespeare Legends". Suddenly, their charismatic leader Soga dies, and the wheels of destiny begin to spin out of kilter.

name: The Drifting Life of Himeshiro
description: Otoino Himeshiro (Ikko Hurutani), called "Otohime" is a gambler. He wears juzu abound his right list and is rumored to "salvage with the right hand, kill with the left hand. He does both just for a kick." He was a son of a renowned doctor of the Naito family and was supposed to be a doctor as well. However, his parents and two brothers were killed by a robber, and he could not save his younger sister even though he took the operation by himself. People said this experience made him hate society and became a gambler. One day, Himeshiro saved Omitsu (Nana Okada) with a Ronin, Hyoma Odagiri (Hayato Tani) who keeps traveling to search for the person who killed his father when Omitsu was caught by men as a hostage. She asks Himeshiro and Hyoma to save her father, Yakuza of Kuwana, Choyano Takeyoshi who got injured on his foot by a competing family. They stay at Takeyoshi s house, but Takeyoshi, in fact, was the man who killed Hyoma s father.

name: CRIMINAL STIGMA ~Reminiscence~ The STAGE
description: The second stage adaptation of the "Togabito no Kokuin" light novels. Unlike the first show, the story goes beyond the original novels introducing characters who are unique to the stage version.

name: Il Ballottaggio

These agents, known as Sakura, must follow an iron code and cannot form relationships with anyone other than their assigned "Messiah". This is the cruel fate of Sakura candidate Shiba Shusuke who is tasked with investigating a member of the council.

description: In a criminal ridden suburb, it s hard to keep secrets. But you remember one of the most important rules of organized crime? No witnesses. Stupidity meets coincidence in this short action comedy.

name: Bloodthirsty Order
description: There has been a legend about the Bloodthirsty Order circulating in the world - it is said that under the blood moon, after performing sacrifices, an entire city can be massacred in an instant through the Bloodthirsty Order.  Mei Liu, a thief who lives in the outskirts of the capital. In addition to doing some theft, he and his brothers also act as informants for the Six Doors. When the chief arrester suddenly dies suddenly, Mei Liu has to participate in the investigation. The night of the blood moon was coming, and the ceremony to restart the bloodthirsty order was ready.

name: Student Restoring Corps
description: A School s Governing Body, the SRC,  gets taken over by a shady businessman. 5 years after the acquisition, Eddie Brock must use all of his assets and contacts to help him bring this businessman down for good.

name: Buddy
description: Buddy is an drama action comedy directed by Sam Anton.

name: Star Wars in Real Life II.V: Shadows of the Past
description: An exciting new spin-off in a galaxy near you! Set between the events of SWIRL II and III, join Jedi Master Mike as he explores his past. After the defeat to the Sith, Mike and Cory have parted ways. Mike now resides in hiding, searching within himself for answers. A response to his call echos a familiar voice from his past. Mike begins a journey with his droid BB-8 to find this ancient call and hopefully get the answers he has been looking for. Experiance this brand new SWIRL adventure with new lore, exciting new visuals, and a new foe that may be deadlier than Supreme Leader Cody himself.

name: Star Wars in Real Life III: Revenge of the Jedi
description: After the defeat of the Jedi, nothing has stood in Supreme Leader Cody s way. With the power of his battlestation, he has been able to take over the world and rule it with an iron grip. The only thing that Cody has to worry about is his apprentice Gabe, and if he is truly loyal to the Empire he helped create. For Gabe s final test, Cody send him to find and kill Jedi Masters Cory and Mike, thus eradicating the Jedi once and for all. Experience the final chapter in the SWIRL Trilogy with exciting action, stunning visuals, and the  epic final showdown between the Light and the Dark.

name: Star Wars in Real Life II: Attack of the Empire
description: After turning to the dark side, Gabe begins to question whether he has made the right choice. He is unable to shake a connection to his old life, and his new master Cody only furthers his uncertainty. Meanwhile, Jedi Masters Cory and Mike enlist the help of Seth Weeks Bounty Hunter to find a new resource in defeating the Sith. In the Exciting sequel to Star Wars in Real Life Episode I: A New Menace, bonds are tested and loyalties are crossed as the battle between the Light and Dark continues.

name: The Nobel Carrot
description: As the school year is winding down and students are plagued with busy work, two teenagers find themselves intertwined with a plot for world domination. When Seth and MIke s easy-going chemistry teacher gives them a carrot for lab, they discover that the carrot is actually a magical artifact and that Mr. Hamer may not be who he seems. Enjoy the witty dialogue, intense action, and the unraveling of a centuries old mystery in The Nobel Carrot.

name: Hammerman III
description: The final chapter of The Hammerman Trilogy is here!

name: Star Wars in Real Life I: A New Menace
description: After a war between the the light and dark side of the force, the sith are believed to be eradicated. The three remaining Jedi, Cory, Mike, and their apprentice Gabe, begin to rebuild a Jedi order. But after an encounter with a rogue Jedi, Gabe begins to question his relationship with Cory and becomes conflicted when he learns the truth of his brother, Supreme Leader Caleb. Watch this exciting tale of good, evil, and the force, which all takes place in a galaxy not so far away.

name: Double Dragon: The Shield of Shadow Khan
description: Two brothers are separated at birth. Billy is raised by an elderly martial arts master known as the Oldest Dragon, and his brother Jimmy is raised by the evil Shadow Master as his second-in-command, the Shadow Boss. As a result, the Lee brothers oppose each other as adults; but when Jimmy is betrayed by the Shadow Master, he renounces his evil ways and joins his brother as a Dragon Warrior in a futile search for their father, John Lee.

name: The Janitor

A group of first-years band together to prove themselves. "The Janitor" is an action short fused with animation that s ultimately about family.

name: From the Ashes: A LEGO Star Wars Story
description: Following the discovery of a serious threat to the Clone Army of the Republic, a unit of civilian volunteers is dispatched to quell the Separatist scheme. Meanwhile, a young man with a special gift struggles to find a place of belonging in the galaxy.  "From the Ashes" is a fan-made, feature-length LEGO stop-motion Star Wars film.

He finds himself colliding with enemies of his fathers. This J.J. Sessions film follows Copeland’s journey against all the Odds

name: The Revenge of The Earthquake
description: Jack Shaker is a professional earthquake hunter. He has always enjoyed traveling around the world killing earthquakes. Sadly, tragic accident renders Jack unable to hunt earthquakes and he moves to a peaceful little town in Finland, far away from seismic activities. Everything seems to be great at first but when people dead to Jack start to die around him, he s soon to realize that a big nasty earthquake is after him... AND THIS TIME IT S PERSONAL!  The Revenge of the Earthquake is a world spanning epic action thriller from Trash Video and Insane Bastards. Filled with dramatic moments, bloody action and explosive special effects.

On these zones, with their characters and situations, the detective faces enemies that represent the mythological plagues that struck the Uru nation, beasts defeated by the Condor. The detective sees himself as the Condor.

Arun fell in love with a college student named Trisha Wesmen, whose father was a journalist. To take revenge for his father s insult, Arun made a plan with his friend Hitler to stage Balaram as madman. They were successful, and Balaram was suspended. A new Superintendent of Police, Sukhomoy, took charge and supported Arun. Indrajit, Arjun, and Balaram tried several times to stop Arun in preventing their different illegal business and failed due to support from the state ministry. Arun later arrested the three of them for different crimes.

In the year 2069, rogue cop Rex Maverick (Griffin Shute) must take matters into his own hands to save Neo Blue Hill from a temperature-connected crime wave.

The procedure for their heists is for Meiko and Yoshi to behave in such a bizarre manner that nobody in the bank notices it s being robbed. Things go well for them at first, but eventually their individual fears and neuroses start to get the better of them.
