name: Rolled Back Cassettes
description: “Rolled Back Cassettes" is a short experimental film that delves into the intricate world of a woman haunted by her lack of a genuine childhood memory. Seeking solace and closure, she embarks on a journey to confront her past, leading to a profound self-discovery. The film is divided into three distinct parts, each representing a significant aspect of the woman s emotional exploration. It is a visually captivating and introspective film that explores the complexities of memory, self-perception, and the power of acceptance. Through the woman s journey, viewers are invited to reflect on the influence of past experiences and the transformative potential of embracing one s true history.

name: Dara Saga 3: The Movie

The fate of the universes rests on their shoulders. Will they find him or will this be the end for the Perspective crew?

name: Mother and Daughter Robot
description: A film about the relationship between a mother-daughter robot.

name: Poncho
description: After his friend is hospitalised in an attack, Wolf Konan, AKA "Poncho" tries to deal with the traumatic experience, and becomes obsessed with enacting vengeance for his friend, and revenge for himself.

name: Sneharshi
description: Pruthvi s life leads into a situation where his personal life along with his dearest friend is disturbed and due to unavoidable circumstances Pruthvi has to address the biggest social menace happening in the current metropolitan lives.

name: The LXD: The Uprising Begins
description: Join seemingly ordinary people who discover they have extraordinary powers in a groundbreaking mythology about hope, greed, love and the force that moves us all.

name: Danger Bucks
description: Sometimes, all money isn t good money. Nori and Derek will find out the hard way when the wrong package causes destruction. Meanwhile, Lucky owes Kobra money but finds out his dad left him and his siblings a large lump sum that changes everything.

name: Caped Crusader XIII
description: With the campus-wide dance competition looming over their strong, toned shoulders, the men of Closson pull off their gutsiest move yet: they ask someone else to help.

name: Steppe
description: The story is about inspectors-conservationists who come to grips with poachers and save a woman and her daughter at the cost of their own lives.

name: CET on Strike
description: CET on Strike captures the essence of a political strike unfolding within the college premises. Later, the film delves into the intricate dynamics of friendship among the protagonists and explores how it becomes strained over the course of the story.

name: The Cold Mountain Temple
description: Corrupt officials seek to gain control of a large region of Southern China, but a group of Shaolin monks will not surrender without a fight.

name: The Division: Agent Origins
description: A devastating pandemic sweeps through New York City on Black Friday, and one by one, basic services fail. Within weeks, society collapses into chaos, and the government activates The Division, a classified unit of self-supporting agents. Leading seemingly ordinary lives among us, Division agents are trained to operate independently of command when all else fails. In Tom Clancy s The DivisionTM: Agent Origins, four newly activated agents must serve as civilization s last line of defense after a man-made virus devastates New York City. Based on the video game by Ubisoft®, this action-packed film introduces the world of The Division to fans of Tom Clancy movies.

name: Legends
description: George Washington dubbed America a "Great Experiment." In 2020, the experiment failed as the country descended into a second Civil War with too many sides to count. By 2043, the war is nearing an end and the greatest warriors have risen, Cain and Abel. Whoever recruits the sworn brothers will win the war and unite the nation. But, can Cain and Abel choose the same side?

name: The Doomsday Prepper
description: A man relentlessly preps for the end of the world during a zombie apocalypse.

name: The Labyrinth
description: Daedalus, a highly gifted builder and designer, has his morals put to the test when he must decide if his loyalty truly lies with the Prophets of Crete

name: Lonesome Trailcam
description: The Old Timer tells The Kid the story of how he survived the lonesome trail. But all is not as it seems...

name: MN Confidential
description: Two detectives work to solve the murder of a bank executive, only to be drawn into a web of crime and deceit

name: Dudefall 2
description: The Dudefall Saga continues!

name: David Morrell Jr. vs. Alantez Fox
description: On December 18th PBC presents David Morrell Jr. vs Alantez Fox. In the main event of the evening the undefeated WBA Super Middleweight Champion David Morrell Jr. takes on hard-hitting 168-pound contender Alantez Fox for the WBA World Super Middleweight Title. Who will come out on top? Will Morrell defend his title or Fox will become the new WBA Super Middleweight Champion.

name: Mind Survivor
description: A soldier (Stephen Groo) is fighting to survive in his own mind when he suffers PTSD. He has been living on his own for 5 years believing an event killed everyone including his wife Bonnie (Valeri Oaks) and his daughter (Rachel Zaugg). How will he be able to regain his reality and return home

name: Sales Pitch: The Minie Ball
description: The absolute art of a Sales Pitch in a perfect example (made for a History project).

name: DEMO
description: Zach and Tyler, two minimum wage workers for the Department of Energy and Matter Organization, embark on a mission to save the Universe when their outdated equipment rips a hole in time-space. Before the end of the day, they must set everything right or risk Universal destruction in a reverse Big Bang.

name: Dead Man
description: A high schooler named Max is tasked with fighting a group of deadly assassins who plan to take down him like they did to his brother.

name: Christmas Crisis
description: On Christmas eve, a tired detective bothered by the crime wave plaguing his city stops at the store to get a last-minute Christmas gift when he is taken hostage.

name: Yukihime Seven Changes VOL.1
description: indie ninja tokusatsu film

name: No Honor Loyalty or Love
description: The wait is over for the intense action drama of the year. Based in reality, and crafted by aspiring Writer and Director Keison ( Milliondollakeii ) Trottman, and under the tenured wisdom of Legendary Executive Producer Boosie Badazz follow the interwoven lives of four friends navigating struggles, hardships, and experiencing the strength that propagates in their bond while enduring it all together. This crew and the performances are tighter than a brick, and this is your first chance to have it in your home today.

name: In the Dead of Night
description: When he finds that his apartment has been broken in in the middle of the night, a timid young man must fight against the burglar and defend himself before he loses his life.

name: The Man with the Water Gun
description: The protagonist Bondarev must defeat his villain again. However, this time the special services agent does not want to save the world, because he does not know what role he plays in his life.

name: Maal Masala
description: After a fatal accident leaves Kumar mentally challenged, he faces his greedy maternal uncle s hostility. Meanwhile, unable to bear it anymore, he plots to seek revenge.

name: Legend of Suheldev: The King Who Saved India
description: Film adaptation of Amish Tripathi s bestseller Book of the same name.

name: Vigilant
description: When Thief for hire Jason, steals a priceless artefact for a mysterious client, he becomes entangled in an endless game of cat and mouse across the city streets and rooftops, with a vicious pursuer on his feet at every turn. But this mysterious item Jason carries could hold more than meets the eye.

name: Detective Stone
description: The story of Detective Adrian Stone, as he hunts down gang leaders while he combats the forces of an evil shadowy organistaion.

name: In The Shadow Of The Horns
description: Occultism. Rituals. Satanism. True crimes. Exorcism. Cannibalism, Extreme music This is not your ordinary documentary, it s not even a documentary, it s a new genre of movie, we call it "A reality movie". The film will mix true action sequences with drama, sub-plots and interviews with extreme metal bands, all blended together in a storytelling style that will blow your mind!

name: RAY - Die Suche nach Leben und Tod
Story of The Tower
description: A group of young people with dreams, decide to move into a building. But its owners have other plans. Annoyed by the youths  illegal activities, they try to chase them away. The means at their disposal are powerful. But corsairs love life and will not surrender so easily. Along the way a lot will come up.

name: City Warrior
description: The Big Circle Gang threatens the security of Hong Kong. The police headed by Huang Sir are determined to eradicate these robber gangs.

name: Blind Trade
description: In 2034, there was a phenomenon of a sarin gas leak that resulted in many victims. From this incident, the government requires everyone to wear a gas mask. Brenda (F/26), a former military academy student as well as a judo athlete, decided to go to the forest to get away from the city, but Brenda faced a problem due to not having a supply of gas mask filters. Brenda who found information in the middle of the forest immediately approached, but it was not that easy. Brenda had to make an exchange with Toni (M/28) by exchanging rifles, and where Brenda did not allow it, because this rifle was a means of protecting herself. Then Brenda was expelled, because Brenda s ambition was so great she kept trying to get what she wanted, including hurting other people.

name: Offbeat Enforcement
description: When two stellar police officers, Marcus and Jacob, are forced to work a case together, they painfully endure each other’s company to take down the Banana Kingpin.

name: Double Trouble: Thomas  Teleporting Conundrum
description: Thomas has goofed up! Due to his fear of rejection, he s made dates with two separate girls who both said yes. Thankfully Thomas has a few tricks up his sleeve.

name: Girls Commando
description: Haruka Koyamauchi, an ordinary junior high school student, is taken away and attacked by drug addicts on her way home from school. A mysterious beautiful girl, Mio Kurusu, suddenly appears at the scene and saves Haruka. The next day, Mio appears before Haruka as a transfer student. She is a girl commando on a secret mission from the police. Haruka volunteers to be the commando s assistant in order to help Mio in return for her help. Haruka tells him that it was just a coincidence that she saved him. Mio tells her that his purpose is to help the drug cartel.

name: The Beanie Baby Hunger Games
description: Katniss Everbean voluntarily takes her younger, royal blue elephant sister s place in the Hunger Games, a televised fight to the death in which two beanie babies from each of the twelve Districts are chosen at random to compete.

name: Skywars: The Wrong Portal
description: SKYWARS: The Wrong Portal  is a Minecraft short film filled with action, intense moments, and a little comedy on the side. This film explores the story of how one theory about a Nether dimension could go extremely south. Vera and Irish are transported to a dimension they didn t expect, and they have to fight their way out if they want to survive.

name: Half-Life: Hostiles
description: A small squad of rebel forces escape to a nearby outpost for safety, unknowingly, they are being pursued by secret police for their role in an incident.

name: Ninjani Calling on! Fight Towards the Future
description: Kazaha (Daiki Shigeoka), Futo (Nozomu Kotaki), Hoji (Sho Hirano), Sora (Tomohiro Kamiyama) and Kisuke (Koji Mukai) are 5 young ninja from the Kansai area. They train patiently, during a peaceful time, to carry out their first mission. One day, they are ordered to break up.

name: Covid Catfishes
description: Two teenage girls let out their frustration during the covid 19 pandemic.

name: Devils Don t Say Thanks
description: A young bar owner and a down on his luck gambler join forces after they are targeted by a ruthless assassin.

name: Unnatural II: The Gates of Hell
description: A gunslinger and his grandchildren defend a small town from the Devil and his henchmen who are determined to enslave mankind.

name: Agos-Dilim
description: Life continues to flow. Sometimes in light, sometimes in darkness. But for Clara, who seems to be constantly drowning in the depths of the world, the current of life always puts her in the shadow of tomorrow s rays.  The story of chains and release, where the brothers are torn between greed or forgiveness. How far can you stand the truth, if your own family can t believe you. Will Clara finally be punished for her past sin?

name: My Ally, My Brother
description: After landing in Normandy, a squad of soldiers are split and must find each other whilst taking back Normandy.

name: Write Human Sapyo
description: Park Tae-hoon, who disappeared after being betrayed by the Yakuza to which Aoki belonged, returns to seek revenge and coldly carries out his plan. Author Min Ha-young is writing a novel featuring a man and woman from an underworld who fall in passionate love. Tae-hoon goes on a trip to get revenge on the traitor Jang Do-sik, and Ha-yeong goes on a trip to soothe her pain after breaking up with Lee Jun-seok. The two meet by chance and feel a premonition of fate, but soon break up. While Hayoung was writing based on the impression she received from Taehun whom she met during her travels, Taehoon was preparing for a decisive battle with Aoki.

name: The Prince
description: It s a 1985 Bangladeshi movie about International Crime and so on

name: Bubbleman Superstar Mission El Cobra
description: Mexico, U.S. border - the wall is finished. Bubbleman, a flippant secret agent from Zeroland, goes there on a very special mission: to tear down the wall and repair the future. But things don t go as planned...

name: Onyanko Torimonochou: Nazo no Murasamejou
description: Film adaptation of The Mysterious Murasame Castle game for Famicom Disk System.

name: Reflection of a Soul
description: A poetic short film that personifies fire through a woman, expressing the duality between good and evil. She dances with grace but also unveils the devastating consequences of her poorly controlled power on Earth. But is it her fault?

name: The Foreverglades
description: After the death of a major player in a historic assault on the ecology of the Everglades, Leah Jones, a victim who was present in the scheme, retells her story to a local reporter. Her retelling reveals more on how her friends unwillingly became part of this scheme.

name: A Fight
description: An intimate dinner party at the house of an organized crime leader goes awry.

name: Lethal
description: A special agent enters inside a house to eliminate a chemist working bacteriological weapons.

name: GunPoint
description: In the short film "GunPoint", we follow the gripping journey of a man unexpectedly stumbling upon a mysterious firearm that alters the course of his life.

name: Hallucinations
description: Aliens descend in crystal spaceships to make contact with people through guitar amp distortion and glowing animal skulls.

name: Feng Qi Luoyang Shuangzi Zhui Xiong
Allergic Reaction
description: Two specially trained agents must use their skills to outsmart two guards and recover a stolen CPU in this action-packed short film.

name: The Leveler
description: A competitor in the National Book Stacking Competition must receive unique training in order to have a chance at beating his rival in the National Book Stacking World Championship.

name: Miseria
description: Nada, a 20-year-old suffering from schizophrenia, falls into a dark depression after the mysterious murder of her twin sister Lina. But her encounter with Hela, a neighbor and a passionate boxer, offers her hope of a new friendship. Living with her sick father, who risks a leg amputation, Hela works tirelessly to support her family and to achieve her dream of joining the Tunisian Olympic boxing team.

name: Polpette 86, tratto liberamente dall opera di Jacopo Masini
El hombre que no pudo disparar
Bridge/Keeper
description: There is something strange going on between a man and a bridge.

name: 307-r
description: 307-r  treats about a mysterious soldier put in a post-apocalyptic scenery; he has no name and, unfortunately, he finds himself inside the humid torture room of the enemy, who will force him to face the demons of a tormented mind. The soldier lives in a so-called limbo of a future society where the one and the only law which is observed is "homo homini lupus"; he plays his personal chess game in a constant balance between the physical violence and the psychological torture, in a delirious climax whose highest point is an external act of becoming conscious of the situation. How long can a man resist under torture? How far can a man push his limits? But, above all, who is the mole?

name: The Power of Probability
description: In the capital of the Republic of Moldova, children begin to disappear. Police officer Vlad, helped by his friend from the secret services, decides to find the missing children by all means, but discovers a secret that could lead to a coup d état.

name: Nashville Aahoy
description: Nashville Aahoy  is a heartwarming and adventurous tale set in the vibrant city of Nashville, Tennessee.  The story follows Aahoy, a grey Shiba Inu with a short sword, who arrives in Nashville under mysterious circumstances. Aahoy befriends Walter, a local musician, and together they discover ancient symbols scattered across the city.

name: Infinite
description: An inexperienced team of agents has to get a hold of the infinite energy source within 48 hours. If not, their identities will be revealed. Time is of the essence – but they lack the know-how.

name: Sindhuri
description: A beautiful girl and a young man fall in love and get married after he saves her from criminals. The woman s behaviour, however, remains consistent until a mysterious change occurs. What will happen next?

name: Smuggler
description: A respected officer keeps a gangster s money box, leading to his arrest, dismissal, and jail time, and then joining the same gangsters.

name: Fight for the Token: The Secret Woman
description: Yuan Bin is a member of the Jinyiwei (Brocade Guards) and is ordered by Commander Ji Men Da to track down a military talisman. Yuan Bin leads his brothers in the Jinyiwei to victory against Mongolian mercenaries. Just when Yuan Bin is about to get the talisman, a figure brushes past and snatches it away. This figure is the Golden Sword Sect s master, Tranquility. Yuan Bin chased after her and fought with Tranquility. As a result, Tranquility used a demonic spell and managed to escape. At the same time, Ji Men Da attacked the Golden Sword Sect, tortured them and found seven talismans. Together with the four talismans that Ji Men Da had hidden, he had eleven talismans in his possession. It turns out that Ji Menda is the one who wants the talisman the most. By coincidence, Yuan Bin and Tranquility found the last talisman at the bottom of the cliff, they escaped and looked for a chance to kill Ji Men Da. The twelve talismans are finally complete!

name: El Lagarto
description: A mysterious lizard mask has been lost for centuries. A naive young explorer hires a mercenary to retrieve the mask, but things don’t go as planned…

name: Rastro Mortal
description: Andres Alfaro is an ex-agent from Intervention Special Units. After he inherites a property from his father and refuses to sell it, his daughter will be kidnapped.

name: Honor
description: A story of three people who got their second chance in life through a person s heroic action.

name: Kuruthipunal
description: Kuruthipunal is a malayalam action drama short film based on events occurring on a crime syndicate and the conflict  between the leader and other members happening on a single night....

name: In Search Of...Detective Barnaby And His Descent Into The Haunted Mansion
description: Made by a cinema (on shift) for the cinema - Inland Empire meets The Muppet Show in this experimental abstract horror comedy feature debut.  Following on from a series of shorts - Detective Barnaby has been tasked to investigate the disappearance of Detective W.T. Hell & the previous characters who succumbed to the horrors of Tong-Hands.  Upon entering his haunted mansion located within a cinema suspended from space and time, Barnaby meets the ghosts and specters of the previously fallen. Once alerted to his presence, Tong-Hands begins to torment the detective, using his cinema to tear apart his perception of reality.  With a smorgasbord of constantly revolving characters and an ever changing score - you will be sent on a cinematic journey akin to no other. In Search of Detective Barnaby and his Descent Into The Haunted Mansion will delight, horror, confuse, perplex, stun, entertain and leave you forever changed.
After 1,426 years of following orders, Ari receives an order that makes him question his superiors and fear for his life.

name: Estribo Gang: The Jinggoy Sese Story
description: Director: Junn P. Cabreira Writer: Jojo Lapus Stars: Jeric Raval, Mikee Villanueva, Francis Magalona, Jason Roman, Anjo Yllana, Jennifer Mendoza, Ronaldo Valdez, Paquito Diaz, Imelda Ilanan, Patrick Dela Rosa, Lovely Rivero, Berting Labra, Roldan Aquino, Jinggoy Estrada, Cathy Sablan, Vic Belaro, Johnny Ramirez, Bomber Moran

name: Maginoong Barumbado
description: When Angel (Phillip Salvador) is released from prison, he wants to change his life.

name: Rebelyon
description: Director: Willie Dado Writer: Leleng Ubaldo Stars: Vic Vargas, Dante Varona, Rommel Valdez, Melissa Mendez, Romy Diaz, Eden Bautista, Peping Escueta, Billy Gill, Mar Abalavan, Ado Geronimo, Badong Trinidad, Ading Noche

name: Late Night Repairs
description: A hitman for the mafia is tasked with killing a new target, however the task proves to be difficult due to unforeseen reasons.

name: Mujer Perversa
description: Victoria, an intrepid Latina in a cartel world, falls in love with her bodyguard and stepsister, leading to a risky love triangle. In the midst of the dangerous world of drug trafficking, he must make difficult decisions to survive.

name: Drum Duel
description: A story about a boy who signs up for drum lessons, not knowing that his teacher turns out to be an amateur and becomes jealous of her own student s drumming skills.

name: Execution Day
description: Execution Day feature movie demonstrates the process of execution, its rules and other details in the USSR. In the movie we have shot the prison life of an innocent kolkhoz chairman and the most dangerous offender who is sentenced to execution.

name: Neeras
description: A depressed assassin doesn t want revenge, redemption, retirement, retreats or regrets, and yet finds himself in a violent mayhem when he s hired for fresh bullets to be fired.

name: Last trip: Let s meet Carlos
description: On Friday the 13th a group of friends plans a party; However, they can t imagine how their night will end. After they decide to try LSD together for the first time, things start to get out of their control.

name: Deadeye II
description: The sequel to  Deadeye

name: Tu Mo Subhadra Mu To Jaga
description: Between the battle between nurturing Mother Nature and humanity that is blinded by the greed of money, Jagga, a blind boy with heightened hearing and smell abilities, has to fight for his beloved Mother Nature, but the battle becomes more intensified for him when his family gets dragged into it. Now, he must not only fight for Mother Nature but also find a way to shield his family from the devastating consequences of this war.

name: Skeebo s Armageddon
description: A 7 Act Movie about The Misfit Heroes and a bunch of other teams trying to stop Skeebo and his crew of Villains from taking over the World.

name: Hero Forgive
description: Hero Forgive

name: Dinosaurs in the City
description: A short film made by a couple of kids in the mid 90s in which an ape goes bananas and fights dinosaurs.

name: Aad en Arie Vocaat Advocatenbureau: Civil War
description: While Aad and Arie are on vacation, someone breaks in. This takes a surprising turn, for everyone involved...

name: Kana
description: Director: Cesar S.B. Abella Writers: Humilde ‘Meek’ Roxas, Cesar S.B. Abella Stars: Janine Barredo, John Regala, Toby Alejar, Jorge Estregan, Bing Davao, Edwin Reyes, Ernie David, Banjo Romero, Miles Francisco, Mariel Salvador, Kristine Zablan, Tess Orias, Gary Israel, Vic Varrion, Joe Andrade, Remy Gutierrez, Jing Caparas, Eddie Gicoso

name: Kahit Ako y Tupang Itim, May Langit Din Film
description: Director: Cesar S.B. Abella Writers: Cesar S.B. Abella, Humilde ‘Meek’ Roxas Stars: John Regala, Robert Arevalo, Cherry Pie Picache, Dan Fernandez, Liza Lorena, Melissa De Leon, Beverly Vergel, Sylvia Sanchez, Bomber Moran, Dona Mary, Tsing Tong Tsai, Danny Riel, Boy Ranay, Pong Pong, Nonong De Andres, Torling Pader, Banjo Romero

name: The Plush Movie 2
description: When a new enemy named Death runs the PlushLand citizens out of their home, it s up to Sez and his friends from PlushWorld to fight evil once again to save both themselves and their newfound PlushLand friends from harm s way.

name: The Plush Movie
description: PlushWorld Leaders Sez, Armed Sez, Sezo, Ottie, Bill, Ender, and Koopa go on a house-sized adventure to protect their people and stop old foes Zoregore and Brutus from taking control of their beloved home.

name: Bad Piggies II: The Countdown to Balls
description: It has been about a week since the Bad Piggy was found in a local man s home, but he hasn t been seen since then. Several people have been on the lookout for the Bad Piggy, including a guy named Mike. and during his 20th Annual Nut Countdown, a familiar face appears.

name: Encounter Dayanayak
description: Daya lives a poor lifestyle in a village called Yennehole with his dad Rama and mom Radha. When Rama passes away, the duo re-locate to Bombay where Daya gets a job with the Police as a Sub-Inspector. When a group of terrorists abduct 40 tourists in a bus, Daya seeks permission...

name: Top Girls
description: Han Yu Meng has always dreamt about becoming a pop singer in South Korea, unfortunately due to Visa issues she had to go back to China. One of her new classmates is Sheng Shang - a tattoo artist, part-time singer and an underground boxer. Will they succeed in creating their own music band?

name: Behind The Secret
description: Arabella is a young girl who is orphaned. She is left to live with her wealthy cousin, Mika. Arabella attends Mika s private school, where she feels out of place. The school is divided into rival gangs, and Mika is the leader of one of them.

name: MILE House 69
description: A grizzled campus police veteran and a fresh faced rookie are tasked with taking down a meal swipe cartel being operated through the notorious MILE House 69.

name: Amateur Interrogation
description: Two inexperienced teens, through the use of increasingly ridiculous tactics, interrogate a boy they believe stole their bike.

name: Code Name: Double M
description: Policeman Mike (Val Sotto) will track a syndicate and in his every mission, he will always bump into Dindi (Chat Silayan) who happens to be a Major who will become his partner on a secret mission.

name: Turno de Noche: The Wrong Place
description: J is on his shift one more night, accompanied by The Boss, when a serial killer and the victim he has clumsily let escape arrive at his deserted scrapyard.

name: SLUGFEST
description: SLUGFEST emerges as a playful, engaging martial arts experience that delves into the "inner-feminist struggles" that have characterized recent years and decades. Yet, unlike narratives of division, this film champions the concept of unity, emphasizing the dire need for solidarity and deeper mutual respect within feminist discourse.  The film s central motif is a stylized, choreographed sparring training that, while aimed at empowerment and self-discovery, can sometimes escalate beyond control. This metaphorical approach isn t about antagonism but represents the passionate debates that fuel progress and understanding, even when they momentarily seem to get out of hand.  "There is no losing in martial arts. Either you win or you learn." - as Karate Kid would say today.

name: Attack of the Living Toys: The Motion Picture
description: A teen recluse is forced to reevaluate his life over the course of one very bad night.

name: Nidja s Kitchen 3
description: After a long hiatus he"s back and ready to ruin food.

name: Cool Dracula
description: Gabe Itch embarks on a journey when his life dramatically changes and he becomes a superhero.

name: The Standoff
description: A man must decide whether or not to show mercy or shoot the man that killed his brother...

name: Nook of War
description: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Shanwa s family of three lived peacefully in the Taihang Mountains. One day, Japanese soldiers built a artillery tower at the mountain pass, which worries Shanwa s family, their peaceful life was soon disrupted. The Japanese soldiers spotted Shanwa hunting and shot him. The bullet pierced one of his ears and almost killed him. This made the innocent Shanwa feel indignant and thus his need to vent out his anger. Ignoring his wife s dissuasion, he came to the opposite side of the blockhouse at dawn, shouted curses and fired shots in protest. This angered the Japanese soldiers in the artillery tower. They chased him into the mountains several times and finally found his home. The Japanese soldiers brutally killed his wife and child, but he managed to escape with his life. From then on, Shanwa with the help of his father launched a desperate battle against the Japanese soldiers.

name: Huli Banthu Huli
description: Film starring M V Vasudeva Rao and Ramakrishna.

name: The Burger
description: Story of two hitmen from different world going through the same shit

name: Gentleman Daku
description: The story follows a brave man who rescues a sweet girl from criminals, and they fall in love. An incident causes trouble, leading to consequences for the family and the criminals.

name: The Limit: An Immersive Cinema Experience
description: Enter a new world of storytelling in this blockbuster “immersive cinema” experience from visionary filmmaker Robert Rodriguez (Sin City). As a rogue agent with a mysterious past, you enlist the help of enhanced super-assassin M-13 (Michelle Rodriguez) to retrieve your identity and strike against the deadly organization that created you. Also featuring Norman Reedus (The Walking Dead), THE LIMIT will put you inside a 20-minute action movie like you’ve never seen!

name: Michael s Run 2
description: Michael is minding his business once more, until he is caught once more by the same gang he previously defeated. Determined to earn back his status and power, the gang leader hunts Michael once more, but this time... for revenge...

name: Michael s Run
description: Michael is minding is own business, until a run in with the local gang prompts a chase he ll never forget...

name: The San Andreas Clown Massacre
description: The clown had been selling hot dogs his whole life until tonight. This night changed his life by putting him in danger.

name: Fighter of the Sun Leona - The Battlefield was too far
description: Yui Yawana is a teacher of Urushigaoka Elementary School. She transforms into Fighter of the Sun Leona to fight evil.

name: Grimsby and The Patrol
description: After a tragic incident leading to Grimsby breaking his sworn oath he decides to open a restaurant serving food from his Viking days. When his arch nemesis Ursulo takes away the Paw Patrols powers, Grimsby goes on a musical adventure where he has to confront the ghost of his past to save them.

name: The Killer Citrus
description: When the two friends Pete and Lorenzo from Citrus Hill set out to start their weekend at a local coffee shop, they realize that they need to bring cigarettes to Pete s Aunt Heidi. However, this plan quickly turns into a real nightmare.

name: Punch Punch Forever!
description: Gogo Matsumoto, an 11-year old aloof martial arts prodigy, along with her half-demon older sister; Nono, her mama; Mama, and her cool pet frog; Coolfrog, embark to compete in a martial arts tournament that pits humans against a near-infinite barrage of demons from another realm called the Akumugai. If a human can come out triumphant, they will be granted a wish from the Akumugai s warlord, Emperor Koro. Can Gogo overcome this impossible challenge? If so, will she wish for a big, like REALLY big hamburger? I hope so!

name: One Way Out
description: A teen who lives with his single mother struggles to keep up with rent when challenges arise. He settles for unorthodox ways of getting around to help his mother and in the process stumbles into a sticky situation.

name: The Cuban Devil
description: A revenge tale about a man whose cat was murdered by mobsters.

name: The Rumour
description: When a rumor spreads around school that a killer and a dead body are on the loose, it s up to this group of kids to find out; until they re knocked out one by one.

name: MOVIE
description: A man wanders around his high school after it s been mostly abandoned following an incident.

name: The Forgotten Jedi
description: The Forgotten Jedi, a story about a young Jedi Knight who accidentally lands on a new planet called Earth and is now being hunted by a specialised underground government and a mysterious Inquisitor.

name: Mac & Cheese
description: Friendship is tested over the cheesy delight of macaroni.

name: Bubby s Nightmare
description: Bubby meets the mysterious man and has a nightmare adventure

name: Bad Piggies: The Search for Sus
description: A man is told to clean his bedroom, But while performing the task, He remembers something he left behind a long time ago. The Bad Piggy, He rapidly searches around his room trying to find the one who d brought him joy all those years ago. Will he find the pig he s looking for? or will he lose his way and come out empty handed?

name: Dumpywing 2: Butt on My Mind
description: Everything sucks for Dumpywing. Let me say that one more time - Everything sucks. He has lost his dumpy. Who is Dumpywing if not a guy with a massive dumpy? He s got to get it back. That is not going to be as easy as he hopes it would be.

name: Tunnel Hunters
description: A rag-tag documentary team seeks to debunk the rumors of what lies in the Cold-War era tunnels beneath their high school.

name: Tony s Dilemma
description: A saxophone, bandits, a plane and ...

name: The Pope: Sunday Justice
description: After receiving news of a gamer burning a bible. The Pope springs into action and gets himself tied into a vicious battle with an atheist.

name: DUSHT BECTOR
description: A young Russian hitman, Mikail, operating in India, is hired by a drug dealer to snatch his budding rival, Dusht Bector.

name: A Decisive Battle at Dawn
description: The "Memory of the War Years" photo exhibition was held in Beijing. The old yellow-stained photos awakens the recollection of the memory of an old Russian soviet lady comrade, named, Sulla, whom when she was young once worked for the Soviet as an intelligence personnel who was held hostage by the Japanese near the end of the Second Sino Japanese war in 1945, when the Russian joined the Chinese to drive out the Japanese.  This period was when the Chinese was on the counterattacking side against the Japanese, though the war had not yet subsided. Her old recollective memories recalls starts here when the Russian enlisted a specially trained Chinese squad that was trained in Russia, lead by Captain Luo Feng, to lead a team of six to advance into the crisis-ridden Japanese-occupied areas and rescue her (when she was young), an important Soviet intelligence comrade.

name: Hello Robot!
description: In the animated short film Hello Robot!, we follow a girl in a desolate world as she finds an abandoned robot in a cave.  Luck is short though, as batteries are hard to come by.

name: The Survivor
description: A young man acquires a set of skills from a botched medical experiment and uses those skills to survive and tackle the organization that is trying to capture him for it.

name: Kung Fu Master - Bruce Lee Style
description: Two undercover agents pretend to be prisoners in order to infiltrate a smuggling gang and break up their operation.

name: Magical Flute
description: Raised by his powerful grandfather, Angga was taught martial arts and black magic, which he hopes to use against Maharani and her all-female "Wild Virgin" tribe, who had killed his family and the entire population of his tribe. There s also a helpful fairy and a magical flute.

name: The Olaria Chronicles
description: Captain David Dale, commanding officer of the Earth Starship Longtree, travels to Olaria IV with his crew, Lt. Lizago and Lobster Woman, to greet the sentient life of the planet. However, while there, they get caught in the middle of a war between the Googlins and the Goglins, and seek to put an end to the conflict once and for all. THE OLARIA CHRONICLES is a thrilling Sci-Fi adventure from visionary filmmaker, William Kent. In this picture, he explores the themes of war, colonialism, and the very meaning of life itself.  All views expressed in the film are those of the one and only William Kent.

name: Sad Boyd Clones Dog: The Movie
description: After his dog is caught in a horrific accident, Sid Boyd must more sinister forces in order to bring his loved one back.

name: Aaj Ka Mahatma
description: Randhir and Ranvir Verma are twins. Randhir is straightforward, while Ranvir is a petty criminal. These petty thefts add up, and soon the police arrest Ranvir, and he is sentenced to prison. In prison, Ranvir incurs the wrath of a gangster, Tony, and is killed. Randhir undertakes to find the killer, and gets himself arrested, and imprisoned to get to see who the killer is. After getting out from prison, Randhir plans to avenge his brother s death, without knowing that he himself could endanger his very life, as well the life of his girlfriend, Mala. The song "Chandni chand se hoti hai, sitaron se nahin, pyar bhi ek se hota hai hazaron se nahin..." is still popular.

name: The Rise of Miss Power
description: An intergalactic visitor, Miss Power, comes to earth and promises to teach WordGirl everything she knows about crime-fighting. When the lessons don’t go as planned, WordGirl and her sidekick Captain Huggy Face begin to question whether Miss Power is a super hero or a super villain.

name: MURAMASA Chapter 9: Hoshiyomi
description: The ninth installment in the series of fantasy swordplay action movies starring Riki Takeuchi.

name: Garden Warfare
description: In a post apocalyptic world, two rival groups fight over a garden.

name: Don Pepe
description: Don Pepe (John Regala) is a policeman whose wife left him for another man because he s poor. He will do everything to become rich and take back his wife.

name: Alyas Joker: Sigue-Sigue 22 Commando
description: Alyas Joker: Sigue-Sigue 22 Commando: Directed by Cesar S.B. Abella. With Baldo Marro, Bernard Bonnin, Sylvia Sanchez, Berting Labra.

name: RICOMINCIA LA SCUOLA - Alunni vs Insegnanti
The Presidents: The Movie
description: When Donald runs for School President, a war between the cool kids and the losers threatens to wreck havoc on the entire community. A thrilling story of love, passion, revenge, and school politics.

name: The Heat Goes On
description: Celine enlists her military pal, Vincent, for a robbery, banking on his expertise and unwavering loyalty. Vincent s motive? To reunite with the woman he s never stopped loving. however, the heist reveals a deeper yearning for reconnection.

name: Giohazard
description: Scientists have developed a drug that can make women beautiful, but due to the uncontrolled side effects of biotechnology, it has evolved into an infectious virus called the "beautiful girl virus." The infected person will forcibly kiss other healthy humans to spread the virus, and the infected person will become the details regardless of the original gender and appearance.

name: The Master Gardener VOL. 1: The Curve of Destiny
description: An epic journey of a gardener fighting different hitmen after he finds a mysterious object called: "The curve of destiny"

name: Jaka Bhyasa VS Kuntilanak
description: Jaka Bhyasa together with the  LIMA MANUSIA  silat group fought against Kuntilanak to avenge the murder of Jaka s wife and other pregnant women in their village.

name: The Minister
description: In a futuristic 1999, a highly trained Vietnam veteran, now evangelical minister, goes on a mission of holy vengeance after his wife and child are brutally murdered.

name: Sellout
description: Two famed bounty hunters get hired for their new job, but soon begin to struggle with trust once they realize the task is harder than originally thought.

name: Nerds
description: Two nerdy friends seek a mentor in order to become cool.

name: The Remnants of War
description: In the face of harrowing moments that may be their last, one man s unwavering determination to shield his child s joyful innocence becomes the heart of this emotionally charged story.

name: AEF 4: Patrick Habirora vs. Brunel Badikadila
The Hatchling
description: Introducing ‘THE HATCHLING,’’ an original short film that transports you to a world where dinosaurs and man coexist. Nestled within the picturesque outskirts of Pine Ridge, a tight-knit group is thrust into a thrilling adventure to help reunite a baby Deinocheirus with its family in the sun-soaked wilds. Alongside evading the wrath of prehistoric beasts, our heroes are entangled in a web of forces who wish to capture the infant for their dubious agendas.

name: The Perfect Plan
description: An expert heister reluctantly decides to join a crew for one final score. What should be a simple job turns deadly when a second gang of thieves turn up to rob the same house. A heist-gone-wrong told through the various viewpoints of each man involved.

name: Shuang tian zhi zun
description: Two petty adolescent street urchins Lo and Lung become inseparable sworn brothers who survive the cruelty of the streets. They are separated after Lo gets caught by the law trying to steal food. Years later, Lung grows up to be an enforcer for a gambling syndicate not knowing that it also fronts as a narcotics ring. To contrast Lo is raised in a law enforcement household and is sent out to investigate drug activity in the region. They reunite under a fragile alliance on the opposite sides of the law as their interests spiral into collusion. Things turn deadly after drug boss Ma retaliates by having Lo s stepfather killed and framing Lung for the deed.

name: Katapadi Kattappa
description: Katapadi Kattappa is a Tulu movie starring Uday Poojary and Yajneshwar Barke in prominent roles. It is an action drama directed by JP Tuminad with Rajesh Brahmavar as producer, forming part of the crew.

name: The Devil s Dance
description: Special agent Major Hashemi is working on several terrorist cases. Meanwhile a news is received about a plan for bombing in Tehran.

name: The Green Hell
description: Elderly gamekeeper Heydari s encounter with a group of illegal hunters whilst on patrol ends in tragedy.

name: Baffi Bamboleo: Deviance Of The Multiverse
description: Baffi Bamboleo manages to reach our world, causing havoc among the multiverses. An unlikely team will be forced to work together to prevent the universes from collapsing.

name: Covert
description: A security guard must protect a priceless Jewel from a thief s clutches until the police arrive.

name: Le Magnum de la Vengeance
description: After an initiation to a criminal gang a man is beaten. He gets revenge.

name: Cyber Sentai Justy One ACT III
description: The sequel to Cyber Sentai Justy One ACT II.

name: Cyber Sentai Justy One ACT II
description: The sequel to Cyber Sentai Justy One.

name: Sitram
description: Two graduates make a film to change India s education system. Due to a lack of funds, they were only able to complete 80% of the film -- how the system changes and what happens to the other 20%.

name: Keep Yourself To Yourself
description: A naïve gunslinger walks into town and gets involved in something bigger than he can handle.

name: En el valle de la luna
Citizen Twain Chapter 1: No Country For Bald Men
description: We meet Solomon, a man nearing the end of a very long journey for revenge. But revenge on who? why? What is even going on? Who  s bald now? And they re puking? Girl thats crazy!

name: Kung Fu Karen
description: After learning Kung fu, Sharon Karenston, the biggest Karen in the world has to use it, to fight the mysterious man Oskarus Pedepeerus, who wants to steal her soul to become the biggest Karen in the world himself.

name: Juhan II: The Return of Juhan
description: 2 days after Makaak presumably killed Juhan, he has taken Juhan’s brother, Donald hostage, wanting to starve him to death. Turns out that Juhan is alive in a hospital, now having to save his brother before it’s too late…

name: The Penrose Protocol
description: A disgraced police officer seeks to enforce justice however she can under a corrupt oligarchic system in this 20 minute short film.

name: Rubber Tire Soul
description: 2 Groups battle each other in a Tire War.

name: Terminator vs Jesus: The Greatest Action Story Ever Told
description: A short parody video where T-800 is sent back in time to protect Jesus from being crucified. (But Jesus assures him that his death is supposed to happen.)

name: The Final Extra
description: The alert atmosphere of a large-city newspaper office and its giant presses combines with the back-stage atmosphere of the theatre, set against the sinister shadow of a bootleg gang and the glitter of a big musical comedy "first night" in a whirlwind of dramatic action. A hot-shot newspaper reporter and a Broadway show-girl provide the romance.

name: Dark City: Interval_575
description: Toivo, a university student comes back to the City to finish his bachelor s degree. Upon arrival, he meets the face of disaster when his breadwinner brother, Simon, is murdered right before his eyes by a gang from which, Simon, borrowed money that he used to pay for Toivo s tuition. The series of events involves his home being burned, leaving him and his sister, Maggy, with nowhere to go. Amidst all the chaos, Toivo unknowingly joins the same gang that s responsible for his miserable life. As if that is not enough chaos, Toivo discovers that his sister, Maggy, has been prostituting herself in order to make ends meet since their brother s passing. As his life crumbles away, Toivo is forced to put himself through education, protect the family and come to terms with the revelation that has been in bed with the same individual responsible for his current life.

name: Objetivo: Matar al vecino
description: The protagonist has the objective of finishing off his neighbor at any cost, however it will not be easy for him.

name: Rise and Shine
description: A teenage boy s car fails, leading to a near death experience after he is mistaken for somebody else.

name: Deadeye
description: Deadeye is a skilled hitman who is hired by his longtime ally, Kenny Kane, to kill one of Kane s oldest enemies. What ensues is a path of violence as Deadeye is tracked down by a family of mobsters and their personal army.

name: 99% Fight
description: "99% Lucha" is a documentary that takes us into the fascinating universe of Argentine catch, a sport that goes beyond simple fighting in the ring. Through a purely visual narrative, without interviews or voice-overs, this film captures the essence of camaraderie and sacrifice that characterize the fighters of this sport. We discover that behind the action in the ring there is a community united by a shared passion, where rivalries are only part of the story. This documentary delves into everyday life. Each fighter is a protagonist, and each blow is an expression of his unwavering dedication. "99% Lucha" is a window to a world where 99% effort becomes 100% passion, showing how sacrifice and camaraderie drive your commitment to this exciting sport.

name: Blue Lilac ～Pure Heart～
description: Blue Lilac ～Pure Heart～ acts as a counterpart to Eiyu Club s other film Red Lilac - Dream of Shudder

name: No Legs. All Heart.
description: After years of addiction and a life changing accident, André Kajlich aims to be the first double amputee to complete the Race Across America, a bone-crushing, sleep-deprived, 12 day, 3,082 mile bike race, revealing a true test of spirit and the pain we endure to carve our own path in life.

name: ANIMAL
description: Jimboy wants to go home to his family, but he is forced to accept a job after meeting what he thought was a good man. As he faces the fallout of his choice, an internal battle unfolds against his own inner demons, testing his strength and resilience.

name: HIVE
description: An elite military team is sent to a top-secret lab deep in the American wilderness to save a brilliant scientist from a biological incident. When their helicopter crashes, they must band together to survive hordes of ‘HIVE’-minded Zombies, controlled by a powerful QUEEN.

name: A Normal Christmas Movie: Every Christmas Has Its Christmas TOO
description: This is a completely normal Christmas movie with nothing that would make you think otherwise. Die Hard is a Christmas movie, so this can be one too. Please enjoy: Every Christmas Has Its Christmas TOO

name: Lords of the Barrio
description: Tired of living paycheck to paycheck, a newlywed man assumes the identity of dying guns-dealer to make a quick buck and get out of middle-class America. But when a real Miami mobster finds this out, he goes after this impostor from suburbia with a vengeance.

name: Reanimation Team
description: It s the year 2131. A bold team from the Tri Force rebel alliance embark on a daring mission in a last ditch effort to save what s left of the human race and liberate space aliens from an Evil Brain s tyrannical mind control

name: Two Chens
description: After the creation of QwC in March 2020, Christian is living his best life. That is until a new threat arrives that could wipe out his entire show; himself.

name: I Need 5 Bucks
description: The prequel to Saddlefrogs Debut Film "1000 Subscriber Tradgedy"

name: Dinosaur Fights Against Cosmic-Men
description: Taiwanese monster movie

name: The Beast
description: Ciaran, Rishi, James and Nanak have their lives changed while playing games in the woods.

name: Bellator 300: Nurmagomedov vs. Primus
description: Bellator 300: Nurmagomedov vs. Primus was a mixed martial arts event produced by Bellator MMA, that took place on October 7, 2023, at the Pechanga Arena in San Diego, California, United States. A Bellator Lightweight World Grand Prix semifinal bout for the Bellator Lightweight World Championship between current champion Usman Nurmagomedov and former champion Brent Primus was the main event.

name: Spin the Block
description: Follows a drug dealer as he struggles to keep sane as he tries to go straight and forfeit a life of crime.

name: I Am The Hero
description: One hero, one girl, and many failed tests. Will may be invincible, but he can t tank his less than ideal grades. In a gesture that could be interpreted as pity, Katelyn steps in to help Will get some common sense, and maybe something other than a D+.

name: No Such Thing as Loyalty 3
description: After Rachel s death, James and Darnell put their differences aside and tear the streets of Syracuse up. During the bloodshed, the truth is revealed about the attacks on James and Darnell and why they were targeted by Bia and Mr. Kiss.

name: Subspiral 2
description: 7 years after Tru s death, Six returns to Atlanta seeking answers and revenge. Things have changed greatly in the city but some things still remain the same. Betrayal, death and destruction follow Sx wherever he goes. No one can withstand the force that pulls them down. No one can withstand the Subspiral.

name: Slapped Straight
description: Garry Nichols lives day by day resenting his life choices, until he meets the one person that will change his life for the better. After boosting Garry s confidence and showing him how to live, HotHands introduces Garry to the world of Smack Fighting.

name: Saakshi
description: Thriller Sinhala Short Film

name: Get It
description: Two drug dealers unwittingly get caught up in a terrorist plot while trying to make a drug deal catching attention of U.S. intelligence agencies.

name: Myal Uprising
description: Kill his Enemy s daughter or be killed. To unite the Caribbean community. The Emperor starts a secret organization. First he must eliminate anyone hindering progress. By any means necessary. Starting in Philadelphia

name: Plus 4
description: Just a completely normal game of Uno!

name: A wave
description: A young man chases a young woman to discover the content of a briefcase.

name: Peter Pan The Musical
description: Peter Pan the eternal boy who doesn t want to grow up comes to life and goes on an entertaining and touching adventure in Neverland.

name: אי המטמון - המסע הגדול לאיים הקריביים
description: A huge musical for children and the whole family based on the beloved book by Robert Louis Stevenson. A young boy discovers a treasure map and goes on the adventure of his life!

name: H-151: Perfect Machine
description: H-151 is an android that suddenly starts to have human memories. Humanity seeks to resist despite the power and indifference of the machines.

name: Cat Burglars
description: Two catnip drug peddlers scam a pimp and now they must escape his thugs.

name: Superworld
description: Set in an alternate world where everybody has powers, however, a supervillain has taken over. The one kid who lacks special abilities is the only person who’s able to steal the Super Stone that keeps the villain in control – but to do that, he must pull off the dangerous heist while rallying his hero friends in a war against the villains.

Jason breaks into an apartment in search of something important. Along the adventure, he runs into a number of obstacles that slow him down and frustrate him. Will Jason find what he is looking for before Miguel comes back to the apartment?

name: Stoley
description: About a car that s getting stolen repeatedly throughout the day, which belongs to a hit man s mother, and he s in a rush to get her car back to her.

name: Guy Manley - A Real Movie
description: Guy Manley, formerly the world’s most preeminent secret agent, who, while drowning in his alcohol-filled retirement, is brought back for one last mission by his former boss Buck Cash. His mission? Kill Buck s brother, Rich Cash, keeping him from being elected the city s new mayor, thereby stopping him from becoming the most powerful person in the world!

name: Stone
description: A private detective is hired to find a missing girl. The only thing is, the girl isn t who we think she is and everyone is out to get her.

name: Life Debt
description: After being tasked with the murder of his friend, The Hitman now retired, turns down the mission, but things start to go bad after his friend is mysteriously poisoned.

name: Accomplices
description: When a politician s son is abducted by two brothers in their first kidnap, trouble comes unannounced.

name: Snakes!!
description: When a small town is ambushed by an unwelcome reptile, people start to question whether or not it can actually be killed.

name: By My Hand
description: Haunted from his inability to save a young girl from drowning, a Coast Guard Rescue Divers  life begins to fall apart. His only saving grace on the path to self-destruction is one woman s love.

name: Legendary
description: A squire runs away from battle and encounters a dryad in the woods.

name: Turbo Treadmill
description: Six racers compete on a turbulent treadmill in a race to the finish line…but an ulterior motive threatens everyone involved.

name: An Unfinished Country
description: Hungry for recognition, two young American doctors accept the challenge of a residency in the world s largest hospital, where they unexpectedly get entangled between an ambiguous chief administrator, drug lords and political corruption.

name: Switcher – Off the Grid Cinema
description: During a corporate war, mercs that works for the opposing factions engage in a brutal fight for a refugee convoy, with unpredictable consequences.

name: The Reflection Temple
description: A man is attacked by 3 bunny men and must fight them for his self worth.

name: 陈真之困兽犹斗
description: During the Beiyang period, various forces in Shanghai were intertwined. People with lofty ideals joined the revolutionary party and were persecuted by the Beiyang warlords. The Japanese assisted the Beiyang warlords in arresting the revolutionary parties. As a patriotic and passionate young man, Chen Zhen prepares to reorganize Jingwu Sect after avenging his master. Revolutionary Party Yang Yunshuang asked Chen Zhen to help rescue leader Li Guofeng after he was caught and taken into prison by the Japanese. Chen Zhen wanted to revive the Jingwu Sect and did not want to go against the Japanese, so he declined. Yang approached Chen Zhen and asked for help again after he found out the secret location of the prison. Chen Zhen knew the brutality of the Japanese and knew that he could not save him alone, so he decided to help him. The next day, Chen Zhen was taken to prison by the Japanese and was asked by Ryosuke Ishikawa to participate in the ring competition.

name: Bethell
description: In the vast expanse of space, a team of explorers stumbled upon an unexpected and enigmatic planet called "Peniel". A team dispatch to the planet s surface. As they confront unforeseen challenges and unearth mind-bending secrets.

name: Dreamer
description: A Native American Medicine man has a vision of the future to come.

name: Shinigami s Box: Origins
description: In a race against time, Inspector Kabir of Special Crimes Unit must unravel the connection between a masked criminal captured during a critical operation and a mystifying box that materializes in a secluded village on the city s outskirts.

name: Foot : Trophée des Championnes 2023 : Lyon OL - Paris PSG
Veeranadai
description: After the death of his sister, Periyakaruppu vows not to marry and raise his niece, Poomayil. When Poomayil grows up, she finds out about her uncle s sacrifices for her and decides to marry him.

name: القناع الأسود
description: The story of a young boy who becomes a vigilante known only as the Black Mask

name: Phar Lap s Son
description: New Zealand s second talkie film, a fast moving original feature comedy filmed in Dunedin about the eccentric owner of famous race horse Phar Lap. Only 45 seconds of the film still exists.

name: Sharp Instinct: Volume II
description: Just when they thought he was dead, Mad Malkie strikes again! And this time, he’s got a vengeance, and a sidekick! The team return for the action packed sequel in ‘Sharp Instinct: Volume II’. Knightley and Wainwright are back on the case with Chief, Gallagher and Banes. Mad Malkie with the help of hitman Hugh Rafferty begin to try and take out the police force. Will they succeed, or will they get caught?

name: Sharp Instinct
description: There’s a murderer on the loose, and there’s not much time left to stop him. DI Patrick Knightley (Paul Burke) and DS Iain  Wainwright (Mark Stinson) along with PC Terry Gallagher (Chris Reynolds), PC Jon Banes (Billy Burke) and The Chief Inspector (John Seggie) have to catch the killer. Will they catch him, or will he escape for good?

name: Doga: Mumbai Ka Rakhwala
description: Deeply disturbed and traumatized since childhood, DOGA is a cynical and brutish, yet idealistic vigilante who believes in "uprooting the problem rather than solving it", and does not believe in upholding the laws and rules of the world since he considers the whole system corrupt and twisted. This short film is a brief introduction of his ways.

name: To Kill A Man
description: A hitman sent to kill only to find himself in small talk and a short chase.

name: The danger is with them 4
description: The story of 3 detectives and their hunt for criminals, and how things get complicated when a case of money laundering takes an extremely dangerous path, when very powerful people are found to be linked to it

name: Boy Kristiano
description: A Muslim man joins an organization of rebels to avenge his parents who were killed by foreign Christians.

name: Benigno Saulog
description: When Benigno (Raul Zaragosa) decides to become a priest as a fulfillment of his mother’s dying wish, his pregnant girlfriend Maribel (Jennifer Dimla) commits suicide.

name: Widow Ghost
description: Mina and her husband Pop are happy, but Pop needs to go to Bangkok. Vina accompanies him but needs to go back as his mum is sick. Pop is aggressed and killed by three ruffians as he stole Mina s love from the subdistrict headman s son.

name: Pineapple Studios - The Movie: Worlds Collide
description: On the night of the convergence, The One Beyond enters the pineapple dimension through a rift in space-time. His one goal- to force Pineapple Studios to review the film Moana. Now Pineapple Studios fights for the fate of his world and many others, as the penalty for disobedience is the complete reset of the multiverse.

name: The Contract
description: A look inside a job of paid assassin with unusual disability.

name: Blood, Bullets, Buffoons
description: Framed for a murder he didn t commit, a young man sets out to exact revenge on the girlfriend, mobsters and friends who put him behind bars.

name: Bloodsport Royale
description: Two college students, Grayson and Eli enter a competition where they get hunted for sport. Will they make it out alive and be able to reap their rewards, or will Bloodsport Royale get the best of them?

name: Forgotten Innocence
description: Richard Becker, a military veteran who finds himself on live television, recounting the harrowing experiences of his two-year deployment in the Iraqi war while reflecting on the tragic events he endured.

name: The Final Showdown
description: Young Vietnamese tries to live as a fighter in the United States and discovers that the man who hired him for life and death in the ring is the officer who betrayed him and killed his sister in Saigon.

name: The Inhabitants
description: Logan, haunted by his past arrives in a small coastal town where he quickly finds its inhabitants are not what they seem.

name: American Dreamers
description: Jake’s future doesn’t involve college, just his grandparent s money to pay for it...

name: Ningyo Sashichi: The Cat’s Golden Claws of Death
description: Sashichi is a dapper and handsome man. He is called a doll Sashichi because he is "a nice man like a doll." On top of that, he is a considerable young boss. This is a story in that Kanda solves the murder spree in Edo where a famous boss of Otamaga pond, Sashichi lives in.

name: James Bum: The Spy Who Laughed At Me
description: When a sinister threat from his past reappears with catastrophic plans, a wayward and lost Bum must return to action and save the world from side-splitting disaster

name: Realm of the immortals
description: The film mainly tells the story of ordinary high school student Lu Fan who was accidentally involved in the demon battle, and was awarded the top master of the immortal world. He was then forced to take the story of “Xianxia College” to cultivate immortality, love, counterattack and destroy the Mozu.

name: Chemical Crisis
description: Hong Kong movie

name: Kahit Sa Kabilang Buhay
description: Director: Willy Milan Stars: Ronnie Ricketts, Subas Herrero, Renato Del Prado, Naty Santiago, Ina Raymundo, Boy Fernandez, Dong Serrano, Anthony Cortez, Noli Buenaventura, Infanne Abanica, Romy Blanco

name: Time Tunnel Warrior
description: A fast and powerful warrior from the Ming dynasty is transported to modern day Taiwan, where he puts his skills to good use and becomes a champion marathon runner.

name: On Air
description: This is a robbery taken place in a studio. Three robbers hijacked huge property and trapped nine hostages. The robbery scene was broadcast live while dealing with the police.

name: Penetrate Blue: Vapor Trail Another Age 2824
description: 2315. Humanity was defeated at the end of the war, refusing to coexist with machines with intelligence born from a certain accident, "Machine Intelligence". Driven from the ground, they hid in large shelters. Hundreds of years later. The nation has lost its form, some vigilante groups such as the "Security Forces" are in control of the people and facilities, and humanity, who has stopped even counting the calendar, has only surrendered itself to gradual destruction.  2824, a blind girl who once fought as a soldier of the Security Forces, "Tenshu Mikoto" is an engineer girl who manipulates the Security Forces Organoid Organoid, 13th Generation Cradle--F/V-10 Honet-C. Along with Noriko, she earns a living by salvaging and repairing machines and batteries in the discarded section as an outcast "Outer" who does not belong to any community.

name: Dashing Down
description: Frank has had a bad day. His girlfriend dumped him, he got mugged and his e-bike got stolen. Frank now on the clock to find his bike goes on a revenge fuelled investigation to find the perpetrator and give him a taste of his own medicine.

name: Jayden Ritchie: Reign Part 1
description: Jayden Ritchie meets Connor Paterson who faces a new enemy which may be his last.

name: Lappu sa Sachin
description: Seema Haider had crossed the border from Pakistan to enter India illegally to marry Sachin, whom she met through the online game PUBG. Seema was already married to Ghulam Haider and has four children with him. She decided to leave Pakistan and cross the border illegally to be with Sachin.

name: BKFC 49: Slaveski vs. Lindsey
description: BKFC 49 took place Friday, August 25, 2023 with 6 fights at Miami-Dade Fairgrounds in Miami, Florida.

name: Rowdy Raja
description: Plot Unavailable.

name: Sunday Jog
description: A short animated film about two joggers who set out for a stroll on a beautiful Sunday morning. They are alarmed by what appears to be an earthquake-which quickly reveals itself to be much more.

name: The Ballad of Ricky Santangelo
description: Popular tiktok star Skweezy Jibbs movie debut.  Ricky Santangelo is a male dancer who has to rescue his son from the Russian mafia.

name: Milton s Laundry
description: Milton, a nerd who is constantly picked on, gets his chance to prove his toughness.

name: The Toxic Kid
description: A prequel to BLOODFEAST! THE ADVENTURES OF SGT LUNCH.

name: The Fur Locker
description: "The Fur Locker" is a captivating and whimsical fictional movie that takes the core elements of the acclaimed film "The Hurt Locker" and reimagines them in a feline-centric world. Centered around two daring cat brothers, Ori and Cookie, this adaptation weaves together suspense, humor, and the unique charm of our feline companions.

name: Kong VR: Destination Skull Island
description: A virtual reality short tied into Kong Skull Island.

name: Harbour Chapter 1
description: A story based on unity of Indonesians, Malaysians, Chinese and Indians. In north Indonesia, a powerful international gangster tried to encroach a part of fishers region to build a harbour for corporates but they failed as the people who live there are experts in the Silat martial arts. After 16 years, David returns with another strategy to defeat Anwar Hussain- the godfather of Asian silat warriors.

name: The Lollipop Forest
description: In a candy world, a park ranger develops superpowers and has to save the world from vegetable pollution brought about by an evil CEO.

name: Cardigans and Cream Soda
description: Two burglars attempt to burgle a house who’s residents are on holiday. However they face an enemy they do not expect.

name: Kingdom Hearts 2: The Movie
description: In this fan made adaptation of the hit video game, Roxas has mysterious encounters with hooded figures that lead him to discover a terrifying truth about his life. Sora, Pence, and Olette must rescue their friend Kairi from the claws of Organization XIII.

name: Ghanoom the Billionaire
description: Ghanoom and his friends work as filmmakers, he tries hard to succeed but he fails in everything he does. Ghanoom discovers that he gets a big inheritance from his grandmother. But to get the inheritance, he faces a unique challenge and incapacitating conditions. On the other hand, a gangster tries to stop him from getting the millions.

name: Path Jodi Na Sesh Hoi
description: This movie is based on a love story. A girl named Titli meets with a car accident and she even loses her mother. Titli is severely injured on her head because of which she loses her memory of few years. She stays with her uncle and falls in love with a guy named Aranya. Titli suddenly gets back her memory and she forgets whatever happened after her accident. Aranya tries to remind Titli of their courtship days, but Titli doesn t remember anything. Still Titli feels that Aranya truly loves her and they both stay together.

name: Power Rangers Mission Training
description: Join Rex Ranger as he and his team of Power Rangers take on Lord Mortar and his evil Zomboids! Train to be the next Red Power Ranger!

name: The Spider Conspiracy
description: Top swordsman Ting Hwa Chung faces his most deadly challenge when a powerful kung fu spider demon wreaks havoc in a town on the western frontier

name: Greenback
description: In a small Minnesota town, Jesse works as an underpaid mechanic. After a tense work day, he comes home to find his Grandma losing their house. On the search for better pay, Jesse agrees to work with his best friend Eddy. But during a job, things get real.

name: Red Lilac - Dream of Shudder
description: Released by Eiyu Club in 2001. Super-powered dolls. The other part in this series is called the “Blue Ver.” and was reissued alongside a later Eiyu Club release.

name: Gabe the Kung Fu Spy from Western Sydney
description: Gabe is a retired spy who loves his wife, his kung fu and his country in that order. One night he receives a call from his old friend Tanner to help him out for one last mission. At first Gabe declines but when he finds out that his Grandmaster is the mastermind villain in this mission Gabe comes out of retirement to find out why his Grandmaster has done this.

name: Desi Spider-Man
description: A low-budget Parody of famous superhero Spider-Man. Set in Ghaziabad, India.  Plot : One night, Shyam got his super powers from a Sage to protect his village s residents from the evil Bandits and to be more successful in life with Radha his Love Interest.

name: 女劫杀
description: Jade Bond is a secret agent for the Kuomintang who uses the codename snow, who is given the task of overseeing an arms deal with the North Korean agents. Soon the communists discover the plot and use their best agents to thwart the plot. A brilliant action film: from the Mainland China studios Jinn Kwang Xi.

name: The Quest
description: A group of friends find an old map and decide to seek the treasure, but someone comes in their way...

In the gripping action thriller  240  John Doe, a hardened hitman, finds himself entangled in a web of danger and deception. Be immersed into a high-stakes narrative where every moment counts. As John s calculated skills lead him to unwittingly target the son of a formidable crime lord, he s thrust into a deadly game of survival and redemption. With heart-pounding sequences and unexpected alliances,  240  will propell you on an electrifying journey of suspense and adrenaline.

name: The Big Night
description: A wannabe superhero causes more harm than he does good.

name: Paa Lohgan
description: Thai action movie that was later re-edited into Filmark s Robo Vampire.

name: Beaver Wars Episode IV: Dam Dam
description: Its a period of civil war. The Beavers, Striking from their hidden Dam, Have won their first victory against Camp Mahn-Go.  During the battle, Counselor spies manage to steal the Beavers ultimate weapon, the Glizzy Gauntlet, a device with enough power to control the waterfront.  Pursued by the Beavers sinister agents, Epic Man confronts General Beaver. The Beaver Kings most entrusted ally...

Seeking to avoid the terrible economic crisis of 2001, a young man travels to 1990 to stop the Minister of Economy. But he will have to deal with his bodyguard, who will have to choose between his own interests and the fate of the entire country.

name: Backslide
description: After creating an e-liquid from a mysterious set of instructions they found on the dark web, Ryan, a highly intelligent high schooler, and Justin, not so much, decide to team up once again and spend their summer vacation making "real money."

name: The Dark Feline
description: On a dark night, a mysterious masked hero must face his biggest fears to save his family before the sun comes up.

name: Audio and Visual Experiment 6
description: The sixth in an ongoing collaboration between Gf Savages (visuals) and Hugo Alexander (audio) made entirely using remixed media.

name: The Big Catch
description: Two clashing minds, going by the nicknames of Fish and Blue, have to work together to complete their plan of a robbery. These two amateurs are set for failure but with a bit of self confidence, they go through with it and the challenges along the way.

name: STRESSBALL
description: A student decides to join a school fight club.

name: Space Cowboy
description: Rivals Space Cowboy and Evil Cowboy race to be the first to steal the elusive Cosmic Cowboy Boots from the high-security Sheriff Headquarters. The Head Sheriff and her team of cowboy security guards, however, are out to get them. Make sure you re wearing socks because this action/comedy will knock them off!

name: Connor Paterson: The Beast Within
description: A bewildered Connor Paterson must reconcile with old allies while facing the beast within himself and the beast within his new home.

name: Jayden Ritchie 2: Ritchies Unite
description: The two Jayden Ritchies must learn to work together to defeat a returning threat.

name: Menace To Society
description: The Menace to Society is a guyyy who is a ... well....; yeah,,,,

name: Rapid Action
description: Blaming himself for the death of his wife, Gao Feng left the security industry and lived an ordinary life with his son. Six years later, due to the arrival of his former boss, Gao Feng has no choice but to return, to the old profession.

name: Mais uma segunda-feira na vida de Marselo
Chaos Rising
description: A bloodthirsty war band of northern marauders lay siege to an unsuspecting, fortified Breton village. Sir Florian L anguille and his band of noble questing knights are all that stand between the people of Raissal and the forces of chaos.

name: mr dadee
description: cash register one mr dadee two mr dreaded for toys r mr DADd

name: Gunman from Nowhere
description: When hot-headed Shi-Han stabs the local gang boss while recovering money that his brother lost in a gambling match, he is forced to flee to the North. Here he is reunited with old classmate Mai-Chu, but old habits die hard as the pair get involved in the business affairs of the local club boss and the dramas of jealousy, betrayal and violence that come with it.

name: Can You Can t You
description: Welcome to The Wedding.  A marriage failing from its inception causes blazing riots amongst guests

name: The Animal
description: A man transforms into his primordial being. He sees two things in the world. Pleasure and Blood. One might say he is the wolf. After two cops are demoted from the force to a new Parks Protection Unit, Keon Lennedy (Orlando Torres) and Marquis Sinclair (Logan Serna) must now hunt down a beast that has spawned in the woods after two cameramen(Alex Ceja and Brandon Hay) tampered with the environment.

name: CVTV
description: A crime saga unfolds when a humble high school news broadcaster is revealed to be the most notorious criminal in the world. Out of revenge, he takes his Co-anchor hostage for experimentation of his master plan, only for it to become a deadly game of cat and mouse filled with treachery, clones, and murder.

name: The Lame Ranger
description: When the self-conscious villain known only as the Red Scarf begins terrorizing local saloons, town drunk and local hero the Lame Ranger and his trusty sidekick Best Buy must use all their wits to stop him and defend the Wild West.

name: Ring of Hell
description: Ka-chi who spent a miserable childhood starts out looking for Eom-ji, who used to be at the orphanage with Ka-chi and was adopted by rich parents. When he finds Eom-ji, he hesitates to approach her for she became a member of high class society.

name: Oh Jak-du the Emporer
description: As second in command of a group of organized criminals, Jak-du expects to receive control when the leader announces his retirement. However, the elderly crimelord unexpectedly passes this honor to a cruel stranger with plans of his own that do not include Jak-du.

name: Here They Go
description: Tommy Peterson takes his girlfriend to meet his over protective Mother and crazy family. He s worried that his mom won t like their age difference, and he s hoping his relationship makes it through the night.

name: Malvolia s X-Mas Massacre
description: Malvolia s first ever Christmas Special! Join her as she hosts "Silent Night, Bloody Night 2: Revival" from Director Dustin Ferguson.

name: Prisoner of the Dawn
description: A criminal from the 1940s is captured by the Nazis, they experiment on him turning him into a vampire. Now the deep state wants to experiment on him to create a super soldier. He fights to stop them.

name: Buddha
description: A prince in India learns that his birth was responsible for his mother s death. He makes up his mind to relieve the suffering of his people and begins studying to become a Buddhist priest

name: Fatal Snakes
description: Two bounty hunters, Quincy Ellis and Blake Harper, go on an epic journey of self-discovery in pursuit of infamous crime lord, Colton Beckett.

name: Off Objective
description: A rookie agent operative is sent on his first mission. However, after an error from the agency he is faced with a serious ultimatum.

name: Half Samurai
description: A mysterious drifter wanders into a bar owned by a psychopathic yakuza gang on Halloween night.

name: Brandon Figueroa vs. Stephen Fulton Jr.
description: Two undefeated super bantamweight world champions will meet to unify titles when Brandon Figueroa and Stephen Fulton, Jr. clash for supremacy at 122-pounds. Figueroa set up the anticipated unification bout when he scored a sensational seventh-round KO over Luis Nery in May to win the WBC belt. Fulton captured his first world title in January with a hard-earned win over Angelo Leo. Now, the two will go toe-to-toe in the ring with the winner having the right to call himself the best 122-pounder in the world. Live on SHOWTIME.

name: Tom Yum Phee
