description: Every 10 years, the duel between the Bat Demon Lord and Chomyuth Mam will be held by appointment But this time, the tournament ended faster than expected when the Demon Lord s beloved disciple attacked the Demon Lord Mam. Causing this tournament to stop And the two made an appointment that they would meet again in the next 10 years.

name: Rosemary & Sage Turn Back Thyme
description: Detective Reba Rosemary teams up with FBI agent Samantha Sage to solve a series of murders from 1984. A sequel to both Race Against Thyme and St. Patrick s Day, Turn Back Thyme is the Spring Lane crossover event you ve been waiting for!

name: Corre Narco Corre
description: Pushandro, a petty criminal, decides to steal four kilos of unicorn cocaine from his dangerous boss. Now with a price on his head, Pushandro finds himself hunted by the intrepid bounty hunter named Vash.

name: A Nightmare in the Living Heart
description: Joi is going to break up with K on the night of a grad party after she found out that K has planned to leave her and go study aboard in China for the rest of his life. Amidst the chaos, a mysterious masked killer crashes into the party. Leaving Joi and K with no choice but to fight and survive this disaster, together.

name: The Accidental Revenge
description: THE QUEST OF MISUNDERSTANDING AND THE PATH OF ACCIDENTAL REVENGE.  One man sets on a journey to survive the outcomes of an apocalyptic world but turns into a grand adventure.

name: Scummo the Kid
description: Scummo the Kid and his partner in crime Aaron Kinsella are force to leave town, again, but this time notorious bounty hunter Dean Taaffee is hot on their tail.

name: BlueBolt: Rise of the Mists
description: After battling countless villains, Bolt and his team have never faced anything like this. When Viciouz finally enters the scene, and having a Team of his own on his side, Team Bolt will have to team up with Wire and stop the Rise of the mists.

name: Mr. Dollar
description: A man with a skittles addiction must meet his dealer

name: Death Protocol
description: A reporter investigating police corruption faces danger at every twist and turn. As he races to expose the explosive truth, he must decide where to place his trust.

name: Kill Jill
description: Mayhem in a hospital. (this was entirely centred around Jacob having crutches)

name: The Amazing Compulsion
description: THE AMAZING COMPULSION, a determined superhero whose power is to help people, must aid young Ernie in retrieving his wig from a maniacal hair-puller, THE PLUCKER, and his road salt/crack dealing accomplice, THE SALTSHAKER.

name: No Memories of Murder
description: After a murder at an assisted living home, none of the residents can remember what happened.  Detective Jake Jordan works tirelessly to discover the truth.

name: Sgt. Villapando: AWOL
description: A WELL-TRAINED JUNGLE FIGHTER COMBATS CORRUPT AND SELF-SERVING AUTHORITIES AS HE WAGES A ONE WAR AGAINST A GROUP OF TERRORISTS PROTECTED BY AND PROTECTING AUTHORITIES.

name: A Man Who Arrived by Night Train
Bellator MMA x Rizin 2
description: Bellator MMA x Rizin 2 and Super Rizin 2 was a mixed martial arts event being co-promoted by Bellator MMA and the Rizin Fighting Federation that took place on July 30, 2023, at the Saitama Super Arena in Saitama, Japan. A Bellator Lightweight World Grand Prix quarterfinal bout between former Bellator Featherweight Champion A. J. McKee and former Bellator Lightweight Champion Patricky Pitbull was scheduled to headline the event. However, on July 26, it was announced McKee had pulled out of the bout due to medical issues and was replaced by current Rizin Lightweight Champion Roberto de Souza at a catchweight of 161 pounds.[

name: A Cup Full of Crazy
description: An award winning screenwriter, who is recovering from an emotional breakdown, must figure out who is terrorizing her before she goes insane.

name: Hawkeye
description: When Kate Bishop (Tori Mosser) arrives at her safe house, it is not as safe as she thought. Can she and her partner, Clint Barton (Garrett Sims) figure out who and why someone is after them?

name: The King of Zhuanyu
description: The King of Zhuanyu, a hero in ancient China who defended his country. When the whole country facing the crisis, The King of Zhuanyu decided not to give up or sacrifice his citizen. Eventually he and his wife were martyred.

name: Tigers Roars
description: Pei Yunxiao went to find a genius doctor to save the people who lost their hearts, but he didn t want the Justice Society to hunt down the killer. The Justice Society kidnapped Pei Yunxiao s disciple and forced him to hand over the skill. A conspiracy where good hands and justice will rebel against each other.

name: The Legend of the Imperial Physician
description: The Wang family is proficient in traditional According to the doctrine of his family’s ancestor, Wang Zhaoen would rather live a normal life than serve in the palace. So he runs away from his hometown. However, he was still found by Emperor Qianlong and was hired as an imperial physician. Wang was highly praised for his unique skills in saving the dying and healing the wounded, his success made some others jealousy. They framed Wang and almost made him dead. After the death of Emperor Qianlong, he had no choice but to flee from the court and live among the people.

name: The Secret of Princess
description: In Chang an, a fire broke out in the Qinglou Zuiyue Royal Academy, and the Top 1 girl, Jingyue, was burned to death. What was supposed to be an unsurprising case alarmed Yang Wenxian, the Eunuch of Shen Ce Army. Pei Jun of the Dali Temple (Court of Judicature and Revision) asked his friend Su Yannan to help investigate the case. Su discovered that there was a bigger conspiracy behind this.

name: Damocles
description: In the Ming Dynasty. With a humble background, Yin Yingzhi encounters a secret assassin organization that has existed for thousands of years. He was told that he has the blood of the King of Assassins and that his father was murdered. This secret assassin group will train Yin to become a super assassin,and ask him to avenge for his father. Actually it is a big conspiracy.

name: Killing Crisis
description: In the late Jiajing period of the Ming Dynasty, the corrupt official Zhao Bingren murdered in order to avoid investigation by the imperial court. He blamed Li Xin for the murder, but unexpectedly Li Xin escaped from prison with the help of Lin Xun.More people are involved. In order to save life, Li Xin must mediate among these forces and find the truth.

name: Avengement
description: During the Chenghua period of the Ming Dynasty, at the beginning of the establishment of the West Factory, a large number of forces were incorporated to serve it. The Hu family of Shaanxi was also included. Escort Master Mu was unwilling to succumb to the West Factory, but he knew too many secrets, and Hu killed Mu.The youngest son Mu Xiaobai stabbed Hu s eyes and finally escaped.

name: Revenge
description: In the year of Tianqi of the Ming Dynasty, Liu Qizhong, the town governor of the Jingyiwei, was tragically exterminated by the eunuchs, and only his two young children were spared, living in the world under the names of Yin Qian and Yin Mo. Twenty years later, the two brothers embarked on the road to revenge.

name: The story of Zhanzhao
description: Zhan Zhao is ordered by Bao Zheng to go to Anyang to handle the case, but accidentally happened Feng blacksmith death case. Qi Yong is a powerful and arrogant man who wants to recruit Zhan Zhao, but Zhan Zhao refuses

name: Ordinary Man
description: Between Song and Qi, Zhang Yongxun escorted the little princess Zhao Yuhuan, escaped the pursuit of Qi s eagle dogs, and entered the inn by mistake. In order to protect the princess, Jia Youcai, Banniang Jiang Xueer and Dong Yi worked together to protect the princess and embarked on the road to Jiangnan. Along the way, they faced the pursuit of Qi s eagle dogs. Let Jiang Xueer and Jia Youcai understand what a hero is. The three went through layers of obstacles and finally escorted the princess to Lin an safely.

name: Wakai toppū
description: On his way back to Yokohama, a young boy named Kenji Hase encounters a girl named Yoshiko who is being harassed by the Kaminaryu gang. He rescues her and they head towards Yokohama in Yoshiko s car. In Yokohama, there is an uproar because Kenji s father, Shozo Hase, a customs officer, has been accused of stealing confiscated drugs. The story unfolds with thrilling action as Kenji bravely confronts the gang of villains who framed his father and kidnapped him, all while seeking justice and vindicating his father s innocence.

name: Dinner For Two
description: A husband with a hidden past and a wife ready to move on, struggle to hold what s left of their relationship together, but when a sinister figure comes knocking, he threatens more than just their marriage.

name: Marshall Man
description: 9 year old Marshall is an average boy when an experiment gone awry in science class transforms him into Marshall Man. A tiny superhero with the power of flight, super strength, and the ability to barf on command. Marshall Man learns the struggle of maintaining his regular life during his new super story as well as how to handle loss and come back even stronger through his main moral: NGU - "Never Give Up!"

name: World Gone Mad
description: A rouge news reporter looks into the murder of the District Attorney, who was killed after he started an investigation.

name: Legends of Charmswood
description: In the mythical land of Charmswood, young Marco is pursued by the forces of the wicked Lord Morok, catapulting him into an epic adventure that soon involves a stoic warrior and comical sorceress.

name: Shark!
description: When two estranged brothers reunite after years apart, they have much more to worry about than just clashing personalities. A magical muse brings their unfinished childhood script to life and soon a poorly rendered shark is floating through their neighborhood, thirsty for blood! As the brothers flee through the night, they re forced to face their broken bond and dashed dreams.

name: พจมาน สว่างพิฆาต
Sher Gujjar
description: Narayan Gurjar is a very cultured self-respecting youth but due to crop failure in the village, he has to work as a security supervisor in a factory. He is humiliated by his employer and his 5-year-old son witnessed it. Will he resent them forever or help them despite his prejudices?

name: Bullet Rani
description: A fearless police officer, Bullet Rani must face off against powerful criminal and anti-social elements, when she is assigned the murder investigation of a political leader. Can she identify and bring the culprits to justice?

name: Carry on Maratha
description: Kolhapur s young Maratha, Martand comes across Kusum, a South Indian girl looking for a lift in the middle of the road. A chance encounter turns into a love story that brings both families face-to-face. Will the Maratha warrior be successful in love?

name: Ras B Ras
description: Set in the world of Bathaikha, where weirdness knows no bounds, Ras B Ras revolves around the misadventures of Darwish (Adel Redwan), a bumbling chauffeur, who mistakenly picks up a retired crime lord from the airport and ends up being ruthlessly pursued by the old man’s gang to return him in one piece. Darwish, Abu Ghadrah (Ziyad Alamri) and the newly appointed CEO of Sheikhs’ chauffeur limo company, Fayadh (Abdulaziz Alshehri), are on a mission to mislead the gang into believing that the man is still alive, igniting a wild and transformative adventure.

name: Sobre la hora
description: A trip to a football match is the perfect excuse for Lionel, Andrés and Alan to continue learning aspects of their strange friendship.

name: Orchid
description: About the problems faced today, especially how to deal with the tragedy of losing hundreds of livestock due to the threat of mercury.

name: Red Bag
description: A poor servant steals a red bag from a rich man s home later bag gets stolen by a driver and many chases the one after the bag.

name: Malok Ila
description: Portrays the far-from-average life of a Malagasy character in a humorous way, with suspense, fights, comedy, and adventures.

name: George Foreman vs Joe Frazier II
description: A professional boxing match contested on June 15, 1976, for the NABF heavyweight championship.

name: Evander Holyfield vs Buster Douglas
description: A professional boxing match contested on October 25, 1990, for the WBA, WBC, and IBF heavyweight championships. The bout took place at the Mirage in Paradise, Nevada, USA and saw Douglas making the first defense of the titles he won from Mike Tyson in February 1990.

name: Assalto em Luanda
description: The story of King and Talibam, two poor and unemployedbrothers from Luanda who, wanting to change their lives, decide to become robbers.

name: Born in Limbo
description: A story revolving around a small nation during the warring states era.  It was a dangerous time in the land as people were dying from the plague. The godly doctor and his students Jiao Long and Zong Bao head to the area to offer medical assistance. Unbeknownst to the them, the tragedy is caused by the King s insatiable greed to obtain the fountain of youth.

name: Water Bottle Blues
description: A man supposed to buy drinks for a party, gets confused and buys water bottles…

name: Through The Borobudur
description: There is a legend that the secret of the rise and fall of Murim is hidden in a seven-story stupa.  The path of painful trials begins for the young knights of the Hero Association who jump into it.  They complete their mission through assaults such as the scorching sun and pouring rain, but discover that everything in the Budo Tower was a conspiracy.  And the culprit behind everything was one of them...

name: Massive: The story of West Ham United s UEFA Europa Conference League triumph
description: A coming of age tale about West Ham United s meteoric rise through the 2022/23 Europa Conference League Competition, but will they be crowned European Champions? Includes talking heads from the likes of Divin Mubama, Aaron Cresswell, Jarrod Bowen and more!

name: Private call
description: A mysterious phone call will change the life of the writer Valentino Lombardi and his family. He will be violently harassed by a psychopath who will play the bloodiest and most macabre horror story with him. But that s not all, for years he has studied it and will take revenge by torturing anyone who meddles. They must fight to survive and face such an atrocity. Who is it? And what do you want?

name: Payphone
description: After receiving consecutive calls from an unknown number for almost a week, Noah (Davin Broadhurst) and Claeg (Brandon Criswell) discover that the call has been coming from a retro payphone.

name: Anomaly
description: An armed military team, led by a tough elite solder, is closing on a group of "anomalies," closing in on them through an abandoned wasted landscape. The anomalies are evidence of some strange paranormal activity and it s a perilous situation, and some of the commander s team want to be cautious. But the commander -- whose last mission failed -- is ruthlessly determined to prove herself by succeeding in hunting down the anomalies.

name: Fight in Causeway Bay Ⅲ
description: Chinese movie

name: The Clown
description: From 1996 until today, 33 violent murders are perpetrated during the Halloween period in Belgium by a serial killer who calls himself "the clown". We are on the eve of Halloween. Vincent hates this party and for good reason: his father committed suicide during this period. That morning, he receives a call from his friend Alice to babysit her cats because she has to be away for a few days. On the way, he realizes that he is being chased by a strange, masked man. Very quickly, he realizes that this stranger covered in a clown mask is prowling around Alice s place, determined to enter.

name: Far From the Grove
description: Desperate to satisfy their employers, Del and Julius venture out to find potential customers for their drug dealing operation—the search zeroes in when Del meets Khalif, a struggling addict with a troubling past. As their lives intersect, mutual destruction ensues.

name: IMPETUS
description: In a riverside community, a father and son struggle to stay on their land.

name: The Territory of Beasts 2
description: Yuji miraculously survives the war between the Takemikai and Shinwakai yakuza gangs. However, an assassin hired by the Shinwakai attempts to take his life...

name: Stoney
description: A highly anticipated boxing match is coming up, but one of the fighters has an untimely death. His waterboy is required to take his place.  Available on YouTube on Shawn Wick Productions

name: Remote (Out Of) Control
description: A remote control becomes sentient and starts messing with someone who just wants to watch TV.

name: Total Shootout
description: It s an all out war. Who will win this battle?

name: The Crystal
description: James finds a crystal that grants him extraordinary powers. However, Tevolo wants the crystal for himself.

name: Volicia of Pluto - Chapter 1: Fire of the Apocalypse
description: 2006, Shikoku s shipping city faces the Seto Inland Sea.  Akio Hoshigami, a girl who lost her dream of becoming a track and field athlete due to a leg injury, entered high school with her best friend Ayano Umisoe. Club activities and meeting new friends, Meizakura, who was empty, is gradually regaining her former self. However, one day Saiki suddenly disappears.　  On this planet, there have been battles that have continued since ancient times. Once given to God, eight giants with empty souls "Star Machina".

name: Sari
description: Introverted girl whose routine life brightens up when she falls for Rohit, one of her fellow college mates. Will they be together?

name: Lights Out!
description: A magical multiversal arcade machine, and two choices at every turn…will you be able to escape space pirates, save the school from a flood…or maybe both at once? Perhaps you could make it to light…or will you perish in the darkness? Make your choice in this interactive film.

name: My Sky [Detective Edition] Punishment of Darkness
description: A bureaucrat in the Ministry of Health and Welfare is murdered. The wealthy detective Ippei Yasuda s line of investigation reveals Takeshi Tsumeyu, a psychiatrist who heals the worries of big names in the political and business world and works behind the scenes as a fixer in the shadows of politics and economics. Ippei buys up the raw materials for Moonsault to fight Tsumeu, who manipulates people at will with the devil s drug, Moonsault, but...

name: My Sky (Detective Edition)
description: Ippei Yasuda, the scion of the Yasuda Zaibatsu who has continued his wandering journey, becomes a detective and corrects evil! Recognized for outstanding grades at the police academy, Ippei is assigned to the Kyobashi police station as a new detective.

name: Earthquake Wars
description: When Los Angeles gets hit with a massive earthquake, how will America respond?

name: Rest In Peace
description: A shootout breaks out in the wild west. Blood will be shed, but is it worth the glory?

name: Bored Hatamoto: The Kaga Conspiracy
description: The crescent shaped scar on his forehead is a license given him by the Shogun to kill anyone he deems to be a villain. A strong performance that reflects well upon his father, with interesting stories, these films are required viewing. When Saotome hears rumors of a Daimyo s plot to overthrow the Shogun, he launches an investigation. With the help of his sister Kikuji, his stewart, Kinai and a mysterious woman they begin to unravel the web of treachery.

name: ThAT One Guy
description: A down-to-earth individual leading a modest life, Thomas Adams "ThAT" Thompson s world is turned upside down when a mysterious event bestows upon him extraordinary superhuman-like abilities. In his quest to overcome his greatest adversary, ThAT One Guy undergoes a transformative journey, both physically and emotionally. He must learn to harness and master his powers, pushing himself to the limits and discovering the true extent of his abilities.

name: The Insideman
description: plot is unknown

name: Run It Up
description: A group of ladies create their own way of life by robbing individuals. They keep stacking their money up, until they get caught in the act.

name: Bloodfeast!: The Adventures of Sgt. Lunch
description: When wrongdoers and lawbreakers are on the prowl, there’s only one man for the job. Meet Sgt. Al T. Lunch; IOU1 PD’s most diligent and decorated officer. With over 300 arrests under his belt, Sgt. Lunch is revered by his peers, beloved by his community, and a prominent subject of interest for local ace reporter Mary Lowdown of the Daily Tattletale. That is until Lunch’s vengeful and envious twin brother Feast constructs the ultimate killing machine: a super human, Terminator-esque cyborg known as The Annihilator who marauds through the city maiming and mutilating innocent citizens. To make matters worse, Feast has disguised himself as his do-gooding twin and committed acts of robbery and murder in order to sully Lunch’s good name. With his reputation tarnished and his job on the line, Lunch must do battle with The Annihilator and put an end to Feast’s reign of terror once and for all.

name: Crime - The Dark Side
description: Crime - The Dark Side chronicles the life of a young boy Debomoy who aspires to be a footballer although his orthodox parents are hell-bent on him pursuing engineering. In a strange turn of events, Debomoy finds himself being accused of a crime he did not commit.

name: This is Budget Productions
description: Follow Budget Productions over the past 2 years. Diving into behind the scenes, bloopers, highlights, extended cuts, never before seen footage and the cancelled Virgin Wars: Ultimax.

name: Cam48
description: A young woman owes a significant amount of money to a sports bookie.  One day, hiding out in a pawn shop, she steals an old camcorder and soon discovers the camera films 48 hours in the future and she inadvertently films her own murder.  Now with 48 hours to go she must solve her upcoming murder and figure out where the camera came from.

name: Alexander the Brain
description: Dive into the mind of Alexander Conroy, a bare-knuckle boxer in the 1880 s. Approached by a young fighter, Charlie, who idolizes him, he takes Charlie under his wing into the dangerous testosterone-fueled world of bare-knuckle boxing.

name: White Nights
description: In the early winter of 2006, Xing Dong, who had just been released from prison, was stabbed to death at Jiangbei County Ferry. The criminal police officer in charge of solving the case, Wu Xiangyong, lost his wife in his early years. He is a workaholic and has a tough personality. The boss of Renchuan and his adopted son Rhubarb were arrested. At this time, there was another violent murder case in Jiangbei County. Wu Xiangyong almost collapsed helplessly and fell to the bottom of the valley. Ten years later, when the cruel truth surfaced, Wu Xiangyong realized that more than youth had been lost.

name: Nine to Forever
description: Hello and welcome to the Nine to Forever Program. And happy work day! I hope you are content with your well deserved rest, as you have got quite a big and exciting day ahead of you!  In "Nine to Forever," two individuals find themselves trapped in a mysterious office space, subject to a series of perplexing tests orchestrated by an enigmatic, prerecorded voice. Struggling with their fragmented memories and conflicting desires, they must navigate through a maze of uncertainty where intentions remain shrouded in ambiguity.

name: The Rookies and the Mighty Kids
description: THIS IS AN ACTION-COMEDY FILM.

name: Tulume Alyas Zorro
description: THE BIGGEST SWASHBUCKLING ACTION COMEDY OF THE YEAR. - THIS ACTION-COMEDY MOVIE HAS THE PROVINCIANO TULUME PLAYING AN UNLIKELY ZORRO.

name: Grave Keeper: Track of Lord
description: At the beginning of the Republican Era, archaeologist Zeng Tian Hua and his friend Zhang Huai Chun start searching for the map that will lead them to the hidden treasure of the Marquis of Haihun. During the search they get to meet the tomb keeper Yue Ling and the three will have to help each other defending the tomb from the evil grave robbers who want to covet the treasure.  ~~ The story is inspired from the literary records published in 2016 by Li Long Wu (黎隆武) about the Marquis of Haihun Liu He (千古悲摧帝王侯——海昏侯刘贺的前世今生).

name: La Notte
description: Based on the concert "La Notte" by A. Vivaldi. Carnival in Venice: Pulcinella attempts to slip into a VIP party, without too much success. His dream of the rich and famous will turn into a nightmare.

name: Grave Keeper: The Coffin of Marquis of Haihun
description: Revealing the secret of the tomb of Marquis of Haihun! Villagers continuously die in strange ways. While there is more to the beautiful owner of the gold store than what she seems to be. Is she an evil spirit or is there another hidden secret?  (Source: iQIYI)  ~~ The story is inspired from the literary records published in 2016 by Li Longwu 黎隆武 about the Marquis of Haihun Liu He (千古悲摧帝王侯——海昏侯刘贺的前世今生).

name: The Last Wargame
description: A group of paintballers  idyllic wargaming weekend turns bloody when they find Neo-Nazis in the woods alongside them.

name: Secretly a Serial Killer
description: A teenager and his buddy decide to surprise their friend by showing up at his house one day. Little do they know, their friend harbors a dark secret which may change their lives for good...

name: Contract Killer The beginning
description: Shambhu who is a big businessperson, who gives Dev a contract to kill a company s CEO.

name: Shanto Keno Mastan
description: Sadek tries to rape Shanto s younger sister, Jui. Shanto in revenge kills Sadek. Shanto s father, lawyer Mirza Sahib, is the witness in the case. Mirza hands over his son to the law. Shanto is sentenced to four years in prison. Shanto then chooses the gangster s path.

name: Keep Quiet
description: A weathered tribal cop and his new trainee must find a ruthless fugitive, whose return to their rural Indigenous reservation has exposed its darkest secrets and could ignite a violent gang war.

name: Phantom of a Previous War
description: During the 8 years of war between Iran & Iraq, many people have been killed and left their families behind, in the meantime Kurdish people fight for their rights against Saddam Husain s Government. Pishtewan a child lost his brave Dad and was killed by a traitor, he Became an Orphan and grew up without parents as his mum left them behind, Pishtewan as an adult trying to tell us a story of his childhood as he is a team leader in one of the known organization after the liberation of Iraq.

name: BKFC 46: Franco vs Harris
description: On July 1st BKFC 46 took place at the  Walker Activity Dome in Newcastle, England.  In the main event of the evening Rico Franco faces off against Kaleb Harris.

name: Salvador Sanchez vs. Ruben Castillo
description: On April 12, 1980 at The Civic Auditorium In Arizona, Salvador Sanchez defended his WBC Featherweight Championship when he fought Ruben Castillo.

name: Salvador Sanchez vs. Juan Laporte
description: The Salvador Sánchez vs. Juan Laporte fight was a boxing encounter that took place on December 13, 1980, in El Paso, Texas, United States, for the WBC world Featherweight title.

name: The Four Commando’s
description: An alien invasion is upon the earth and our four hero’s need to stop them! In this short film Cédric Knote wrote, directed and edited his first short film

name: I am Bautonyut
description: The story of Bautonyut and his comrades on their crusade against invisible demons.

name: Action Movie
description: A writer attempts to write his own action film. Will he succeed or will he succumb to his own personal doubts about himself? Birdman meets Adaptation meets every action cliche on the planet!.

name: Assault Human!!
description: Assault! Human!! (突撃！ヒューマン！！ Totsugeki! Hyūman!!) is a Japanese tokusatsu series co-produced by Nippon TV and Union Motion Picture Co. in association with Mot Boule. Filmed as a live stage show, it was broadcast on television from October 7, 1972 to December 30, 1972. Having never been released on home video and the master tapes believed to have been overwritten, the show is now considered completely lost. Many of the suits used for the kaiju were acquired by Toho through Bin Promotion, using them for their 1973 series Go! Greenman.

name: Agnishapath
description: The latest directorial by Anup Sengupta.

name: Kung Fu Kuresa
description: A Documentary crew explore the life of Kuresa Tapu, a man who believes he is a Kung Fu master. As the crew delve deeper and ask more questions, they soon discover Kuresa may not be who he say s he is.

name: SCP: Dollhouse
description: A group of Foundation MTF operators investigate a suburban home after reports of anomalous activity inside.

name: Almajiri
description: THE ALMAJIRI is a movie that is based on true stories as it affects millions of children in Nigeria and other countries who are victims of trafficking and other forms of child slavery as we saw with Nafisat and Salihu, two young children who were separated from their parents from childhood by the cruel business of Alhaji Makarfi. The gullible villagers believe him, love him and even revere him higher than the chiefs in the North. He is showered with gifts, praise, some villagers even go the extra mile to sell their valuables to offer him bribes just to get their wards enlisted for his scholarship scheme, unknown to them that none of their children ever gets to see the wall of a school let alone have the liberty of pursuing a trade. They are beaten, brainwashed and force to become prostitutes, suicide bombers and ALMAJIRIS.

name: The Cavern of Necrodon
description: When the threat of a Dragon arises, The Baron sends three warriors to slay it before it can ravage the land.

name: The Legend of Hei 2
description: Xiaohei had lived a peaceful life with Master Wuxian in a village and had gradually adapted to life in the human world. Two years later, the Spirit Hall was suddenly attacked and Wuxian and Xiaohei received a request to go to the guild hall. Can Xiaohei overcome this sudden trial? In the face of unexpected enemies, what choice will Xiaohei make...

name: Seishun no Sabaki
description: University karate club member Kikuo is actually the son of a yakuza boss. However, he disliked his father s business and never spoke about his family at school. One day, his father, Tatsuzo, becomes the guardian of the Yamanaka-gumi.

name: Edhuvum Nadakkum
description: A frustrated theatre actor leaves his house after a troubled married life with his nagging wife. He meets a young woman in a lonely house and mistakes her to be his wife.

name: Dagul
description: Dagul: Directed by Cesar S.B. Abella. With Baldo Marro, Star Querubin, Howard Aleta, Bob Soler.

name: Rustico Acuzar: Waray
description: Rustico Acuzar: Waray: Directed by Tony Y. Reyes. With Baldo Marro, Ramon Revilla, Ace Vergel, Jess Lapid Jr.

name: Blood on Each Step
description: Different stories at different time periods, all about revenges and killings.

name: You Give Me Heart
description: In an opulent world where the gods get their powers from social media adoration, struggling artist Sundiata joins the talent competition “Who Wants To Be A God?” in a desperate attempt to be seen and impress the most popular deity of all: Maadi, the Goddess of Plenty. Sundiata wins by a fluke, shocking the world by becoming the new God of Creativity. Ascending to the realm of the gods, he will discover what it means to be worshipped by the masses, and who Maadi really is behind her facade.

name: Mkhuzi: The Spirit Racer
description: Manzo is a half-human, half-alien teenager who dreams of becoming a superstar racer like his mother, the legendary masked racer Mkhuzi. Always struggling to reconcile his Zulu heritage with his alien blood, Manzo is outraged when aliens threaten to destroy his Soweto neighbourhood and his injured mother challenges her old nemesis Ogun, an alien overlord, to a re-match he knows she won’t survive. Manzo takes the mask for himself and joins the epic race with everything he loves at stake.

name: Ip Man: Thailand Kung Fu Masters
Boris Schniderman 2: The Blade of the Musician
description: Boris finds new success in his music career after moving on from guitar and becoming a cover artist.  During this new path in his career he makes new enemy s who attempt to destroy him and his career, as he is followed by a documentary crew who captures the reality of his life.

name: EONII
description: In the distant future, a lone scientist makes a breakthrough discovery, called EONII, that may save the Nation and the Continent. Forces in the shadows begin to surface. Lies, Betrayal, Politics, and War, all to decide one thing, who should control the power of the EONII?

name: Bootlegger s Picnic
description: On an adventure with his older brother a young man comes face to face with the darker side of the bootlegging business.

name: Pratisodh
description: Plot Unavailable.

name: Warden
description: When Warden Cruz (Baldo Marro) assumes office, the penitentiary brims with diplomacy and fairness, which is very much unlike the situation prior to the warden s appointment. Unfortunately, Warden Cruz accidentally kills an unreasonably persistent suitor of his wife.

name: Ranasthali
description: Basava is a warrior consumed by vengeance, eagerly awaiting his confrontation with his enemy, Badra.

name: Estrella de Plata
description: Bruno, an aging taxi driver who yearns for his secret past and likes "lucha libre", has trouble relating with his young son Ricardo. But his past comes back to haunt them, forcing Bruno into a final confrontation with an old enemy

name: Gazetegnawa
description: If you don t face it, you won t win.

name: Wanigon vs. Gamaron
description: Direct-to-video tokusatsu kaiju short included with a pair of monster toys.

name: O Grande Golpe
description: Rafael Yasin, a trendy bon vivant from São Paulo lives his life as an uncompromised heir and party animal since the day he was born. With the death of his father, a company to manage and bankruptcy on his feet, Rafael needs to chase maturity and get his company back.

name: Krai Thong 2020
description: A story about love in Thai literature that has been adapted and rethought.

name: Damn Hippies
description: The year is 1973. A sleepy small town is turned upside down in a matter of weeks. It all begins when six young men return to Norway after many years abroad. The life as hippies around the USA and Europe has left its clear marks. However, it will soon prove to be difficult to lead the same lifestyle in Norway.

name: Another Day at the Beach
description: Sergeant Stacker and ODSTs encounter the covenant after crashing nearby Hotel Zanzibar

name: BANG
description: The gruesome, unexplained events of random college students discovered by an off-duty officer.

name: The Shining Will Come Crashing Down
description: The Shining Will Come Crashing Down

name: Superpanther
description: Tim Ritter s first short, which was him trying to pay homage to Superman.

name: Miikshi: Cosmic Rays
description: When Mibukiville s underwater tunnel is threatened by geological disaster, Miikshi must save the city before it s too late.

name: Dulhan Ganga Paar Ke
description: What is the English language plot outline for Dulhan Ganga Paar Ke (2018)?

name: Weekend at Selmseys
description: When a weekend at Selmsey s farm turns deadly, they must fight to survive against a wild creature - far away from its home.

name: My Friend Angelo
description: Near the end of WWII, a prisoner named Angelo is framed for murder.

name: The Forever Beautiful
description: A struggling cosmetics company uses stem cells for a new anti-aging cream, extracted from prisoners before they are executed, but those who apply the product soon find themselves haunted by their ghosts.

name: Mantiram s Ring
description: Join Ghanti and friends on a wacky adventure through magic lands such as a bridge, trees and stuff.

name: Freewheelin’
description: A

name: 广东十虎铁桥三之王者荣威
Khiladi
description: What is the English language plot outline for Khiladi (2023)?

name: Innermost
description: In a technologically advanced yet collapsed society, cyberpunk SF and traditional oriental martial arts converge. The story follows the emotional entanglement between a long-lost chivalrous couple and a person with regenerated organs starting from a fight for a mystic magic lyre. From the perspective of the capabilities of regeneration technologies, it prompts audiences to contemplate the amplification or dissolution of emotional value.

name: Buenaventura Daang: Bad Boys Gang
description: Daang Buenaventura, head of the Bad Boys Gang, prefers to live in jail rather than enjoying the free life at the young age of 17.

name: Los Hermanos Bedolla
description: Based off the corrido of the same name.

name: A Guys  Story
description: A crime trio of Almaty, Kazakhstan, go on a dangerous adventure, delivering an illegal package across the border, to earn money and start new lives. But everything doesn’t go according to plan, and not only their future depends on the success of the mission, but to their lives.

name: Kuthu
description: A Yuvaraj Mohan Punch

name: World Heroes
description: An animated special based on the World Heroes fighting game series by ADK.

name: Strong Bite
description: kung fu kurdish movie

name: The Burrell Files
description: Special agent Michael Burrell attempts to stop an enemy from his past from exposing him and releasing information that could destroy his friendship and the world.

name: The Burrell Files 2
description: Michael Burrell and Reggie Reid are called back into action. Their new enemy, who has a more dangerous plan than they first realised, appears as Michael s greatest challenge as he must stop him before it s too late.

name: Medal
description: Rajvir Singh, a young athlete, dreams of winning a gold medal, but tragedies always prevent him from achieving his goal. After losing his hearing due to an accident, he gets admission to an athlete academy where he betrays by angad.

name: Hellcat s Revenge II: Dead Man s Hand
description: Tough and sexy "Hellcat" club member Kat (Lisa Neeld) gets framed for a crime she didn t commit and sent to a gruesome women s prison ruled by a maniacal warden (Patricia Culliton). She must fight her way out in order to get her revenge against ruthless and sadistic biker gang leader Rosie (Donna Hamblin).....and get help from her former lover "Snake" (Len Kabasinski) to make that revenge happen.

name: Carding Estrebel
description: "Carding Estrebel" is a noteworthy Filipino film directed by the highly acclaimed Romy T. Espiritu, starring Ricky Rogers, Rosemarie Gil, and Van De Leon. This film is a great example of the quality that can be found in Pinoy movies, showcasing brilliant storytelling

name: Sonny Segovia: Lumakad ka sa Apoy
description: Sonny Segovia s "Lumakad ka sa apoy" is a Filipino movie directed by Jose N. Carreon. The movie features a talented cast including Mark Anthony Fernandez, Giselle G Töngi, Alma Moreno, and Dan Fernandez. The film is a must-see for fans of Pinoy cinema, as it offers a compelling narrative and exceptional performances. If you re looking for an engaging and thought-provoking movie.

name: Bullet for Vengeance
description: 3 years ago, Inspector Yen along with a team under the  command of DSP Amrish intends to nab Feng, a criminal on  the run along with his wife, Wei Ning once and for all  However, a reckless and rash Yen dashes in without prior  orders, resulting in the accidental death of Wei Ning. 3 years  later, a recently released Feng from prison seeks to take  personal vengeance against Yen for the death of his wife

name: Laya
description: An ex-convict in search of a new life is caught in the tangled web of love, hate, and intrigue.

name: The Dawn
description: An instructive film on the topic of the eradication of smuggling and democratic police.

name: CW 155: San Diego
description: CW 155: San Diego was a mixed martial arts event that took place on Friday, June 2, 2023 at the Sycaun Casino Resort in San Diego, California.

name: Red Light District Shark Attack
description: Amsterdam - a city known for its wild debauchery, legal sex and drugs, and sharks?! When sex and drug obsessed Tommy takes a trip to Amsterdam to visit a brothel in the Red Light District, he tries the newest experimental drug available on the black market that turns him into a HALF MAN, HALF SHARK, FULL ON KILLING MACHINE! Will the ladies of the brothel survive the night? Hope ya’ got your rubbers!

name: Crossroad
description: A Chowk is like a solid witness that passively observes people, relationships, friendships, festivities, politics, and social interactions. Chowk is about crossroads.

name: The Hourglass Project (Part 2)
description: The continuation of a vexatious scandal that rocks the school to its core. 4 members of a fake board game club carry on with their plan to expose the truth.

name: Monster Fights
description: Godzilla and his son Minya fight Angila, Gaos and Mechagodzilla on an island in the pacific.

name: Sideshow Beast
description: In Felix Macaca s first leading cinematic performance, watch as he plays a traveling circus primate named Mr. Margarita escaping the abusive clutches of clowns Chinky Chancho and Dr. Lubes.

name: The Trespassers
description: Boris wants to destroy everyone universe, and only keep his alive. J.C. must figure out a way to stop Boris from doing so, but he can t do it alone.

name: The Flash of the Forest
description: Silent action film featuring forest rangers.

name: Batang .45
description: Batang .45: Directed by Deo Fajardo Jr.. With Michael Rivero, Isabel Granada, Ricardo Cepeda, Ramon Christopher.

name: PANTALONE
description: Lucas and Lucca carry out a robbery to recover their boss s briefcase while arguing about trivial day-to-day matters.

name: Sunset Sounds of the Mediterranean Sea
description: Watch the Sunset on the Mediterranean Sea in Egypt while listening to ambient music from around the world

name: Rand Rover
description: The misadventures of a young couple, Rodolfo and Patrizia, as they set off on a car journey to their coastal home during a summer vacation.

name: The Sexman
description: Famed Bounty Hunter The Sexman Goes on a quest: For Revenge.

name: Quest For Whopper
description: A young brave knight goes on a journey to save his kingdom and the Whopper.

name: Isang Araw, Isang Buhay
description: Isang araw isang buhay: Directed by Leroy Salvador. With Rudy Fernandez, Elizabeth Oropesa, Alma Moreno, Daria Ramirez.

name: Revenge of the Fierce Woman 2: The Deadly Escape
description: After Luo Dan killed Lao K, the boss of drug organization, 1.5 million dollars from the organization went missing. Lao K s wife hires killers to eliminate Luo Dan, at the same time, other crime organizations start to chase this missing money. Luo Dan have to team up with Kai Bo from international police department to fight their way out.

name: Revenge of the Fierce Woman
description: Chinese athlete Luo Dan comes to C country to find her young sister Luo Li, only find out she was raped and killed by local drug organization. Luo Dan picks up the gun and determined to take revenge on them.

name: Guardian s Valor
description: Meet John Anderson (Zack Farms), an ex-military veteran turned vigilant protector of the innocent. Known as the Guardian, he possesses extraordinary strength, unwavering determination, and a heart of gold. Enter Adrian Harmony (Jackson Fillmore), a brilliant and enigmatic criminal mastermind with an unusual obsession-music. Adrian, also known as the Melodic Menace, not only possesses a genius intellect and a flair for the dramatic, but his weapon of choice is a symphony of sound. As the Guardian and the Melodic Menace clash, With each confrontation, the Guardian faces an adversary who skillfully incorporates music into his nefarious schemes. From sonic booms that send shock waves through the streets to harmonic traps that confound even the most seasoned heroes. Along the way, he enlists the help of allies, including a gifted sound engineer and a passionate music aficionado, to decipher the villain s musical clues and save the day.

name: Battle of Qigong: Blood on Macao Port
description: Crime organization from overseas sent a skillful Qigong killer Huang to China, Chinese police ask young Qigong user Ling to help. Huang and Ling fight each other all the way from mainland to Macao Port, only to find out that they are apprentices from the same master.

name: AIDS Apocalypse
description: A crazy story set in somewhere Southeast Asia, a group of "crazy apostles" brutally massacred aids patients. The policeman Shao Wen s wife was killed by the group, so Shao determined to chase each member of this group to death.

name: Moonchild
description: Detective Carter, and his disillusioned partner, Anthony, investigate the death a small-town police chief. These investigations lead Anthony to uncover a greater mystery, one that had nearly been forgotten. It s his job to bring justice to the victims, and in his journey for truth, he finds more than just evidence.

name: Life After Man
description: An infectious disease causing the dead to rise again has wiped out most of humanity. On a small outback farm in Australia, a young girl must protect her sister from more than just the dead.

name: The Masked Man
description: After a terrorist group called the Masked Men bombs the city s police station, Cathal, a young police officer, is thrust into a world of chaos. With the city in turmoil, Cathal takes matters into his own hands, breaking the rules he once followed. Determined to restore order, he embarks on a dangerous mission to hunt down the masked terrorists and bring them to justice, becoming the city s last hope in a relentless battle that tests his bravery and determination.

name: BKB 32: Sweeney vs. McCauley
description: BKB 32 took place Sunday, May 21, 2023 with 11 fights at Indigo at The O2 Arena in London, England

name: POO Facing Italian Warrior
description: Woman gets kidnapped, but before that we get to see her stick her entire hand inside of a drink.

name: Sgt Patalinhug: CIS Special Operations Group
description: Director: Jerry O. Tirazona Writers: Erwin T. Lanado, Stanley Orong Stars: Eddie Garcia, Aurora Sevilla, Beverly Vergel, Lani Lobangco, Charlie Davao, Nick Romano, Orestes Ojeda, Dick Israel, Gabriel Romulo, Jessie Delgado, Apple Punzalan, Nathaniel Rivera, Honey Policarpio, Dexter Doria, George Estregan, Efren Reyes Jr.

name: Off Course
description: A psychological thriller told though the eyes of a hitman that gets haunted by the people he kills.

name: Rage And Redemption: A Quarrel Of Morality
description: Tis a tale of ass-kicking martial art, betrayal, anger, vengeance, fury, and rage. Created in under 48hrs for the Okotoks International Film Festival 2023 and Winner of the award, "Best Use Of Dialogue"

name: Juan Mechas Vol.2: The Revenge of Lg Og
description: After defeating a dangerous mob boss named Popovich, Juan Mechas and his new adoptive daughter, America, must defeat Lg Og, a vengeful lackey of Popovich.

name: Walang Atrasan
description: THE WACKIEST GANG OF SOLDERS ENGAGE IN AN SUCCESSFULLY DESTINED TO END ALL MILITARY ENCOUNTERS IN THIS ACTION-COMEDY FILM.

name: BKFC 43: Alexander vs Smith
description: BKFC 43 took place Friday, May 19, 2023 with 12 fights at Liberty First Arena in Omaha, Nebraska.

name: Bounty in Chinatown (Short-Film)
description: After fleeing his life of power and privilege in a dystopian future, monarch Dr. Orlando Han becomes the target of a relentless hunter, seeking revenge for a past tragedy. However these vengeful plans are disrupted by the arrival of a mysterious stranger who holds the key to his families deepest secrets.

name: Zombie Bounty Hunter M.D.
description: A struggling film company documents the onset of a zombie outbreak to gets hits and pay their rent.

name: Crooked Stripes
description: In the heart of Detroit, two detectives fight side-by-side to avenge the death of the man that brought them together - and to protect the city they call home.

name: Loyalty
description: When Fendi hears her brother Bill was gunned down in the streets of Phoenix. Fendi and her female crew (Honey and Cartier) wreak havoc, seeking revenge.

name: Poker Pandemonium
description: A group of friends in suburban Ohio who hangout after school almost every day gets bored. They then decide to start playing poker and chaos ensues.

name: Act of Vengeance
description: A retired man with special skills seeks revenge for the murder of his son who was a cop on an undercover assignment to bring down a very powerful man name Johnny Vitto.

name: Trampa Tendida
description: Pedro Cancino transports a load bound for Houston, Texas, where his accomplices are waiting for them. However, something is wrong. There is information that does not match. Pedro and his partner prepare because this could be a trap.

name: Iron Rule
description: About local authorities trying to track down those responsible for wreaking havoc in a city overrun by drugs, money, and crime.

name: The Come Up
description: Down on their luck, Best friends Ace and Deuce need money fast. They stumble upon a package from a transport gone wrong. What seemed like a lucky come up turns deadly as the packages owner will stop at nothing to get it back.

name: Stranded
description: About an incorruptible officer who gets stranded in a lone forest and must find a way to be saved while trying to remember all that has happened to him. It is also essential to know that it is a Nigerian story.

name: Canary Brothers of Tondo
description: For those familiar with Tondo gangster lore, brothers Roming, Boy and Jaime emerge as the new contenders for the power vacuum left by the murdered Salonga.

name: Galit sa mundo
description: A YOUNG MAN FEELS THAT HE IS ALONE AGAINST THE WORLD.

name: The Gunner
description: Before the era of the Laser Men resistance, an ambitious warrior with the help of his partners, look to make an innovative difference with the weapons they have been using in the years-long ongoing fight against the mercenaries who have taken over their home land. All throughout this journey, his character and motives are tested by family difficulties, power trips and team loyalty.

name: Huliya
description: Upcoming Kannada Movie

name: Walang Katumbas ang Dugo
description: Walang katumbas ang dugo: Directed by Toto Natividad. With Richard Gomez, Gelli De Belen, Mark Anthony Fernandez, Chuck Perez.

name: Durugin: Anay ng lipunan
description: Durugin: Anay ng lipunan: Directed by Tony San Agustin. With Romeo Campos, Dan Fernandez, Kimberly Diaz, Bernard Bonnin.

name: The Individual
description: In a futuristic and corrupt society, a female dictator comes to power, clones people, and disposes of the original bodies to create her army. One man stands up to her and begins unveiling the truth about her to save society.

name: Vandread Turbulence
description: Vandread Turbulence is an OVA summary of Vandread the Second Stage with additional footage and animation.

name: Vandread Integral
description: Vandread Integral is an OVA summary of Vandread the First Stage with additional footage and animation.

name: What s Left Behind

Mack is a widower who likes to cause trouble in the bar, and on the first day of his career he was trapped in a KTV full of killer players. He has to deal with stressful situations to survive to attend his son s birthday.

name: Intiqam 2: Wira Budiman

He who has now migrated and is determined to become a changed person faces an internal conflict whether to hand it over to the authorities or take revenge on his younger brother s death.

name: Badd Girls: The Book of E.L.M.

Though incarcerated, both heads of the two infamous gangs in Bilibid Prison won’t stop at anything just to get rid of each other and would do everything even to the point of inciting a grand riot inside for the sake of supremacy.

If they manage to keep Conway s brother Michaels, the worst player on the team, from screwing up their plans they just might win. But soon everything changes when Zoltar, Conway s old enemy shows up looking for revenge.

Saddened and feeling guilty, Siddharth embarks on a perilous journey to save Kohinoor from the clutches of the traffickers.  As he navigates through the treacherous world of human trafficking, he faces several challenges and risks his own life to rescue Kohinoor. As they journey together, Siddharth falls in love with Kohinoor, and their love story develops amidst the chaos of their situation.

Outré and the Battle with Scarecrow

The mayor calls in the military to help. The Drug Enforcement Unit sends its best agent, Dolph Reiner a former Vietnam fighter. He and his well-trained special unit declare war on the ruthless drug lords and their terror. Their message to the dealers is simple: they will inflict pain until they are on their knees begging for mercy....

name: Colossus: Child of the Wind
description: Modern scientists who were exploring in search of the  Goddess of the Wind , which has been an old legend of Jeju, accidentally travel back in time to Tamra in the 1230s. Meanwhile,  Yeong-deung , a girl of destiny prophesied by the legend of Tamra, meets  Yoo-rang  while being chased by pirates who covet the  spirit of wind  and escapes from danger. However, the pirates attack Tamra to claim the god that has the power to destroy the world, and the giant Dolhareubang robot  Colossus  to stand up to the enemy appears in the waterfall...  Will Yeong-deung, a girl of destiny with the power of the wind and a giant, be able to protect the god of wind?

name: BucketHead
description: An unsuspecting young plumber becomes a crime-fighting vigilante.

name: Bystander
description: A girl is home alone when she is met with the horrors that await her, right outside her front door.

Tirazona Stars: Jess Sanchez, Jess Lapid Jr., Cristina Gonzales, Tony Ferrer, Jorge Estregan, Nick Romano, Dan Fernandez, Perla Bautista, Chai Romero, Isabel Granada, Nazareth Sanchez, Derick Hizon, Roldan Aquino, Romy Diaz, Bert Olivar, Usman Hassim, Robert Miller, Falcon Laxa

name: Apocalypse
description: A story that tells what may happen to our universe. There are forces that live around us and beyond the universe. All the aspects of this movie come from God s Bible.

name: Son Of Sheba
description: In 937 BC the great King Solomon is dying as all of Jerusalem awaits his word on who will be his heir. In a last-ditch attempt to right a wrong in his past, Solomon promises when his bastard son born to the Queen of Sheba is brought before him, he will then announce who shall succeed him. He tasks his First Lieutenant, Jeroboam, to find him and bring him safely home. Menelik, the son of Makeda the Queen of Sheba, is now an adult. Just as he begins to feel truly confident in the realities of his life, he discovers he is the son of a foreign king who is capable of doing great harm to his family. He struggles with his responsibility to his family as his mother and wives harbor secrets of their past.

name: Leningrad: Voyage
description: Ilya Naishuller s second music video made for the Russian band Leningrad which depicts the grief of a robber.

name: Greys
description: "Asura Tiger" is a Famed Security Company based in Yangon providing a variety of services all related to security such as Body-guarding. Asura is trusted by celebrities and even big-time politicians. Despite their acclaimed status, Asura Tiger also has a plethora of enemies from various corners of the underworld in Myanmar. "Goudou" is a 20-year-old Asura Tiger Employee, one of their brightest prospects and a hardened young man, Goudou is an individual who has grown indifferent to the everyday horrors of the Myanmar underworld.....that is until he is one day confronted by his past.

name: Slay Ride
description: It s Christmas Eve, 1974 and we follow the story of Ronny and Wayne, who ve had a hatred of each other ever since last Christmas. Ronny, trying to make amends, invites Wayne up to his annual Christmas party, along with a few other mutual friends. During the party things seem to spiral out of control, with eccentric arguments, hookers, pimps and plots to kill other party guests. But the night truly devolves into all out chaos when a maniac dressed as Santa begins killing each party guest one by one.

When a massive solar flare from an incoming cataclysmic solar storm hits the station on a collision course with Earth, it is up to astronomer and former NASA Astronaut, Jess Denver, and Air Force Colonel Sam Adler to team up and save humanity.

name: Mamba s Diamond

The film stars Osas Ighodaro, Gabriel Afolayan and Uchemba Williams in the lead roles. The film is based on a story of couple of amateur thieves who by accidentally steal diamond which is one of the most valuable precious jewels in the world. The film had its theatrical release on 19 March 2021.

description: 3 young strangers who have been wronged in a bid to find justice form an alliance to bring a ruthless and vicious politician down. They subject themselves to physical and psychological training in order to execute the justice society has failed to grant them. Will they succeed and will this revenge bring them the peace they so desperately seek?

Chad Wildly Crusade

name: Simhadriya Simha

After his untimely death, his elder son Gowda (Vishnuvardhan) takes his throne and passes a wrong judgement against his brother Chikka (Vishnuvardhan). What circumstances lead to this

name: Holy People from Tangkuban Perahu
description: Because he is hurt by Wiro Sableng (Tonny Hidayat), Kaligundil (Gino Makasutji) takes revenge with someone else s hand.  Kalingundil killed a student of the White Lotus School and left a challenge letter as if it had come from Wiro Sableng.  Then he was contacted by other martial arts experts by pitting Wiro against each other.  So, when Wiro Sableng came to the top of Mount Tangkuban Perahu at the invitation of Kalingundil, he was greeted by crowds of well-known martial arts experts.  Wiro Sableng tried to explain, but was ignored.  Had to fight.  Wiro can solve that problem.  Especially when Kalingundil can be made to die, the problem is revealed.

name: The Sting of a Poisonous Warrior
description: Penging (Robert Santoso), the main disciple of Dewa Tuak (Piet Pagau), betrays him.  He ran away with an ancient book of his teacher.  Dewa Tuak did not pass down all his knowledge, because Penging committed many crimes.  Dewa Tuak then sends another student, Anggini (Devi Ivonne) to retrieve the book, while Penging has appointed himself as regent of Lumajang.  When they met, Anggini even asked to be his wife.  Because the request was rejected, Anggini was detained and will be hanged.  So Dewa Tuak then asked Wiro Sableng (Tonny Hidayat) for help.  On the way, he met Mahesa Kelud (Johan Saimima) who also had a grudge against Penging, because Penging had stolen both of his weapons.  The two of them, with the help of Dewa Tuak, were finally able to finish off Penging.  Anggini then arranged an arranged marriage with Mahesa Kelud.

name: Wild Nights

name: The Cry For Help

Ranges from bank robbers having to save his mom to Detectives finding killers to Serial killers, trying to find their way in the world.

name: Tribesman: The Last Red Hunter

One night, he is set free by a native girl. Confused and exhausted, he runs until he passes out. A mute native youth saves him and he integrates into the tribe. But he must find his way back to his reality and his time.

name: FERG

description: Barda the Blind (Ratno Timoer) while at Borobudur, is accused of being the murderer of Bimo Adirekso (Wahid Chan).  The children who were killed, Subala (Adang Mansyur) and Subali (Adji Agus), did not care about people s accusations.  They fight over their parents  inheritance until a big fight breaks out, which is useless, because the will and the treasure map are in the hands of Sekarningsih (Nuke Maya Saphira), also Ben s daughter, and her boyfriend, Bambang Permadi (Rachmat Kartolo).  Selendang Mayang (Rita Zahara) stole the treasure, then it was stolen by another person, all the way to Dieng.  Here the battle takes place.  This film is presented in a mystery style.

name: Battle of Persian Gulf I
description: The Persian Gulf Battle" is a 2016 Iranian animated war film directed by Farhad Azima. Set during the 1980s Iran-Iraq War, the story unfolds with an unprovoked attack by Saudi F-15 Eagles, piloted by French and American pilots, breaching Iranian airspace and shooting down an Iranian F-4 Phantom. In retaliation, Iran deploys its legendary interceptors, the F-14 Tomcats, to defend their territory. The intense aerial combat that follows highlights the tactical prowess of the Iranian pilots, who manage to shoot down a Saudi jet. The film pays tribute to the courage of the Iranian pilots while offering a thrilling, action-packed cinematic experience.

name: GORILLA
description: When a gorilla breaks out of the local zoo, it s up to Scott Wilson and his stalwart partner Jonesy to set things right.

name: Tiger Mask: War Against the League of Masked Wrestlers
description: Chizuru is a blind girl who lives in a poor rural orphanage, Hope House. In order to help her and get the winning prize of 100,000 dollars, Tiger Mask = Naoto Date turns his back on Baba and Inoki, who are indebted to him, and participates in the big event "Masked World League" set up by Tiger s Den. While hurt both physically and mentally, he fights against the monster wrestlers sent out by the Tiger s Den.

name: James
description: What happens when his archenemy is in the same house A bloody night

description: With an amazing cast of Blood Angels Space Marines, blistering ship-to-ship combat, an awesome soundtrack, and the best Techmarine ever invented, Angels of Death has been a fan favorite from the moment it first dropped on Warhammer TV.  Today, for the first time, we’re proud to present the10 episodes in a special feature-length format – so you can sit down and watch all 164 uninterrupted minutes in movie-form.

name: Shooting People In The Head
description: John and Max take desperate measures to shoot each other in the head without the other noticing, but they have problems doing it.

name: Pyar Mei Qurban
description: Pyar Mei Qurban is an Indian Hindi Language film, directed by Zuber K Khan. The film features Zuber K Khan, Imtiyaz Bhat, Ebadat Bhat and Roma Arora in lead.

name: Ghost Lamp
description: A classic wuxia about the dragon magic sword

name: Sailor Fight!
description: Sailor Fight! picks up several years later after the disappearance of the original Sailor Fighter and takes a bit more dramatic tone, following two new Sailor Fighters with clashing ideologies about the new wave of kaiju.

name: Toei 100 Great Heroes Super Fight
description: A 1986 video-only film introducing one-hundred Toei s superheroes from their tokusatsu productions and other shows.  Composition

name: Sailor Fight!
description: An early 90s indie tokusatsu revolving around the exploits of the Earth Defense Force’s Japan Branch. Which operates out of a small storeroom in the middle of nowhere. The lone hope for Japan and the world against the constant waves of kaiju invaders lies in the hands of the EDF’s support robot, Sailor Fighter.

description: With the help of Movember, Rogers, our sponsors, and all the teams that participated, the Tackle the Stigma Charity Football Tournament raised $19,000. This short documentary highlights the event and delves into the importance of men s mental health.

name: Jaga Hatare Pagha
description: Plot Unavailable.

name: Same Three Men

name: The Man Who Confronted Lampião with a Camera
description: This documentary tells the story of traveling salesman Benjamin Abrahão Calil Botto. He followed a trail of horror into the Sertão to find the fearsome King of Cangaço. The band invaded cities, looted, castrated men, branded women with iron, raped and killed. When he was face to face with the bandit, he drew his weapon: a film camera. This video recounts the confrontation that marked the history of documentary in Brazil, with impressive images of Cangaço

name: Piet Piraat Show: De Schat van de Propere Zeeën
description: Piet Pirate sailed with his Leaning Barge to the island of Bananos to look for treasure in the washed-up shipwreck of Captain Dirt. On the island he meets the young, tough boy Bertus Bandiet. He warns Piet Pirate about the curse on the wreck because Captain Dirt Beard polluted the sea. Piet Pirate knows that this curse is not real at all, because he invented the curse himself to frighten and stop pirates who pollute the sea. Piet Pirate is a champion of the clean seas. He goes looking for the treasure fearlessly. But then there appears to be a ghost wandering on the island. Is the curse real after all?

name: Shooter
description: It s a story of a little boy who becomes a gangster. He fell in love with a girl after saving her from committing suicide. But a rival gang leader tries to destroy his life and the people he cares about. So now he is seeking revenge

So he wants Samraat dead by any means but failed. Samraat finally lands and has bargain with one of Musa s man about the share. As Musa fails again and again, he needs a man smarter and stronger than Samraat. Kabila introduces Raja to him who becomes his first hand. But who is this Raja and what is his interest with Musa

name: Round Vernian Vifam: Chicago Super Police 13
description: A parody of Round Vernian Vifam set in 1920 s Chicago. Originally released as an extra on the Round Vernian Vifam: Memory of Ms. Kate VHS tape.

name: Post Master 71
description: The film is about a post master named Arif who serves the Pakistani government during the Liberation War. However covertly he recruits young aspiring fighters to fight with Freedom Fighters. But his identity is revealed by a local Pakistani agent and soon the Pak troops converge on him

name: Gunda The Terrorist
description: A bangla movie starring Afzal Sharif, Golam Kibria Tanvir, Achol, Bappy Chowdhury, Misha Sawdagar directed by Arif Jahan. Other actors playing important roles: Ilius Kobra, Don.

name: Ninja the Wonder Boy
description: Ninja the Wonder Boy is a 1984 film cut from the 1979-1980 anime series Manga Sarutobi Sasuke.

name: Alien Battlefield
description: On a desperate quest to find her missing brother, a woman travels alongside a mysterious stranger with no memory on the way to visit a shadowy figure.

name: Halser Acre The Movie ACRES
description: The heroine is a descendent of the Okinawa nature and farm-loving Halser Tribe and confronts the destruction of nature with farming tool nymphs. She decides to embark on a fight to protect the natural environment that she so loves, but…

name: Smash & Grab
description: Four women race a ticking clock across a bustling city, readying themselves for the ultimate Smash and Grab showdown.

name: Entre el Poder y la Calle
El Burrito Cowboy Saves Douglas, AZ
description: Join El Burrito Cowboy, Amiga Sue, La Paquita Vaquita and friends as they save Douglas, AZ from the evil Phantom before it becomes a ghost town.

name: Fatal Strike
description: After his brother is brutally murdered, a young man sets out to find the diamond-smuggling gang responsible in this fast-paced and gruesome tale of revenge.

name: A Hero Reborn
description: A continuation of a hero and his weakness film. The hero slate is brought back to life by a powerful witch named hazel. She trains him to control his powers, and the two must fight the villain Mr. Moji.

name: The World s Best Burger
description: A stoner college student s quest to create the world s best burger leads to a wild adventure with a food critic involving action, some valuable life lessons, and a really freakin  good burger

name: Yu Ming II Resurrection Of The Gaeltacht
description: After a deadly attack on his homeland, Yu Ming is forced out of retirement in the Gaeltacht in oder to defeat an old enemy one last time. He also has a son maybe, I don t know. There is cool guns and shit though

name: Ghost City
description: The life of a gritty undercover investigator is the focus of this edgy urban crime thriller starring Richard Carrol Jr. and Vonet Woods. A Drug Enforcement Administration agent must confront the ghosts of his past.

name: Irumban
description: Office, who belongs to hunter tribe, falls in love with Jain girl Mahima, whose life ambition is to become Nun. Office s friends kidnap Mahima into sea, to help their friend s Love. The Boat journey becomes adventurous and romantic and later dangerous due to goons with mission to eliminate office and his friends.

name: Guddu Gangster
description: Guddu is a teenager and Gangadhar is a middle aged gangster. They have nothing in common but due to some magic realism their lives got entangled in such a way that it created pandemonium after pandemonium.

name: The ShadowRealm
description: Long ago, a powerful spell tore open the veil between our world and the dream world, allowing Nightmares to cross over into reality. They have mercilessly preyed upon humanity, driving mankind towards extinction. Only one Hunter still stands in their way.

name: Xamayca: Land of Water and Forest
description: Intriguing and transgressive, Jamaica has always been considered the most attractive island in the Caribbean. The place in the world that plays, sings and dances at all hours of the day and night.

name: Toxic Restoration
description: Two teenage brothers attempt to escape their hometown during the outbreak of a cure gone wrong, while the federals wipe out all living beings with the hope of restoring faith in humanity.

name: The Warm Wind Of The Desert
description: A journey through the hottest deserts of Central America and its ghost towns. Red Rock Canyon, Mojave Desert, Antelope Canyon. Las Vegas, the metropolis of excess and Los Angeles, the city where the glorious Route 66 dies.

name: DUO
description: DUO follows a college student named Tim as he struggles to decide between going into finance or going into film. At the same time, he notices someone is stalking him. These events are more connected than they appear.

name: Boracay: The Suspended Island
description: Boracay Island is a small sandy island in the Philippines that is probably famous for one resounding decision. It has been suspended! In just 25 years, this small island has carried the burden of popularity and, unfortunately, decadence on its shoulders.

name: American Krawlers
description: Off-road s first feature length movie documenting an event held in Colorado during the summer of 2021 that brought together a handful of Offroad companies and your average off-road enthusiasts for a week of wheeling on iconic Colorado trails.

name: Voogie s Angel: Forever and Ever
description: A compilation of the original OVA series with 7 minutes of new content at the end.

name: C4
description: Suddenly, the alarms start wailing, indicating four people are still alive. The command center immediately dispatches some motor riders with warfare equipment to attack on them.

name: Shorty and the Legend of the Enchanted Reef
description: After their home reef is destroyed by a fish trawler, Jake and Shorty, two young fish friends, along with Indigo, Shorty’s sister, go on a quest to find a legendary coral reef, one that has never been found by humans. The trio sets out on an adventurous journey, where they will learn about courage, friendship and the ocean’s last underwater haven.

name: Nemesis the Warlock
description: Stop-motion animation based on the 2000 AD comic series.

name: Hard Bull - Ein Mann aus Stahl
description: German short film.

name: Poisonous Snake
description: Two "naginis" (snake women) compete for the love of a "nag" (snake man) in this supernatural action/romance/horror mash-up starring Shakib Khan in one of his earliest roles.

name: Avander
description: A desperate and depressed father meets a man who offers him an opportunity to find closure in a cold case that continuously haunts him. But he soon realizes that opportunity will change his life in ways he had never imagined.

name: Becoming the Enemy
description: The Thrilling True Story of the Woman who Terrorized The Islamic Regime of Iran 1978 "The Chadores Killer"

name: Martín Aquino, el último matrero
description: A film by Ricardo Romero Curbelo, produced by Cimarrón, is one of the few films made in Uruguay with historical recreation and in rural areas. This drama tells the story of the last oriental matrero and his adventures, love affairs and fights with a facón, between horses and grocery stores.

name: Tarri
description: A young hot tempered boy, Sangram popularly known as Tarri for his fearless attitude and unfettered courage, he fights against all odds and powerful adversaries to achieve what he has decided.

name: Hostage
description: Wealth strikes Ken as he helps his close friends invest In a once in a lifetime business opportunity. Ken somehow finds himself in a ransom with a Street cartel who wants what they see.

name: Lifestyle
description: The story of how Kinfolk joined the drug game to finance his dream of being a fashion mogul and record label CEO until he catches the wrong attention and finds himself battling between fighting for his streets or his dreams.

name: Kyodai
description: An unknown virus that turns people into dead people, ravages a large part of the world s population, leaving stranded survivors to the land for their survival, and fighting to preserve it.

name: Slay it, Son
description: A father and son set out on a harrowing quest to defeat a looming beast.

name: The Spark
description: This is the story of a guy named Will and his big fight. He finds himself in a difficult challenge from which it is hard to get out. He is trying to find his spark by the power of his ancestors. The video is done in trailer format and we are currently engaged in the development of Will s story.

name: Bang Bang Bang
description: A movie theater employee gets hunted down after witnessing a murder.

name: Five Minutes
description: The news of the death of Vladimir Ilyich Lenin shocked the whole world. The working people of England and France, Spain and China, Africa and America in the great sorrows bowed their heads. January 27, 1924 at four o clock in the afternoon, when in Moscow, on Red Square, the Soviet people buried Lenin, in everything work stopped for five minutes. Plants and factories stopped, stopped the movement of trains, ships and cars. This day is large American concessionaire should have made a good deal with a representative of one of the countries of the East. On the way, the Chinese driver stopped his car for five minutes. These minutes decided the success of the millionth deal. But no persuasion, bribery and threats to the concessionaire could force the driver to continue driving.

name: Robocon s Great Adventure
description: The story follows Robocon, a student of Gantz  Robot Academy who lives amongst humans and aids them as part of his studies. Though Robocon is a screw up, he makes efforts to establish a good image for robots in the eyes of humans they cross paths with.

name: Wheels or Doors
description: TBD

name: Hunt for The Rockerman
description: After a chance meeting in an otherworldly bar, two bounty hunters set out on a dangerous quest for revenge, fame and glory.

name: Beyond Stars - Part One
description: It tells the story of James, Ezra and kady s adventure as they try to stop the evil Company that is invading their planet.

name: A Brother s Turmoil
description: What happens when a Black and White by the book cop realizes that there are different shades of gray during the turmoils of life!.

name: Bright & Dark
description: ZHENG Dao-nan and Xiao Bei, a pair of well-renowned high school table tennis players nicknamed “Nan-yang and Bei-feng,” lost connections with each other after encountering a gang-brawling incident. Many years later, Xiao Bei led several young ex-gangster to run an industrial-style barber shop. At the same time, ZHENG was released from prison with the mystery of the death of his stepfather, the Mafia Don. The two reunite and work to stop a burring storm in the mafia. After investigating, deducting, and piecing the puzzles together, they finally get hold of the secret ledger that can reshape the landscape of the criminal underworld. In the end, they each have to make their own choices of either getting revenge, reviving their father’s business, returning to the mafia, or living a simple life as ordinary citizens.

name: Embers - A Patriarch Story
description: Embers is a teaser for the feature horror film PATRIARCH - this short film help get the project green lit. At the beginning of the Patriarch script, it mentions 2 of the security team (who were split up from the rest of the team) have gone missing. This is what happened to them. —David A. Roberts

name: Nagarsevak: Ek Nayak
description: Its a political journey of Malhar Shinde.

name: Fruitshido
description: The kitchen s peace has been shattered! Now "Ringo", the apple, must battle the monstrous "Ude-Naifu" to avenge his fallen fruit brethren!

name: The Weekend
description: A bad situation caused Kilo to kill his best friend Scrolla s brother. With Kilo in lock-up, Scrolla has been counting the days to Kilo s release, plotting revenge for his brother s murder. Now Kilo is out and living like a marked man.

name: Ms. Bobbins and Her Trees
description: Join Bill, Charles, and the rest of your Fantastic World friends for a music-filled Christmas spectacular that promises to be a modern classic.

name: Par de Jack
description: THIS IS AN ACTION FILM.

name: Cyborg Blue (サイボーグ ブルー)
description: A lone man in rubber pants and leather jacket fights against an evil organization. His body has been replaced with internal mechanisms. When equipped with a special chestplate, he becomes Protector, a powerful cyborg fighter. When his friend is killed by the evil organization, he sets out to destroy the organization and its evil robots from around the world. Can he defeat the might of the world s deadliest robotic killers?

name: Hahalik Ka Rin Sa Lupa
description: Jose Dela Cruz (Jess Lapid Jr.) goes to Manila to avenge his family who died in the hands of Paterno (Paquito Diaz) and his men. One by one, Jose kills his enemies, believing that justice can only be served through death, to ease the pain, anger, and emptiness that he feels inside.

name: Oslacraft the movie
description: Oscar gets stuck in an alternate dimension in which the hacker was successful with his takeover from episode 16 and so he must defeat him along with alternate version of some familiar faces

name: A Real Hero (Literally You)
description: A driver lover seeks to protect a box at all costs, this involves a trio of thieves and the law.

name: Gapos Gang
description: THEY TIE-UP THEIR VICTIMS BEFORE DIVESTING THE OF THEIR PROPERTIES, THUS THE NAME OF THIS CRIMINAL GROUP.

name: Train Town: Amazing Places
