The world of Batmania is an amplified version of the real world, making it a nightmarish hellhole in which even the purest of good hearts find no solace and lose hope. The main character, Philos Redd (played by Mazu Sircle) is someone whose ideals and values are completely against the grain of everyone around him, leaving him tortured and alone, struggling to find purpose in a world that seems like it wants nothing to do with him; that disregards his identity, his morality and who he is and wants to be. Watch here: https://www.youtube.com/clip/Ugkx2VsCDz0tPh-ADOpUhDSEexeetmcGNSSx

name: Pure Blood Sabre
description: A hero uses a supposedly magic sword and his martial arts during the Qing dynasty.

name: LAMBCHOP
description: A struggling band gets caught up in something sinister when their manager books them a gig at a shady venue.

name: Kenzie The Heroic Movie
description: Kenzie is just a small town kid who goes to 22nd Josh Street High School and lives on a farm. Until SpongeBob destroys there farm and his evil army reign the earth, Kenzie learns the power of friendship and his family secret and inner power.

name: Blossoms
description: A Love, Action and Thriller story.

name: A Go-Go Teenager
description: Two orphan boys indulge in petty theft after the war. One, Chow, is caught but gets adopted by a policeman. He turns out a solid young citizen. Lee, the boy who escapes, grows up to be a triad. When the two re-meet, Lee is attracted to Chow’s stepsister. Some years later, Chow is now a cop and vows to smash Lee’s gang. After a struggle with his conscience, Lee agrees to help.

name: GLUE
description: Mankind is compromised by the strange artefact but B.O.S.S sends the only capable soldier to put an end to the Devil s threat.

name: KFC Burger Feast with Supercharged Sauce
description: Mike Mazowski is a vigilante on a mission to kill the last of the offenders. The challenges ramp up as he goes on his journey to find the anonymous criminal known as The Big Offender, the most dangerous man in the city. After acquiring the information he needed from Jake Hall, The Big Offender’s right hand man, it’s time for Mike to enact justice once and for all.

name: A Grand Little Lie
description: Joe, a people-pleaser, tells a small lie to his boss in order to please his girlfriend. This lie eventually blows up to magnitudes of biblical proportions.

name: Strange door and dark blade
description: During the peaceful period of Song and Liao, Tang Ziyan, an agent originally trained by the secret organization "Phoenix Fire Army," is placed in the Imperial City Department in Beijing. While Tang Ziyan wanted to quietly quit and have a peaceful remainder of her life with her husband Zhou Qian, her husband was taken away by the Phoenix Fire Army to threaten Tang Ziyan. She now has a new mission set by the army: To assassinate the visiting envoy of the Northern Dynasty. During this period, Zhou Qian an was shot and killed by the Phoenix Fire Army and Tang Ziyan is determined to take down the Phoenix Fire Army. She pretended to not be wavered and continued to plan the next step of the assassination plan, but is surprised to find that the target is just by her side. In the end, Tang Ziyan along with the envoy work together to defeat the Phoenix Fire Army, quelling a scourge and returning peace to Beijing.

name: 10 Minutes For A Pound!
description: Pressures of life, combined with a spilt coffee, causes all hell to break loose at the laundromat.

name: AUTOMATON
description: A boy’s life is threatened when his home is invaded by a group of zombie-like creatures masked in a familiar face…

name: Selo
description: A mysterious letter is sought and passed from character to character.

name: Korosiya Ami
description: Ami, a girl who works as a flower arranger, also works as a professional assassin

name: Jenglotman dan Keinginan Mertua Jahanam
description: Sisworo the Jenglotman, married Anggun, the daughter of Mbah Kusumo, a shaman. During five months of the marriage, Sisworo and Anggun were terrorized. Apparently, they were terrorized by Sisworo s own father-in-law. Mbah Kusumo wants the power of the Jenglotman Belt! Like it or not, Sisworo had to fight his own in-laws to be able to live in peace.

name: Female Punisher Zebra 2 Action Edition
description: One day, Rino saves an injured thug Koji from a beautiful woman who happened to visit Office Zebra. Because of her, Rino is a drug smuggler Misa Nishioka. She, a female police officer, becomes embroiled in a dispute over selling a crowded train. She stole away her pistol while in the organization, and Rino secretly boarded the scene of her attack. Koji tries to rescue Rino in the midst of shootings on her way to work. Hitting the train all over her, she finally found her, but at that time, Rino, who desperately ran away, found a pickpocket. However, Misa is taken back and the assassin s bullet is fired...and she points her pistol at Rino and the others...

name: Xi Xing Ji 2 : The Fantasy Cave
description: Taking the story of Tang Sanzang and others  journey before obtaining the Eternal Flame (Before Season 1) - Tang Sanzang and others went to the other side of the world to obtain the Eternal Flame, and traveled through the cities of the world. They were attracted by the fantastic and beautiful view of Qiongqi Cave, but instead got lost in the cave. Therefore, they accidentally found out about the Demon King Bai Yandi s conspiracy of Qiong Qi Cave. In order to prevent the shocking catastrophe that would strike the entire Demon Path, Master and Disciple fought together. But, Sun Wukong was controlled by his mind and turned into a giant ape. In the face of an unprecedented desperate situation and crisis, how will Tang Sanzang and the others fight back?

name: The Space-Fighter
description: Two brothers are thrown into a cosmic battle of good versus evil.

name: Deep in It
description: Kevin Hunter a small time thief just released from the penitentiary is back home to take care of his young daughter and ailing mother. With no job in sight and in desperate need of money, Kevin turns to what he knows best but this time he robbed the wrong person and what he has in his possession belongs to a very important and dangerous man that will do anything to get it back. Kevin must figure a way out because now he s deep in it.

name: Bahad
description: Brave CHDF fighters defend their land against marauders.

name: Atash-e penhan
description: Film about the 1982 Sabra and Shatila massacre

name: Su Can from Guangdong Ten Tigers: Dragon Is Born
Run Lola Run The Jewels Run
description: "Run Lola Run" + "Run The Jewels" + 14 Editors = Run Lola Run The Jewels Run

name: Wrong Connection
description: The Malagasy government discovers an unlikely revolutionary weapon, made of artisanal rum and water from Lake Anosy (the most polluted lake in the country) and decides to sell it to the highest bidder in order to improve the country s economy. By the greatest of coincidences, North Korea wins the auction, and the entire geopolitical balance of the world is upset. The incredible parody from the Red Island!

name: Roy Jones Jr vs. Prince Badi Ajamu
description: Roy Jones, Jr. (49-4, 38 KOs) returns to the ring for the first time since dropping a unanimous decision to Antonio Tarver in their trilogy bout, to take on Prince Badi “The Boxing Prince” Ajamu (25-2-1, 14 KOs).  The unheralded Prince Badi, apparently holds five fringe title belts in the light hevayweight division, the NABO, WBC Continental Americas, WBC CABOFE, IBC Intercontinental and Pennsylvania State title. Only the NABO light heavyweight title is on the line.

name: The Deer
description: A mage-hunter has searched for days for his first prey, tired he walks through plains and dark forests where only his footsteps can be heard until unexpectedly he finds what he was looking for, a strong deer with which he will have a chase that in their minds will become a dance between life and death.

name: Gennady Golovkin vs. Grzegorz Proksa
description: Golovkin will defend his middleweight world title against European champion Proksa in the main event Sept. 1 of a "Boxing After Dark" doubleheader on HBO at Turning Stone Casino in Verona, N.Y.

name: Juan Francisco Estrada vs. Roman  Chocolatito  Gonzalez III
description: Estrada (43-3, 28 KO) and Chocolatito (51-3, 41 KO) first met way back in 2012, when both were in the 108 lb division. Gonzalez won a decision to retain his WBA title that night, and as he went up the weight classes, Estrada chased behind him, hoping for an eventual rematch.  That rematch didn’t come for over eight years, but the two met again in early 2021. In that one, Estrada got a debated split decision nod, retaining the WBA and WBC titles at 115 lbs.  Since then, Estrada has given up both belts, though he does have the WBC’s “Franchise” belt.

name: Operation Take The Flag
description: Dawn and demon are assigned to secure the flag for this week s training.

name: Hacker 2.0
description: A Short Film based on phishing, hacking. We wanted to spread awesomeness of preventing Hack.

name: Dig Deeper.
description: There is always another layer.

name: BKFC Thailand 3
description: BKFC Thailand 3 took place Saturday, September 3rd, 2022 with 12 fights at Rajadamnern Stadium in Bangkok, Thailand

name: The ancient City of Loulan
description: At the beginning of the last century, the ruins of the ancient city of Loulan were discovered, leading explorers from all over the world to explore for treasures, and countless precious cultural relics were excavated by foreign treasure theft groups. Chen Xiao, an explorer, has been working hard to stop the bandits from destroying the monuments and stealing national treasures, so he is regarded as a thorn in the flesh of many bandits. In an escape from the bandits, Chen Xiao mistakenly entered an area that has never been set foot in, this place is the legendary "Mirage City."

name: La Confrontación
description: In the year 2041, Ax, a young survivor of an environmental crisis that shook the planet and left the world without water, must face challenges in order to survive.

name: Beelay s Diary
description: The film begins with a  retreat , in which alumni from different batches of a residential school have travelled to their alma mater for a reunion. Anabil, one of the alumnus, presently working with UNICEF India as a  child protection specialist , narrates the story of his childhood days spent in the residential school. In his childhood, when he was admitted to the residential school by his parents, Anabil happened to be a very shy student possessing below average abilities. For such a child, time table specific, demanding hostel life was not easy. A mischievous senior student Bishey and his gang added to Anabil s woes. Due to similarity in names, Anabil was nicknamed  Beelay  (the pet name of Swami Vivekananda)by his seniors

name: Titans of the Deep
description: Prominent scientists Dr. William Beebe and Otis Barton, using the Bathyspere invented by Barton, descend several thousand feet to the ocean floor off of the shores of Bermuda to study and film sea creatures seen and filmed at that depth for the first time. A sometimes staged semi-documentary that was often sold and advertised as an exploitation/horror picture.

name: The Price of Death
description: A gambler turned bounty hunter transports a high-priced outlaw to his hanging, unaware that they are being chased by a ruthless murderer and his gang of thieves for money hidden by the outlaw.

name: The Wild Panda
description: 7 years after the events of Wild Panda 6, Ethan and Cam return to stop the Panda once and for all.

name: CICATRIX
description: A corporation rises in power that attempts to remove freedom from humanity s possession.  This was a short film that was created for a local student film festival. Hope you guys enjoy.  YouTube link: https://youtu.be/ffnm1W4A5TQ

name: El Ultimo Round
description: An EPIC battle between two friends.

name: Aranyamlo
description: Aranyamlo is a romantic action thriller written, directed and produced by Sudershan Reddy Palvai under One Man Creations banner while Ajay Patnaik scored music for this movie.

name: Back Door
description: Four friends with big dreams go rogue in the streets when they need the cash to make them come true, but soon find themselves getting in too deep.

name: Undercover Rascals 2
description: Venkat works hard to bring down the largest drug empire in the nation. His plan is disrupted when Aditya Sharma is back from prison to seek his revenge.

name: Sri Asih
description: Because her father was seriously ill in Semarang, and Sri Asih did not have time to leave, Sri Asih only took her mother to the station. After the train departed, Sri Asih heard a whisper, that the train was about to explode, because on the bridge there was dynamite that had been plotted. Immediately use the talisman, and Sri Asih becomes agile and can fly. The dynamite was thrown and exploded in the river, though before that he had to face resistance from the bandits. Then, Sri Asih followed the horde of the Black Garuda and managed to destroy it.

name: I m Not a Terrorist
description: Islam and terrorism have nothing in common. The lack of purpose in life encourages young people to join the radicals. The main goal of the film is to show the audience the reverse side of the romanticized life of ISIS fighters.

name: Tarot Killer
description: When the CEO of a film production company is about to retire, a fast mover sleeps with her to get the job and dumps the front runner, Carla, who he is also sleeping with. Carla hires a psycho to kill him and leave a Tarot card on the body. The killer blackmails Carla, so she has his girlfriend killed. The police and a couple of amateur detectives eventually stumble into solving the case.

name: Moscow, quickly
description: Guys skating over the Moscow. Film was made to promote new Magamaev s collection — first summer 2022 drop.

name: wife?
description: Skating and life moments.

name: The Blue Shell Incident
description: After shenanigans happened at a local bar, two brothers are against each other, both out seeking revenge.

name: The Final Cut
description: A short film about a group of Student s filmmaking plight.

name: Red Dusk
description: Red Dusk, A Terror and Investigative Film. An Alshabab Terror Group Led by Hassan Hussein Carry out an ambush on Kenyan soil taking hostage 3 Kenyan Citizens. A Team of 3 Kenyan Black Opp Soildiers Are Assigned a task Carry out an Off The Books Rescue Mission Outside The Kenyan Borders Led By The Deputy Director Of National Security and Her Team.

name: Kaerazeru hatoba
description: A crime film from 1966

name: Kaiketsu kuro zukin
description: First film of the The Black Hooded Man series.

name: Goose
description: Goose is short horror film set on a university campus, following a group of bartenders at the student pub. After they finish their shift and begin to walk home, they come to realize the world has changed drastically since last call. Soon they find themselves hunted by a deadly and determined predator hellbent on bloody chaos.

name: Los Alterados
description: A group of soldiers are trained by their leader to destroy cartels operating in Texas.

name: in search of... THE RISE OF THE MAFIA KING!!!
description: The unnamed mafia henchmen becomes the NAMED Augusto as he awakes from a coma after his car crash looking for revenge. He will do anything to climb to the top of the mafia ranks... But at what cost?

name: Alibabavum 40 Thirudargalum
description: First Tamil adaptation of the story Ali Baba and the Forty Thieves.

name: Zoku teppō inu
description: Zoku teppō inu (続鉄砲犬) is a 1966 film directed by Mitsuo Murayama. It is the sixth film in the Inu series.

name: The Mannequin
description: A robot prototype takes back his mind after being programmed by space pirates. The robot with no name crashes on a planet known as Araxus 8 and must survive a manhunt that was sent on him. He meets a female robot who helps him find a secret gem before it s too late.

name: The Golden Buddha
description: A Young warrior is faced with knowing what is most important, the Golden Buddha itself or the teaching it stands for.

name: 2057: Return to Zombie Island
description: A man named Callard demands a larger sweat budget for his film. The zombies aren t about to give him what he wants.

name: 2056 Escape from Zombie Island
description: 2056, has the world been nearly destroyed by war? Who will control the balance of power?

name: Zen
description: During the 1700s in Japan, a young samurai warrior learns about love and the secret of killings vampires.

name: The War of Great Monsters
description: In the 21st century, the powerful nations of the Earth have launched into fierce competition over natural resources found on the newly discovered planet Gradioras. But each time a probe is launched to extract resources from Gradioras, monsters appear and threaten life on Earth. As Baeklim University professor Heinrich Park studies the monsters, he discovers that the monsters are receiving orders from someone through artificial brains which have been implanted in each monster. Professor Park develops a gamma ray in order to defeat the monsters, but Spectre, an international crime syndicate, has other plans. Directed by Yu-soo Yong, the film is a representative work from Korea s animation boom period.

name: Ghost Car
description: In the city of Samara, a community of anarchists are on the run from the Russian Government in a vehicle specially designed to to avoid detection. Ghost, one of the members of the gang, yearns to escape the life she s trapped in and discover what happened to her presumably dead parents.

name: The Pick Up
description: A getaway driver anxiously awaits his accomplice...

name: The Queen of Kung Fu 3
description: The gorgeous big boss of The Bund, Ying, decides to end her career and live a peaceful life. But the various sects in the jungle are competing for the title of the best martial artist in the world. While Ying left for her hometown to celebrate her birthday, her master got murdered. In order to avenge her master s death, she returns to Shanghai with her younger sister and kills the gangsters, but she is falsely accused of killing her master and destroying her ancestors. How can she avenge the death of her master and punish the evil and promote good?

name: Chachchu
description: Raja Mia (Monwar Hossain Dipjol) lead a life of crime. But his wife Shanti (Aruna Biswas) and daughter Tumpa persuaded him to leave his criminal activities. He started to live an honest life but his enemy Dulu Mirza (Misa Sawdagar) tricked him and made him a murderer in the eyes of the law. Now he wants his revenge.

name: The Quest for the Magic Bands: Through Time!
description: When an internal conflict threatens world peace, the keepers of the Magic Bands must travel back in time to protect the future.

name: The Quest for the Magic Bands
description: A group of competitive cousins overcome their differences on a quest to keep the six powerful "Magic Bands" out of the hands of evil.

name: Faraar
description: movies beautiful

name: Pirates of the Sky
description: Daredevil pilot Bob Manning is pressed into service by the Government to track down a missing mail plane. He soon uncovers a gang of aerial hijackers, led by Bruce Mitchell. Exhibiting a repertoire of truly awe-inspiring flying stunts, Manning beats the villains at their own game.

name: Tea with Milk
description: Ahmad s father has gone missing for two days. This is the story of Ahmad s quest in searching for his missing father from an Indian restaurant serving tea with milk.

name: True Heart
description: Handoko, a successful businessman in Batam, hopes that his son Ferry can continue to manage his company, Handoko sends Ferry to a well-known high school. Ferry has a younger sister, Vina. The two were so close because their parents were so busy that they were rarely home.

name: POISON
description: A young officer manages to infiltrate a gang of kidnappers and while waiting for the strike force to go into action, she is forced to intervene. Alone and without support, she must decide if, in order to save one life, she must first end many.  A strong woman in a violent world, police forces and defend the good at any cost. When the Law has a lethal side... is it Law?

name: I ll End in Hell
description: Joji Dan tries to find the heir of a prosperous Japanese millionaire who died in Mexico. However, the bandits want to take over the inheritance and Joji has to use his skills as a fast and accurate shooter!

name: Who Killed Captain Alex 2
description: A sequel to the cult classic action film.

name: The Detective
description: The film deals with a struggle between a young detective officer and a fugitive drug dealer.

name: The Youngest Son
description: Al-Jadah is a word in the Kuwaiti dialect that refers to the youngest son in the family. The film tells about  the youngest boy of a Kuwaiti family, he goes to war and his news is cut off.

name: The Neighborhood Cop
description: The film shows the struggle of a policeman with thieves in old Kuwait.

name: A Warrior
description: A warrior fighting for his freedom.

name: During The War
description: A phone call tells Hamad to leave the house before the invaders come, but they have arrived before he can escape.

name: The Assassination of the Journalist Meshal
description: Its events revolve in Kuwait in the eighties about a journalist named Meshal, who criticizes a greedy merchant, and the merchant tries to bribe Meshal and does not accept, then the merchant assigns someone to kill Meshal. What will happen?

name: Once Upon a Time in the Desert
description: Khalaf is 10 years old, and he is from the desert in Kuwait in the past. He goes with his father for a trip to find a new water well for their tribe, but something happens to them that changes course of events.

name: Seven Star Escort
description: A taiwanese language wuxia film.

name: Italian Batman
description: Italian Batman must stop evil scarecrow!

name: Rosemary & Sage Race Against Thyme
description: After the mysterious death of her partner, police officer Reba Rosemary teams up with FBI agent Samantha Sage to track down a group of terrorists known as THYME.

name: Per Sempre
description: When her friend Eve goes missing, Stevie will stop at nothing to find her. With the help of her brother, Mick, she tries to unravel the twisted web of events that led to Eve’s disappearance. Shot on a shoestring budget of $15,000, this femme thriller shows all sides of the American south, the beauty and the evil.

name: Midnight Riders
description: Described as an “action-espionage thriller,” concentrating on the ride of Paul Revere and the lesser known William Dawes prior to the battles of Lexington and Concord. Said to be a historically accurate swashbuckler about the spark of the American Revolution, with horses, gunfights, swords, and a little bawdiness.

name: Pending Accounts
description: A corrupt judge is kidnapped and looks for a way to escape

name: Tera Venuka
description: Sivaji Rao, a Hyderabad based officer is posted in Mumbai to handle a corrupted cop called Pansari. He successfully manages to arrest Pansari but he soon makes bail and makes it his mission to make Sivaji pay for sending him to jail.

name: Heaven s Rush
description: This short film follows Zenjiro Kurata (played by Daichi Yamaguchi), a hitman with a 100 million yen bounty, as he faces attack from various assassins.

name: Paint!
description: An an Artist faces off against an Art Block in its physical, monstrous form.

name: Ruedas De Metal
description: "Metal Wheels" that was going to be a post-apocalyptic feature film and ended up being a sycalypse its realization.  It was canceled after several days, after nothing went well and the number of planned scenes could never be filmed (even the first scene that appears, which is the first filmed, we traveled to a distant field and were only able to record one scene due to conditions inhuman under the sun, without water and without electricity to charge the battery)  Here is edited based on the existing script the material that was recorded.

name: The Village
description: In a dystopian world where AI already took over the world, a young man is searching for a mythological village where the dwellers live like old times.

name: Top Secret
description: The human world is invaded by the magical beasts from the game "Phantom Realm" and the world is plunged into a chaotic war. The survivors Qin Muchuan (Liu Zheng) and Su Hang (Shi Xuejing) are also under siege and are saved by the sharpshooter Ye Lin (Zhu Lina) when they are in danger.

name: The Fatal Fortune
description: A young newspaperwoman travels to a South Seas island to search for buried treasure.

name: TWSTR
description: A twisted fan edit of “Twister” made by a bunch of freaks.

name: Story of Japanese Chivalry: Flower of a Chivalrous Man
description: In the early years of the twentieth-century a young gambler returns to his home town where he finds the gang of which he was once a member engaged in a feud with a rival gang. Though he successfully settles their differences he is turned out of the organization for the way in which accomplishes it. Upon his return he finds that the fortunes of the group have declined - there has been treachery and desertion. This time with the approval of the seniors he settles the differences with a duel. After winning, however, he declines the position of gang-boss, preferring his freedom, and once more leaves town.

name: Quick Draw Sanshiro
description: Koji Wada, who is good at shooting, karate, judo and boxing, has a tough fight with the sea gangsters!

name: Mohican Cop
description: A Mohican Cop with a microchip implanted in his brain is being hunted down by an evil organization run by a cyborg.

name: The Camssassins
description: The Camssassins is an exaggerated film about the filmmaker struggle.

name: Timothee
description: Timothee is a story of a humanoid boy trying to navigate life in the northern part of Nigeria as he finds himself in a series of misfortunate events that come as a result of his past.

name: BKFC Fight Night: Tampa 2
description: Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship Fight Night: Tampa 2 is a bare-knuckle fighting event held by Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship on July 23, 2022, at the Florida State Fairgrounds in Tampa, Florida, USA.

name: Oscar Ramos: Hitman
description: A Farmer, unjustly put behind bars. Escapes and becomes a rebel hit man.

name: Z: The Beginning
description: Z is a short film set in a post apocalyptic era in Nigeria around the 2050s which reveals a developed Nigeria undergoing invasions. The word Z centers around a scientifical project (PROJECT Z) created by a Company called  The Triangle .

name: Jerry Marasigan WPD
description: Jerry Marasigan WPD: Directed by Augusto Salvador. With Jestoni Alarcon, Gretchen Barretto, George Estregan, John Regala.

name: The Last Summer Nut
description: Two friends eat nuts while listening to classical music. Their enjoyment is interrupted when they discover there s only one left. They then start a chase to see who gets to keep it, influenced by the frenetic piece of music that is playing.

name: The Tears of the Rabbit
description: After a gruesome war which decimated much of the Earth s population, a white samurai awakens with no memory of his cruel past. He is sent on a great journey to retrieve the elixir of life, known as "The Tears of the Rabbit." Along the way, he encounters many sexy ladies, French ninjas, and the almighty Az. This is post-apocalyptic samurai action at its finest!

name: A Dinosaur Story
description: A dinosaur named Noahsaurus who,after realizing that a flood is coming to the Dinosaurs,builds a giant boat to keep him safe.After escaping,he goes in search of a new home

name: Infectious Skatillium
description: In the summer of 2004, a young cadre of skaters battles the pressures of growing up in the mountain town of Steamboat Springs and containing the infection of their commitment to skating.

name: Karate: Blind Escape
description: Ben Kesser is a vietnam veteran that works for the mafia as a hitman. One night he discovers a clue about his wifes mysterious death and seeks revenge.  His friend, Hash Brown, a quirky teenage hacker rushes to his aid. Its is going to be a long and perilous adventure. They need the help of a very special friend. The elusive and wise Eric Virgo... a modern day samurai that has sworn never to kill again.  The three heroes venture deep into the New York Underground seeking the truth.  Very soon they discover that the man behind the murder is none other than Doctor Hans von Braun, the leader of the Nazi Ninjas... A crazy scientist with a dream to create a new army of.....  I ve  said enough...

name: Proyecto: Peleas
description: Shapovalov decides not to deal with Navrátilová in the stolen Mona Lisa business, so he captures her to collect the reward. The Russian finds a way to escape, entering a path of fights that can only leave one of the two standing.

name: Wrong Place, Wrong Time
description: In the Hudson Valley, there s Mafia warfare. Johnny Marzano vs Louie Benson. Trapped in the middle of this is Tommy Andreas.

name: The Vagabond Master, Part 2
description: A swordswoman joins hands with fellow warriors to save her son from the evil monk.

name: Great Beast Barrigular
description: A kaiju comes to Earth from a meteor.  It is the Great Beast Barrigular!!

name: Errakota Veerudu
description: Errakota Veerudu is a Telugu film released in 1973. Produced by T Gopalakrishna under the banner of TGK Films, MSP Sarathy directed the film. Nandamuri Taraka Rama Rao and Savitri are playing the lead roles in the film, which has music by Ghantasala Vijayakumar.

name: Rater Sohor
description: The story follows two characters Arka and Priyanka who meet coincidentally at Sealdah railway station after she misses the last train and Arka agrees to help her reach home safely. The night turns into a nightmare for them as their individual past comes back to haunt them and a cat-and-mouse game ensues between a deadly killer and them.

name: Palaban
description: "Palaban" is one hell of a violent flick. The story of one man s pursuit of bank robbers and the bloody consequences that follow is so nihilistic.

name: Maa Nanna Naxalite
description: It is a story of a prominent but an ageing Naxalite leader Kondarudra Seetharamayya, who wants to meet his son who is studying in University as a last wish. Police are in hot pursuit of him as he eliminated a political personality who happens to be the father of Home minister. It is an emotional journey of a father to meet his son whom he has never seen.

name: Doomsday
description: Invasion of zombies in a laboratory

name: Rani Banal Jwala
description: A woman cop who is ruthless to the lawbreakers does not spare them for their wrong doings.

name: Sports
description: The film is about a protest provoked when the university decided to restrict access to sports facilities to athletes, cutting out all other students. This is, strictly speaking, not a Prokino film. It was produced by the Waseda University Film Circle, which was organized by Kawazoe Shiro. Feature film directors Yamamoto Satsuo and Taniguchi Senkichi were apparently students at Waseda at the time and participated in the production.

name: Chaduranga
description: In her effort to show the world the true colours of a few corrupt politicians, Dr Maheshwari is murdered. An enraged Bharath, her son, vows to exact revenge from the culprits.

name: Amma Donga
description: Chakri is framed in multiple murder cases and sent to jail. On release from prison, he heads to the village to bring to book the real culprits.

name: Déjà vu
description: There s a legend in Thailand about an American soldier s exploration of an underwater world called the "Peal of Naga". Though disappeared, it is said to be full of treasures, including immortality and the power to any empire. Camera, the queen of darkness, wants this power to control the entire world but isn t the only one.

name: The Fallen Cadet
description: The Fallen Cadet is an Action/Drama student short film about a teenager in a less than ideal situation. Morals will be tested.

name: Coal Miner s Adventure
description: A exploits of one simple-minded Coal Miner after his son is captured from his family home on a secluded island on the Mediterranean sea. Chasing the pirates who stole his son sends the Miner to the mysterious and authoritarian land of Bosnia, where strange mechanical creatures, known as walkers, keep the peace. Coal Miner must leave the comfort of his old life behind, meeting and encountering strange characters, places and technologies and must defeat the evil and mysterious Boss, stopping his dastardly plans that threaten the world as we know it.

name: Ad Hominem
description: Young rebels attempt to overthrow a totalitarian regime.

name: Lady Snake Fist
description: Classic South Korean martial arts film

name: Perils of the Yukon
description: A silent serial with the following chapter titles: 1. Fangs of Jealous; 2. Doomed; 3. Tricked by Fate; 4. Master and Man; 5. Terrors of the North; 6. Menace of Death; 7. Trapped by Fire; 8. Hurled into Space; 9. The Gold Rush; 10. Valley of Death; 11. A Race for Life; 12. The Path of Doom; 13. Martial Law; 14. Trail of Vengeance; 15. The Final Reckoning.

name: Logan, Hell Fire
description: Pleng had to flee the Logan village after he was severely assaulted. Many year has passed, he comes back to this place which is ruled by gangster. After godfather finds that he comes back and hiding information about precious things, so another hunt begins.

name: Angkara Murka
description: Dulkafar, leaves his hometown for three and a half years after his parents are murdered, and has now returned for vengeance. With his whip of fire, he defeats criminals while searching for the murderer of his parents. He also disguises himself as a “buaya Keroncong” or an expert singer in Keroncong music. His efforts finally pay off when he finds a woman wearing his mother’s necklace.

name: Hanya Satu Jalan
description: Two businessmen, Burhan and Benny, are rivals and Burhan hires Joko, an ex-convict who is trying to reform. Joko is asked to investigate Benny, through Leila, a hostess that Benny usually goes to. But then Joko and Leila fall in love and things do not go as planned. A accident happens and Leila is shot by Joko. Burhan dies in a car accident while Benny runs away out of the country. The reason of enmity between Burhan and Benny is unclear, nor that of Leila’s role, who knows so much about Benny’s secrets.

name: The Truth About the Year 2000
description: The year 2000 will ring in a few hours. The arrival of an IT bug will change everything that Harry has prepared to celebrate quietly this new year day with his wife Wendy. Video Consisted only of air plans of American cities, this found footage movie takes away his geography by replacing the actors by buildings with a doubtful accent. The French cinematographic aura sneaks in this colossal continent to compose a blockbuster which tries with great difficulty to equal his Hollywood colleagues.

name: eDrum98: The Videogame
description: A Man and His Girlfriend Went To An Uncharted Island. His Girlfriend Goes Missing And Now He Is On Hunting Down Those Who Kidnapped Her.

name: Champakali
description: A kind beauty gets brutally assaulted by the bandit she is trying to protect her village from and decides to come back and bring him down for good.

name: The Spider-Stop
description: Two Raimi Spider-Man Trilogy fanboys discover the most shocking secret in cinematic history: A Spider-Man 4 does, in fact, exist. But only one copy in the entire world remains.

name: F.C. Funkytown: Dare to Dream
description: This documentary follows a group of aspiring young soccer stars as they create their own club soccer team and dominate rival clubs throughout north jersey s indoor 5 v 5 soccer scene

name: The Chase
description: A terrifying chase ensues.

name: Water Wars
description: Every year the students at Miller High School risk everything to get the grand prize of a thousand dollars during Water Wars. Basically if you get wet... you are out. There are some additional rules such as you can wear floaties for safety, and you can t shoot anybody on school property or in a business. Other than that, it s mostly fair game.

name: Malla
description: Shiva, a florist s son, grows up to become a gangster. After his father is murdered, he sets out to take revenge against the culprits.

name: The Rat s Angle
description: Carmelo is a prosecutor who lives under protection with his son, Nicola. One night, while having dinner, Nicola lets slip the fact that in school other kids tease him, calling him "rat", as rats live in hiding. Carmelo understands this is a crucial moment in his child s growth, and chooses his words wisely. He starts telling Nicola a tale. The tale of the Rat s Angle. That same evening, late at night, Nicola and Carmelo are hiding under the bed, scared. Some men are trying to break into the house, screaming death threats. Carmelo looks at his son, he knows how to calm him down: he reminds him of the rat they talked about at dinner. The hitmen are now in the room. Carmelo closes his eyes, building up courage. He knows this is the last time he will have to. Then he jumps out of hiding.

name: Batrez
description: An exciting fan-made Batman action short film.

name: DEPRAVITY
description: A man wakes up horrifically scarred, and seeks retribution against the ones responsible.

name: The Incredible Hunk
description: The titular hero uncovers his newfound powers as a powerful foe begins to wreak unhealthy havoc.

name: The Feline Lady: Feline Good
description: In an effort to take down a religious extremist. The Feline Lady teams up with an old friend.

name: No Mistakes
description: Two opponents battle in a time-spanning epic chess game that may cost them their lives.

name: The Superman
description: While Sansonia is away shooting a movie in Argentina, villains Markus and Niska plot to kindap his wife and sons back in Italy.

name: Hard & Loose
description: Based on the manga by Tsuchiya Garon (aka Marley Carib) and Kawaguchi Kaiji, serialized in Action in the 80s. A detective thriller in which former boxer Shozo is thrown into a web of intrigue when he picks up a ringing phone in a room whose occupant he is supposed to be following.

name: The Down Grade
description: The Down Grade is a 1927 Action film.

name: Department Six: The Mystery of Blood Worms
description: During the Zhengde period of the Ming Dynasty, Dong Yunfei and Zhao Xiaoyi were famous demon catchers from Department Six. One day, when they were on their way to visit master catcher Ye Guotao, but found that he was framed and killed

name: Why Do I Hike
description: Inspiring story of an avid hiker who hiked Pacific Crest Trail and established Croatian Long Distance Trail and now he longs for a new adven ture on which he wants to find the reasons he goes into the wilderness and hikes for a long periods of time. On his quest he encounters other hikers and together with them he made a beautiful collage of answers and reasons why do they hike. Here’s what the author, Nikola Horvat-Tesla says about how this whole project came about:"In summer of 2019. I went to hike Colorado Trail to find the reasons why do I hike. This was independent project and the movie was filmed, edited and written by myself. It was challenging to carry all of video equipment in my backpack, but I had a vision and a goal – I wanted to capture my inner reasons why I do hike and why do I always go back to long distance hiking. "

name: The Panther of the Border
description: A young woman who works as a secretary is raped, and unjustly accused of drug trafficking, a corrupt system finds her guilty and makes her pay a long prison sentence.The Panther of the Border seeks revenge against a ruthless drug cartel.

name: Song of Yakuza
description: A low ranking yakuza who spends more time enjoying life than doing the yakuza work falls in love with a pretty student girl, whose brother later gets drawn into the yakuza business against his own wishes.

name: Escape
description: In 60 seconds.

name: King of Britons
description: The Britons are betrayed and attacked by the Saxons. Separated from his people, the leader of the Britons is taken in and tended to. While recovering, he discovers how badly his people are being treated. Furious, he develops a plan to exact revenge upon the Saxons, and free his people, once and for all.

name: A Hero s Return
description: A group of young athletes in the field of bodybuilding plan to achieve tournaments, but a girl intervenes among them in order to tear them apart, so they won t succeed. She pulls it off at first, and one of them walks away from his friends but a surprise changes the course of events.

name: Once upon a time in Aotearoa
The Kowloon Emperor
description: One day, the Kowloon Emperor TSANG Man-choi pays a visit to OR Siu-yat, his guard dog of previous life and a current staff of the Community Improvement Bureau, with an incredible story and request. According to TSANG, the Bureau’s plan to redevelop To Kwa Wan will destroy an ancient seal and unleash a vengeful evil spirit, Princess Kwong Tak, who was murdered by TSANG’s ancestor 400 years ago. To save themselves OR must assist TSANG to destroy the evil spirit. In this rare gem of a martial arts/fantasy short film, the impossible battle between human and spirit is playfully visualised.

name: Dragon Lizard Lord Super Monsters
description: Ancient Dragons battle for dominance. Omega Tiamat Odin has awakened to wreak havoc across the planet in Tokusatsu terror and stomps Tokyo and New York, Draco Quetzalcoatl hits Osaka. Hong Kong feels the power of King Fafnir.

name: The Bench
description: A mysterious rendezvous at a park goes awry.

name: Gold Digger: The Time Raft
description: An explorer and her sister tackle adventures that defy their wildest dreams, though when it all comes down to it, it s all in a day s work for them.

name: Ultimate Kill 8: Cabin Fever
description: Cletus & Randy fight zombies.

name: Ultimate Kill 7: The Chronicles of Krevchencovich
description: The story of Krevchencovich, leading up to finding Alex Z.

name: Ultimate Kill 6: Alex’s Son
description: Pvt. Keller, the son of Alex Z, joins the military ranks. He must pass a laser hologram training course. After a hologram steals his instructor’s mustache, they both complete the course with a vengeance.

name: Ultimate Kill 5: Zombies 3: House Escape
description: 7 years after Ultimate Kill 4, Jarvis and Alex Z are living peaceful lives at the once populated Alien Compound. One day, the zombies break in and all hell breaks loose.

name: Ultimate Kill 4: Zombies 2: Zombie Alien
description: At Krevchencovich’s dying request, Alex Z travels to his camp, the Alien Compound. Unbeknownst to Krevchencovich, the virus has already spread there. In addition to that, flashbacks let us know what happened to Alex A… and it’s not pretty.

name: Ultimate Kill 3: Zombies
description: 7 days after being shot by Professor Z, the mysterious man wakes up in the middle of the zombie apocalypse.

name: Ultimate Kill 2: Alien
description: Alex, an agent for the good guys, infiltrates an alien compound to unexpectedly find that Jarvis, his friend at the agency, is undercover as well.

name: Ultimate Kill
description: A mysterious man infiltrates a military base to get revenge on Professor Z.

name: Raj Sounds and Lights
description: Rishi, the only son of Rajanna who is a well known Event Manager, struggles to prove himself worthy to his father. Will he be successful in solving the problems and making the event successful or will there be a twist?

name: Turd Merchants of Death
description: Break out the shotgun and the toilet paper. An unspeakable horror has been unleashed and the undead are on the hunt for human flesh. Three unlikely heroes must fight to save their town and their dignity before sunrise.

name: BKFC Fight Night: Jackson 2
description: Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship

name: FANROAD Opening Animation
description: Produced for "Gebocon I", a convention organized by Fanroad magazine, an anime/manga/doujin magazine in the 80s and 90s.

name: URACON II Opening Animation
description: Opening animation for URACON II.

name: Mr. Lambu
description: The plot revolves around the once popular genre of Rakhi relations, a bond between brother and sister.

name: VANS SNOWBOARDING PRESENTS: ELLES
description: A short film featuring Arthur Longo, made with friends near and far during winter 2021. Featuring Arthur Longo, Dan Liedahl, Mary Rand, Blake Paul, and more. Filmed by Jake Price, Harry Hagan, and Olivier Gittler. Directed and edited by Tanner Pendleton.

name: John Storm II: The Last Spy
description: As the nefarious Dr. Moonscar wipes away every last spy from the federation, agent John Storm is forced to return to the life he once thought he had left behind forever. In this non-stop action thrill ride, its a race against time as John finds himself doing whatever it takes to bring justice to the world he was once a part of. Blurring the lines between good and evil, Storm tries not to spiral out of control, because this time… its personal.

name: School of the Dead
description: When zombies overrun a high school, the students band together to face the onslaught of the undead.

name: Cletus and Clyde: Missing In Possible
description: Cletus (Sandoval) and Clyde (Fukui) face a new threat when a villainous cyborg (Coelho) threatens to destroy their world. The situation becomes even more complicated when they discover he has villainous partners. Will Cletus and Clyde be able to save the world? Will they be able to save themselves? Find out in this motherfacking action-packed cowboy buddy adventure!

name: Forgive Us Our Trespasses
description: On the evening of 21 November 1974, the Provisional Irish Republic of Army carried out a terrorist attack in Birmingham (UK). It was recognised as the bloodiest attack in the Troubles England. This short film tells the “behind the scenes” of this attack, which hides a series of mistakes, delays and frictions within the same terrorist cell responsible for it.

name: Invisible Cop
description: Storm (Typhoon Kanokchat Manyaon), a young police officer who resigned from the agency. and immersed himself in the past mistakes One night, he receives a message from his former commander to return to work for the nation in a secret unit known as the "Black Pigeon", but the caveat is that he must become an anonymous person who no longer exists.

name: Unseen
description: A man and his friends hunt down a mysterious ghost that killed his wife.

name: The Game Of Survival Project
description: Eight friends must compete in a series of challenges whilst voting each other to the death as a sacrifice for seven souls. Who will make it out alive in this drama-filled Game Of Survival?

name: The Inside Job
description: A former DEA agent has an axe to grind after his partner is savagely killed by the Russian mob as he seeks revenge by forming a crew with someone personally linked to the Russians to scheme the perfect heist.

name: Drout
description: When a trio of childhood friends grows up to have very different paths in life, they are tragically brought together by a serious crime.

name: Swordsman s Romance
description: The film is adapted from the large-scale martial arts online game "Jian Wang 3", with the main line of martial arts love and hatred, telling the story of Ye Wei s realization of the sword and becoming a generation of swordsmen.  During tournament at the Smoky Rain Tower (Yanyulou), Ye Wei, the third son of the Hidden Sword, meets Liu Xi, the eldest daughter of the Northlands  Bastard Sword Villa, and Liu Fuyun, the second son. In an accident, Ye Wei was wounded by his own sword formation and lost all his martial arts skills due to a broken meridian. The two of them live in seclusion, hiding from their families, and are engaged for life.

name: TRAVIS RICE || RESETTER
description: Travis Rice typically makes an annual pilgrimage to the mountains of Alaska. There, he finds and rides ridiculous lines and creates films that terrify and/or inspire the rest of us.  Last year, COVID broke that tradition.  However, fortunately for Travis, there’s plenty of backcountry right in his backyard in Jackson Hole. All of the sudden, he saw an opportunity to reset and reconnect with his old stomping grounds.  Epic snow. Incredible terrain. Fresh air and beautiful solitude. Sometimes, Alaska comes to you.

name: Desert Runner
description: A drug runner in Mexico is determined to call it quits after his final job when a DEA task force launches an operation in Mexico to combat the opium and heroin traffic in 1973.

name: Gascon... bala ang katapat mo
description: This is the true-to-life story of Capt. Dionisio L. Gascon whose bullets tell you that a cop is no dirty word. It happened in the crime center of Balic-Balic-Manila-Gulod -The tondo of Sampaloc in the 80s.

name: ท่านเจ้าชายโอคหล่อที่สุดในโลก ซีรีย์ตอนปิดท้ายจ้าา
description: Prince Oak Oakleyski is the real Eurasia prince and also a chief managerial chairman in reality. Prince Oak Oakleyski has Russian, Tatar, Uzbek, Turkish, Thai, Chinese, and many more ethnicities. But what made him stood out is that he is royal, unlike typical and extraordinary humans. Prince Oak Oakleyski is above extraordinary humans because he is the real handsomest royal human, no extraordinary bullcrap. Prince Oak Oakleyski is famous but not anyone know his real name. His titled name is Lord Kandanai Maneesawath (ท่านเจ้าชายกันต์ดนัยมณีสวัสดิ์). He is also renowned for his alternative name принц оьклейский. Most people in Eurasia know that he is the real handsomest sovereign lord of Andronovo culture. Nobody can compare to him at the current decades, although he is 30 years old already, he is still energetic and physically fit and more handsome than everyone in the world today. Because he is the Prince Oak Oakleyski Lord.

name: Lobster Game
description: A man who was offered a chance to play a dice game for $20,000 has to reveal the past 24 hours of what happened to the police in a tense meeting.

name: Nishabda 2
description: Three robbers try to dupe a visually impaired veteran, unaware of the horrors that await them.

name: How to Lose Twenty Pounds
description: A wallet gets dropped on the ground and twenty pound note within it finds itself in the wallets of other strangers who want it for themselves.

name: Blood Brothers
description: A Taiwanese production that was directed by Lee Tso-Nam and starring Chen Kuan-tai and Don Wong Tao.

name: Puppet Family: The Juice Heist!
description: Tyrone runs out of juice, so he goes out to find some!

name: Southern Alps - A NZ Ski Movie
description: MFC s first ski movie displays the beautiful New Zealand mountains that played a key role in developing some of the worlds top Freeride Skiers.

name: Suffer
description: In a world out of time, an exiled handmaiden escapes imprisonment and must survive long enough to free her people from the tyranny of a mad prince.

name: Sweet Dreams
description: Two men without any clear motivations come to blows with one another.

name: The Sandwich
description: The story follows a girl who intends on eating the sandwich she has just made; however, the sandwich has different plans. We follow the runaway sandwich trying to escape the girl, and the girl hopelessly chasing after her afternoon lunch!

name: Bare Knuckle
description: A former Marine who must fight in the underground world of bare-knuckle boxing in order to protect his family from a ruthless mob boss.

name: She Is A Spy
description: The Russian underworld and the spy world clash as Boris, the Russian gangster gives CIA agents Cherie and her partner, Yves, a run for their money. They pursue the villain across the Atlantic from Russia to the United States. As the story unfolds, Boris  once business associate, Emilio also has more than enough reason to pursue him for revenge after a double-cross. Meanwhile, Cherie, the new CIA team member also deals with issues that involve members of her team which can damage the success of the assignment.

name: The Cup of Tears
description: A short proof-of-concept for an as-yet-unproduced live-action feature film modeled stylistically on Japanese anime.

name: Michael vs Jason: Evil Emerges
description: Michael Myers and Jason Vorhees fight

name: Frog Magic Kung Fu
description: Dugu Yu s father disappeared 18 years ago when four great warriors from Jiang Hu met on a terrible windy night. The young guy inherited from his lost father only a piece of purple jade, secret kung fu technique and strange tendency to sleepwalking

name: Lagablab sa Silangan
description: The exciting story of the PRFTOK fighting battalion in the Korean War.

name: Brahman is Angry
description: The second film of Brahman Trilogy.

name: Accident
description: A man has an accident.

name: A Man Beyond Common Sense, Den Ace
Manedyer... si Kumander!
description: A 1982 Filipino marriage comedy starring Fernando Poe Jr and Susan Roces.

name: For the Motherland
description: South Korean martial arts films.

name: The Jaws of Steel
description: The Jaws of Steel is a 1922 Silent Western.

name: Hervanta Homicide 2000
description: Hervanta is being stalked by a mysterious serial killer who uses his video camera to film the murders he commits. For some reason, this sneaky psychopath sends the murder videos he made to inspector Kallinen. Kallinen goes to solve the crime with his partner detective Kuokka. A lot of people have to die before the story gets into the solved cases folder...

name: 6 Weeks
description: Bob, a 32-year-old professional boxer, lives with 30-year-old Marie and their 10-year-old son Adam. They live a peaceful life until Marie is arrested during a drug deal.

name: The Man from Guntown
description: When Tim Hanlon arrives to tell Ruth McArthur her long lost brother has been killed, she mistakes him for her brother. He stays on to help her retain control of the dam her farther started. But DeLong is after the dam and having had McArthur killed, he now sends his man after Tim.

name: P-Man: Cyber Doll Zero Command
description: Mitsuo Hii s, aka P-Man, girlfriend, Kyoko, is missing. She s been altered and turned into a robot by the evil pervert Otaki-Kyō chinman. He s recruited by F Gang to fight a duel with P-Man, whose transformation circuit is destroyed and he s captured. P-Man is in mortal danger! What will happen now?

name: Diegesis
description: A cinema-lover feels the urge to go to the bathroom during a movie but on his way, he travels through various film worlds. On his journey back to the cinema he meets a mysterious girl who claims to know everything, including how they magically transport into different genres. What follows is a magical journey back home to "reality".

name: Fightman: Dancing Monsters in Hellfire!
description: At the end of the 21st century, humanity is facing the worst. It was the emergence of monster people. Kaijūjin, or "monster people," are the last of the human race that has been transformed into monsters. They have completely lost their human nature, and are ferocious and brutal, with a variety of monstrous abilities that threaten to bring humanity to the brink of extinction. But there is only one person who stands in the way of these terrifying monsters!

name: Plutonium Dancer vs. Atomic Monster
description: Absolute terror strikes an unlucky man.

name: The Minibus Boss
description: A minibus driver and conductor damages a rich guy’s car and get into debt.

name: The Trial of Darn Porpington
description: A surrealist zero budget comedy shot in Dorset over 11 days.  Darn is a quiet, reserved girl until her unfounded arrest  forces her to take a stand, for the sake of herself and her family. With the help of her girlfriend, Vlad, and a goofy footie hooligan, Dan, she embarks on a quest for truth and liberty that takes her from scuzzy saloons, to abandoned castles and the very darkest recesses of Footenmouth.

name: Behind the Clouds: Salute to Peshmerga
description: It is the story of a foreign reporter who accompanies Kurdish rebels (Peshmerga) forces reporting on their national movement against the former dictatorship in Iraq. The government is informed about this and attacks the mountainous area to arrest her. What will the Peshmerga do?

name: Mission to Nowhere
description: A compelling and gripping story of Mrs. Naomi Adams, a top Nigerian society lady slaughter right inside her own house by an unknown assassin. Coincidentally the nation is undergoing a democratic transition and the late Adams happened to be the estranged wife of John Adams.

name: The Matarese Circle
description: Two secret agents paired to fins a group of killers.

name: 2 Girls, 1 Crazy Trip to Mexico: Origins
description: Two girls travel to Mexico only to be kidnapped.

name: The Inner Circle
description: 3 top CIA Agents run into a new breed of day walking Vampire during a mission gone wrong, when they realize the new terror they are up against when one of their team is bitten and turned, they decide to bite each other and change, in order to fight this newer form of dark criminal.

name: Locke the Superman: Mirror Ring
description: In the space history year of 0375, the killing Plan of Esper and the Imperial Plan met with failure. Run, who had executed these plans because of his partiality for his own self-made computer named Elena, lived together with Locke and Near under their protection. At the same time, Cassandra and Barcov of the Hackers netted the widely dispersed computers in each corner of space, and they succeeded in reviving some abandoned programs. This was the federal administrative computer, Elena. She tried to start the previous Imperial Plan again. When Locke found out about it, he set off to stop it. At the same time, the federal administration which detected something abnormal, also started to move. Involving Run and Near who chased Locke, the confusion was expanding to the entire Galaxy...

name: The Jethroverse: Hollow Victory
description: Worlds collide in HOLLOW VICTORY, the explosive finale to the story of THE JETHROVERSE. Not only has Jethro Smith returned, but a new multiversal threat has emerged...and it falls to Vincent, Trevor, Raven and more to fight it.

name: Revenge is Sweet
description: The top master in Canton, Master Ho, is killed by an ace fighter Cazy Wolf (Philip Ko) in a death duel . The late master s daughter, Hung Wah is so stricken by grief that she starts to sleep walk and start random fights. She encounters a Shaolin Monk that helps her channel her grief and thirst for revenge.

name: Tractor Man
description: Dokrak is a tractor rider. He’s persuaded by the old man to rob illegal stuff from gang boss. After he’s injured from the mission, he comes to his old man’s house and meet his daughter, Nampeung. They just fall in love.

name: The Legend of Trio Macan
description: One hundred years ago, in a descendant Chinese village, the territory of the Dutch East Indies. Once upon a time, three "Amoy" whose actions were famous throughout the country.

name: The Search for Agent Z
description: After meeting up at a roadside diner, two estranged brothers challenge one another to a cross-country automobile race.

name: Les folles aventures de Max La Barouette
description: The adventure of bumbling criminals Max La Barouette and Killer.

name: Di Gal Bite Mi
description: Every 30 years a vicious sexy lady vampire hits the streets of London England and it s been 30 years. So be warned. Trust no sexy lady after dark.

name: California Dream - A Second Chance
description: A has-been teen celebrity gets his life in order, however, upon returning to the entertainment industry, he is faced with a new, darker side to it.

name: O Assalto ao café Ponte Nova
Pilot Candidate: Comrades
description: A retelling of the TV series from the point of view of one of the Goddess Pilots.

name: The Invincible Kung Fu Guy
description: A "martial arts master" embarks on a journey to avenge the death of his brother, save his country from being ravaged by a plague, and most importantly, to avenge the deaths of his parents. Needless to say, the journey does not go smoothly.

name: Wong Fei-Hung Tries His Shadowless Kick
description: Starring Tak-Hing Kwan as Wong Fei-Hung

name: Oscar Valdez vs. Shakur Stevenson
description: Oscar Valdez vs. Shakur Stevenson

name: STAGNANT
description: Marie has a dull and mundane life. The only thing keeping it going is her boyfriend Steven, but when he breaks it off she doesn t know how to handle it.

name: Blood and Steel
description: When his sister’s murder unmasks a hidden drug ring, one man battles through a gaunlet of Kung-Fu experts in a thirst for revenge. The action spirals to an electrifying conclusion of sheer suspense, where no mercy will be granted to any who stand in his way.  Includes epic, original and fresh martial art fight sequences that will keep you on the edge of your seat. An all out tour de-force of martial art mastery.

name: The Yass Film: Adventure to Gaylord Street
description: A man and his young companion venture off to find the elusive Gaylord Street. However, many threats will stand in their way—from a sentient stuffed shark to a Russian, flintlock-wielding knight. Will they be able to make it there and back alive?

name: Ms. Justice
description: A female ex-soldier returns home to become a violent agent of revenge for wronged women.

name: A Couple Of Regular Fellas 2
description: Tony is sick and tired of it. The late hours, the disrespect, his pretentious boss. He wants what s his... But what s his... Isn t his just yet. Go through his meticulous plan, step by step in how to double your capital (fast).

name: Megazone 23 SIN
description: A remake of Megazone 23 Parts I and II.

name: Blood on the Streets of Ah Fei
Solitary
description: Directed by Seyed Masoud Atyabi was made in 2018. This movie is produced in Iran and in the comedy and family genre. In this film, Mehdi Hashemi, Reza Attaran, Ahmed Mehranfar, Barzou Arjamand, Shagaig Dehghan, Siros Hemti, Omid Rouhani, Mehdi Faqih, Shakib Shajare and Mehsa Tahmasabi have acted as artists.

name: Maha ut
description: In the late 70 s, "Sergeant Thong" and "Sergeant Khachon", two best friends who had tattooed the Maha Utma amulet together, went on a secret mission in the border with the enemy as mercenaries. Instead, they suffer major losses when their units are completely destroyed by the enemy. While waiting to die without military reserves Instead, they find that the invincible supreme power has helped turn the situation into an opportunity.

name: Belt Mathai
description: The film begins with Mathayi, who was imprisoned for killing his pregnant sister, being released from jail. He goes back to his house, where he recalls the incident of his sister s death and his father s mourning face.

name: A Ryan s House Christmas
description: During the beloved holiday season, Ryan neglects to acknowledge the true meaning of Christmas, out of selfish desire for a PlayStation 5.

name: TV Show: The Last Episode
description: As the war comes to a head, Derek must face his greatest challenge yet.

name: Olot Palot
description: Rohan, a teacher, swaps his job with Taboon, a thief. While Rohan struggles to negotiate with criminals, Taboon faces challenges teaching at a school.

name: YOSHIDANOBUO
description: Due to the SOMA secret society, Tokyo is under a chaotic order of destruction. People who have a high amount of MTE in them are kidnapped and brainwashed by the SOMA.

name: Outré A Peculiar Thing
description: In the near future, a mysterious creature, who goes by the name Outré, causes chaos towards civilians. Their only hope is an Archer who has been hunting Outré forever. Will the Archer succeed or will Outré continue to cause havoc.

name: The Amulet of Tahi
description: This is a story about standing up against what is wrong.

name: Deshdrohi 2
description: Kamaal R Khan in & as Deshdrohi.

name: Badai di Ujung Negeri
description: Badai is a marine assigned to an Indonesian border guard post on an island in the South China Sea.

name: Medal for Return to Wolfenstein Castle
description: This animated movie is made by Alexander Timchenko from Vladivostok. He did it alone for six years. This is made with love to great computer games and characters such as Lara Croft and, castle Wolfenstein and a great number of other well known and loved things.

name: Perjaka Terakhir 2
description: Sam, the beautiful girl is guarding the supermarket 24 hours. His eyes caught a criminal trying to shoplift. Turns out he was threatening to hand over all the money in the cash register to him or he would detonate the bomb attached to him.

name: Hell Van
description: Enthralled by his demon-possessed van, a volunteer firefighter opens the gates of Hell as a dying town is powerless to stop him.

name: Shadow of Drought: Southern California s Looming Water Crisis
description: This Emmy award-winning documentary examines the severe drought California suffered from 2012 to 2016 and the consequences it had on the state’s complex water management system. Despite recent wet winters, California’s water supply will continue to be threatened by ongoing population growth and longer, more frequent droughts caused by climate change. Southern California, an arid region especially vulnerable due to its reliance on imported water, has been a pioneer in the use of innovative water technologies. But as a shadow of drought hangs over the state, much more needs to be done to avert the region’s looming water crisis.

name: Whistle
description: A film following a Soldier s life during WWI.

name: Unnamed Western Film
description: A Western Film.

name: Perfect Victory Daiteiou
description: When an alien force attacks Earth, a giant sword falls onto the campus of Paradise Elementary School, transforming it into a flying vessel. The fate of the planet lies with one group of kids who must pilot powerful mecha to stop the invaders before it s too late!

name: Check YES!
description: In a world where about 8 in 10 people posses some kind of super power, Reineldis De La Cruz is a high school senior wanting to pursue hero work. In order to do so, a parental consent form is needed to allow any super children to attend a training academy.  Giselle, Reineldis  mother, has no intentions of letting her attend. However, a normal trip to the salon changes everything.

name: Die Scream Hate
description: A lost child finds herself in the middle of a clash between a murderous coven of witches and an equally murderous posse of witch hunters.

name: The Trail s End
description: Through his mirror vocograph The Wolf learns that Marguerite is carrying the codebook with her to a reception at the home of Col. West. The Wolf and his confederate there make a strenuous effort to secure the valued book but they are frustrated by Fred Randall, Marguerite s sweetheart, and all ends well when the soldiers of the fort pursuing. The Wolf engages in a skirmish in which the international crook is killed and his confederate captured.

name: The Blind Man from Ghost Cave: Duel at Bromo Crater
description: Barda Mandrawata (Ratno Timoer), also known as The Blind Man From the Ghost Cave, is in the Sarpala area which is being hit by a disaster created by the vile magician Tarub. After finishing his business, Barda intends to leave but is given Narisa, a child who is to be returned to his biological parent, Labone, the leader of Sarpala who has fallen in love with Barda despite being betrothed to Latongga (Torro Margens). Meanwhile, Latongga himself is being chased by Radina (Mila Karmila), a female child from the ascetic Sakti. Narisa is wanted by many warriors from various circles, including Tarub, and once he escapes from Barda s hands, Barda is forced to look for him.

name: For A Few More Yen They Kill
description: A blood war erupts when Tang Shaw, a gambling mob boss, discovers his henchmen have been skimming the casino till. Tang must have the thieves killed quickly as an example to others. But before he can, the henchmen assemble their own band of ruthless killers. Control of the casino and all its wealth lies on the quick fists and sharp swords of the warriors. It s an all-out bloodbath spectacular pitting the world s most highly trained Karate mercenaries against one another.

name: Ryan Garcia vs. Emmanuel Tagoe
description: DAZN Presents: Ryan Garcia vs. Emmanuel Tagoe

name: Battle of Clay 2019
description: A 2D remake of Takena Nagao s original claymation Battle of Clay.

name: Battle of Clay 2
description: Two men are playing rock-paper-scissors, but this version has a painful twist: whoever loses the round will be whacked on the head with a mallet. A bowl will offer them protection from the blow but only if they are quick enough to grab it. Tension builds as the game begins. What will the outcome be?

name: Battle of Clay
description: The red clayman is bored... and apparently, he has nothing better to do than bother the yellow clayman.

name: In The Days Of The Mob

description: Based on Bankim Chandra Chattopadhyay s iconic Bengali novel "Anandamath". Set in 1770, against the backdrop of the Sannyasi Rebellion when a brotherhood of monks banded together to fight the ruling British East India Company.

name: The Legend of the Tang Dynasty Killing Phoenix
description: Sultan, Lee Chun-saeng, and Cheong-cheong solve a murder phoenix case.

name: 新・年少バトルロワイヤル
Mosquitos, Alligators, and Bullets
description: A wealthy drug lord offers $2-million to anyone who can spring his son "Lenny" from prison. A jail break is attempted...and botched...as Lenny works on a chain gang. He is forced to flee into the swamp with a jail guard in tow, and money-hungry thugs on his tail, who are in pursuit of the $2-million bounty.

name: ROCKSTAR MADE
description: When the UK’s Sweetheart Jean-Phillippe retires from the MI6, he’s dumped by his ex girlfriend because of his sneaky antics & is called back into his old life by a mysterious phone call from his old boss. Will Jean-Phillippe ignore call the call? Or become ROCKSTAR MADE...

name: Small Lives
description: Small Lives is a short film by Aytaj Majnun

name: Beowulf: The Denmarkian King
description: There once existed a mighty and noble hero by the name of Sir Beowulf. He proved his heroism through many a noble(?) quest. Join him on his tale as he faces off against the infamous villains of the Great Lake, Grendel, Drakeula, and his ultimate rival: Master Sereno.

name: Rise of the Avalanche: Revenge from the Shadows
description: Sequel to the award-winning Neo-Noir film Rise of The Avalanche (2017), Rise of the Avalanche: Revenge from the Shadows is about a gangster by the name of Alvin "Avalanche" Steele who is freed from prison and executes his plans to take back his city. Meanwhile, the Supercop that put him behind bars (Antoine "Megki" DeLord) is hell-bent on sending him back to prison where he belongs. While Avalanche is distracted trying to take back his city and doing everything he can to keep the cops off his trail an old rival who he left for dead is out to exact revenge from the shadows.

name: Crazy Weapon 5: Back for the First Time
description: In the year 2297 Las Vegas, the master thief and escape artist, Wanda  Whispers  Jones has stolen a Crazy Weapon from the distant future (The year 4225/Envision City) and plans on using it in the past (The year 1974/ Colorado) to alter the timeline for her own gain. Two time cops (Sergeants Calloway and Quinn) along with Timeline Regulator, Spencer Cooper partner for the first time to go back to 1974, to retrieve the Crazy Weapon and Whispers Jones.

name: Table 23
description: Meli finds Chirac, and the two lovers are very happy to meet up after a long time and decide to catch up. The adventure becomes hard to continue when Chirac announces to his sweetheart that he has come back to marry her as promised, but she has already married another man!

name: Blood and Water II: Book of Z
description: Years after the end of the Blood and Water, Captain Frost (now a zombie) emerges from the shadows and begins his quest to rule the world. With the help of Drake, his undead army, and the Spear of Destiny, the only thing that stands in his way is a group of college students. Jake, the son of Jacobs, Bekah, Terry, and Bird. Jake s world is turned upside down when he s attacked by a zombie. He must learn to accept his destiny and embrace his past if he wants to save the world from Frost s wrath. But, he needs to watch his back. Some of his allies might not be as loyal as he thinks...

name: Do Waqt Ki Roti
description: Notorious bandit Tantia Bheel is arrested by the Police, tried in Court, found guilty and sentenced to 10 years in jail, where he gets to meet Jailer Vijay Saxena. Shortly thereafter Tantia breaks out of jail, and re-joins his fellow-bandits, led by Bhairav Singh and his son, Jagga. Acknowledging his failure, Vijay tenders his resignation and vows to bring Tantia back to jail so that he can complete his sentence. Vijay does find Tantia and readies himself to apprehend him, but he must first overcome an unexpected opponent, in the shape and form of Shankar, who is out to avenge the death of his sister, Pammi, at the hands of Tantia. Watch what happens when both Vijay and Shankar clash with each other for Tantia - while the bandit remains at large.

name: The 4 Points
description: Two LAPD Detectives take you on a bumpy, suspenseful ride along the streets of Los Angeles as Detectives Shane Murphy and Dre Allen navigate the twists and turns of life above and underground to stop a major gang war from exploding in the very same streets they grew up in only to find out a person very close to them is calling all the shots.

name: Invisible Detective Akira
description: Akira, a young detective, uses his Invisibility to investigate a case where the Mona Lisa has been stolen by the villainous Team Z.

name: Heroines of S.W.O.R.D.
description: Metro City is under attack and five of the world s greatest super Heroines have been brought together by Mr. X to create the new crime fighting super team S.W.O.R.D. A trap has been set buy Kingpin a new diabolical evil power who is preparing to take over the world. With the help of The Jester and his army to drain the powers of the heroines one by one. Each Heroine must fight the good fight and make their way to Kingpin s evil lair before they are captured and confronted with their fears. The evil within S.W.O.R.D. betrays the others and all could be lost. Will the Heroines of S.W.O.R.D survive? Will they be defeated? Will the they come together and fight as a team or self-destruct and go their separate ways? Will Kingpin rule the world or slip back into the darkness where he came from? Only the Heroines of S.W.O.R.D. can save the world from disaster.

name: The Prequel of Gold Convoyers: A Beacon Fire in LiaoDong
description: A martial arts film about the activities of the members of the Geumui Committee in the process of escorting the ambassador to be chased by the Japanese.

name: Schlieren
description: A documentary feature explaining the principles of Schlieren photography, which makes any phenomenon that changes the refractive index of transparent substances visible.

name: The Elys
description: High action movie, based on a teenage boy in a world during an apocalyptic event, where everybody is a vegan in a vegan world.

name: The Deal
description: It was a class film, actors were very good looking,

name: What Did You Do?
description: Ross, a strange and depressed individual, becomes obsessed with how people perceive him and his act of cowardice. He becomes lonely as he feels he cant relate to others, all during an uneasy time in growingly complicated friendship that is ready to erupt.

name: Irampa si Mediavillo
description: The final chapter to the Mediavillo trilogy

name: The Pirates Go to Town
description: The Uproarious Adventures of a Band of "KRIS-MEN" from the South who took Manila by Storm.

name: Raya
description: Raya grew up during the time when the Japanese forces were invading Thailand. Together with Captain Rome-run, a Thai army officer, Sae-ree Thai movement, the Thai freedom fighters, they interrupt the Japanese forces in every way they can. Raya also wants to get even with a local man, who co-operated with the Japanese and also had his father killed.

name: The Stories After War
description: War destroys everything, in my reign not only we had war in our enemy we had interior war between 2 political part we called this war (Brother s war) and a thousand human killed or handicapped because of this war, now both of the party sharing the power of the government. After 7 years of war between them. My film is all about the victim of last war those people whom suffering physically and psychologically because of this war.

name: Gain the World
description: The whole city is after Gwap when he sells drugs to the wrong person, and a bounty is put on his head.

name: When Rogues Fall Out
description: Holmes, the president of the S.L. Railway, has been trying very hard to secure a new franchise for his company. Frank Hynes, an acquaintance of Helen, the daughter of Holmes, has been a friendly visitor at the house, but, unknown to Helen and her father, is trying in every way possible to prevent Holmes from obtaining the franchise.

name: Buried
description: A short film for Ryan Pour s track Buried.

name: Idol Soldier Priere
description: Mika Aikawa is given the powers of Idol Soldier Priere and told she must be the protection from an evil person.

name: Pururun Sangunshi Piranger Cosplay Bishoujo Encyclopedia
description: An action-etch comedy in which a trio of Rie, Yoko, and Mayuri, who noticed a change in the school, transforms into a cosplay warrior Piranger and fights against the evil gang.

name: The Whale Mystery
description: Why do thousands of whales commit collective suicide every year? A deep-sea diver thinks he has the answer.

name: The Cleaner
description: The story of "Way", an ordinary office guy who works secretly as a corpse exterminator called "The Cleaner." Way works as a partner with "The Killer" named Guy. But then an incident forces Way to become a killer.

name: Incident of the 7th Bamboo Flute
description: This action-oriented film tells the story of a traveling theatrical troupe. When one of the actresses is sold to criminals running an opium den, Woon-gyu Na s character rescues her and returns her to the troupe.

name: Scissors
description: Micheal is bullied in school until one day when he seeks vengeance.

name: Walang Kasukat Sa Tapang
description: Two Hong Kong cops on leave to Manila take on a group of arms dealers.

name: Sleigher 3
description: The Sleigher universe comes to a close in the final installment of the trilogy.

name: It Was Mr. Glosser?!
description: Like most other high schoolers, four young students meet each other in detention and vow to start a band, but when their school s NFT culture starts getting all wacky (or "on the rag" as Relief Riley would say), the kids must band together and save their school and its beloved dog from complete crypto takeover!

name: Cyanide
