description: When two high schools combine due to budget cuts, a turf war breaks out between students to prove who really runs the school.

name: Three Roses
description: When Charulatha, Nandhu and Pooja return from abroad, they find out that their friend has been arrested for travelling on a fake passport. After learning that she is innocent, they decide to help her.

name: The Target
description: Two brothers are separated from each other for many years. Khosrow is now a police officer but his missing brother Essi is a thief. Essi gets release from the prison but is in need to money for the treatment of his ill son so he participates once again in a rubbery with a gangsters mob. The police brother is involved in the events too. Essi when sees a special mark on

name: One-Eye Dragon, the Strange Hero
description: An early Romantic Comedy featuring Tak-Hing Kwan and Kien Shih.

name: Knock-Out
description: A charming and ingenious amateur movie by Ciné Ovaki (Oost-Vlaamse Amateurs Kineasten) member "Em. Fournier" was the cameraman, assisted by "his daughter Monique", for this story about "Union Match" matches, climaxing with a boxing match.

name: UNBRIDLED
description: During the Day of Kamianets-Podilsky, a delegation of the Council of Europe visited the city. In the center of the plot is a hero who came to work on his first day of internship. During the solemn session of the City Council, the session hall and the entire administrative building are seized by a group of terrorists, and among the hostages is the protagonist s sister, who works here as a assistant of the mayor. The hero decides to take control of the situation and rescue the hostages, based on his previous experience of service in the VIII Khmelnytsky Special Purpose Battalion.

name: Haruwo
description: In a violent post-apocalyptic Japan, a reckless juvenile delinquent named Haruwo takes on the Yakuza, but their new bouncer may be more than he can handle...

name: Fast Cars, Bad Kids
description: Jillian and Addie wanted to drive their dad s car, but their dad won t let them cause their dad said "12 years". When Addie stole their dad s car keys, they go to Disney Land. However, this goes wrong.

name: Enemy by Blood
description: By the will of fate, the twin boys were separated in the hospital. Guys grow up with different outlooks and principles of life, unaware of each other s existence. But one feature unites them - it is obstinacy. The orphanage resident Motor Leha contacts the Ytyr company, famous for its criminal machinations. Өttүk Leha, who grew up in a family, works as a physical education teacher in the village. His half-brother Rodion, who is the head of the construction company "Dio5ur", also lives there. These two firms collide with each other, not sharing a large prize for the further implementation and development of their companies. "Ytyr" and ko starts a war with the "Dio5ur" company. And then he comes to the defense of his brother Өttүk Lyokh in order to restore justice in a peaceful way, But Motor, decides to go to the end...

name: Frog-Induced Insomnia
description: A diverse crew of cold-blooded criminals camp out in the woods and attempt a night of rest leading up to a long-awaited bank heist. However, the ever-present croaking of an elusive amphibian raises the heat as paranoia, betrayal and long-overdue bloodshed takes hold.

name: Macbeth 3000: This Time, It s Personal
description: The President is dead. Murdered in his sleep by an unknown assassin. British Agent MacDuff is sent in to investigate and soon finds himself confronting an old ally Macbeth - only this time, he s the president... and it s also very personal as implied by the subtitle. As stakes rise, car chases & light-sword battles ensue, allies become enemies and it becomes clear that there can be only one!

name: Faster, Hollywood: Die! Die!
description: A Couple on the Run against a brutal Detective.

name: Everything from the Rubber 2
description: Rubber strikes again, when everything is being rebuilt, but not just the city, the forests and the world.

name: The Guy in the Cave
description: Comedy short about a caveman, known as the Guy in the Cave.

name: Cop Zone
description: Officer John Halloway arrives home on his 45th birthday, only to find no surprise birthday guests waiting for him. Frustrated and alone, with a day old cupcake, John makes no wishes and goes straight to bed. Suddenly John is awakened by a camera man who has barged into the back door of his home at 2:00 AM, unannounced, ready for a ride along.

name: Fight Back
description: A Devonshire pensioner fights against yobbos, Death Wish-style.

name: The S.I.N.
description: Against the backdrop of the race for mayor of Las Vegas, a mad bomber is on the loose and his target is Pacific Cargo Shipping. The company hires expert and world-renowned P.I., Bud Chelzer, to investigate the latest bombing in Las Vegas, NV. At the same time, Brad Morrison, a recently fired singer/comedian, has just been approached by a sexy and mysterious woman...

name: Iron Bridge Kung-Fu
description: Iron Bridge Monkey is 10th generation of O Mei section, in order to protect the national treasure – Jade Watermelon, he lives at Tien Ho town secretly and disguises as a time announcer. General Chang intends to find it and sell to a foreigner. When his real identity is exposed, he has to run away. Who will finally get the Jade Watermelon remains a puzzle…

name: Rumble in L.A.
description: Freedom is a dream of every man and woman. Kero is an immigrant from Asia. Coming to Los Angeles he found himself between two fires. On the one side he is pursued by police and security service. On the other side he is attacked by drug-mafia, demanding money. But the real freedom is the only dream of Kero and a prostitute, that became his new friend.

name: Concrete Feet
description: A mob enforcer is betrayed and transformed into a bonafide killing machine.

name: Once Upon a Time in Franketown
description: Tony is a gambler who loses everything he owns to an evil gangster. He makes one last bet and tries to win it all back. But he makes a bad call and loses his soul. Now he has 24 hours to give the gangster some money. Or he will become his slave forever.

name: The Million Dollar Watch
description: Directed by Joseph Yao. With Jonathan Yao, Joseph Yao, Joshua Yao. A boy deals with the accidental breaking of his friend s gun through a story of theft and pursuit.

name: Secret Mission in Damascus
description: An adventure in Syria during Hanukah

name: Keng Heng Hor
description: Thai action movie.

name: Nero Bloom: Private Eye
description: It s 1947 and private investigator Nero Bloom is about to experience his most twisted mystery yet! When hired by a rich socialite to secretly follow and protect her gambling husband, Charlie Lomax, Nero has no idea what mix of mystery and intrigue lay ahead.

name: Half Past Noon
description: Jim Torres is a creature of habit. He attempts to reenter the world after a period of seclusion, and with his habit disrupted, he fears that he’s made a mistake, and that his tether to reality might be slipping.

name: Star Trek Versus Batman
description: Accidently sent back to the 60 s, the USS Enterprise is discovered by Chief O Hara and Gotham City Space Control.  Beaming down to Gotham for absolutely no reason, Kirk and Spock are kidnapped and brainwashed by the Joker and Catwoman.  The fun and melee begins as ridiculous fights, childish dialogue, and colorful costumes

name: Everything from the Rubber
description: a certain species is erasing every town...

name: Bairagee
description: Huli Shiva, a hulivesha artiste, works in a police station, doing odd jobs. When he moves along with his inspector friend to a new city, he meets many new people, including Vathapi and Karna. While he discovers new friendships and love, he also witnesses an unfortunate incident that awakens the tiger within him once again. Does he find justice?

name: Heroine in Black
description: The Head of Southern Stone Village, Lee Ba-hung bullies others with his power. Yet he has no knowledge that his niece Lee Chun-hong is actually the Black Heroine who confronts him. It turns out that Chun-hong s father is fearful that Ba-hung would bully the mother and daughter of Chun-hong, hence he has disguised Chun-hong with woman attires. Chun-hong s identity is unveiled when she devotes herself to helping the refugees of a disaster by distributing food and emergency supplies. Ba-hung would like to murder Chung-hong by hanging, yet it ends in him being killed by his followers.

name: Cyber Lady Suzuka
description: A group of friends who live in a furnished warehouse faces the forces of evil with their robotic maid/crimefighter.

name: Battle Holography Wind
description: Whenever he s threatened, a kid uses his laptop to call upon the power of Wind, a holographic fighter from the digital dimension.

name: Brahman: Legendary Hero
description: Short indie shot-on-video tokusatsu film from Central Island.

name: FINAL FIGHT
description: Two opponents go all out and battle for their life in a glorious chaotic bloodshed. Who will win?

name: Hatachi
description: Takeshi, an aspiring sumo wrestler who has just turned twenty, is suddenly brought into the  Quarter-Life-Crisis-Realm , where everyone who loses their hope and will to achieve their dream will turn into  stone statues . Takeshi is faced with two choices: preserves his childhood dream as a sumo wrestler, or gives up and continues his family s sushi restaurant.

name: The Purple Night
description: A deadly strain of magic mushrooms overtakes a family man s life. Torn, he must decide between returning to his beloved India, or America s allure.

name: DNA
description: Blaxploitation  actioner

name: Tosa Boy
description: A teenager who s fought a third of his life in organized street-fights grows up after he is forced to train an unruly kid.

name: Escape From Forest Lake
description: The President s Dog has been Kidnapped! Or... I guess Dognapped. Anyways, the U.S. only Trusts one Man to get it back, Even though that Man has Committed Countless War Crimes. (Look, are they really war crimes when both sides are doing it?) Anyways, Snake Snakeskin must help save the President s Dog from the Evil Clutches of one King of Forest Lake.  Starring...  Ryley Clarkin As Snake Snakeskin  Zach LaBarre As The King  Devin Cavanaugh As C.I.A.  Trenton Huston As Burrelli Brothers  Austin Siddall As The Dog

name: Geimu
description: Looking for a challenge, Emi, an impetious gamer enlists her pal Hiroshi to illegally hack her VR game console together with her AI device so that she can play in a fully AI created VR game world. At first it appears to be a typical RPG (role playing game) set in medieval Japan with plenty of action, but bizarre events begin to take place, and she gets separated from Hiroshi. Will Emi prevail and escape with her life or does the AI have other plans...?

name: The Coleman Trebor Heist
description: There is a plan to steal the limited edition Coleman Trebor action figure.

name: Buddha Powers
description: A bonkers tale of paranormal investigators on the trail of a crazy Christian cult.

name: Dr. Ice
description: In this action-packed suspense thriller, renowned homicide detectives are summoned to Las Vegas to investigate a series of bizarre murders. Officer Brooks and Wade must settle their own differences from the past before they can apprehend the cool and calm Dr. Ice. When the detectives attempt to question Dr. Ice, the pressure is on. And now Wade, Brooks, and a rookie cop must work feverishly to catch the serial killer before he strikes again.

name: LEGO Racers 4D
description: Watch the adventure featuring colorful cars and characters racing across an impossible, ever-shifting landscape.

name: Patriot: Selamatkan Indonesia
description: Tells about Sandi Yudha s troops who have the task of carrying out unconventional wars, wars that are not subject to international law.

name: In Search of the Blue Sky
description: Short animation by Po Chou Chi about a grandson want to make his grandmom s wish come true

name: Krishna Balram 2 Kalvakra Returns
description: Kalvakra is rescued by the sorceress and they team up to unleash the indestructible Nivatkavach army which is locked up inside the deep confines of the earth. By controlling that army they plan to defeat Krishna Balram and then conquer the entire earth.

name: Krishna Balram: Kalvakra
description: Kalvakra is a mighty asura and is regarded as a living devil. He has a powerful army of millions and is invincible in battle due to a boon he enjoys. When his Army carry away Udho, his friends Krishna and Balram, along with Radha, undertake the journey by sea to Kalvakra s island kingdom, upset Kalvakra s plans to capture them, mange to free Udho and get him safely back to Vrindavan.

name: Krishna Kansa Vadha
description: Krishna s miraculous deeds soon reach the court of Kansa. He soon devises a sinister plan to finish Krishna and invites him to Mathura. Krishna and Balram accept the invitation and travel to Mathura. After entering Kansa s arena they kill Chanur and Mustik, the wrestlers, and eventually kill the evil Kansa himself.

name: Won t Stand for Dying
description: The son of the murdered Yakuza, Kenji, at the request of his mother, worked in a stable company. However, soon the girl Kenji Amy, who was in favor of the director of the company, is sexually harassed by him. Kenji beats the director and resigns. He asks his brother Ryota, the manager of the cabaret, to find a job, but his brother refuses him, and he is taken in by Senba, a yakuza boss specializing in smuggling and drugs...

name: Salvaj
description: Ishak, an experienced police diver, contemplates the emotional perils of his vocation following the most challenging dive of his career.

name: Hopkins
description: Hopkins, from the movie COMMANDO NINJA, gets a stand-alone short.

name: Pig Face - Chapter Two
description: Samantha Bombay and Jackson Cake live in a shared flat with Derek Stone. Unbeknownst to the couple, Derek is the notorious serial killer of Piggy Bank Road, the Pig-Headed Man. With Samantha revealing to Derek that she s thinking about becoming a vegan, time is running out before he strikes his next victim. Will the duo be able to discover Derek s secret before it s too late?

name: Chinese Unicorn 4: Shadow Play - Part 2
description: In the concluding chapter of the  Chinese Unicorn  Saga, Saloona Fishpaste and The Book Man team up to find her beloved Salmon Glass. But with Brad Stan and the Company lurking, what are the chances he is even alive? Or that any of them will escape the encounter with the mysterious businessman?

name: SWAT Mission Demo
description: It started as a peaceful night. Then he heard the birds suddenly stop singing.

name: Ang Titser Kong Pogi
description: Joey Perez, a policeman goes to Subic as a Kindergarten teacher to secretly investigate the case where he was framed up. He becomes attached to Cynthia, a co-teacher and Jimbo, his student—both relatives of his suspect. Joey has to protect himself and the children to prove his innocence once and for all.

name: Reunion of Champions
description: A quirky dramedy about a group of diverse fighters with special abilities who once saved the world from a great evil, who then reunite years later while coping with the mundane existential ennui of crumbling marriages, unfulfilling jobs, and drug abuse.

name: Moses - Fallen in the City of Angels
description: A tale of a fallen angel who was sentenced to a human life sentence... Moses, the angel of life is haunted by the visions of a dead child works as an assassin for Mrs. Mier whose true identity is Gabriel the Arc Angel... the assassination of Lucky Palermo was a mistake. Julius Palermo, Lucky s brother whose true identity is The dark angel...

name: Lex
description: A little girl from birth has powers to move objects with her mind. As a young girl tragedy happens and she chooses to never use her gift again. When she becomes older the world starts to be overtaken with unknown machines. As Lex and her brother Ethan run for their life s, she has to make a decision to keep her oath, or to over come her fear and use her gift.

name: The Reckoning
description: In a post apocalyptic world where resources are controlled, a fearless young girl seeks revenge for her families death. After years of Government manipulation on the people, she must find a way to restore order from those who took everything from her.

name: The Adventures of the Zordine Warriors
description: 80s-style teen action comedy A duo of high-kicking kids from a far off kingdom use their wits, intelligence and martial arts skills to save the world from evil.

name: Fist Under The Sky: The Fist Power
1 Kiss, 2 Bullets
description: Atlanta  blaxploitation

name: Unrevealed: 3 Days in Hades
description: Christian blaxploitation short.

name: Ronin  Boys
description: Newly initiated into a powerful society of Asian gangsters, Evan s tame corporate days are over...

name: Try Hard Too: Born on the 3rd of July
description: A 1989 Filipino comedy film starring Redford White.

name: The Syndicate: Assignments
description: Every story has a beginning. The Syndicate: Assignments is the new action drama prequel to The Syndicate: A New Frontier from Terminal 52 Films.

name: Driver
description: Six months in the making, his film is Joel Biggs  Year 12 VCE media project about a street driver challenged to a high stakes race.

name: A Fistful Of Pebbles
description: A Fistful of Pebbles won the 3rd prize in the SEA Tropfest Film Festival 2015. The story is about a mysterious man who finds himself in the muddy monsoon in a village terrorized by a local gangster. When he’s unwittingly drawn into the village’s problem and the beautiful daughter of the village Chief is about to be taken, the hero takes matters into his own hands… with a fistful of pebbles.

name: Who Are You, Ellie?
description: He has an instant reaction and an accurate eye, strong muscles and a cold mind. His friends call him simply Ellie, and the "fathers of the city" are behind him, as if behind a stone wall. However, he is not the master of his fate either...

name: Kamandag Ko Ang Papatay Sa Iyo
Havana Connection
description: DTV actioner set in Cuba.

name: Philippine Soldiers: The Action Films of Teddy Page
description: TEDDY PAGE (real name Teddy Chiu) is one of my favourite trash film directors. Throughout the 1980s he made some of the most entertaining, low-budget, explosive action jungle films you will ever see.  With the help of certified Weng Wengologist and Filipino film expert ANDREW LEAVOLD ("The Search For Weng Weng"), I explore the English language action films tha Teddy churned out between 1983-1995.

name: Hunter becomes the Hunted
description: A Hunter tries to hunt someone but ends up getting hunted instead.

name: Nexo
description: A neurologist with a doctorate in neuropsychology has found a way to increase human intelligence. He has created a formula where he can improve the physical and mental weaknesses of his patients. This procedure has allowed him to find the cure for many diseases and hope for a better future for humanity. This secret Society sees an opportunity and uses Dr. Hensel s procedure to gain full control of humanity. A group of people knowing that humanity is in great danger from the experiment, They all agreed and came up with a plan to destroy the laboratory but one of them betrays them and they catch them, but one of them manages to escape, now the mission is to try to save them to continue the plan.

name: Chicken Fight
description: A man sits down to watch the news while enjoying some soup, but he is interrupted by a strange visitor.

name: Lin Chong: Wind and Snow Mountain Shrine
Like a Boss
description: A foolishly heroic guy gets himself into fights against thugs to save innocent people but gets beat up until his  kick-ass  girlfriend comes to the rescue.

name: Barlow Grant s Wish
description: There is a bond between men who have been in the trenches together that transcends time, space, life and death.

name: Last 234!
description: Jasper, a senior cheerleader of Saint Noel University Pep squad, is down to his last performance to represent his future alma mater. With days before the competition, an unexpected incident arises that will test the team’s will as athletes.

name: King of Kings
description: MMA action drama.

name: Maratabat
description: A simple guy who loves to play guitar was forced to leave everything behind as he ventured through the valley of the shadow of death when his brother suffered an unfortunate demise. No beast is more savage than a man possessed with power answerable to his rage.

name: Oddity
description: In 3025 ODDITYs plague the earth and it is Wayne s job to keep them in check. but when the Wayne s ODDITY is stolen he starts questioning the system he works for.

name: The Great Villains
description: Psychological action drama about the activities of a corrupt lawyer.

name: NASCAR NEXTEL Cup Series 2004
description: The complete overview of the 2004 inaugural NASCAR NEXTEL Cup series

name: Field Mouse
description: A young man called Field Mouse (Deuljwi) saves a young couple when the woman is forced to marry a rich gangster.

name: The Sniper
description: Ghost Hand, the legendary gunman in Jiangcheng city, was being hunted for being a traitor by Xihe Tang, an organization protecting the city. Lu Lan, a punk, impersonated Ghost Hand and was taken by the best woman killer in Xihe Tang. Lu Lan was full of hatred after finding out his brother, Shen Lie, was a member of Xihe Tang and had been killed by Ghost Hand. Xihe Tang trained Lu Lan, who has the gift of slow vision, into the best gunman. Lu Lan was told to work with Leng Feng to eradicate the underground power that traffics arms and kill Ma Wenchang, a warlord. Their mission was interrupted by Ghost Hand many times. Lu Lan was determined to kill Ghost Hand in revenge for his brother’s death. Just when they were about to have a gunfight over life and death, Lu Lan found out his dead brother was no one but Ghost Hand. It turned out that all of this was a conspiracy of Xihe Tang.

name: Club Girls
description: hong kong drama

name: In Dangerous Minds
description: Two middle eastern detectives on the Louisville Police Department struggle with the aftermath of a Post 9/11 America.  Director Hussain Ahmad Writer Hussain Ahmad Stars Hussain AhmadInder KumarErik Kyr

name: Robbery Intermission
description: A robber breaks into an apartment which he thought was empty. He quickly encounters a problem when he finds out there was someone inside.

name: The Last Operative
description: After a sniper s bullet kills his son, retired CIA Agent Michael Sabado goes back into the New York City, clandestine underground he once worked, evading those trying to kill him while following the clues hidden in his past to discover who killed his son.

name: Deadly Discovery
description: When narcotics detective Ike Walters visits his former partner Stetson Avery in rural Greentown, he inexplicably finds himself the target in a deadly game of deceit. Befriended by the alluring yet suspicious Renee Dupa, Ike discovers that his life has been placed on the line and that nothing is what it seems.

name: Kyaukme Prisoner
description: Kyaukme A Kyin Thar (ကျောက်မဲအကျဉ်းသား) is a 1969 Burmese black-and-white action drama film, directed by San Shwe Maung starring Win Oo, Khin Than Nu, Aung Lwin, Phoe Par Gyi and San San Win

name: Tabire Khab
description: A police officer is involved in a complicated robbery case without much time to decide right from wrong.

name: Rejects
description: Guns, cash and four friends who have the wrong idea at the wrong time.

name: Lock Off
description: A police force led by a trigger happy commander are tasked with bringing down a suspected “criminal organisation”.

name: Kaiketsu Nōtenki 2: Pure Love in Minato City
description: Noutenki faces off against Mecha Noutenki

name: Kaiketsu Nōtenki
description: Private detective Ken Hayakawa wanders in search of the organization that murdered his best friend. When there is trouble, he transforms into the motorcycle-riding superhero Notenki.

name: The Standoff
description: When two Cowboys collide in a traditional standoff, both their weapons and their emotions are tested.

name: Run for your Life
description: Following his robbery, a man finds himself forced to board into a little grandma’s car to escape the police through the colorful streets of Cuba.

name: Reloaded
description: During his investigations in an increasingly criminal metropolis, detective Jimmy Cloud gets into a world of gangsters, espionage, murder, prostitution and drugs, in which a terrorist group also targets his girlfriend to stop him.

name: Emma s Revenge
description: A posse of martial arts divas force karma on human traffickers that mess with Emma s family.

name: Batman and Robin
description: Vickie Vale, who has the combination of the Gotham City National Bank has been kidnapped by The Mask and his henchmen. Batman and Robin attempt to rescue Vale, but Batman is rendered unconscious and Robin is taken prisoner by the gang. The gang have escaped in a car, with Batman following on foot. Eventually, batman catches up, frees Vale and Robin, and they fight the bad guys. The Mask throws a hand grenade at Batman, who catches it and throws it back, destroying The Mask.

name: A Paper Tiger Burns
description: In the face of bigotry, a young immigrant to St. Louis struggles to obtain true strength through martial arts while overcoming the demons of his troubled Colombian past.

name: Crossing the Line
description: A Mexican Sicario runs into a world of challenges when the cartel leader, "The Viper" assigns a Middle Eastern Hitman to accompany him on missions. The Iraqi methods are different than the established norms of the cartel. Stars Eylisabeth BengocheaAnthony AceHussain Ahmad

name: Shuriken Sentai Ninninger: Final Live Tour 2016
description: A stage show to go along with Shuriken Sentai Ninninger.

name: Under the Lights in Thailand
description: In March of 2014, Coach Mark Nardone (Kru) traveled to Thailand with only three fighters to represent Team USA at the MuayThai World Championships.

name: The Crooked Mind
description: Kyle Carson is diagnosed with multiple personality disorder, also known as DID. He despises his community after doing a background search on everyone who he believes has committed a crime without punishment. When one of his multiple personalities, Jonah, comes forth; he trains Kyle to kill and not be seen. Detective Amon Barracks leads the charge

name: BKFC 19: Paige VanZant vs Rachael Ostovich
description: Paige VanZant vs. Rachael Ostovich

name: Chordal Combat
description: A Guitar Player (Roch Guertin) and a Banjo Player (Heath Dyer) battle over a jam spot in a cul-de-sac, except they don’t use their fists or even words to settle the score: they use their song and instruments.

name: Aga
description: Bakhytzhan Abdulayev — the former sword of the three Zhuzes — after high-profile cases in the past, having suffered the loss of loved ones, leaves the criminal path. Secluded in the mountains, he lives his life as a hermit. However, the news of the brutal murder of his nephew disturbs his peace and idyll. Baha learns that the culprit is Saken, the son of the local oligarch Sansyzbai, a dangerous and influential man who is not subject to the laws. Baha decides to go on the warpath against the most powerful and influential clans of the three Zhuzes. He is ready to do anything to restore justice.

name: Wrong Place Wrong Time
description: Wrong place wrong time is a film about two people who stumble across something that would change their lives and yet decide to do the right thing against all odds.

name: Circle Track Summer
description: The owner of a failing race track seeks to reverse his fortune by holding a series of promotion events where the cars are driven by women in bikinis... backwards.

name: Intense Battles Reloaded
description: The ultimate revamp of the original "Intense Battles" from Ryanium Films. A young boy Elia grows up devastated and in desperate search for the reason behind his father s disappearance. One day he discovers a dark secret past which his father had tried so hard to lock away - but there is no stopping Elia for what he will do next.

name: The Golden Bouzouki
description: Johnny Diamonds stars in this musical adventure set in ancient mythological greece.  Johnny Orpheus returns home to the peaceful village of Salamis to find that it has come upon troubled times. Assembling a crew of heroes like no other, Johnny sets sail on a song-filled voyage of adventure to obtain the Golden Bouzouki, a legendary musical instrument of divine origin which is said to bring peace to the hearts of all mankind. (Not Rated, 1 hour, 48 minutes)

name: Lila Kills Again
description: A continuation of  Lila Lives Again .

name: A Night at the School
description: A boy named Jason Dunnly finds Jack who both get locked in their school with four enemies. Can they survive the night, who will fall and who will rise?

name: Lila Lives Again
description: A woman wakes up in the woods, injured, with no recollection of how she got there. She soon rediscovers the events that came previously as a mysterious masked group attempt to hunt her down. What are the lengths she ll have to go to in order to secure her fate as a survivor?

name: A Bad Day
description: A man goes out,not knowing what s ahead of his day.

name: The Debt
description: in the broken down streets of Victoria, Chris and Micheal work for their shady boss Antonio, but one day, they come face to face with a different type of power, one that they too cannot control...

name: Gem.
description: High Schooler Eiji Kayama dreams of being attacked by a mysterious man. In the same day, a new school teacher is assigned to Eiji classroom, the teacher is Ihara, the same man that attacked him in his dream. From now on,  strange events occur frequently around Eiji ...

name: Static Shock Blackout
description: Daisy Watkins, an up and coming news reporter, goes to Dakota City to to discover the name of a super-powered teenage vigilante. It s a fan adaptation of Dwayne McDuffie s comic book and television series: Static Shock.

name: The Cat, the Rat, and Me
description: Guy s day takes a turn for the bizarre when he crosses paths with Cat, a talking cat, and Rat, a murderous rat.

name: The Vampire Asset
description: A reluctant vampire recruited by the CIA to hunt down his former lover, the woman who turned him into an immortal killer, before she unleashes a global catastrophe.

name: The Real Twin Dragons
description: A true, one of a kind story that is totally unique in the film world.

name: Super Giant Continues: Kingdom of the Poison Moth
description: The 9th and final Super Giant film, in which he fights a group plotting to assassinate a Middle-Eastern prince for his country s treasure.

name: Super Giant Continues: The Devil s Incarnation
description: The 8th Super Giant film, in which he copes with a disfigured mad scientist, who turns his own daughter into an evil witch.

name: Super Giant Continues
description: The 2nd Super Giant film. Super Giant continues his battle against the foreign terrorists. In return, they frame him for murder. (Part 2 of 2)

name: Blood Brothers
description: The Dragon Tiger brothers who live as yakuza in the Han Chinese district of Japan. The arm of his brother, Noboru, is engraved with a dragon rising to the sky, and the arm of his brother, Takeshi, is engraved with a tattoo symbolizing himself. After the war, they draw the blood of Sangokujin Wang Haidong, who was killed in a mutiny in abandoned Japan, but has been gratefully serving the leader of the Takeda group who murdered his father. One day the group leader tells them to take over the group. Honda, a young leader who is not convinced by this, partnered with the head of black society, Wang Rei, and began taking over the Han Chinese district and the Takeda group. As a result, brothers Ryu-Tora and Wang Retsu will play a deadly battle without meeting the real brothers who draw Wang Haidong s blood.

name: Oh! Who Do Recover
description: A young school girl is surprised by a man in black while smoking in a shrine. Not far away, a teacher friend and a detective get into an argument over a discarded cigarette when the angry stranger reappears. If there s one thing he can t stand, it s improperly disposing of garbage. Like a spirit of vengeance in nature, he flashes his katana.

name: Ninja Girls Kagechiyo
description: Kasumi, Lemon and Ranmaru are always there when they sense injustice. Together they are Ninja Girls Kagechiyo! When they see the mean Akane beat up poor Yumeno, they decide to do something. So take Yumeno under your wing to train her in all of the ninja techniques. Help for self-help, supported by their master Hattori.

name: Children of God - Shinji and Rinka -
description: Shinji and his daughter Shizuku are attacked. The crazy yakuza Jizo takes Shizuku hostage and forces her father to demand 100 million yen back from the thief Rinka. Desperate, Shinji sets off, but he is not the only one hot on Rinka s heels.

name: Chaotic Monk
description: Eiji - a Buddhist monk - and Burgon are friends, and the very best. On their arduous way home, they are attacked by a vicious black magician who puts a deadly curse on Burgon. Now it is up to Eiji to find a magic mushroom within a day to buy his friend s life with it. Amidst sakrush, lust and crossing blades, however, this proves to be extremely difficult, as the monk s loyalty is put to the test time and again.

name: Bakumatsu Heroz
description: Hana leads a boring life between work and hobby, until one day she suddenly travels through time to ancient Edo, before the Western powers had opened the country. A fan of historical romances, she imagines herself on a film set and fancies the historical Sakamoto Ryōma, a hero of the Bakumatsu period.

name: Blood Blade
description: Defensive Momo hunts down "Oni", monsters and demons in human form, with her sword. Together with her clueless friend Kaori, she must prevent the creation of an army of immortals.

name: Sa Atin Ang Daigdig
description: Out of the gutter, the din, the squalor of the big city - A rousing story of 6 people seeking success that will startle you with its frankness and stir you its truth.

name: Crossing
description: A desperate security guard tries to rob a bus when 2 actual robbers beat him to the punch. This sudden twist of events forces him to be the hero he did not intend to be.

name: ZsaZsa Zaturnnah Vs. The Amazonistas of Planet X
description: A shy, small-town gay man discovers a strange meteorite that transforms him into ZsaZsa Zaturnnah, a flamboyant female superhuman ready to defend his town from all sorts of supernatural & extra terrestrial threats.

name: Volt
description: Upcoming superhero animation series.

name: Mantis Boxer
description: Face off between young Ulysses Chan, and the female slave takers/ owners. They terrorise the village and steal women from their homes. A clash is likely!

name: The Rapture: La Pinacoteca
description: Detective Conad is investigating suspicious events regarding an Art Gallery and the paintings of the mysterious artist "The Rapture".

name: Beyond Black Mesa
description: Inspired by the Half-Life Video Game series, this is an action-packed short film centering around Adrian Shephard and a band of resistance fighters struggling to get out a warning about the impending invasion.

name: The Blood Wind
description: In hope of growing his power, a warlord hires a group of  Devil Fighters  to kill whoever gets in his way. When a group of martial arts experts does just that, it seems a bloodbath is unavoidable.

name: no
description: no

name: Hamilton: The Spaces Performance
description: An intepid singer performs all the songs from the hit musical  Hamilton  as part of a solo and an acapella show on Twitter Spaces

name: Big Balls Mcgee: Battle of the Belts
description: Big Balls McGee trains to defeat his evil father,

name: Das Gesetz der Mine
description: A black African avenges his father by murdering the inspector of a diamond mine.

name: There Lies Another World
description: When teenage siblings Jack and Jessie discover the thief of their missing toys, they decide to steal them back, only to find themselves witnessing the launch of the first colonization shuttle to Mars.

name: Teeth
description: "This is what happens when kids see Jaws 2 and want to make their own Super-8 sequel. Shot in Riverside, CT in 1978. Sound added 35 years later." -RH

name: Hwarang-V Trio
description: The super-powered trio of Sky, Earth, and Typhoon attempt to rescue Princess Lanka from the King of Evil with the help of young Ae-ri.

name: Gold Pencil and Alien Boy
description: A Korean animated movie about a boy and his alien friend possessing supernatural powers.

name: Hunny Bunny Bank Robbery
description: Honey and Bunny In Bank Robbery is a slapstick fun riot. It is a story of 4 best friends who come together to help their neighbor, Mr. Khanna, to retain his job by solving a bank robbery and bringing the bad guys to justice.

name: Sundown Town
description: Bryce and Mitchell s trip home is disrupted after making a pit stop in a mysteriously unwelcoming town.

name: Death Row: The Tournament
description: In the near future, death row inmates are afforded the opportunity to fight to the death in a televised tournament.

name: Martian
description: During an expedition to Mars an accident occurs and the ship carrying the astronauts crashes with a single survivor, who tries to maintain his sanity and survive with the help of a robot while waiting for the most unlikely rescue

name: Battle of the Hearts
description: Called to negotiate with a man who has taken a hospital ward hostage, an ex-army major is shocked to learn of the attacker’s link to his own past.

name: Mahal... Ginagabi Ka Na Naman
description: Sequel to "Mahal... Saan ka nanggaling kagabi?". Johnny, the loving and obedient husband of Luding, must juggle family life and battle bad guys in the neighborhood.

name: Dragon Vs. Ninja
description: Two martial arts dojos battle over the right to rule the streets.

name: Golden Butterfly, the Lady Thief
description: Lui Yik-pang is reduced to his wits  end to rein the Golden Butterfly. Chong Tak-ming emerges as the suspect. The friendship and ties between former classmates Lui and Chong date back years ago. When the impoverished Chong turned to banditry, Lui abided by the law and arrested Chong. Chong repented and bore no grudges. Chong s daughter Ching-han and Lui s son Siu-man are lovers. Ching-han reinvents herself as a chivalrous bandit and robs the rich to help the poor after the imprisonment of her father and the death of her mother. Endowed with her father s gifts, Ching-han remains out of the law s reach, until she is tailed by the father enlisted in the police service. A bitter row ensues; the father s underling Sung Sing-biu snatches the stolen goods and activates the security system. Ching-han is prepared to turn herself in when Sung surrenders himself as a gesture of gratitude to his benefactor. Attending the wedding banquet, Lui brings his son and daughter-in-law a golden butterfly.

name: Into the Cutezone
description: An elite squad of highly trained soldiers has the task of reaching the center of a mysterious zone. Inside they are confronted with a frightening enemy immune to their massive muscles and guns.

name: La estampa del escorpión
description: Felix Duarte learns of his younger brother s existence in Mexico after being separated since birth. But seeing they are both enemies by their profession (Felix as a Colombian Drug Lord and Sergio as the head of Interpol) Felix must find a way to win his brothers heart as well as operate his illegal drug operations. But his trip is cut short as he battles the Mexican Federal Police, Interpol, The DEA, and a powerful Brazilian Drug Lord Rival preparing to take over operations in South America.

name: Penélope
description: Penélope an eleven-year-old girl the daughter of a drug-trafficking mother and a violent stepfather is taken to live with Martin (Hugo Catálan), her biological father, after her mother is sentenced to eight years in prison, Martín who has never seen her before agrees to take custody, at first the relationship is difficult but in a short time Martín and Pénelope establish a bond, but when a gang of criminals kidnaps her father Pénelope launches in search of her father with the help of a 9 mm pistol and Nacho an Uber driver.

name: El Karma
description: While living without a care, Daniel s ambition has separated him from his family. With time against him, now he must face the cruelest of lessons to recover what was once his.

name: El Americano
description: It is not the result of hunting the prey that really satisfies whoever is after its capture, it is the very ritual of watching, stalking, harassing and cornering, which becomes the food of the executioner s ego.

name: Morir con estilo
description: Gustavo will try to take revenge for the betrayal of Luis and Edgar, obtaining help from the person he least expects. Two antagonistic cartels will work together so that the drug business continues in the same way.

name: El Cartel de los Zantos 2
description: Mario and Ángel Santos, trying to free their father from prison, openly declared war on the government. Many people have died on both sides. The special team must seek alliances in order to stop the deaths.

name: King Of Crystal
description: Mexican drug trafficker Ignacio Coronel Villarreal was one of the leaders of the Sinaloa cartel and one of the most wanted drug lords in Mexico, in addition to being Chapo s right-hand man

name: Shakur Stevenson vs. Jeremiah Nakathila
description: Shakur Stevenson gets a shutout unanimous decision victory over Jeremiah Nakathila to earn the WBO junior lightweight interim title

name: First Blast
description: In this modern action epic, the fate of humanity rests within Agent Rockets’ hands.

name: Katakata
description: Coerced to foil a terrorist plot against a children s school, two brothers must decide the value of character or risk losing their ultimate reward.

name: The Evil Within 2
description: Three years after the events at Beacon Mental Hospital, Sebastian Castellanos has left the Krimson City Police Department, but the mysterious organization MOBIUS gives him a chance to save his own thought-dead daughter.

name: Profit III
description: The power has gone into the wrong hands and its a race against time. Meanwhile the man behind it all is about to reveal himself...

name: Profit
description: In the broken streets of vermont south, 2 young men find a folder which belonged to a mysterious man...

name: Thomas And Friends 1945
description: Join Thomas, Allen, And Amber In An All-New Movie Adventure For The Whole Family! When Allen From America Comes To Sodor, He Soon Finds Out That The Island Is Under Attack! Now, Him, Thomas, And Their New Friend Amber Must Save The Island From The Nazi s Dreaded Bombs. So Join The Fun In This Heart-Pounding, Action-Adventure Movie, Thomas & Friends: 1945.

name: Buhay mo y buhay ko rin
description: Action star Bong Revilla Jr. and the charismatic Mikee Cojuangco star in this Pinoy cinema classic as an undercover cop and traffic enforcer who fall in love while they dismantle a crime syndicate.

name: Monster with a Movie Camera
description: A re-cut of the movie Hanuman and the 5 Kamen Riders spliced together with new Thai footage to create a meta "movie within a movie" narrative.

name: Way Darker Than You Think
description: n 2002, ex Pri-Meat worker Alan Smithee was sent to a psychiatric ward for his part in the Massacre at Two Moon Park occurring on Pri-Meat s land. Alan swore that he did the world a favor by killing "Zombies" while Pri Meat owner, Karl Atkins, issued a statement that they lost power, and a section of their mental patient ward escaped into the woods...where they were all brutally slain by Alan, and his Crew consisting of Paige (gun for hire) and Nick (the Brains). After 8 years Alan is released from a maximum security facility to the hands of a film director hell bent on making the ultimate zombie movie; asking Alan for authenticity to help re-tell the story. After learning that Alan is free, and a foiled attempt on her life, Paige enlists an old friend to help her uncover the 2 Moon Park mystery. Were they in fact zombies covered up by Pri Meat? And if so, how did this all come to fruition?

name: Escobar: Walang Sasantuhin
description: A 1995 Tagalog-language Action Drama film written by Tony Tacorda and directed by Efren C. Piñon and P. C. Sreeram and produced by S. Chandrahasan and Kamal Haasan under the banner of Raaj Kamal Films International.

name: Anak Ng Yakuza
description: A girl in search for her real parents fell into the hands of a notorious mobster whose leader and founder happens to be her real biological father.

name: Girls! Girls! Girls!
description: A showcase of six short films written, produced, shot, edited and directed by women.

name: Martel s Movie Madness The Movie Part One: The Beginning
description: Martel s Movie Madness The Movie Part One: The Beginning is a genre bending buddy comedy with elements of horror, and sci-fi, heavily influenced by the films produced by legends such as Lloyd Kaufman and Roger Corman. The film will follow Ryan and Cagney, cohost of a movie podcast as they try to watch a holy grail film they ve just received in the mail but in the process they get into shenanigans and misadventures along the way including run ins with a satanic cult, dealings with a crime boss, and a magical wizard, will they ever get to watch their movie?

name: Talos
description: King Talos mourns the loss of his family and struggles with dark dreams that threaten his sanity. A sinister plot to overtake his kingdom makes him an outcast and fugitive. Hunted by both soldier and bounty hunter he turns to his mentor Watoga who sends him on a perilous quest to regain his kingdom and rescue his only son from an evil influence.

name: Walang Matigas na Pulis sa Matinik na Misis
description: Bong Revilla plays Capt. Bartolome “Bart” Renaldo, a tough and honest cop but is very afraid of his wife Gloria (Lani Mercado), who resigned from being a cop to be a plain housewife. And although he is a loyal husband, Bart’s ex-girlfriend Mildred (Plinky Recto) tries so hard to win her back. And now, Bart has a bigger problem with Gloria.

name: Akasmika
description: A police officer investigates a prostitution racket.

name: Devin Haney vs. Jorge Linares
description: Devin Haney vs. Jorge Linares was a professional boxing match contested between WBC lightweight champion Devin Haney, and former three-division world champion Jorge Linares. The bout took place at the Michelob Ultra Arena in Las Vegas, Nevada, on May 29, 2021, with Haney s WBC title on the line.

name: The Last Heathen
description: The new and the old meet in a bloody battle on a plain in old Norway.

name: Remember Us
description: A man is stuck in a twisted, looped reality with his loved ones and has to figure out what is going on and how to protect himself and his family.

name: Optimum Capacity for Epicness
description: Young college student over their head attempts to take down a local mob.

name: War Is Hell
description: A young man has vivid dreams of participating in World War 2 battles, and enlists the help of a psychic friend when these past life memories begin appearing in reality

name: Mongrel & the Wrath of the Ape King
description: Mongrel, barbarian mercenary from Ul Imir, and his accomplice, Dennen, infiltrate a temple and encounter the dreaded Ape King.

name: Siembras Michoacanas
description: Starring Eleazar Garcia JR and Bernabe Melendrez.

name: La Cruz de la Marihuana
description: a film based off a corrido.

name: Armed Betties
description: Armed Betties follows two friends, Coco and Rayna, who are recruited into an all-female bodyguard company after helping thwart an attack on a mysterious woman. Together with their newfound team, they take on undercover security assignments using martial arts, and along the way, they discover what it means to stand in their own power.

name: Burgled
description: The perfect kung fu movie date is ruined when a Burglar steals the TV.

name: Multipass
description: Illegal races, Street challenge, incomparable characters - a portrait of the era. Nobody argues how fashionable it is now, good or bad, This is chaos, creativity, adrenaline. The speed and speed of reaction is the manner of a free artist, not constrained by any framework and obligations. The film was shot in the MTV style that is so popular among young people now. Mikhail and his team made an almost documentary film. Not a single take in the studio, everything was filmed only on the streets of Moscow in real extreme conditions, without official permission, without special letters. This is nonsense for the capital. Feel real freedom, forget about the constraints, about the conventions imposed by the metropolis. Only forward.

name: The Lone Rider
description: A cowboy takes on a gang of gold mine swindlers.

name: Latchkey
description: A group of acid-selling punk rockers suspect a small town conspiracy when a suicide chain is initiated at their local High School.

name: The Extraction
description: As the sun sets, a shady operation begins within the city. However, not everything is as it seems, and this operation has a caffeinated twist...

name: The Batmobile
description: A Batmobile dashed at 3km/hr.

name: 100 Balfour Road
description: A happy family in the suburbs of London enjoy an afternoon around the kitchen table when a knock is heard at the front door. A government official wants the family s help to assist a homeless family - but are they after more? The film puts on view the tragic fallouts of the Balfour Declaration (1917), in which the British Foreign Secretary Arthur Balfour signalled the go-ahead for the establishment of a Jewish State in Palestine.

name: Red Sands
description: A desert-set war drama by Ali Khamraev

name: Kill the Pushers
description: A film that stars Joseph Estrada, Pilar Pilapil and Rosemarie Gil based on Marcos  war on drugs.

name: Jose Ramirez vs Josh Taylor
description: José Ramírez vs. Josh Taylor, billed as Undisputed, is an professional boxing match contested between WBC and WBO champion, José Ramírez, and WBA (Super), IBF, and The Ring champion, Josh Taylor, with the winner set to become the undisputed light welterweight champion since Terence Crawford, in 2017 and the second in four-belt era. The bout took place on May 22, 2021, in Virgin Hotels Las Vegas, Paradise, Nevada.

name: Kalibre .45
description: The picture that SCREAMS with action.

name: The King
description: The King follows a group of heroes as they stop an evil king from taking over the world

name: Senile Dystopia
description: In a bleak future, a group of unlikely comrades do everything they can to ensure their survival while being hunted by an energy drink seeking titan.

name: The Big Thirst
description: One man s quest for a cup of water.

name: EPOCH
description: This is EPOCH, a coming-of-age tale of a troubled individual who is set on a path to battle his inner demons. Indulge in a physical manifestation of his warpath to redemption.

name: Rescue Brigade
description: A group of brigade members enter a building to save the victims of a disaster, as things get complicated they remember their training.

name: Elevation 404
description: An urban legend that follows the story of a hitchhiker and a driver that are stuck in loop of time.

name: 怒号する巨弾
description: At the end of the Greater East Asia War, young Amada Koichi and his father were wrongfully accused as spy suspects and his father died in prison after being tortured. Ten years later, Amada seeks for revenge on the three men responsible for his father death.

name: Project D: Classified
description: PROJECT D: CLASSIFIED concerns a top secret retrieval mission to the Moon which ends with the spacecraft crashing back to Earth. At that point, the search for the classified contents from the mission begins, bringing together an unlikely group of people: a quantum physics professor, an investigative reporter, Men in Black known as "The Silencers," a writer, a psychic medium - and an astronaut who is half-man, half-monster who goes on a killing spree looking for the missing contents. Time is running out for all of them, and for Earth, because the mysterious contents from the spacecraft are also being hunted by those from whom they were taken...the aliens themselves.

name: Good Melon
description: A young man s obsession with a summer fruit unleashes a powerful threat on the world and his confused friend must try and save the day.

name: Tranh & Nowak
description: An action comedy with two agents with elite fighting skills who are specialized in undercover operations: Tranh, a young intelligent, down-to-earth woman and Nowak, reckless and adventurous. This time, their mission is to recover stolen paintings from a neo-nazi esthete, Otto Von Schnitzel...

name: Nervous 2
description: Mini-movie featuring characters fom Versus (2000) and a sequel to Nervous (2004)

name: Nervous
description: mini-movie featuring characters from Versus (2000)

name: The Ethereal Plane
description: There exists another dimension you never knew was there...until now.

name: Katie Taylor vs. Natasha Jonas
description: Katie Taylor vs. Natasha Jonas boxing PPV match

name: Kolasmenes Psyches sta Dichtya tis Idonis
description: Tony Kouroglou responds to a job ad for working in a sea-side hotel. Hitchhiking his way to the hotel, he finds himself trapped in a murder case. He hastily disposes of the body and starts his new job. When he finds out that the people that framed him stay at the hotel, he becomes determined to expose them in order to keep himself out of jail.

name: Poker Face
description: Two guys face off in a game of poker -- who will take home the prize? The only thing is, the "prize" has different plans.

name: BKFC 17
description: Bare-knuckle fighting event by Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship held on April 30, 2021 at the Boutwell Memorial Auditorium in Birmingham, Alabama.  Main event: DILLON CLECKLER vs JOSH BURNS

name: Gunshot at 6 in the Morning
description: Six o clock in the morning was the time when Taiwan s executions of death row criminals was executed in the early years

name: Ace of Hearts: Lord of Hearts
description: Manzi David, a man whose sister s days are numbered with heart disease. Heartbroken and determined as ever to rally money for her treatment, Manzi David sets himself on a path of no return when he takes on two of the country s most notorious casino bosses in a lethal bet.

name: Spaghetti 8
description: Super 8 gunplay - explosive scratching, amazing stunts and fabulous outfits - experimental artgak at its finest!

name: Jane Blonde
description: This time tested action hero gets a queer overhaul when Secret Agent Jane Blonde is sent in to discover who is melting the snow in an attempt to thwart the 2010 Olympic Games in Vancouver. Will she get to the bottom of this devious plot before the games are aborted?

name: Bad Guy 3
description: Pearl and Bypola are at it again. At the height of their musical success this dynamic duo is finally turning a new leaf in life, then their world gets flipped upside down,Between dirty cops, kidnappings, shoot outs, and tags being on their heads; it s hard to believe that they re not the bad guys or the Baddest of the Bad. The final film in the Philly based trilogy.

name: Vigilante: The Crossing
description: Dexter Gooding (Kirk Brown), an ex-convict, deported from the US returns to his homeland to find his beloved community Bakers Village engulfed in crime. The police are out-gunned and out-numbered. Rape, murder and robbery plague his once beautiful paradise. Armed with guilt of past crimes and a genuine passion for his birthplace, Dexter takes on the mission of Vigilante. In true Robin Hood style, Dexter mercilessly seeks to eradicate Bakers Village of all criminals. Its on this very ruthless path, he meets Amy (Malissa Alana), a white Barbadian woman, who is on a similar mission and their worlds collide. Black and white, rich and poor, upper and lower class, and as the their paths cross...the historical cap of racial, class and social prejudice, violently erupts and suddenly threatens the mission. Love, hate, passion, guilt and prejudice all meet head on and Dexter and his beloved Bakers Village are now at a Crossroad.

A short film dedicated to old classics of south Indian films. Raju and Seema fall in love, but a twist in Dinesh (Raju s friend) life changes all their lives. A classic plot point explored and presented by many film makers back in those days.

name: The Gold Rush King
description: Swordsman Xu Tianxiong gets a message from dying gold miner Tao Jin Wang, then leads the confrontation against the treacherous gold store owner Ba Zhangui.

name: The Cocktail Party
description: A cocktail party turns into an unexpected martial arts action film.

name: killer limo
description: Swordfights and action-packed moves color this thrilling crime action film about a girl trying to get revenge on the criminal organization that killed her Thai father

name: Tsunami: Facing The Global Threat
description: It s one of the deadliest natural phenomena on the planet. Tsunamis are so sudden and powerful that in a matter of minutes, they can wipe out a coastline. They can happen all over the world. When energy builds up beneath Earth s surface, a series of huge waves can rise up to crush everything in their path. What can we do to get ready? How can we protect ourselves against this global threat?

name: Fish Heads
description: A gang of three is planning an heist with a professional criminal who has no trust in them.

name: The Poet of the Ring
description: Laura will make her boxing debut in Las Vegas, but she doesn t know what kind of opponent she will have to fight against.

name: Coffee Troubles
description: Chaos ensues when Red has a mishap at a coffee shop.

name: Deadly Assets
description: It’s all action when a hot blond is saved from the clutches of a crooked Texas lawman by a new stranger in town. The two find themselves embroiled in a chase that takes them across the border and the pursuit intensifies when the mob sticks their best hit man on the blond and her hero. Follow the action on this trail of gunfire, sex, and mayhem as you learn what a blond too hot for her own good does when she finds there’s only one way out.

name: Love of Woman
description: A lesson in love and a duel ‘til death set to Elizabethan music.

name: Pirate Baby s Cabana Battle Street Fight 2006
description: Two young men have to battle monsters, freaks and many other horrors inside a building to rescue their friend from the evil Pirate Baby.

name: Dante s Shot
description: Two childhood best friends, Joshua and Carlo, auditions in an indie film. It’s their dream to be actions stars like their idols in the Philippine Cinema. But as Joshua finds a way to achieve their goals, Carlo suddenly changes his mind because of the things he didn’t expect.

name: Stank Chronicles 3
description: Stank Chronicles 3 takes place after Stank Chronicles and follows an investigation into the death of an enemy.

name: Bite
description: Nish  is a noir-esque film brimming with atmosphere - telling the story of a policeman who discovers his family brutally murdered. The mafia are responsible for this monstrous act, ...

name: The Milkman Returns
description: The debut feature film from Will Harwell, released for free on his YouTube channel.

name: Falling Sparrow
description: A young woman sets out to take her family s sword back from her murderous uncle.

name: Dinosaurs of the Twentieth Century
description: Returning to his native village, a demobilized paratrooper learns that his brother has become a victim of a drug mafia. He decides to avenge his death and goes to the city...

name: Bibleman: Defeating the Shadow of Doubt
description: While under the spell of the sinister Shadow of Doubt, Kayla begins to doubt God s interests in her problems. And when Bibleman and his trusted friend Coats come to her aid, the cunning Shadow targets Bibleman as his next victim. Both Bibleman and Kayla learn a lesson in relying on the truths in God s Word.

name: Get the Boss
description: A soldier must fight his way through a robot army in order to defeat his ultimate enemy, a super scientist known as "The Boss."

name: Feifei
description: During the war against the Japanese, a white horse named Feifei steers away a enemy raiding teams to save its wounded master.

name: Granny: House of Fire
description: When Chase comes home and finds his family missing, he learns the true meaning of family.

name: Steel Spirit
description: This 90-minute, emotionally charged epic will have you asking yourself, “Who would I trust?” as Dallas McQuaid (Steven J. Pershing) struggles to stay alive after a five million-dollar bounty is placed on his head. While being hunted by every lowlife bounty hunter looking for beer money, McQuaid searches for friends among foes. Reunited with his best friend, Jack O Donnell (Brian Papakie); ex-wife, Jennifer (Jennifer Rockelmann); and his old friend, Detective John Coleman (Stephen Pagano), McQuaid quickly discovers that sometimes loyalty is purely superficial.

name: Waiting For The End
description: A man named Holden Lane is searching through his parents basement and discovers secrets that could change his life.

name: The Ringing of a Bell
description: Wonyong and Yeonsil are in love with each other. The gangster Gyeong-seon also has a crush on Yeon-sil, but one day, a fight breaks out between Won-yong and Gyeong-seon. When Won-yong is in danger, Yeon-sil blocks his body and gets hit by a knife. She walks down the snowy hill, weeping as she embraces the body of Yeon-sil.

name: Los más ojetes y cabrones de la sierra
A Policeman Hyung-Lae and Trio of Insects
description: Sol-i and Song-i head to Hanyang with the blueprint for a canvas invented by their father. On the way, he meets bandits and gets into trouble, but Baek Du-geon appears and defeats the bandits and saves Sol-i and Song-i. Sol-i and Song-i arrive in Hanyang and hand over a canvas and blueprint to Hong Cham-pan, and Baek Du-gun and the three musketeers become pozzols, causing a commotion. Hong Cham-pan, who was handed the blueprint, works with the grape master and tries to sell the blueprint to a Japanese spy (Miyamoto).

name: Bondage Television
description: A prototype for a specialty channel dedicated exclusively to bondage. BTV takes us on a sexy ride through B-action movies and Hollywood blockbusters to celebrate the joy of being all tied up.

name: Sailor Half-Breed
description: In Sailor Half-Breed the narrator flies like a super-heroine through a landscape of difference, investigating the nature of half-and-half-ness.

name: Герои 2: Турнир Скорпиона
description: Appearing in the finale of the first part, Scorpio intends to raise an army against our heroes. In search of the lost part of his amulet, Scorpio arranges a tournament.  Our heroes answer the challenge. Intensive training begins. Will the heroes be able to reach their enemy? Will they be able to win in the battle with Scorpio and his team?

name: Герои. Битва за кубок
description: Who of the guys did not dream of becoming one of the heroes of famous movies or computer games as a child? I remember, as if it were yesterday, how my friends and I played out epic battles between the forces of good and evil. With shouts of "I am Sub-zero", "And I am Jean-Claude Van Damme", we imagined ourselves as these heroes.  Unfortunately, in the evening we again became ordinary Vanya or Kolya, and years later Ivan and Nikolayev. But with the characters of this film, something happened that we all dreamed of as children. All of them are ordinary village guys, but once a year, when summer comes, it s time to become real superboy Heroes.

name: A Soldier of Fortune
description: Na Woon-gyu plays the role of Nicolai Park, a veteran of the Russian army, who has returned to Korea from European battlefields. Broke, hungry, and unable to find employment, he is taken in as a boarder by Kim Chang-ho. Chang-ho s friend, Cha-duk becomes romantically involved with Hae-ok, who had sold herself to support her parents. Cha-duk s wife, Yeong-ja becomes involved with Nicolai, who rejects her proposal to run away with him. The romantic complications spiral until Yeong-ja kills Cha-duk. The film ends with Nicolai departing for destinations unknown while the other boarders bid him farewell.

name: Masud Rana
description: Masud Rana faces the consequences of disrupting the result of a fight rigged by a powerful businessman.

name: Super Dyke: The Movie
description: A young woman struggles with her own identity in relation to the accepted norms of the lesbian community in this witty piece about personal choice and sexy black boots.

name: Melvin $
description: Rev. Melvin seeks justice to whoever stole his identity.

name: Die Ausreißer
description: After two bank robbers pull off a heist, they are encountered with an alien. They now must deliver that alien back to his home planet, as they are being chased by 2 secret government agents.

name: Crammers
description: In this high school satire of classic gangster movies, using NERF guns instead of real guns, Brody Siegel is faced with paying off his debts to save himself.

name: Nancy Boy vs. Manly Woman
description: Silly, outrageous and truly queer, this freaky comic book comes to life introducing the world to Nancy Boy, a spandex wearing superhero and his campy battles against his Eurotrash enemies.

name: Friday The 17th
description: Who died best? And who is Shane Barbara? A surfing horror film.

name: The Blackmist Group
description: The Blackmist Group

name: Jane Rambo
description: Jane Rambo is sent on a rescue mission. However, she soon learns that her commander cannot be trusted.

name: Outlaw
description: Dad Mohammad joins the other villagers trying to migrate to the city. Due to a drought, he can not afford to pay his annul fee to the lord so he has to leave his lands behind. According to an advice from Seyed (a teacher who is exiled to their village), Dad Mohammad changes his mind and remains in the village to protest against the cruelty of the lord...

name: MAKING OF SHIROYASHA
description: A behind the scenes documentary of Kenji Onishi s never completed 35mm feature film "Shiroyasha", shot between 2002 and 2004.

name: Meant to Be Broken
description: Harvey has led a cautious and conscientious life until he gets fired and finds out he has one month to live. Throwing caution to the wind, he meets Luke at a bar and confesses he s never broken any rules. Luke responds "Do you want to?," and so the quest begins. Along the way, they accidentally kidnap a woman who joins them on their adventure, but she might prove to be more trouble than they are looking for. "Meant to be Broken" is a crazy journey of law breaking and discovery that culminates in Miami where competing forces catch up to the unlikely trio.

name: In Black Darkness
description: The only daughter of the father runs away from the house in love with someone and the father dies, the daughter goes to find her father and goes home.

name: Murong Knight
description: Thousands of years later, in the 21st century, the righteous Murong family descendants moved to the earth and guarded this homeland. Soon, in the detective agency that they opened, they received unbelievable cases in succession, and the victims had their blood taken away and looked like skeletons. After careful comparison, Murongxue, Murongxia and grandmother infer that it was the remnant left by INFERNO ten thousand years ago, and it is very likely that they are planning something for the crystal stone. Everyone decided to hide the crystal stone first, and split up with friends Zimo and Slow, who are also superpowers, to investigate the ins and outs of the case.

name: Yo no soy un asesino
description: mexican movie.

name: Foriegn scotch
description: Foriegn scotch is indian kannada language movie Directed by Ravi

name: Balada Dua Jagoan
description: At his teacher’s urging, Lie studies martial arts under Saleh, together with another student, Rachmat. Lie awakens the competitive spirit in Taufik, one of the best fighters in the village, who challenges him to a friendly spar. But Taufik loses and then starts training again. So more fights are organised which becomes the main plot of the film.

name: The Terrible Adventure
description: When tasked with taking  action  by an elementary teacher as a summer project, two affluent and spoiled siblings face their Dad s bankruptcy and parents  divorce by attempting to win the most complicated contest of all time.

name: ninety-nine
description: Farley, a die hard wrestling fan needs to win back his backyard wrestling championship from his arch rival Nick.

name: Blade Brigade
description: Blades has to defeat his ex rival Ajax for the last and final time or pay the consequences.

name: Jack Nicolson
description: Short film directed by Mitsuyuki Ishibashi set to the song Jack Nicholson by Japanese rock band Bloodthirsty Butchers.

name: KNOCK OUT The REBORN
description: Muay Thai: Eisaku Ogasawara vs. Kyosuke Yasuda  Muay Thai: Haruto Yasumoto vs. Phetsila Furumura Gym  Kickboxing: Ryusei Kumagai vs. Takeru Owaki  Muay Thai: Issei Saenchai Gym vs. Hikaru Furumura  Kickboxing: Shintaro Matsukura vs. Kohei Tokeshi  Kickboxing: Hijiri Tamura vs. Tomoki Yoshino  Kickboxing: Keijiro Miyakoshi vs. Yuki Yoza  Kickboxing: Chihiro Suzuki vs. Masaya Kubo

name: Konan The Barbarian Swordsman
description: An IFD cut and paste movie, mostly made from the Korean action film Muin/The Warrior. Synopsis on the box is: “Due to frequent attacks of Mongolian soldiers, the people of Koryo Kingdo, including Yu-seong’s family are under much suffering. You-seong heads for Mongolia in search of Yong Tae-san, the enemy who had destroyed his family and kidnapped his betrothed Su-ruin.”

name: Tatooreh
description: Gorgo saves a drunk American from the sea and takes him back to his home where he lives with his wife. The drunk American, Rep, tries to rape Gorgo s wife after he gets sober and thus is thrown out of the house and beat up. Gorgo is bankrupt now and has to work in a Road Construction company, where Rep also works as one of the main engineers. The story goes on with a series of unfortunate events consisting of death and rebellion and false accusations...

name: Monkey King
description: Sun Wukong was hit by the demon s successor, Huang Mi, who was confined while losing all of his magic power. Old monster Hoang Mi built a mighty army, set up the mortal arena, used mud to create Luc Nhi My Hau to replace the real Sun Wukong. Sun Wukong fell into despair and fell into despair. A person used to fighting alone is forced to ally with youkai to save himself. After one failure after another, he realized the true meaning of the two words "Great Saint".

name: The Witch & the Woodsman
description: A woodsman must rescue his young daughter from an evil witch.

name: Fruits of Labor
description: A failing street fruit vendor finds himself at odds with a thief looking to start the same business illegitimately.

name: Bad Business
description: In a small town in an unknown location, two criminal organizations share their territory. The bosses "Mango Red" and "Sean Mason" don t particularly like each other, but they don t get in each other s way when it comes to business.  -However, in the last few weeks several small fish working for Red have been killed and it seems to be Mason s handwriting. When they meet, the two become enemies and a bloody gang war begins. The bosses  professional killers cause great damage to the other organization. The gangs weaken each other and fight to the death, but there is actually a very nasty plan behind it by a corrupt cop and one of Mason s killers and the pimp Victor Vortec still has a huge bone to pick with Red s gang...

name: Hell or Tidewater
description: Set in the near future, Hell, or Tidewater is a thrill a minute underwater submarine action/sci-fi film told through the eyes of Lt. Cmdr. Allan Parker, a 40 something Sea Dog with a chip on his shoulder. The action surrounds the controversial Canadian energy industry and their longing to bring a pipeline to Tidewater.

name: Alien Theory
description: When a man whose company wipes his memory every night discovers what he really does for a living, his worst theories are revealed to be true.

name: Remnants of Dog
description: Legendary hit-man Henry  Big Dog  Douglas is considering a change of career, but the local Russian mafia have their own plans for him...

name: Anaganaga Oka Rowdy
description: Anaganaga Oka Rowdy  is the title of one of the upcoming movies featuring Sumanth in the lead.

name: Agent Mambo: True Pac
description: Dyulus and Afonya are ordinary country guys who love rap and cool cars. During the day they work in the boiler room, in the evenings they record their album and every day they dream of a better life. Especially Afonya, nicknamed Appos, who dreams of dumping into the city, believing that real life is passing by. His comrade Dyulus, nicknamed Trupak, on the contrary, is not eager to leave his native village. But one day, Dyulus receives a letter that radically changes his life and makes him leave for the city, towards fate...

name: I Need You, Brother
description: A boy helps his friend take revenge on the his rich classmate who used to bully him.

name: Corpse Slayers 2: Spooky Emperor Zhu
description: The ‘Corpse Slayers’ Chinese Vampire series was thought to be all lost. However, recently a short excerpt from the second film of the trilogy has been recovered and remastered for a Western audience.

name: Handa Na Ang Hukay Mo, Calida
Moises Arcanhel: Sa Guhit Ng Bala
description: When an unknown assassin kills off all of his family, Moises (Eddie Garcia) a retired military man is forced to get back into action as the governor s bodyguard in this hard action thriller. Philippines Tagalog movie.

name: The Hero
description: A young man with a troubled past puts on the mask and sets out to clean up the drug underworld in Molde, Norway.

name: La Capital
description: Behold a thrilling tale of action, mystery, and romance! When tragedy strikes for two lovers, a detective must examine the crime in order to capture the villainous culprits. Join us for a novella like no other, where love is everlasting, even if life itself may not be.

name: We Made a Serious Film
description: A historical short film, crosses the genres of action, horror, mystery, thriller, comedy, giallo, Italian mob, psychedelic & cultism. Follows a Smegma the Cowboy, Steve from Minecraft, Knifey McKnifeface, A Screaming E-Boy & A Guy with a Knife.

name: The Redneg
description: It takes place in a near future, in a fallen world after a devastating world war between woman and man. Only one percent of the world s population has survived the war and most of them are women. The few surviving men are being killed or captured by female groups, driven by the vision and the determination to build a new world, ruled only by women.

name: Project A
description: In this comedy, action, and suspense-filled adventure, an unstable detective travels far and wide to solve a case that goes even more in depth than what he had signed up for in the first place.

name: Dark Afternoon
description: A battle between two opposites. Who will be victorious?

name: Diary of a Camper
description: Set during a team deathmatch game, a team of players find themselves up against an enemy camper. Considered to be the first known example of a Machinima film

name: The Story of a Luckyman
description: Heshmati happens to find a golden statue while digging a well. He reckons that he s blessed forever and takes the statue to his apartment. Once it enters the apartment, the personality of the residents is changed, and a severe struggle to seize the statue begins.

name: The Good Samaritan
description: A stop motion film based on the biblical parable about the good Samaritan.

name: Bro: Kahit Saan Engkwentro
description: Father and Son Military Sgt. Delfin Mijares and Lt. Del Mijares work on a mission against the biggest and most dangerous crime lord, Simon Ovarte called Ang Patron.

name: Shao Lin Shi Zhi De Bao Chuan Qi
description: Shi Zhi De Bao is an innkeeper who has no lice, and every day, together with his brothers and sisters, I pretend to be a general to save people to lead guests to my station. Unfortunately one day the drama was exposed, an old monk hindered his business. Not only that, the second history of Linh Chau, Ha Kieu, killed the mandarin and then blamed De Bao for his treasure treasure. One night, De Bao became a wanted criminal, his son lost his life, because in revenge, De Bao followed the monk to learn martial arts. From here opens a thrilling journey of enlightenment.

name: Talahib at Rosas
description: An heiress is abducted by rebels in the United States. Jacob, an experienced tracker serving his time in prison, is hired for the rescue mission in exchange for his freedom.

name: Compact
description: A brawl ensues when a man is ambushed in a parking complex.

name: Bad President - Kenya
description: In an alternate timeline Arizona State alumni William “Billy” Coltran was the president of the USA. Billy was in Africa catching up with some old business colleagues.

name: The Watch
description: A watch allows a man to move back in time ten seconds.

name: SWOG
description: TURN YOUR VOLUME UP (some parts are quiet)  You have been waiting for it, and it may not be much, but hey, who didn t want to see random explosions and chaos in every direction? I certainly did, so please, kick back, relax, and enjoy Swog, like I said, it may not be much but we hope you enjoy our humble little project!

name: Cheppina Evaru Nammaru
description: Three friends who can t face their small problems in their lives will go in search of new lives.From there situations take turns and gets involved in many crimes.How will they prove their innocence is there mining story.

name: Safe Escape
description: A robber tries to evade the police with his recently stolen safe.

name: The Dentist
description: A down-on-his-luck dentist of the Wild West is held up by a gunslinging crook, or so it seems.

name: Twin Detective
description: In the eyes of the world, Sun Xiaohu is missing. In reality, he s a wandering spirit that can only appear to and interact with his twin brother, Sun Xiaotu. With his brother s help, Sun Xiaotu joins the police force in order to find out what really happened to his brother, but they soon discover they re just one part in a much bigger plot.

name: Oh, Brother
description: Two brothers adventuring life as pong masters and pog fanatics come face to face with competitors equal in skill and style. The brothers must fend for themselves through love and war in unexpected places.

name: Minushi
