description: Minushi is an epic story of the human spirit thrust into an unforgiving world of wicked villains, harsh landscapes and fiery conflicts. From within a city under martial law Trixi, an orphan, sets off on a journey to find the only family she s ever known; her older brother, Griffin. Joining her on the adventure is her faint-hearted best-friend, Khal, who turns out to have a secret that brings with it a world of trouble for the pair. Ahead of them lies a war zone fraught with menacing bandits, lumbering giants and an army bent on capturing them dead or alive. At their heels stalks the nefarious, black-cloaked Mr. Tinker and his band of robot goons. During their odyssey, Trixi and Khal not only evade loathsome foes and overcome hardships but they come to realize important values such as friendship, courage and hope.  —Tyler Gibb

name: Grave Digger The Video
description: Learn about the most feared machine in all of monster truck racing Dennis Anderson s Grave Digger. In this video you will learn the history of the Grave Digger, see what makes the Grave Digger the amazing machine it is, meet the people who have made the Grave Digger the most popular truck in the world. Also see footage of the Grave Digger in awesome side by side monster truck racing.

name: Survival of a Dragon
description: A warrior is transported 1,000 years into the present day and must fend for his life while adapting to modern society

name: Ginto’t Pilak
description: Director: Romy Suzara Stars: Rudy Fernandez, Rosanna Roces, Bong Villafuerte

name: Alyas Big Time
description: Director: Pong Mercado Writer: Joven Tan (story and screenplay) Stars: Zoren Legaspi, Ana Capri, Via Veloso

name: Buburahin Kita Sa Mundo!
description: Director: Joey Del Rosario Writers: Efren Esteban (story), Henry Nadong (screenplay) Stars: Richard Gomez, Maricel Laxa, Michael De Mesa

name: A Kid s Flick
description: Coming from the heart of the Belarusian Rebellion, an intimate portrait of a young woman leading a double life. When her regular self enters emotional turmoil amid self-isolation, her seifuku-wearing magical witch alter ego is keeping the fighting spirit ablaze.

name: Reporter Robinhood Reporting
description: Story of 2 Reporters trapped in the corrupt system during the De-Monetisation period View more at: https://www.hungama.com/movie/2016-reporter-robinhood-reporting/62166602/

name: Eksperto: Ako Ang Sasagupa!
description: Director: William Mayo Stars: Jeric Raval, Sharla Tolentino, Ramon Zamora

name: Cara y Cruz: Walang Sinasanto!
description: Berting (Raymart Santiago) is an escaped convict. Boggart (Dennis Padilla) is a cab driver whom he took hostage when he bolted out from jail. The two of them landed in a primitive island where all of the inhabitants were under the control of a religious cult.

name: Warren Balane
description: A TRUE-TO-LIFE STORY - THE FIRST FILIPINO WHOSE CRIME TERRIFIED NOT ONLY THE WHOLE NATION, BUT THROUGHOUT THE WORLD!. EVEN THE CRACK COMMANDO AND THE SWAT COULD HARDLY STOP HIM. AN ACTION-FILLED MOMENT IN CRIME HISTORY.

name: Initiation 21
description: MMA fighter wakes up to find blood and his fiancée missing, told he s been poisoned and has 72 hours to find the antidote.

name: Written On A Sugar High
description: In the year 201X, Blade Johnson (James Altschul) wakes up and can’t remember anything except his name and how to kill people. All of a sudden, a mysterious corporation, lead by The Boss (Matthew Huh) and The General (Zachary Paulsen), wants him dead! Now, it’s up to Blade and his new friends, Tom (Robert Morin), Sydney (Madison Wilson), Dan (Michael Litman), and Johnny (Ian Lu), to take down the corporation and figure out what’s going on.

name: Charley Out West
description: Animated Charlie Chaplin encounters several obstacles on the way to rescuing a distressed damsel held as captive by indigenous Indians.

name: Magtago Ka O Lumaban
description: Tagalog-language Action film

name: Diligin Man Ng Dugo
description: Anthony Alonzo is an idealistic army captain who believes in the government’s reform programs for the people of Mindanao.

name: S E R E N I T Y 2
description: After the death of presidential candidate, Bernie Sanders, a rogue gunman travels to Los Angeles to follow the instructions of Sanders  digital ghost to execute Joe Biden in the computer simulation they live in.

name: Dog Days
description: A shoot out ensues when a criminal is revealed to be an undercover cop.

name: The Wandering Dragon
description: A wealthy kung fu man with exceptional martial arts skills wanders the land fighting for justice.

name: Mabuhay Ka Sa Baril
description: It’s just a matter of survival. He didn’t like it at first, then he gets used to it until he woke up one morning in a maze. There is no way out and he does not have any choice but to use the gun on his hand. Dario/David (Rudy Fernandez), is just a victim, trapped under the name of survival and was hired to kill to lengthen his and his loved one’s life.

name: LeSeurdmin
description: A man becomes an unwitting superhero after a drunken night leads him on a quest to save his love, his life, and his species from a murderous barbecue enthusiast.

name: The Saga of Ashwatthama Continues
description: Upcoming Kannada Action Packed Spy Thriller Movie starring Shivarajkumar

name: Loaded Monday
description: An intense ride of shootouts, betrayals, and murder when two detectives hunt down a corrupt politician and cop killer in Arizona. True to form, Beau Yotty uses classic 1980s action films and cop thrillers as inspiration for Loaded Monday.

name: Stand Off
description: When a biochemical weapon goes wrong and leaks into the local water systems, four strangers must work together in order to survive the zombie apocalypse. As they begin to uncover new information regarding the virus, the infected begin to grow stronger, faster, smarter, and larger in numbers.

name: Death In The Rain
description: Balaash wants revenge on his accomplices who betrayed him...

name: Shotgun Banjo
description: Shotgun Banjo is a 1992 Philippine action film starring Zoren Legaspi and Ruffa Gutierrez. Cast[edit]. Ruffa Gutierrez portrays Kara, the love interest of Banjo.

name: Der Herr der Floppy Disc 2 - Bluten und Looten
Kasangga mo ako sa huling laban
Blow the Horns
description: Engineer Dukalsky arrives from Moscow on the instructions of an underground anti-Soviet center to the Baltic Shipyard in order to take possession of the blueprints of a powerful ship engine. The pest meets the author of the project - a young and incorruptible self-taught master Ivanov. After a series of unsuccessful attempts to buy out or steal the drawings from the author, Dukalsky decides to take Ivanov with him. Criminal Investigation Officers will attack the trail of criminals.

name: The Slug Destroyer
description: A strange commercial that a television station picked up a few years back. It follows a man imploring you to purchase a novelty device known as "The Slug Destroyer."

name: Sige, Subukan Mo
description: Caught in the evil schemes of a politician, David decides that loyalty to an evil boss is not the way to go. His decision to break away leads him to Panyang, another victim of Cong. Leon Manalo.

name: Stygge jakker og hvor de er å finne
The Grassening part 2
description: A man is kidnapped and held hostage because of his weed

name: Double
description: As in a classic detective action movie, this story begins with a kidnapping. A criminal plan came to the mind of a hired dance teacher - to kidnap his pupil Tim for a considerable ransom. However, he himself is not capable of such risky actions, so he is forced to look for perpetrators. And he found them: Stas with PTSD and a soft-spoken Victor who had just been kicked out of the house by his wife. At first, everything went pretty smoothly. Until the kidnappers learned that the boy was in no hurry to return to his "golden cage". And that he has no friends other than his kidnappers.

name: Story of Ming City Wall
description: In order to benefit the people, the wealthy Shen Fu of the Ming Dynasty paid for the construction of the city wall. Unexpectedly, during the construction process, the river demon rampantly destroyed the city wall under construction, and the people were panicked for a while. To appease the people, the emperor ordered Shen Fu to offer the heirloom pot of treasures to suppress the evil spirits, and was given a three-day deadline to order Shen Fu and Li Han Yang, the left minister of the Ministry of Works, to repair the city wall. The river demon is still going around, and Shen Fu investigates with his companions to discover that there is something else going on. What is the secret behind it? While fighting the monster, how can Shen Fu solve the case within the three-day deadline?

name: Revenge of the Iron-Fist Maiden
description: A mountain girl sets out to avenge her murdered father.

name: Germinated
description: Period spy movie inspired by the SNH48 song of the same name.

name: Rambú III: O Rapto do Jaraqui Dourado
Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship 14
description: Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship 14: Palomino vs. Alers was a bare-knuckle fighting event held by Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship on November 13, 2020 at the InterContinental Miami in Miami, FL, USA.

name: Glitch: Tersesat Dalam Waktu
description: Right before tsunami happen in Indonesia, there was a time glitch in various parts of the world, including in Jakarta. At that time, three friends who back to Cibubur, West Java suddenly moved to Bukittinggi, West Sumatra.

name: Semblance
description: The Man With The Gun is an assassin within a small gang on the North Side. While he is good at what he does, it is evident he feels guilty about what he does for a living. Religion is a way for him to justify it, yet he doesn t know how or why. X, the gang leader, tasks him with finding a rat within the gang. With this, he starts to investigate others. In turn, investigating who he is as a person.

name: Rec Man
description: A Recreation Instructor fights to keep a recreation center open from budget cuts and a notorious street gang, but he doesn t realize something far more sinister is at work.

name: Spy Catcher
description: Natasha finds out that her handler has gone back to Russia and she decides to to follow him. She begins a journey of self discovery into her past, trying to discover what happened to him.

name: Mad Martha: Church Warrior
description: A B-movie horror-comedy set in a post-apocalyptic world, where two vampires decide to rob a blood drive and end up meeting their maker.

name: Taylor & Barinov 2
description: Liverpool s most beloved cops reunite in order to take down the city s most notorious toilet roll dealer.

name: Mancoro
description: Mas Bejo, who was too much in arrears, was taken hostage by a cruel debt collector. When about to be tortured, Mancoro appears as a savior.

name: Domio Instano
description: In a country that worships instant noodles, no one is allowed to cook instant noodles outside of what has been determined by the sect. You can’t even cook using methods other than what has been outlined in the packaging. Then came a challenger, bringing new flavors and new ways of cooking.

name: Candi Wars: The Force Awakens
description: A new order threatens to destroy the New Republic. Finn, Rey and Poe, backed by the Resista-- Oh wait! this isn t Star Wars movie.

name: Wala Nang Iibigin Pang Iba
description: Sarah, an archaeologist and museum curator, is good at recovering and restoring treasures. One day, a very important treasure map is stolen from the museum, but the map is in Latin and the guys who seized it cannot read it.

name: Chronicles of the Five Tribes: Trial by Fire
description: While being chased by a group of bandits, a hunter is born through the trials of the great expanse.

name: Jason Charger 3
description: After years on the run Jason Charger is back to settle the score

name: Life and Death
description: Deputy captain of the anti-narcotics brigade Tang Lang and the female special police captainYue Xiaofeng  are two public security police who are working together on the front line of life and death.

name: Den of Monsters
description: A girl with kongfu team got into den of monsters to save her brother.

name: Unbong
description: A movie set in a school notorious for violence about students continuously fighting with each other to become the number one fighter.

name: Conwy 6
description: 2057. Welsh resistance troop Conwy 6 is on a mission to take an English weapons base in an ongoing civil war. Nia watches her sister and leader, Gwen, descent into immorality by the loss of their younger brother and a need to complete the mission in order for his death to mean something.

name: Au cœur de l opération Barkhane
Spy Acaddemi
description: Cassie Cage, renowned female spy, makes a fatal mistake on an important mission and loses her job. She decides to join a local spy academy before realizing it s simply a children s program. As numerous child abductions begin to arise, Cassie and fellow Spy Acaddemi classmate, Jimmy Kirkland, must take matters into their own hands.

name: Revenge of Domino Mask the Movie
description: Can the indomitable and unfortunate hero "Domino Mask" protect the world from the hands of the Dark Demon King and his sister? A romantic action movie sent in collaboration with professional wrestlers, idols, and musicians.

name: Bail Up! The Bushranger on Australia s Silent Screen (1906-1928)
description: A collection of early Australian films about bushrangers, compiled by Australia s National Film and Sound Archive.  Films are: [unknown] (1906), The Story of the Kelly Gang (1906), The Story of the Kelly Gang (1910), Thunderbolt (1910), Trooper Campbell (1914), The Kelly Gang (1920), Robbery Under Arms (1920),  When The Kellys Were Out (1923), and Trooper O Brien (1928).

name: Hunt
description: A truck is moving from the south to Tehran. On the way, during an accident, a fugitive passenger secretly gets into the truck...

name: The Sphere of the Lycanthrope
description: John Hammond (David Stay -“Photon”, “Dahmer vs Gacy”, “Tres Caminos”)  is a high school professor transferred to another school for delving into some dark  practices. Upon arriving at Meckalecha High, he finds it is terrorized by a nasty  gang of thugs led by Calvin Cooks (Aronne Baietti), best known as the Devil.  After his back is against the wall and he realizes no one will take a stand against  them, John Hammond the mild-mannered professor swallows the Sphere,  transforms into a ravishing beast and takes on the punks in a bloody rampage.

name: The Time of the Turning
description: Now that the 3 suns have aligned and the last surviving race of Syentees has died it is up to the Eneber priests to bring back magic to the land of Sablewood.

name: The World Is Enough
description: When a russian terrorist emerges with a sinister plot to destroy the world, it is up to the one and only Bond James to stop him.

name: En Garde!
description: A story of a young fencer on his way to manhood, wrestling with fears and a feeling of guilt, after the loss of an important adult.

name: Knife Fight!!
description: Stranded in a foreign land, Barbara the Impenetrable has been isolated from her army. It is two days until the invasion and she must return to Aisengall to lead a defense against The Swarm. However, there is a price on her head and she is nowhere near the border of her country.

name: Three Peaks & In Between
description: „Three Peaks & In Between“ tells the story of Jana and the Bicycle race of her life.

name: Illkillya!
description: A kung fu spoof film from Yorkshire

name: Antar and Abla
description: The series portrays the life of knight and poet Antarah ibn Shaddad whose father refused to acknowledge him as a legitimate son. Antarah falls in love with his cousin Ablah, but he couldn t dream to marry her due to their different positions and her father s wish to wed her to a wealthy man.

name: Leon jumps in the Liffey for 50 euro
description: Dublin youth leon faces the ordeal of his life where he is challenged to jump into the liffey in a life or death thriller that will leave you on the edge of your seat asking for more

name: Dimensions Prime
description: Youtube series by Franklin Clegg about two brothers who find a machine that allows them to travel to multiple dimensions.

name: Satan Stole Our Hot Dogs!
description: After Satan has stolen all of the worlds hot dogs, two agents has to go down in Hell and kill Satan.

name: Outbreak
description: A coming-of-age story about three teenage boys, wandering aimlessly in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, who set out on a perilous journey to find a young boy who may or may not be in danger.

name: Fatahillah
description: Disappointed after seeing his homeland, Pasai, destroyed by the Portuguese, Fadhilah Khan, later known as Fatahillah or Fala Tehan, completes his education in the Holy Land, then joins Sultan Trenggono who rules the Sultanate of Demak. He gains a respectable position as a cleric, then marries the sister of the Emperor, Ratu Pembayun, and Ratu Ayu, the widow of Pati Unus, who died in the battle against the Portuguese in Malacca. The Portuguese want to establish a fort at Sunda Kelapa. But the Sultanate of Demak is determined to wage a war against the Portuguese. Fatahillah is elected as the commanding officer, and he conquers Sunda Kelapa, and changes its name to Jayakarta, which later became Jakarta.

name: Thiccy Thugz
description: Two frendoids try to outrun a po po who is after them after they broke into an asylum. During their daring escape, they will cross a rickety rackety ol  britch and wonder off down yonder into the forest. Be shook!

name: Altered
description: The decision between good or evil determines how far one must go for isolation.

name: Saetta più forte di Sherlock Holmes
Stickman
description: Man doodling

name: Brothers in Arms
description: A man returns to his home after years of absence, and receives a less than cordial welcome from his brother.

name: The Inventor
description: A man dedicates his life towards his invention.

name: Good Medicine
description: Filmed on the Wind River Reservation in Wyoming, Good Medicine is a short film looking at how the youth and elders of the Shoshone and Arapaho Tribes find peace and healing through skateboarding and traditions.

name: SPIKE
description: "SPIKE" tells the story of a down and dirty private eye who seems to have bitten off more than he can chew!

name: A Batguy Christmas
description: Batguy, an aging superhero, struggles to take down a new villain, The Seven. As The Seven tries to take a young boy for nefarious purposes, Batguy’s abilities are put to the test as he fights celebrities, random goons and his own mortality.

name: Terrorist Destruction
description: Garth Michaels  world is changed forever as Tgana Te Laden takes over the United States. Together, he and the Harley siblings try to survive in their new reality facing danger, loss, and destruction.

name: Second Chance vs Magnum Force
description: An infomercial for kevlar body armor interspersed with gun demonstrations, re-enactments of police shooting incidents and comedic sketches.

name: The Last Assignment
description: When a government assassin is asked to do one last hit before retiring for good, he finds himself befriending the target and falling in love with the target s wife and sister.

name: The Last Maniac
description: An inside look at an urban nightmare! All hell breaks loose when neckface hits the pipe and hits the streets! If you get in his way- he ll have to kill you!  He s the last maniac!!!

name: Culebra, en el ojete del huracán
A wondrous army
description: A movie about life of a solder, can t explain more than that.

name: A Day Somewhere in Athens
description: Football games, fights between mosters and explosions, everything that happens in a normal day in Athens.

name: Why is the red mullet red?
description: A film that tries to analyse a very big question, why is the red mullet red. A violent, action packed film, set in the bottoms of the sea.

name: The War of the Frames
description: This film is based on a self-published comic by Peter Looles. The basic idea of the movie is that the characters within a comic page can penetrate each panel and interact with each other, so they go to war. The first official screening of the film was at the 2015 Camera Zizanio film festival.

name: Secret Imperial Edict
description: Our story derives from the period 1644, when the Ming dynasty was threatened with destruction. This forced the emperor to issued a new decree by which the prince and heir to the throne has to leave territory due to threat placed on their lives. Chong Zen punished escape persecution in Nanjing. This course takes the emperor, in the hope that one day the prince would return and take his rightful place on the throne. In the meantime empire and dynasty face complete destruction. On all sides they bid to mercilessly destroy all enemies that comes to hand.

name: Operation Sword
description: The film tells the story of Zhang Jie, the leader of the Liaoyang Anti-drug Detachment, and his battle of life and death with drug dealers

name: The Great Rescue
description: Russia 1975. Captão Belanga and his sidekick, Ajudante Mirim, go on a dangerous mission to rescue A Sequestrada from the hands of the evil Doutor Malandro.

name: Good Times Bad Times
description: The good times we wished we had lived, might have not been the times we imagined people lived

name: Paper?
description: Two students both need a sheet of paper, but there s only one left. A duel to end all duels commences, with the greatest stakes known to man, the inability to take notes!

name: Players
description: Mac and his high school gangster buddies try to take over the world of sports betting in a city filed with crime, prostitution and gambling.  When the Mafia gets involved, they do whatever it takes to keep these tough young-bloods off their turf.  This Friday Night Lights meets Casino story is filled with the perfect combination of nonstop action, violence, lust and greed.

name: Soul Hunter
description: In the vast universe, there is a planet called "Fantasy Domain" on which an ancient intelligent species lives. This race is highly civilized and kind-hearted. It sends tribesmen to and from other planets in the universe. They are dedicated to the people on all planets but have a long-lasting obsession. On earth, they are called "Zhu Nian Masters."

name: King s Blade
description: Russian-Filipino-American action documentary project "KINGS BLADE" !!!  Interesting stories about Filipino martial arts, told by world-famous Grandmasters !!! Adventures and searches for an ancient relic in the amazing locations of the Philippines !!!  The unique documentary film featuring GM Romeo Macapagal, GM Rene Tongson, GM Bobby Taboada, GM Nicomedes Elizar,  GM Rodel Dagooc, Tuhon Mel Tortal, Tuhon Noy Baldwin T. Garrucho, Tuhon Ray Dionaldo, GM Arnold Narzo !!!  Starring: Felix Cortes and Alex Pisarkin !!!

name: Soil & Fire
description: In 1916, Colonel Kit comes to Balochestan with excuse of creating telegraph lines. Eydokhan, unaware of his plans, welcomes him, but G. Ant and Molla Ali who are aware of his deception began to fight him.

name: The Mysterious Disappearance of Awesome Jackson
description: When AWESOME JACKSON comes home from a trip overseas, he s quickly involved in an explosive accident. But is Jackson really dead? His husband, GAY BORAT, is determined to find out.  First wide-spread release from DDAM films.

name: Koga s Messenger
description: The mysterious Koga Ninja crushes the villains who are trying to take over the inheritance of the Omi castle owner using various means! A sword and witchcraft, a mystery and revenge swirl around the mystery of the hood, in the demon tower, in the underground castle, and at the bottom of the lake!

name: Future Apocolypse
description: Using a Mayan coin to travel through time, a wisecracking young explorer travels to the future where he finds Earth an apocalyptic wasteland besieged by neo-Nazis and mutants. A regional SOV film made in Ontario by a local cast.

name: All Hell Breaks Loose
description: Two assassins named Aaron and Jason Packer are about to get fired over an incident. In order to get their jobs back, the duo (along with two other friend) have to enter a hunting game and win.

name: The Troublemaker
description: Hamouda is a porter at the port who tries to establish a union for the port workers. As those who exploit the workers oppose him, they frame him for a crime and send him to jail. When he is released, he finds his fiancée Nousa waiting for him.

name: The Great Sage: Prequel
description: This film tells the story of Monkey King s catastrophe on the way with his master to learn the scriptures, and finally he converges his wildness and puts down the dust to continue to learn the scriptures from the west.

name: The Long Night: The Battle For Amirim
The Apartment 72
description: Two friends are watching a film and discussing an urban legend about a Mafia hitman in the neighbourhood.

name: Shades of a Killer
description: "Some things are worth fighting for" Once upon a time there was a man named Jaan, A son to a murdered hitman, A protege to a mysterious mentor, Husband to a loving wife. Wanting a way out he must face his enemies but when you re the best you only fight yourself...

name: Code Name Flash
description: The country is in uproar as the Chinese are forced to combat the Vietnamese.

name: New Seven Heroes and Five Gallants
description: The film "The Dragon Slaying Case of the New Seven Heroes and Five Righteousness" tells the story of Song Renzong Tiansheng five years ago, the young Bao Zheng took office in Beijing, but he was involved in a bizarre and mysterious case when he traveled to Jianchang County. Fortunately, on the way, they met Zhan Zhao, the "Southern Hero", and Bai Yutang, the "Jin Mao Rat." Although the three of them were young, they couldn t hide their chivalrous atmosphere. In the process of the three people s step-by-step investigation, strange signs occurred - in a ruined temple, the dead body was "resurrected"... In the face of a dangerous situation, in order to save Bai Yutang s body Zhan Zhao, who is seriously injured, when will Bao Zheng be able to understand this complicated case? Can Zhan and Bai be rescued successfully?

name: Bullets Over Brownsville
description: When a drug dealer receives a video camera, he records life in his housing project, capturing stories of love, fame, opportunity, and coming of age.

name: Dark Warrior
description: Hoichi the Earless must face an assortment of historical warriors.

name: Anything for Love - Story of Rei
description: Rei is on a mission to win the spectacular Arena Games, and with it; the heart of the Princess.

name: Chiyohime Senki
description: An action fantasy movie starring two idols, Meibi Yamanouchi and Riho Iida.

name: Hobo with the Highkick
description: There s a hobo on the loose in Manhatten and ... he has a high kick.

name: Blasé L.A.
description: BLASÉ L.A. is about an ambitious teenager that moves to Los Angeles to complete his last year of high school and reconnect with his estranged father. While there, he creates a new identity for himself in order to run with the popular clique at the school. The film is a time capsule of the selfie-obsessed millennial cultured world of Los Angeles.

name: General Rarz
description: General Rarz is being hunted by the Drug Defence and faces losing his empire. Will he avoid capture and retain his title as drug lord or become another fallen hero?

name: Vigia – Um Olhar Para a Morte
Pig Head
description: On Piggy Bank Road, dead bodies are appearing in areas where the scent of Piggy-related things, such as sosigs and beercaans and porky scratchlings, are pungent to the naked nostril hole. Declan Donnelly is dutti rah shuk as the murders seem to be coming closer to the house he shares with his flat mate, Derrick Stone. When Declan begins to take matters into his own hands, he discovers things you know lik dat. But what will he uncover ? What will he discover? Will he be shuk? Watch to find out Dyldoes xoxo

name: Off Purpose
description: Alex is a broke college student whose family is under constant financial strain due to his late mother s medical bills. So, when his friend tells him about a group of guys with a supply of ecstasy, Alex decides to steal it in hopes to sell it all in a huge one-time deal.

name: Bittersweet Memories
description: Two lovers want to meet again after years without seeing each other. Love, time and space in a tribute to the cinema of Wong Kar-wai.

name: The Code of Man
description: Tetsuya Watari, a modern youth idol, co-stars with Tetsuro Tamba for the first time, and a young man who survives freely is an action giant who swings down the iron arm of justice and anger toward evil

name: Gorillaman
description: A school comedy about a mute transfer student, Tadashi Iketo, who is constant­ly shuffled from school to school for his "violent nature," though he really is a mild-mannered boy constantly taunt­ed into fights over his simian appearance.

name: The Day of the Coyote
description: In a garret overlooking the main square, a professional hitman awaits a very important target. He coldly, efficiently, snaps together the pieces of his sniper rifle.But there’s a screw missing. Time for the universe to have some fun.

name: Rock, Paper, Scissors.
description: After the loss of his mother, Jake signs up for a rock paper scissors tournament where he must prove his self-worth.

name: Sala de espera a una muerte segura
Filth
description: Bloodied, bruised and left for dead a man will stop at nothing to exact gruesome revenge on those who wronged him.

name: Two Soldiers
description: Following a global nuclear war, two soldiers from opposing sides wander the battlegrounds searching for signs of life.

name: Get Dead 3: Hell? On Earth
description: Quart, Tristan and God are living a normal life on Earth while a camera crew follows them to document their miraculous resurrection after Quart and Tristan were announced dead. Simultaneously , God is slowly losing his powers and becoming mortal as The Devil assembles an army from Hell to enact revenge.

name: Sex Drugs & Slot Machines
description: A man plays his last coin on a slot machine and wins. He leaves to go home. Suddenly, he notices someone is chasing him...

name: Ghawar James Bond
description: The events revolve around a three-person gang led by Abu Al-Ghawar (Duraid Lahham), who plans to steal Simon Bay, and the gang members succeed in deceiving him and stealing his locker. Whereas the husband of his sister (Nihad al-Qala i) is a person who has many problems and disputes with the people of the region due to the mockery of the people of the region of Abu al-Ghawar Who uses this money to do amazing inventions that have no use.

name: Captain Green
description: A young scavenger living in a small, crime-ridden town finds a cosmic ring that gives him superpowers.

name: Warriors of the Dark World
description: Many years ago, a legendary sword was forged. A battle took place over the right to wield it, but it was ultimately lost. Years later, the ancestor of the sword s original wielder uncovers the sword and sets off a chain of events involving the fabled Dark World.

name: Yam Narcos
description: An ordinary person living their life gets swept up in the dangerous world of yam trading.

name: Heavy Armor
description: The criminal group headed by Fei Ying kidnapped Liang Jinmin after learning that he could make robots and asked master to build a robot with combat capabilities to assist them in committing robbery crimes.

name: Komaneko, Home Alone
description: A fine day. Ojii leaves Koma alone at home. While Ojii is worried, Koma is a little excited, wondering if Ojii will be happy if she behaves nicely. In time, it begins to rain and thunder. And finally the light goes out. Koma, scared, shivers and something is behind her...! Can Koma go through this situation?

name: The Seed of Juna
description: Juna is a rebellious girl living in a post-apocalyptic world. She finds herself reborn in a different part of the universe after being killed by a ruling religious sect on Earth. As she comes to accept her new disposition in an unknown and frightening place, Juna makes several unexpected encounters with both herself and her surroundings.

name: The Red Pad of Courage
description: When Sam, a young school-girl, receives a visit from a blood-thirsty monster, all hell breaks loose. Unable to escape the vile beast, Sam joins forces with a bad-ass female warrior. Together, they must get down to lady-business and defeat the bloody thing.

name: Predict This!
description: Jenga, a rocket launcher, and seeing into the future.

name: The Killer
description: A former gang leader and lone wolf who has left the organization works behind the scenes in a new city to take revenge on a giant alliance of organizations. This film is amongst the last "straight" yakuza films made at Nikkatsu before the studio s switch-over to pinku eiga.

name: Never Trust Your Allies
description: Three men are searching for a valuable in a school, but one of them is working with the enemy.

name: Trapdoor
description: Have you seen Quincy?

name: Eclipse: The Rise of Ink
description: Casey is a comic fan who left everything in North Carolina to come to New York City to make his dream of becoming a superhero come true after reading "S MAN" Comic Book. Convinced that the comic book predicted his destiny of becoming a superhero as well as saving New York from an imminent threat taking place in the following 24 hours, Casey fight to convince New Yorkers of the danger and to put the pieces of the puzzle together in order save the Big Apple and realizing his dream of becoming a superhero.

name: Cops and Desperados
description: A group of criminals call themselves the "Northern Detachment". They commit several major crimes on the Beijing-Guangzhou Railway. The Public Security Bureau sends Ma Xiaolong after them.

name: Robopocalypse
description: In a futuristic world, a human resistance movement forms to fight for survival against a robot uprising bent on eradicating mankind.

name: Real Life Gun Game II
description: After the 88th Annual Gun Game, Jacob Rabiez Banas, son of Will Rabiez, sets out to avenge his father s death. Little does he know what lies in store for him, with the game having become more horrific than he possibly could have imagined.

name: 大冲撞
description: 2 men are wounded while members of a force fighting drug traders. They have a hard time adjusting to life back in Beijing.

name: The Red Baron
description: This animated feature casts the Red Baron as a hero, in a world of heroic anthropomorphic dogs and villainous anthropomorphic cats.

name: Bluff
description: After his release from prison, Rasool promised his sister Maryam that he would not pursue wrongdoing anymore...

name: Magical Girl Melul
description: Demon King Atler seeks to conquer the Magical World. It s up to magical girl Melul to stop him.

name: Magical Girl Mel
description: Two million years ago, Bat Mel, the daughter of a king in the Magical World meets a two horned person on her way home.

name: Magical Girl Megmel
description: Bat Megmel is a girl that lives in the Magical World. One day, while practicing magic, she accidentally unleashes the demon king Atler. She must seal him again.

name: The Devil Series
description: The Devil is a demon who did unbelievable Devastation with his unbelievable Power, believes in terrorism his Motives lead to destruction on India fights with bob. Now see how bob saves india from of the devil.

name: unbeatin
description: UNBEATiN  is a short film directed and shot by Mahi Dubey and stars Ashish Dubey and Ravi Jadhav. Ashish, as the protagonist, fights his way to his boss s office in order to get a job. Threatened by his boss that he ll Punish him dead if the protagonist cannot get to his office in five minutes, the protagonist kills many on his way to the office only to end up killing the boss and leaving the Training Department.

name: Dangers of the Tongue
description: Cedrick Richardson, a college student trying to stay off of the streets and looking for employment, Dain "the gambler" (gambles for a living) and Gdog, a drug dealer who wants to make it big - each are living separate lives but they all come together when G-dog is ratted out and sent to jail.

name: Tagged
description: Set in the criminal underworld of Waterloo, Stoner Jack inadvertently becomes involved in a drug war between two rival gangs. Jack must survive an onslaught of home invaders as he fends not only for himself but also for his precious marijuana.

name: Elfing Around
description: A feature film created with one man s voice, license-free music and stock photos.  Cinema in its impurest form.  In Joel Edmiston s Elfing Around, Santa Claus is out for revenge after his disgruntled elves send him to space. Jolly Old Saint Nick no more, he doesn t care who he pisses off on his journey to get home, get laid and get even.

name: Legend of Ancient Borneo
description: Four warriors of a village in ancient Borneo were going after a gang of reptiles savages who ravaged their village and took the village s sacred dragon skull, but they soon found out the truth behind their village s prosperity and the untold history of the dragon skull.

name: Cat Fight
description: When two cats face off in a chance encounter, the skirmish spirals into an overdramatic montage of fight scene parodies.

name: The Fight
description: This is the story behind why a local PASTOR got in the ring to fight a professional BOXER. Whether we realize it or not, we are all in a fight. Some of us are fighting for our families or our future. Others are fighting addiction or apathy. Still, others are fighting disease or discontentment. The purpose of this documentary is to inspire you in the fight that you are facing. Do you know someone who needs encouragement in their fight? Please share this story!

name: Chiba the Terrible
description: A Creole kung-fu film.

name: Adigaram 79
description: An amnesiac and a notorious assassin once shared their childhood, and the knowledge of an ancient Indian martial art. When they happen to become confronting forces, what is at stake is much more than survival - friendship, love, honor and the legacy of an art form. A contemporary action-drama set against the backdrop of ancient Indian martial arts.

name: Milk Before Cereal
description: What kind of monster would desecrate a bowl of Kellogg’s Cornflakes like this??

name: The Diadem
description: Secret agent Emma has to carry out a special assignment in Germany. Her job is to protect a mysterious box, the key to which she wears as a chain around her neck. But a murderer is hot on her heels!

name: Les Nouvelles aventures des Tortues Ninja - Les extra-terrestres
Girl Scout Cookies
description: After attempting to sell cookies on their turf, two teenagers find themselves in a battle against the League of Girl Scouts, a group of evil capitalistic preteens who are highly skilled in combat.

name: Folaim - Super Drbawy
description: A Saudi teenager encounters a stereotypical Saudi bully "Drbawi," but with super powers.

name: Lágrimas de fuego
description: After terrorism striked, the youth of Huamanga turned to street gangs, violence and alcohol.

name: Mr. Hinapay EP.1
description: The great detective, Mr. Hinapay, is on the case to solve the mystery, the mystery that will save Earth. But he isn’t the only one drawn to this mystery. Evil forces sent to stop him, but they aren’t ready to face against Mr. Hinapay’s flawless abilities. One by one, they drop like flies. But then the big bad appears and shakes Mr. Hinapay’s vibe off of his feet. The battle is intense. Mr. Hinapay is in on a close victory, only to find out….. he is still far from the mystery.

name: Raze of the Cyborg
description: Grace is abducted by a gang of cyborg criminals. Her boyfriend, the assassin Kuang “Berserker” Feng decides to change himself into an android to come to Grace’s rescue and demand revenge.

name: Motor Pirates
description: Crooks in an armored car-- the modern-day pirates-- trespass, murder and rob other motorists while sailing the roadways. Able to traverse small bodies of water in their craft, they evade police capture... for a time.

name: Jacob s Wrath
description: Alone in an airport s bathroom, a father embarks on a dark and twisted daydream that leads him to consider assassinating his daughter s alleged murderer and the three young men who were present when the tragedy occurred.

name: Huwag Mong Ubusin ang Bait Ko!
description: A dedicated, honest, tough cop decides to go after the bad eggs among law enforcers. In the process, he puts his life and family on the line.

name: Liberty City The Movie
description: The story of a cunning crime boss with a low key approach to business along with his quick tempered partner. As children, the two became lifelong friends and together they build a lucrative criminal empire. A tragic childhood event causes one to lose his older half brother to mental illness in the form of dissociative identity disorder.

name: Bhasudi
description: Unskilled, unruly, unwise souls who ends up risking  their lives for a whopping fortune. Admist their big game of crime, they unknowingly befit a threat to an vicious gangster; which ignites the rivalry for acquiring the throne. One who “Wins” will be the  next “Kingpin”. Story on unflinching courage and weapons: “BHASUDI"

name: Cabal
description: Trapped with no where to run, a hapless business man must fight to survive a bizarre cult s ritual death match. As the fight unravels so will his mind, when the purpose of this cruel game comes head first into the ring.

name: Hetchin
description: Bruno, a single dad trying desperately to sympathize with his teen son, struggles to hide a secret life as a henchman for a supervillain corporation.

name: Die Philosophie der Ameise: Die Geschichte der letzten Menschheit hat begonnen
description: An unknown disease has annihilated the human race. Sand - just a tiny heap of white sand is all that is left of a human being.  When Ruth and Sylvester meet, they are the only survivors. They are immune against the deadly disease; on the brink of madness, they find themselves incapable of shifting the burden of responsibility for mankind, which fate has placed upon them. Could they do anything but start from scratch?

name: Two Big Men
description: A gangster-like detective and an ex-convict who met like fate will work together to launch a "super-legal" business that hunts criminals with bounty. Bad guys falling like autumn leaves in front of two men! Cider-like action is pouring down on this stuffy world!

name: Harib min Al-Ayyam
description: No one can confront the Al-Dafrawi gang, which is wreaking havoc. An idiot young man with a drum wanders around the town, and a girl from the village sympathizes with him, but does not love him back. We discover that this idiot is none other than the leader of the gang.

name: Monochrome: The Chromism
description: Traded and sold like currency, the outcast people known as "Hues", are hunted down after turning color in a black and white world.

name: Scary Banquet
description: The French Concession Inspector Zhong Lang accidentally rescued Qian Shouchang, a wealthy businessman who was attacked by a killer. Boss Qian was very grateful and invited Zhong Lang to settle in the Qian Mansion on the day of his birthday banquet to ensure safety.

name: Defense for Innocence
description: Wilson, an important British official in the Shanghai Public Concession, was shot and killed in a bar.

name: Uncover Inside Story
description: The French Concession launched the "No Smoking Campaign", and a large number of opiums of the gang were seized. Han Fei accidentally got involved in a shootout in a restaurant.

name: Grave Digger
description: At the wedding of a tycoon in Shanghai, the bride is kidnapped. Inspector Zhong Lang discovered that the kidnappers were the notorious "gravediggers". Gravediggers routinely lock their victims in an enclosed space with enough oxygen to breathe for 24 hours.

name: GZ: The Movie
description: Buddy (Adam Eafrati), has just reunited with GZ in Berlin, but unfortunately, both men are swept up in an escalating crisis when GZ turns into his true form, The Brother of the King of the Monsters, combats Hunter Ghidorah and ZG that threaten the survival of humanity. The creatures leave colossal destruction in their wake, as they make their way toward their final battleground: Tokyo.

name: Iron of the Conquistadors
description: Age of yin. Age of yang. Which do you choose?

name: Navarathna
description: A construction worker happens to find an ancient box comprising of an attractive  Navarathna  Necklace while digging at construction site. Strange things happen to people around this suspicious Navarathna necklace and thereby the story takes a sharp turn to a restricted Forest where 3 people travel deep into the forest. The story then unfolds in a suspicious thriller manner.

name: The Raid
description: Four special operation FBI agents go on a mission to take down a terrorist organization.

name: Golden Cage
description: Amir is the youngest child of Izadi Bozorg family who was sent to America by his father because of the better opportunities, but because of some issues his communications with his family is cut and Mansor. his older brother. goes to America to bring him back and…

name: Time Lost
description: Set at the height of  The Troubles , in 1985,  Time Lost  is an intense, but darkly amusing at times film; focusing on the nature of sensorial perception.  When Derek Houghton, a young publisher s assistant receives a suspicious package, followed by a sinister telephone call, he is confronted with a terrifying situation. Time is of the essence.

name: Vrutham
description: Balu takes revenge against people who falsely implicated him in a murder. Will he be able to bring the real criminals in front of the law?

name: Adam Driver Fan Cast: Covid Zoom Special Fantasy Forever
description: Lance and Spenser, 10 years after ending the Adam Driver Fan Cast, have to discover the lost tape to save the world. Across their journey they get robbed, stopped by a cop, and trip in a world of legos

name: Cunning Kids
description: Dragons in the night ,hideing in the darkness of the shadows of the night, lying in wait for the Prince of the dragons to be born , I should say hatched, they can hear the sounds of the pecks many miles away; it takes several thousand years for the egg of a Dragon to hatch , all the beasts of the wilderness,waiting for the moment the magnificent one will arrive  —Sheila Johnson

name: Prime Suspects
description: A cold-blooded killer infiltrates the lives of two actors who refuse to return stolen money that the killer claims belongs to him. A classic, film noir feast for the millenium.

name: Karate Do
description: Nicki Wright learns the meaning of acceptance after being reunited with her father. He reluctantly teaches her martial arts.

name: Transformers: Broken Mirror
description: Treadshot lands on an alternate universe in which he is viewed a criminal. He and his human friend must convice this world s autobots he is good while fending off against his enemies.

name: Rajeeva
description: Rajeeva is a Kannada movie starring Mayur Patel and Akshatha Sreedhar Shastry in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Flying King Manju.

name: Memory Hunter
description: Han Xiaofeng, a memory hunter who has always been lonely, was involved in a research and development event about memory implantation five years ago after encountering the indifferent female hunter ink shadow. Tang Mubai is the core figure of this event and also Han Xiaofeng’s Good friend, so Ink Shadow approached Tang Mubai through Han Xiaofeng. With the in-depth investigation of Ink Shadow, the truth was revealed layer by layer.

name: Prayers
description: It is the year of 2014, Shibuya is independent from Japan, and it becomes an independent nation. It is a town of chaos where only young people are living. The life necessity, such as electricity, water, and food are transported by the pipelines out from the Shibuya. The pipelines are running like cobweb in the sky, the young people in Shibuya looked like bugs trapped in the cobweb.

name: Prime Angel
description: The film tells that in 2050, people will enter the virtual world through VR, including studying, working, shopping, and making friends. Shanghai’s Saito Group is the world’s largest VR company with 2.7 billion online users worldwide.

name: 3086: Robot Like a Boss
description: 3086: Robot Like A Boss is a computer animated comedy about Robots in an apocalyptic future.

name: Absolute Crisis
description: A police officer and her partner goes undercover at a beauty pageant in order to catch a terrorist

name: Sansone e la ladra di atleti
description: "Albertini is the champion of Italian athletic cinema. When he’s around, wrongs are righted by way of bold feats. The year 1919 saw him in superb shape. In Sansone e la ladra di atleti he is joined by another sort of hero: Costante Girardengo, the first great champion of Italian cycling." - Andrea Meneghelli

name: Temple of Devilbuster
description: Tai-bao is the reincarnation of the Devil Star and A-queen is the one fated to take on his sins. It becomes clear that as the two try to escape the criminal underworld, an abusive father, who wants to take Tai-bao back to the temple, is using them to take the blame for other people s sin.

name: The Way to Freedom
description: Daniel Cheng is a young promising neurosurgeon. He is dating Lisa Crown, the heiress of a well-known family. After having a successful greeting dinner with the Crowns, Daniel is unexpectedly forbidden to see Lisa by her disabled grandfather who is a Korean War Veteran. Daniel has to fight for his love, literally and figuratively.

name: Battle of Chinatown
description: The film tells the story of Ye Zhuo, a chivalrous man who travels across the ocean to dismantle the Black Dragon Gang

name: Song of the Coconut Grove
description: To restore communications to the island of Hainan, the People s Army sends scouts across the Palm Grove Strait to the Leizhou Peninsula, where the detachment radio station was located.

name: Covered Sun
description: In a world populated by humans and gigantic creatures called Konoc, San has to lead Snoun, a girl with no past, to the Sorrowful Mountains. Will he accomplish his mission?

name: The S.A.S
description: Five students kidnap a young man during a night out at the club.

name: 镖行天下前传7：编外人选
镖行天下前传8：烽火辽东
The Prequel of Gold Convoyers: Confidence of Banking Stockroom
The Prequel of Gold Convoyers: An Ultimate Task
IUVO (Short)
description: A young girl living in the slums of a futuristic world makes a startling discovery.

name: 30 Second Initiative (Short)
description: Chicago is under siege by a creature who seems intent on causing as much death and destruction as possible and there is only one person with the power and courage to stop it. The next 30 Seconds will decide the fate of millions.

name: Changing Life - Der Fluch Der Zombies
description: A few years ago there was a strange incident in a wooded area near Braunschweig. A teacher disappeared with his class during a night hike without a trace. To this day the group is missing. It is said that the teacher murdered his students and buried them in the forest. Their bodies were never found.  Residents and relatives of the missing now believe that there is a curse on this forest, as they heard voices and screams from the undergrowth during evening walks. A group of young drug dealers does not bother this old wives  tale very much! They meet in this forest to smoke their shit and to let the world sink in.  But then suddenly things never imagined happen...

name: Hafsa
description: Hafsa is a trans street dweller with a troubled past, who finds herself in conflict with the sexist world she lives in. When she meets Luna, Hafsa decides to make a change in herself and in the world.

name: Frankie s Jewels
description: Action comedy about two men on a journey to recover the stolen family jewels of aging mobster boss Frank Mancini. So he can rest in peace - in one piece! -

name: Nightmare and the Black Clouds
description: A guy fights mysterious masked  creatures with his own hands while having a mysterious voice of wisdom by his side.

name: Marshmello
description: Yazan, despite the obstacles he faced, tries to implement his plan of revenge for his father deceased some time ago.

name: Gyantse 1904
description: David Austin, a Scottish scholar of the Orient, befriends Awang Dunzhu on the bustling streets of Kathmandu, not knowing that the two will soon both become translators for opposing sides in the British invasion of Tibet.

name: Shadow Dream
description: A mobster tries to destroy the career of a young Black boxer. The same mobster murdered the family of a Korean martial arts master. The two join forces to get even with the mobster and get a shot at the heavyweight championship.

name: El Robo
description: Three brothers set out to kill one another.

name: Followers
description: A man escapes from prison and meets a boy who has run away from school.

name: Argue/Defeat
description: With anger and hesitance, will these two policemen find the real culprit of a crime, or will they just find themselves on a rough patch?

name: Kontrabando
description: Lieutenant Diego, a government intelligence officer, a G-2, becomes a double agent to gain entry into the sinister world of the smugglers of firearms, jewelry, and opium.

name: Spectreman vs. Russ Abbott
description: Spectreman flies out to destroy Russ Abbott. In his disco lair, Abbott detects Spectreman and Prepares horrible weapon. Mayhem ensues!

name: Ninja Dream
description: Ripped from Super 8MM comes the lost surreal action film by Carl J. Sukenick.  Terrorist agent known as the Black Scorpions have stolen NASA s gamma ray weapon. With its power Lord Scorpio plans to conquer the earth. The only survivor of these attacks is Carl J. Sugar-King of the DoD. He must train within his unconscious to fight or we may all perish to the hand of doom!

name: Sajadah Ka bah
description: Rhoma Irama, a traveler, are visiting mosques in Lombok to enhance ties and strengthen the Islamic brotherhood among mosques administrators that are joined in the Fahmi Tamami forum. By chance Rhoma meets a widow, Sohiba, and her daughter Saimah. Their mosque is the target of Towi, a businessman scheming to build the biggest gambling area of Lombok in place of Sohiba’s mosque and house.  Towi tricks Ridho, Rhoma’s son, turning him against his father so that Rhoma has to face Towi and his own son during the land feud. Ridho revolts against his father partly due to his love toward Towi’s sole daughter.  Rhoma accepts Towi’s duel challenge in order to determine the one who will be entitled of Sohiba’s house and mosque. Meanwhile Towi’s men intimidate Sohiba and her daughter, seizing a prayer mat with Kabah image on it, woven by her.

name: The Stocking
description: Submarine Man and his friends battle against the corrupt and evil entity known as "The Stocking".

name: Tales of the Rays: Everlasting Destiny
description: Bandai Namco announced a new short anime titled Tales of the Rays: Everlasting Destiny. The anime will tell a story featuring the "other side" of the rescue of Ickx from the second chapter of the game (Mirrage Prison), showing the actions of Stahn and Leon, and will connect to the game s new story "Fairy s Requiem" which is the 3rd arc in the game app.

name: 77 Group s Secret
description: Sang-ho and Sun-ja are kidnapped by someone and live in brutal abuse while performing acrobatics in a circus troupe called the "77th Dan". One day their uncle comes to visit them and they try to escape, but when Sun-ja is captured by the circus, a black hooded person suddenly appears to help them.

name: The Pioneers
description: Wu Linfang, an immigrant from the mainland to Taiwan more than a hundred years ago, grows from a poor boy to a leader who instructs villagers to open oil wells

name: Assassin
description: Hsu Feng plays Shu Mei, the female assassin engaged to Ling Tien-yu, a swordsman played by Tien Peng. As they are fighting against the Mongolian army that is invading China, Shu Mei takes up a suicidal mission to assassinate the Mongolian chieftain. Again, Hsu Feng appears as a brave swordswoman in the film. In the beginning, she sacrifices her love life and then dressed in white, she fights with dual blades, chains and bare hands against the enemy. Hsu Feng not only shows great fighting skills but brings the character vividly to life. It is not surprising that she won Best Leading Actress at the 1976 Golden Horse Awards. Moreover, the impressive face-changing trick is seen in the film.

name: Mighty Orbots: Magnetic Menace
description: The most invincible team of superhero robots in the universe, The Mighty Orbots , with their inventor Rob Simmons at the helm, fight the forces of evil in three action packed adventures. In the Magnetic Menace,   The Wish World  and  Trapped On The Prehistoric Planet  the Orbots must stop the powerful computer Umbra from destroying Earth. At Rob s command are five Orbots ready to burst out of their underground recharge chambers to save planet Earth. Will the evil robot prove too powerful for the Orbots? Find out in the Orbot s three great adventures-it s mighty entertaining!

name: The Last Stroke
description: The story of an old man who is very good in Karate but pretends to be weak and fragile. By this way he and his friend make quarrels and steal the people. But one day he meets a person who is very familiar to him.

name: Spiral Zone: Ride the Whirlwind
description: Zone Riders are shot down while escorting an evacuation detail to San Juan before a tropical storm hits. The Zone Riders attempt to clear a zoned area of higher ground in order to evacuate the civilians by land.

name: Buddy Spirits
description: In 202x, robots have become essential partner for humans. One day, a silver security robot went out of control regardless of its emergency shutdown and people were in panic. The robot military unit "SARF" established in the metropolitan police begins their mission!

name: Hatchet
description: After a powerful mob boss dies, a number of his underlings fight for power.

name: Exit: The Game
description: 6 friends, a rural getaway weekend, a game. What was supposed to be an idyllic weekend turns into the worst of their nightmares.

name: The Hidden Strike
description: The Hidden Strike is a fictional movie about a ground mission where a team of thirteen Indian Army officers and soldiers went across POK and destroyed the terrorist camp with a planned sub tactical strike. The film is dedicated to India soldiers and their families. The film shows what price our freedom fighters pay for the safety of our country. The Hidden Strike also highlights issues that the Indian Army faces from certain groups of people from the valley.  —Suzad Iqbal Khan

name: C.O.P.S. - The Case of The Iceberg Pirates
description: A team of specially enhanced policemen fights crime in the year 2020.

name: Centurions
description: The adventures of a unit of elite soldiers who wear special frames that accept various weapons and transportation equipment teleported from a space station.

name: Saber Rider and the Star Sheriffs: The Star Sheriff s Betrayal
description: In the distant future, a team of four high tech Star Sheriffs defends frontier space colony Yuma from outlaws, as well as Outriders, an army of humanoid alien beings called Vapors, led by mysterious Nemesis, who need Yuma s resources.

name: Shady Side
description: Tim and his girlfriend Fain live with their little people in a human apartment and consider the woman to whom she belongs as a goddess. They have bad enemies: mold. There is fierce fighting, wounds, betrayal and ... maybe a happy ending?

name: Our Research Project
description: The summer holidays are over: time for the students to present their self-selected research projects. But besides lemon lamps and sea clocks, some of the students have bigger plans. So also Kiyoshi, who wants to make up for his failure from last summer...

name: Mask Ninja Nishida
description: An unemployed young man by chance gets into an age-old conflict of good versus bad. A magical fruit is said to be able to cure all diseases and when a malicious virus threatens the earth, its mission is clear: to save humanity from extinction. Before he knows it, he transforms into the intrepid Kamen Ninja Nishida and is plunged into a crazy adventure that takes him across time to the Japanese Middle Ages. Samurai versus ninja, wild fights, aerial acrobatics and clanking steel. The final battle for the future of the world begins.

name: All in a Day s Work
description: 2019 film

name: Jack Nightrider
description: IT S THE YEAR 20XX, A NEW EVIL IS TAKING OVER THE CITY, AND LONE WOLF RENEGADE ACTION COP JACK NIGHTRIDER IS THE ONLY MAN WHO CAN STOP IT.

name: M.A.S.K. The Movie
description: 4 linked racing series episodes including Demolition Duel and Battle of the Giants

name: Karate Kat: Aristokratic Kapers
description: Karate Kat betrays the myth of a graceful feline in his half-hour animated series. First aired on The Comic Strip in the late  80s, The Aristokratic Kapers follows a martial arts expert who heads the McClaw Detective Agency. The crime-fighting fur ball must contend with a trio of evil-doing misfits: Sumo Cat, Burglar Cat, and Mafia Cat. Karate Kat is joined by other lively characters like Meow-Baby, Katmandu, and Cat Gut. Using his sixth sense and somewhat questionable physical prowess, Kat takes the view on a series of misadventures.

name: Reconciliation
description: A short fight animation by rapparu.

name: The Further Mysteries of Fu-Manchu
description: Detective Nayland Smith, comissioned by the British Government to investigate a series of murders comes up against the "Coughing Horror", Dr Fu-Manchu s servant.

name: Ghost in the Shell Arise [.jp]
description: A short movie with Motoko Kusanagi explaining the move from the Ghost in the Shell website kokaku-a to the top level domain  .jp

name: The New Exploits of Elaine
description: A silent action movie serial.

name: Carpe Diem
description: Provincial girl Yuko is tired of life and follows a fleeting encounter in the big city. A hotel room later, her supposed victim role changes into something unexpectedly new and Yuko realizes her true destiny.

name: Slime Adventures - Yeah! The Sea!
description: A short anime directed by Yuasa Masaaki with Production IG, distributed on VHS as a bonus to a video game magazine subscription. The main character is a Slime from the Dragon Quest video games.

name: Mashed: Dinner with LeBron - Sprite of the Earth
description: Lebron James and Lucas Korns nuke Cleveland to end the furry war and then get #canceled and have to go on the run from thanos and try to figure out if they re really revolutionaries or just terrorists.

name: Majnoon
description: 5th Movie By Rasool Mollagholi Poor in Iran and first Performance as an actor by Masoud Karamati.

name: The Last Eagle Scout
description: In the not-so-distant future, society has allowed political correctness to go beyond the point of the absurd. For years the Boy Scots have been under the government microscope and finally have been mandated to close their doors for good. Boy Scot, Cliff Elliot, stirs the pot as he tries to cling to the last shreds of patriotism and earn the last Eagle Scout Award.

name: Revolt of the Mystic
description: 1896, start of the Philippine Revolution, Liwa, Ula and Ughaw, female aswangs facing extinction, due to Spanish colonizers wanting to extinguish the Filipino culture join the Katipunan as faction leaders to ultimately defeat the race that is killing them.

name: Kin of the Stained Blade
description: Not forgiven. Not forgotten. See the story of brothers torn asunder.

name: Dandam Dashagunam: The Police
description: The conscientious policeman ACP Surya is a powerful and efficient officer who works for law and order and protects people. One day when he is chasing criminals, he meets Maya and falls in love with her. He had previously thought that no woman could ever touch his heart again. Therefore he behaves a little awkwardly and cannot find the right words. Maya, on the other hand, soon finds out that he is a police officer. When both find their happiness of love, however, fate wants Surya to kill an Underworld Don named Drug Manja. His angry and extremely dangerous brother Tamate Shiva seeks bloody revenge, and does not stop at the relatives or the lovers of the brave policemen who are involved in the case.

name: A Wandering Swordsman and 108 Bars of Gold
description: A wise martial arts teacher, knowing that the future will need his treasure, hid his hoard of gold before he died. His daughter and a rival teacher have other plans for gold and each send their agents to try and find it

name: A Swordsman In The Twilight
description: Kim Tae-won remains loyal to Queen Min after the ursper Jang Hie-bin takes the throne. Queen Hie-bin s chief magistrate tyrranizes those who remain sympathetic to the old queen and attempts to kill any who will not pledge alliegence to the new monarch

name: Obsidian Meltdown Presents: Seals Of Refusal
description: Craig s journey continues as he teams up with Fatty to kick ass and take names.

name: The Masked Teacher
description: By acclaimed writer/director Jatin Dhakate comes a somber tale about friendship, betrayal, and the meaning of life.

name: Superbike
description: The Pirate Bikers, lead by Bugis, share a deep, common interest in their Superbikes. After years of illegal racing on the streets, they are now eager to compete on real race tracks. After a fateful meeting with Pak Hamid, who is a veteran racer, and receiving tutelage from him, the Pirate Bikers feel ready to take on that challenge.

name: Chanaksha
description: Shiva Rudraiah s son decides to avenge his father s death and fulfill his dream with wit, intelligence, and wisdom.

name: Aag Aandhi Aur Toofan
description: Inspector Arjun Singh takes the help of Durga, Seema, Geeta, and Sikander Khan to capture Chandi, a dangerous criminal.

name: Новая сказка для русских
description: Animals from the forest went versus extraterrestrials locusts. Locusts has invasion some years ago and occupied their territory.

name: Fighting Chupacabra and Cartel in Mexico
description: The drug cartel hires Dr. Fleming to investigate Chupacabra sightings due to the loss of drug shipments to the USA. When her guide goes missing, she is left alone in the Mexican desert. When the cartel decides to kill her she has to call for John Haynes. Will John Haynes save her? Will the cartel kill them? Will the Chupacabra get them?

name: My Lady of the Cave
description: My Lady of the Cave is the first feature film by pioneer filmmaker Rudall Hayward.

name: Homestuck: The Musical
description: A musical Adaptation of Homestuck.

name: D-52
description: After the police unit is sent to investigate who is destroying their drones around the city, they encounter a droid that will provide resistance to their repression.

name: Kemilau Cinta di Langit Jingga
description: Structured as a film within a film, Rhoma Irama and his girlfriend, Aida, are hired to make a film by Leo and his right hand, Richard. While Rhoma has several shows in the same city, Leo pursues his criminal activities. For him, moviemaking is a camoulflage for his crimes. Richard, who is still in love with Aida, tries to separate Rhoma from the girl. While filming a scene, Rhoma is stabbed for real. While Rhoma is in hospital, Imron, a Rhoma impersonator is introduced. Then a scenario is written for Richard to get Aida. Later, Rhoma impersonates Imron and pulls Imron’s girlfriend Nina out from prostitution. Finally, Rhoma is able to solve the whole drama and Aida is back in his arms. Rhoma’s songs, which are his trademark and selling point, continue to be used.

name: L.A. Task Force
description: L.A s most beautiful women are disappearing and found dead. The mayor of Los Angeles is aware that a crazed killer is on the loose and orders a special team to be set up called the L.A Task Force, but time is running out.

name: Ana almajnun
description: Hassan enters a mental hospital, claiming madness after stealing a jewelry shop. Naima pretends to be his sister, and meets Adam the head of the nurses and agrees to marry him. Hassan escapes with the help of Adam while Naima takes the jewelry bag and and everyone starts chasing her.

name: Super Hero Festival: Kamen Rider x Super Sentai Live & Show 2016
description: A special event that delivers talks by the casts of "Kamen Rider Ghost" and "Shuriken Sentai Ninninger", and luxurious music live by artists who excite Kamen Rider & Super Sentai series. At Music Live, we have created a special live performance by the gorgeous guest artists that is unique to the Super Hero Festival! We will deliver live performances that have achieved even greater collaboration and revolution!

name: The Panz Identity
description: Special Agent M puts the life of the president — and himself — on the line in a high-stakes card game with terrorist Hanz Panz.

name: Hall Cop
description: A high school hall cop takes a shot at redemption after running into two jumping hooligans.

name: Taste of Love
description: 500 years ago, three spirits escaped from Heaven, but Wu Kong got separated from Zi Xia and Bu Kong. Now they’ve all taken human form as the latter two head an army to fight the Bull Demon. It is during one of those battles that Zi Xia recognizes Wu Kong, with whom she was in love, as one of the enemy’s surgeons. But when she finally gets a chance to meet him she realizes he has forgotten his own identity.

name: Harrold - Ferrari Hat Kid
description: Two work colleagues attempt to complete an unfinished documentary for their mysterious boss. It leads them down a long and windy road of peril, drugs, and inter-dimensional travel.

name: Musical Utena ~ Blooming Rose of Deepest Black
description: The continuation of Musical Utena ~ Bud of the White Rose that tells the events of the Black Rose saga.

name: Tie naisen sydämeen
description: Pentti Anttila is a journalist, who accidentally ends up in to a mental institution. There he meets a woman, who claims that she is being kept there by force. Penttilä starts to investigate the case and he ends up in to a little town named Järvensuu. There he drifts in to a conflict with the local mob.

name: Jonny Quest: Time is Running Out
description: A board game featuring the characters from Jonny Quest as they set out to save Dr. Benton Quest from an octopus.

name: In a World of Hurt
description: Scarlet is relieved of her duties as a sheriff by the mayor of the dying city of Sallow. The dreaded Aldritch gang has been putting pressure on the town and people have been leaving by the dozens. In a last effort to save face with the citizens, Mayor Thomas tries firing the female sheriff to replace her with someone he believes has a stronger presence. As Scarlet begins to adjust to her new life as a rancher, the Aldritch gang has nothing stopping them from collecting a family debt.

name: The Death of A Enchantress
description: Four years of Party Goj 고조 Mudeok,  The Moorim First Witch, "White Ox," attacked.  The Eyepung that sent the whole family away.  He sharpens his exploits with a bloody grudge.  It is not enough to deal with the "white bull" who has the legendary monumental lotus flower in his hand.  Indeed, will the strong  Ear Poong  be able to prevent the  White Ox  from flooding and succeed in revenge?  A full moon night,  Awaken the absolute warrior to rule the Gang!

name: The Art of Murder
description: After the shocking murder of a comic book artist at the evening party of a teen celebrity, a local detective must investigate a series of clues in order to discover which party attendee was the true killer, all while confronting his own personal quest and finding his purpose and identity.

name: Baazi
description: An intelligent son of a former entrepreneur takes revenge on a powerful and rich businessman who is as smart as he is.

name: Manuset
description: He wakes up in the woods, bloody and confused ...

name: The 4th Beast: Mask of the Antichrist
description: An ex-army ranger has to discover the truth behind a mysterious disc.

name: Giang Hồ Chợ Mới Tiền Truyền - Trật Tự Mới
Pratibad
description: A middle-class family struggle to make ends meet. Their only hope is their son Rana who always fights injustice which lands him a job in the police force and takes care of the family.

name: Tыrmenatr 4
description: A parody of the Terminator franchise made by teens in the post-apocalyptic landscapes of panel-block microraion Kuntsevschina, Minsk.

name: Super Hero Festival: Kamen Rider x Super Sentai Live & Show 2019
description: Kamen Rider Zi-O & Kaitou Sentai Lupinranger VS Police Sentai Patranger! A special event consisting of talks by show casts and luxurious music live by artists who energize the Kamen Rider & Super Sentai series. At Music Live, a special live performance by amazing guest artists has been arranged! We will deliver a luxurious collaboration live only for Super Hero Festival!

name: Love is Blind The Movie
description: Watch the thrilling conclusion of the Love is Blind web series by Wanly Florexile

name: Zero Nine
description: A detective abandoned his daughter right after his wife s death for a governmental mission. This made her daughter angry. He risks his life to find his daughters missing best friend in order to fix their relationship. Their search leads them to face a deadly organ trafficking band who has blackmailed a doctor for harvesting the organs.

name: Bad Detective
description: The story begins in the late Qing Dynasty and early Republic of China. It tells about a sensational homicide and robbery in a small town in Hubei. Qin Gang, a dartman, died strangely, and Deng Ting, a police detective in the town, was appointed to investigate. Shortly after Deng Ting and his assistant Song Feiyan surveyed the scene, the suspect was locked into a man named Chen Tianhe. The arrested Chen Tianhe confessed to the case, directly acknowledging that the homicide was committed by himself. This made Deng Ting doubt, and immediately sent Song Feiyan to continue the investigation to collect details that might be missed. The case was unfolded in an unexpected direction at this time, and things were not as simple as Deng Taki and others had imagined. It turned out that it all started with a wrongly judged case ten years ago...

name: Bloodlines
description: A time-travelling fugitive steals a device capable of teleportation and is pursued by a detective who has been tracking him.

name: Tebaatusasula
description: TEBAATUSASULA was filmed in the slums of Wakaliga, Uganda. The film was lost after Wakaliwood s computer was damaged by a power surge.  Only its trailer survives.

name: Le Grand Rendez-Vous
description: Remake of the famous short film C etait un rendez-vous (1976), where Claude Lelouch shows us a Mercedes 450SEL, to the sound of a Ferrari 275 GTB, V-12 engine, which runs through the streets of Paris until the driver finds and gives a kiss on the beloved woman. This first feat without authorization from the city hall of Paris and yielded up to a few hours at the Police Station.  This time everything was done within the law. A Ferrari SF90 Stradale, driven by Charles Leclerc, racing through the Monaco Grand Prix circuit, closed to traffic and pedestrians from 6:45 am to 9:00 am.

name: Carter Price and The Gem of Kings
description: Carter Price is getting close to finding the lost gem of kings, with the help of his old friend Jonah Debret. However when he runs into Mike Martin things take a turn for the worst, Carter Price can t trust anyone. Strap in for this fun Indiana Jones style adventure.

name: Carter Price Legacy
description: Carter Price after an unforeseen tragedy sets out to find Black Beard s treasure with the help of old friends. Complications arise when someone from his past makes an unexpected appearance.

name: 24 Hours in Las Vegas
description: A young con man has 24 hours to rob several Las Vegas casinos.

name: The Ghost Hour
description: Soldiers in Afghanistan cost a quarter million a piece...and have no trigger discipline

name: 3 Minutes to Live
description: Young Mr Johnson, goes to hospital to pick up a health report and discovers that he only has 3 minutes to live. The news upsets him, and in a rage, incredible events follow that trigger global chaos.

name: Jump to a Full Moon
description: The end of the 19th century. Far East. Harsh nature and numerous wild animals. A lost village in the boreal forest. A hunter from the indigenous Orochi people rescues a little Russian girl from a plundered caravan and raises her as his daughter. Years pass by, the girl grows up and the village lifestyle changes too. The gold rush, hunting and robber warbags, the fight for the possession of beauty to the death. From firearms to steel tiger claws. Severe manners, wild customs where truth, hardness of mind and primal power win.

name: Johnson and Johnson: Private Detectives 40th Anniversary Edition
description: A couple of bumbling private detective siblings get hired to investigate a bar robbery, in this short, low budget, action/comedy send-up of the 1970s "TV private detective" genre.

name: Dhee Jatt Di
description: A girl seeks revenge after criminals destroy her family.

name: Batman Jr.
description: After the death of the legendary Batman, his son must take on the son of his father s greatest enemy - The Joker.

name: Koh Zad
description: When a man finds out that his beloved daughter has been kidnapped by a group, he chases them everywhere, and after the adventures, he finally saves the girl and realizes that the girl s kidnappers are the same hints that her parents killed.

name: Tiger Cop: Toilet Paper Hero
description: The notorious “Toilet Paper Bandit” has been stealing toilet paper around the country. Whilst breaking into the home of Detective Tang, the bandit is cornered by Tiger.  Tiger and Tang join forces to bring down the bandit at all costs. Fists, Kicks and Toilet Paper.

name: Yamata Snake
description: Wang Shi, the dizzy business guide of the dire business, came across a peach girl who was killed by the evil ninja. Under the pressure of Peach, Wang Shi and her embarked on a journey to find the ninja blade and other female ninjas. When everything is ready, the peach of Hattori is captured by the evil ninja, and Wang Shi has become the key to launching the ninja blade. In order to defeat the evil magic ninja s Baqi Serpent Illusion, Wang Shi in the kimono department decided to let go.

name: Jango Bravo
description: Jango Bravo terrorizes a small town in the "sertão", killing in cold blood everyone who makes fun of him. After parading his evil in the city s pubs, Jango decides to go to the local church to murder the priest, but an unexpected miracle makes him rethink his attitudes.

name: Marjory Targeryen - your worst nightmare becoming true
